26b8(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gang por dkar mo la sogs pa/ kha dog dbye bas so so yin// de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas// dkyil 'khor ba yang rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni/ nang gi 'aper ma yang
27a1(rgyud): ngag gnas/ phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbu su bdag med rnal
27a2(rgyud): ma// phyi rol 'bar ma dkar mo dang // chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma// g+ha sA rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyad pa g.yung mos gang ba'o// 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid// mkha' spyod sa skyed ma zhes brjod// 
27a3(rgyud): srid dang zhi nga'i rang bzhin gyis// ngosu sgyur ma yang dag gnas// lha mo theng sna tshogs mdog/ dran chen phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// zhal gcig ma la ngag bzhi na// spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can pa// 'khor lo
27a4(rgyud): rnacha mgul rgyan dang // lag par gdubu ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas ldan rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs/ jilta rabadag med rnal 'byor ma/ de ltar thad nir bshad/ g.yon pas
27a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang // de bzhin steng du kha T+wAM ga// g.yas na rdo rje sngon po dang // de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid// ro la zhon zhing ba/ zi brjid 'bar// spyan dmar de bzhin sdeng skyes ser// kha dog sdod
27a6(rgyud): me chos gsal ma// stag gi lpags pas snam dkris shing / 'jig pa'i me ni lta bur ni// gsal ba'i gzugs can mde gnas// g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste// g.yon na margad sde mtshungs// bag gi
27a7(rgyud): sAl zhal gcig sa/ rgyun rnams kun gyis rnar brgyad/ lag pa gcigan yod pams bral// g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa ma/ rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang / de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas des// sos rgyas
27a8(rgyud): sprin dang mnyam pa yi/ 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu spro/ de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag// mkhas pas dbus bsgom par bya// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
27b1(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni// phyag rgya chen por yong su gzung // thaMd nor bltas nas ni// sngags
27b2(rgyud): bas 'di ni bsgrubs par bya// sar po legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni// srad bus thig gdab shes rab can// ji ltar nus par dkyil 'khor nyid// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta dngas
27b3(rgyud): rnams kyis shin tu mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// gos dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// mtshams kyi cha rnams thang dang // sgro yi khyud kyi grwa rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// de yi 'khor lo mas
27b4(rgyud): skabs/ nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gang ba byA// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ rdo rje ka ba'i nang logasu// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnar
27b5(rgyud): rgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnar dgod// gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yi/ sgrub pa 'ang khyod la bshad par bya// de la dang por lha nyid kyi// khyim du
27b6(rgyud): sngags bzhugs nas ni// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas de stong rdo rje ni// dkar po rtse mo lnga pa nyid// tshogs bsam par byas nas nas/ ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la// mchod nas
27b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas byang chub se de kun// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bdag ni che go mo zhes bgyi// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// ji ltar dus
27b8(rgyud): gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ni ngas mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // son don byed tshul thas rang chu sa sa
28a1(rgyud): / gsum// se sor bdag gis brtan por gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa ding nas brtan por bzung // 
28a2(rgyud): rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // de nyid las ni so sor gzung // slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la//  mi re re drug byas
28a3(rgyud): nas// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung // las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa tha~Md
28a4(rgyud): ldan par ni// zang so sor bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// seMn kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi/ 
28a5(rgyud): ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi// mgrol bdag sgrol bar bgyi// // dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sen mya ngan 'das la gzhag/ de nas bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin patha~Md kyi rtse mo las byung
28a6(rgyud): bya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'dis bka' sprul pa/ de nas bsam gautan gnas 'dug nas// chos rnams thaMd bdag med par// yang dag rje su blta bar bya// byi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ 
28a7(rgyud): 'di dag thaMd sems kyis brtags// sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni// gzhan du yod pa ma yin// chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir// yid kyisau a nu t+pan+da brjod// de nas
28a8(rgyud): rang sems de nyid 'dis// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// 'dod pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pas ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnar blta/ oM tsat+ti pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi// tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshe dag pa// na mkha' lta
28b1(rgyud): bung dri ma med// yid gnyis kun las rnar grol// mchog tu rnar rtog pa 'joms// nyon mongs dri mdzad dag/ dang po zla ba ltar bzlas nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir// a sogs gzugs kyis 'jug par
28b2(rgyud): 'gyur// a A i i u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH/ bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// ston khyad par ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ gru gsum rgya cher rang bzhin can// sang+yas
28b3(rgyud): kun gyi yon gnas// 'di ni a sogs gzugs kyis ni// sangs rgyas ston 'jug par 'gyur// shel dang zla ba lta bur ni// de yi stong du 'jug par 'gyur// sems na rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de nyid
28b4(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu// sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni// byang chub sems ni bskyed par byed// oM bo d+hini/ ut+pA da yA mi/ byams pa'i rjesu rim 'thung ba// sen rje su 'dzin pa'o// dge ba'i chos
28b5(rgyud): kyis yang dag gang // nyon mongs thad nges par gnon// zla bi 'dri rmyi/ la 'khor dbu su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can// ridir/ yang skar mir rnam pas ni// sangs rgyas ston ka sogs kyi/ 
28b6(rgyud): gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yi/ rnal 'byor gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur// ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tshe dza dz+ha nya/ Ta tra Ta D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ ba ba ba b+ha ma/ ya ra lA wA/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor cho ga
28b7(rgyud): kun// rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsum so// de la dbus rtse lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po bcas pa nyid// kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir// bdag nyid rdorje'i gzugs brnyan du// 'di mi
28b8(rgyud): sngags kyis bsgom par bya// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub spyod pa bla na med// de yis ni rtogs pa 'di// ye shes dag pa zag pa med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rdo rje nges par brtag par bya// namakha'i
29a1(rgyud): / khams ni thaMd kyi// chang du yang dag grang ba yi/ rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid du// sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o// 'dis ni sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis// spro ba dang ni bsdu bur bya// oM badz+ra At+ma/ 
29a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni// snang ba med cing gnas pa med// ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid// dngos po med pa la sogs spang so// bcad med dbyer med bzung du med// chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa// rdo rje bdag med
29a3(rgyud): yang dag gyur// rdo rje'i sku ni gong na med// de ltar yang rdo rjes mtshon pa bsgom par bya ba bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa zad nyon cig/ yang ni rdo rje sede ni// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gtsu
29a4(rgyud): brnyan ni// 'od yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// oM ya thA sarba tathA gud+ha stA thA ha~M/ sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod// spyod yul de nyid rdzogs pa ni// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi/ 
29a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dge/ de nas yang byang chub sede'i sems dpa' chen po/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs gsang ba'i rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i rigs kyi mong ci lags/ 
29a6(rgyud): bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas// pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan// de yi rdo rje pad+ma'i steng du gnas// de las de bzhin gshegs pa thang don// de nas de ltar bdag nyid nar snang
29a7(rgyud): mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og tu sngags kyi yi ge bkod de/ cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang // gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste// 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i
29a8(rgyud): mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ der paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa yar la was rgyan pa'o// de nas de yi steng du sngags kyis de bzhin
29b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa nor bu rin po che chen po 'od gsal ba dang / kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dbyangs pa dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang / 
29b2(rgyud): 'angan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / do shal dang / do shal byed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o// hU~M gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying khar zla ba'i
29b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o// yang sangs rgyas thaMd spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje sede'i rnams pa kun gyi mchog
29b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa zla ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi stang na bo zhugs shing rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ dpa' bo shes rab dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang / dring bu dang / ral
29b5(rgyud): gri dang / lcags kyu nyid dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid do// g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o// g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i 'do// zhal gsum pa dang / phyag drug pa nyid dang / spyan gsum pa
29b6(rgyud): nyid dang / bzang po'i gzugs can te/ rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o// rnam pa tha~Md kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor ba'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o// 
29b7(rgyud): shar du ni nor snang mdzad do// lhor ni rin chen 'byung gnaso// nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// byang du ni gdon mo za bar grub pa'o// dbang ldan du ni spyano// mer ni mA ma ki'o// bden bral du ni gos dkar
29b8(rgyud): mo'o// rlung du ni sgrol ma'o// phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la drag shul me ni kha dog dkar mo'o// lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan me ni kha dog ser mo'o// bang du ni 'dod chags rdo rje mkha dog dmar mo'o/ byang du
30a1(rgyud): ni rdo rje zhib mo kha dog ljang kuma'o// dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar sa ro// me ru ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dmar ser lta bu'o// bden bral du ni sgra'i rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o// rlung dusa'i rdo rje ma
30a2(rgyud): ni kha dog ljang sgyu ma'o// phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o// me ru ni pi bi ma'o// bden bral du ni mu kun dma'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis mal zhal gcig ma'o// phyi rol gyi snam
30a3(rgyud): bu la me tog la sogs po'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de bzhag par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o// shar gyi sgo la lha me rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog dri bar ste/ zhal
30a4(rgyud): g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang / dkar ba'o// phyog/ g.yaso pa'i dang po na ni lcags kyu'o// gnyis pa na ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o// gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang
30a5(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub dang / dril bu 'dzin pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar 'o// lho'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags pa ma kha dog dkar ser// zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dmar ba'o// 
30a6(rgyud): g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang ral gri 'byar ba'o// 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can ste drug pa'o// nub kyi sgro la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste/ de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar
30a7(rgyud): zhing gzi brjid cha ba ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang gzhon pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o// phyag drug na lugs sgrog dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags kyu dang / byang gi sgo la rdo rje dril bu ma 'jig
30a8(rgyud): mar byed pa ste/ zhal gsum ni ljang ku dang / nag mo dang / dkar mo'o// phyag drug na ni dril bu dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa'o// zad kyang skra stang du 'bar ba ste/ sna tshog
30b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// me'i phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsung so// shar la sogs pa'i
30b2(rgyud): sgo rnamasu ni rnal 'byor ma lcags kyu mdong / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma'i lag pa ste/ sgro srung ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa
30b3(rgyud): ste the tshom mi za'o// de ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje se de'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro// gong ma lta bu'i de'i phyed kyis de'i nang du zla ba
30b4(rgyud): phyung ba'i dbyings lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba brgya dkyis nye bar mdzes pa dang / phyi rol tu ri mo bzhis yongasu bskor ba'o// lha mo tha~Md kyi gnas ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams
30b5(rgyud): ni dkar mo la sogs par rab tu brtag par bya'o// de la dbu/ su hrIH'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de'i shar gyi re'u mig la ni hri'o// lho ru ni ho'o// byang du ni dzi'o// me ru ni haM // 
30b6(rgyud): bdan bral du ni dzaM ngo // rlung du ni mi ngo // dbang ldan du haM ngo // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bkod pa ni me'i mtshom su aM ngo // bden bral du ni u'o// rlung du ni e'o// dbang ldan du ni ai dgod par bya'o// 
30b7(rgyud): shar gyi sgo la dzaH'o// lho ru ni hU~M ngo // nub du ni baM // byang du ni hoHdgod par bya'o// phyi rol tu dur khrod brgyad kyis yongasu bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der dbang po la sogs pa'i 'byung ba
30b8(rgyud): chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed pa dgod par bya'o// shar du ha ri b+ha sa la// lho yi tshigs ni yang dag bri// lho ru tsu ta'i shing la ni// gshin rje'i gtso bo'i dbang phyug bri// nub tu a sho ka gnasu/ 
31a1(rgyud): // sprin gyi rgyal po der ni dgod// de bzhin byang du byang chub shing // gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag/ de bzhin mer ni ka rany+dzar// drang srong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab// bden bral ta
31a2(rgyud): tar ni// srin po la sogs de nas dgod// rlung du dz+wa la~M pa lar ni// rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri// dbang ldan pa ta s+tha lar ni// yi dwags tshogs ni yang dag bri// drag bcas dbang bcas 'a dbang bcas
31a3(rgyud): zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i cha// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing // thal ba'i dngos tsal 'che bar byed// thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// g.yon par kha T+wAM brten nasu// dri bu sil si la sgra sgrogs shing // 
31a4(rgyud): khrag gis bkang nga'i thod pa bsdams// gas su rdo rje 'bar ba ste// 'jigs rab yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// skyil krung byed pa byas nas ni// nyid kyi brla stengs g.yon pa mnan// tshangs pa la sogs
31a5(rgyud): mnan pa de// grags pa nye bar mi za ste/ kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyi// sang sargyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis// spro ba yang ni/ sbyin par bya// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas// dngos grub myu du po lta
31a6(rgyud): dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan rnal 'byor ma'i// ngag gi ngag rgya'i mtshan nyid cig/ gsong ba nyan par 'tshal lags na// thub pa chen pos bshad du
31a7(rgyud): gsol// de nas bac+doM sa mkha'agro ma rnar rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya bi'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nos mkha 'gro me'i domI tshig gis phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/ kol+la i re Di a bo lA// mum+bu ni re kak+kog na ki li TaM
31a8(rgyud): ho bAdz+nyA i ka ru Ne ki a in ro lA/ ta haM ba la khadz+dza i/ ga Di mau a NA bid+d+ha i a i/ ha li kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ dud+d+ha rabad+d+hi a i/ tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha ri sah+ni/ kap+sA ra lA i a i/ mA la in+d+ra na shA lany+dzi/ ta haM b+ha mu
31b1(rgyud): khu i a i/ pe kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te/ shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na mu Ni a i/ ni raM shu a ga tsaTA bI/ ta haM dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya dzo kun+du b+hU Da i/ DiN+Di ma ta hits+tsha bAdz+dzi a i/ mu khi/ g+ho g+hu/ g+hu g+hu/ mu g+hu/ lu g+hu/ daMSh+Ta/ 
31b2(rgyud): 'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor dus mtsho na ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba la spro bar bya'o// rtswa 'a/ gu sum+be/ yo d+hi/ d+hi/ lu/ s+t+rI/ gang / gai bi b+hU/ bi b+h+r-i/  ga tri/ ku/ khA dza/ g+has+yA b+h+yAM dzaM/ oM ai go d+l-i da mA ka
31b3(rgyud): o tr-i ko kA/ la/ kA ti pre gri/ sau su na/ si ma/ ku// de nas dag gi ts+tshe mA yi/ cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// gang gis sngun dang sring mor yang // the tshom med par shes bya ba// bai ti ga~M dang / pra ti bo ta ga dang / ga mu
31b4(rgyud): dang / lur+N+Na dang / ni rag dang / n+yo ko dang / hr-i dang ya dang / kau ra ga dang / ka paN+Di ka dang / a li ka ran dang / b+ha ra ha dang / sra ma Na dang / ma tha Na dang / nar dang / tI li kA dang / na ra ka dang / a mu ka dang
31b5(rgyud): kA khi lA deng / swa sa na dang / pa ri d+hi dang / bir d+hi dang / kur dang / an+ta dang / a li ka dang / b+ha gi nI dang / mu ta ka dang / grI hA nA dang / mu dra dang / dan+ta s+phar+ra dzi hA dang / g+ha na ba hi ni dang / a ka man
31b6(rgyud): dang / s+thAn ta dang / ki ra dang / lam bo da ra dang / dan+ta dang / ni ro d+ha dang / bi d+hAp+ti dang / b+hur+ya dang / d+hu mra pr-i ya dang / sa nu dang / sa ri te dang / aM gu lnga dang / ba da nA dang / ra dzi ka dang / a d+ha na dang / baM ka ti dang / dz+nyAn ha
31b7(rgyud): dang / tsa la dang / nr-i ga pa ti dang / maN+Da la dang / swa sa dang / bal+lu la dang / ma hA k+Sha ra dang / smen/ go ma b+hi ha dang / a phya ka dang / sna dang / dan+ta s+phudra na dang / mu khastAR+Ya na dang / drug dang / shu n+ya s+phaR+sha no dang / 
31b8(rgyud): a nu swa rA na dang / steng dang 'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsung so// yi ge dang ngag gi ts+tsha mA ste bzhi pa los rab tu byed pa dang po'o// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// 
32a1(rgyud): // gzugs can ma dang byed ma/ lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo// dri dgra mkhal gro bdun du gsungs// mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang // sprin ma yon por gang byed cing / 
32a2(rgyud): sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang // byis nas 'jigs par byed pa ni// de ni gzugs can ma zhes bya// dang 'ongos gnyis med sten pa'o// sdig pa'am gal te mi sdug pa'i// byis pa lta zhing 'byed na// de ni'i byed mar shes
32a3(rgyud): bya/  mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin// byol song sde stangs khro gnyer gdong // 'di ni smon sgyur bsdigs par byed// gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma// de ni lA mar rnar bstan// phag dong lce spyang bi lo dang // rnga rnam
32a4(rgyud): da 'jigs bying nga// de ni yongs gyur ma ru ga su sa/ rab tu dga' zhing gsal bur grod// seMng bar gyur nas mi ldog pa// do na byos bcas mo ru gsungs// gang nig skyobs lag pa'am/ dong ba'i son rkang bas sam/ 
32a5(rgyud): gos mtha' 'om yang na shing gis ni// des reg pa ni 'tsho ma 'gyur// de ni mi ldog mar shes bya// dgod dang sgra dang du ba dang // glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba/ de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya// mkha 'gro rnal
32a6(rgyud): 'byor ma mor gsungs// thod pa dgra sna mche ba dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // 'phang mdung dang ni bdun du gsungs// yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mtshon// lus srul mo'i mtshan
32a7(rgyud): mo dang phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas lA ma'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// dmar zhing dkar bi'i bud med gang // pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bu'i 'od// dkar po'i gos la rtag
32a8(rgyud): dga' zhing / tsan dan sa rapa'i dri dang ldan/ bde gshegs 'das pa nyid la dga'// chags shing mthong na rjes 'gro ma// khyim du pad+ma 'dri byed pa// pad+ma gar dbang rigs las byung / smin ma'i dbus rtse gsum son// 
32b1(rgyud): lus ni sngo sangs skya ba dang // ud pal sngon po dri dang mtshungs// khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed da ni// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// de ni mkha 'gro mar shes bya// mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang // 
32b2(rgyud): de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes khyim bya dag gis kyang // rtog tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / de yi khyim du rdo rje ni// bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom mA/ 
32b3(rgyud): 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am// log par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i// ser zhing sngo sangs bud med gang // rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid// me tog dkar po dri chen dang // skal bzang phun sum tshogs ma de// khyim du
32b4(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dri bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro// gnag cing sngo sangs bud med gang // so ni dag pa ning mthob dang // rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni// ske ni rtag tu grol ba yin// rtag tu
32b5(rgyud): khrus la dga' ba dang // spyod cing mang du smra ba dang / rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// rdo rje phag mo'i rig sa las byung // dkar zhing gser dang mtshungs pa dang // 'bar ba'i mig dang
32b6(rgyud): bsdu gang // rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa// rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba dang // snyems shing bden par smra ba dang // ma li ka yi dri dang ldan// khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed
32b7(rgyud): pa ni// dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung // rnal 'byor dbang chen mo ni mchog/ sha la dga' ba'i bud med gang // mig sman nag po lta bu'i 'od// dpral bar mdung rtse'i rnam pa nyid// drag shul las la dga' ba ga // 
32b8(rgyud): rtag tu duraro khrod 'gro gang dang // 'jigs med sgrog bro med pa dang // gang gi dpral bar bsdus nas ni// khyim du thod pa 'dri byed cing // rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// he ru ka yi rigs las byung // char sprin mdog 'dri
33a1(rgyud): // bud med gang / son mi mnyam par gnas shing // rtag tu drag shul las rnams dang // g.yon pa'i mche 'ardung ba ni/ khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing // rtag tu mchod pabyed pa ni/ dzar 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba// de ni
33a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gror the tshom med// gang gi skra ni li ba dang // bzhin ni yongasu zlum pa dang // rtag tu kha la smar dang // smin ma ring zhing ba spu dang // gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang // mi bskyod bden par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos
33a3(rgyud): dga' ga/ dnga' bo'i sring mor de shes bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yang na rus sbrul phyag rgya bya// ril ba spyi blugs mchod byed pa/ phag rgya lan du brjod par bya// de ni chos bcu'i res dag la// khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar
33a4(rgyud): byed// ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma// mig ni dmar zhing ser ba dang // / che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan// ser zhing tsamo pa lta bu nyid// / ring zhing log pa ring ba dang // sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang // 
33a5(rgyud): ri mo gsum ni dpral ba'am// steng gi mtsham su nges par gnas// dgod ba dang ni dga' ba nyid// lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing mnan// g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam la rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de
33a6(rgyud): 'dra'i rabu myos mthong nas ni// mdung rtsi'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskums pa yi// gar nyid kyang ni rab bstan pa// g.yon gyis yong su bskor ba ni// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// de'i bcu zhi 'am
33a7(rgyud): brgyad pa'o// de khyim mdung rtse bris shing mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin// dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / mig ni ldang zhing ser ba dang // de bzhin skra ni 'khyil ba dang / dar dbyangs bcings par sna
33a8(rgyud): ba nyid/ ri mo gcig pa rab tu gnas/ de bzhin steng du ring ba dang // rtag tu gos dmar la dga' ning // rtag tu dgod cing glu len dang / glo bur du ni khro ba dang // khyad par du ni sems g.yed // rmod pa rtag tu dgar
33b1(rgyud): nyid// de 'dra'i rab mos mthong nas ni// 'phang mdung phyag rgya rab bstan pa// gnyis pa yis kyang 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyin// g.yon nas yongasu bskor ba dang // phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// thung
33b2(rgyud): zhing byin pa sgom pa dang // rtag tu gos sar dga' ba dang // mgrin pa nas ni gos 'byung ba/ de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// 'khor lo'i bag rgya rab bstan pa// gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni// dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par
33b3(rgyud): bya// de bzhin yongasu bskor ba nyid// de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la// khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed// yan lag kun la ba spur bcas// mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang // gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang // gzhin sgo mkha
33b4(rgyud): no sbom pa dang // ma ma mu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang // sna ni nyams pa gyur pa dang // rtag tu dri ba 'dod pa dang // sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba// / de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// gnyis
33b5(rgyud): pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// 'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yongasu bskor ba gong ma bzhin// de ni bcu gcig tshes la ni// mche ba 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu
33b6(rgyud): byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas yan lag phyag rgya yis// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// bud med gang zhig sti gtsug reg/ spyi bo de yis rab bstan pa// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// mkhur tshos de yis
33b7(rgyud): rab bstan bya// gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ lce ni de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la// kos ko de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig mgrin po rig pa la// lto ba de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig lnga
33b8(rgyud): bston pa la// lte ba de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la/ sa ni de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig gsang bston pa la// ling ga de yis rab bstan pa// gang zhig dbus mo sten po la/ dpung pade
34a1(rgyud): / rab bstan pa// gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la// rkang mthil de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo ston pa la// sen me de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig sa ni ston pa la// na mkha' de yis rab bstan bya// 
34a2(rgyud): gang zhig na mkha' ston pa 'o// nyi ma de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig chu ba ston pa la// rgya mtsho de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo cig ston pa// legs par 'ongs shes brjod pa yin// gang zhig sor mo
34a3(rgyud): gnyis ston pa// shin tu legs 'ong brjod pa yin// g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang // g.yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa// slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston// rgyud tha~Md kyi gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las
34a4(rgyud): byung ba rdo rje mkha'agro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i smin ma sbyar tshul pa 'o// de nas skye bo dam pa kun// 'du bi yang dag rab bshad bya// de la zas gcig bza' bar bya// sna tshog su yang ma lus brtson
34a5(rgyud): kye/ bac+doMs 'du ba'i gnas gnas gang lags// bac+doMs kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang de bzhin / ba'i zhing // tsAn+do nye ba'i tsun+do da // 'du ba de bzhin nye 'dug// dur
34a6(rgyud): khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang // 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// 'di rnams ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi ba// kye/ bac+doMs gnas la sogs pa gang lag/ 
34a7(rgyud): de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab du gsol/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ni dzA lan+d+ha ra ra gsungs// de bzhin du ni ur+yan nyid// gnas ni ko la gi ri
34a8(rgyud): dang // de bzhin arbu da nyid// nye gnas go dpa ri nyid// de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin de bo ko Ta rab shad// de bzhin mA la ba nyid dang // de bzhin kA ma ru par gsungs/ o tra zhing ni nyid du gsungs
34b1(rgyud): zhe zhing tri sha ku ni dang // de bzhin ko shal nyid dang // ka li kar ni ci gsungs pa'o// de bzhin laM pa ka nyid dang // kany+tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni// ts+tshan+dor yang dag gsungs pa dang // nye ba yi yang ts+tshan+do'o// pre ta a hi bsi
34b2(rgyud): dang // de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang // sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling nyid// 'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba// nA ga ra dang sin+d+hu ni// dur khrod nyid du brjod pa dang // ma ru dang ni ku lu ta// nye ba yini dur khrod nyid// snying rje de bzhin
34b3(rgyud): las kyi brang // ha ri ki la nyid dang ni// lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang song dang // bin+ti gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid//  thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do// de dang nye ba dur khrod nyid// rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ 
34b4(rgyud): bskyed mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// de nas gnas l-i lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rdul bral gnas nu ta gnas// kong ka nar ni zla ba'i snying / 
34b5(rgyud): ka rony+dzar gnas tsa ri tra/ aT+TA ha ser ka dam pa// lha mo'i mkha' du ba Ta gnas/ ha ri ke la ra ha ri ga nas/ ur+yan a sho ka ni gnas// dzA lan+d+ha rar gser shing gnas// gnas ni rab
34b6(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma meng // zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can// ts+tshan+do mngon du gyur par nges// nye bi'i tsAn+do sbyang dka' ba// 'du ba ring du song ba ste// nye ba'i 'du ba
34b7(rgyud): mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// pha rol phyin bcu'i sa rnams le// rnal 'byor ma yikla klo'i skad// bu liM sogs pa ci gsungs pa// byi dang nang du bsam par
34b8(rgyud): bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'du ba'i// nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad pa// yi dwags zla byed bcu bzhi dang // brgyad pa la yang khyad par du// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid// skye ba bdun pa khyad
35a1(rgyud): / bar du// 'ang pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// mkhas pas bsad par ba pa nyid// snying rje medan mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje yang dag bshad// ji ltar bdag bzhin son cinyid// ji ltar sen de bzhin bdag
35a2(rgyud): 'di ltar se de'i rnal 'byor ba dang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'du ba'i gnas te lnga pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni// yis dbang po nyan par 'tshal// yis sems dang 'dres
35a3(rgyud): pa yi/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdzogs bya rim pa rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs ring du spangs// 
35a4(rgyud): yid dang 'thun pa'i gnasu ni// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// snying rje phan pa'i bsam par bya// spyi bo med pa'i spyi bo dang // sgra mtha' de bzhin gsang pad+ma// cha ni sna
35a5(rgyud): tshogs yig 'bru rnams// de bzhin du yang bstan rnams nyid/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnar byed// bsdus nas gong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje sengar rang nyid 'gyur// chu sa
35a6(rgyud): khams dang me yi khams// ro gcig mchog gi gnasu ni// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyor// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug/ bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang // lung gi rjes 'brangs de nyid
35a7(rgyud): shes// gsang don de nyid dngos po yang // de nyid las ni gcig las gcig/ sngar gyi mtshan nyid thad kyi// spyong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis// lus kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyang // 
35a8(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yis se de' bsam par bya// mdog dkar kun da zla ba yi// 'od zer rnar spro ba ni// phyag gnyis sa de'i skyil mo krung // pad+ma'i gnas la yang dge bzhugs// rgyan
35b1(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rnar brgyan/ sangs rgyas lnga yis rna rgyun// phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis// snying gi gan su gzir ba mdzad/ gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs gang ga/ yes se ra sgom pa nyid/ chu shing me to/ 
35b2(rgyud): lta bur ni// lte ba ru ni yang dag gnas// langs nas snying khar kun tu gnas// sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs gang bar// gton nas dang po pad+ma ni// mdab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// ze ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas// yi
35b3(rgyud): ge rnam dgod dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor dbusu gnas pa yi// phyag gnyis zhal gcig dkar po ni// bzang po dri med dbus bsam// de yi dbu su rnam shes dang // ye shes de nyid sbyar bar bya// dang po shar
35b4(rgyud): gyi mdangam mal// dmos par ldan pa'i mi bskyed pa// lho ma sbyor ni snying rje nyid// rin chen de nyid sa bon las/ nub kyi sgo yi mdang mal// 'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgod// byang gi sgo ma
35b5(rgyud): gnasu ni// sems kyi don yod gtso bo nyid// dang po'i dbyangs sogs sa bon gyi// zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim// zla ba 'i 'od zer dkar rgyan pa'i// yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya// mtshams
35b6(rgyud): rnams ni ma ning nyid// rnam pa bzhi po sngar gsungs pa// de yi dbus de yi sems// yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya// sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pas// bcom ldan padag la bshang du gsol// stong po
35b7(rgyud): mtshon du med pa la// yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon// mtshan nyid mtshon du med pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med rnar grol// yig 'bru med las yig
35b8(rgyud): 'bru'i gzugs// de dbus ngo bo stong pa nyid// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis gzung // ji ltar mtshan nyid shes kyang ni// mnyam nyid ye shes sems kyis ni// de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// myur ba nyid
36a1(rgyud): / mthong bar 'gyur// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// yis rnam shes de bo las// mtshan nyid bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa// de nyid dang 'a bo ston pa po// 'di yi sgom brjod kyi// 'od zer dkar
36a2(rgyud): bos rnar rgyan// lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni// kha dog dkar po 'od gsal pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// snying gi sa bon pa dbusu// mthe bong yongs kyi dkyil
36a3(rgyud): 'khor nyid// de yi dbusu sa bon ni// A li ka la yongs btus pa// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba ni// de yi dbusu sgo rnams kyi// thig le bsam par rab tu grags// skra yi rtse mo brgya
36a4(rgyud): stong char// phra rab gzugasu yang dag gnas/ rnar shes pa'i rang de bzhin las// ye shes can gyi mtshan nyid mtshan// go 'phangs gnas kyi thig le ltos/ sems kyi mtshan nyid thaMd shes/ rnying // 
36a5(rgyud): la tshangs pa'i sgo yi ni// thig le sgo yi lam las ni// bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yis// rnam shes yis kyi yang blang // lam gyi pha rol bstan bcos kyang // ma yin ring bar gyur pa min// 
36a6(rgyud): bstan bcos rnams ni rnyed sla yang // sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni// bla ma gsol ba 'debs la brtson// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// rnar mkhas pas mthong bar 'gyur/ 
36a7(rgyud): mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis// g.yo ba med cing 'chi ba med// yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro// yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs// yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis// smra ba dang ni byed par
36a8(rgyud): 'gyur// de phyir yid kyis bdag nyid kun// yid la 'byung bar blo ldan pas// snying khar sems sgomo sdom pa ni// gal te 'dod na yo gis bzlas// rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te// de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no// 
36b1(rgyud): 'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te// de nyid mthong ba ma yin// gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod kyi// dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga// spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas// kun nas kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur// rtag tu rtsa
36b2(rgyud): ba'i sa bon gyi// yis rnam shes sa bon las// thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan// 'khor bri'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis// yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan// yi ge dag ni nor spangs// nges par rtag tu go 'bang gnas
36b3(rgyud): rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings// rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa// yis la ni rnam shes nub// yis dngos pos rnam shes kyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur// dang por mtshan mthad kyi// mar me'i rnam pa
36b4(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis pa mtshan ma me khyer gyi// rnam pa'i rdul du mtshon par byed// rdul dkar tsan ka dbyibasu// phyogs bcur de ba zhin mthong bar 'gyur// gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni// 
36b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis rnar brtag/ lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang // ba zhi bar yang ni bstan pa'o// lha yi gzugs ni tha~Md kyang // lnga par sems kyis brtag paraH/ drug pa gzugs ni med pa'acha/ 
36b6(rgyud): bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de// brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don// rdo rje sadar sring rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// nges par dngos po tha~Md kyi// dag pa de bzhin
36b7(rgyud): nyid du brjod// phyis no re rer dbye ba yis/ lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya// lus can rnams kyi phung po dang // khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/ rang bzhin gyis ni nar dag/ nyon mongs mi shes spro ba sbyang bya// 
36b8(rgyud): rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor po snang
37a1(rgyud): de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste// de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos kye bac+doMs rnar mdag pa gang lags/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin
37a2(rgyud): ba'i phyiro// gsol pa/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang logs/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis gzugs ni bzung bar bya// sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ lce yis ron rig par bya// lus kyis
37a3(rgyud): dngos po rig par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya// gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste// 'du shes pad+ma gor dbang phyug// 
37a4(rgyud): de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal// rnam shes rdo rje sede'i nyid// kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka/ mig la gti mug rdo rje bshad// zhe sdang rdo rje mdo na thos pa// phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje bsha
37a5(rgyud): reg la ser sna rdo rje ma// khams dang skye mched thad ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka/ sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma// chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod// me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma// de
37a6(rgyud): bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug// namakha'i khom su brjod pa ni// pad+ma 'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid// 'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus// phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las// nyon mongs la sogs
37a7(rgyud): des bskyed pa'i// bskyed pa'i cha la legs gnas pas// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob/ phung po dang skye mched rnar dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas spyod pa rtog pa rnams// 'jig par byed/ 
37a8(rgyud): babashad par bya// tshob rnams kun la mnyam thung ba/ de nyid spyod bgong na med// sangs rgyas sros la phan pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i byang chu rnam gnas pa// gang zhig yang ni nyid las/ rdo rje yan lag meng pa'i
37b1(rgyud): shes rabang rol phyin pa mchog/ skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por// rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las// sen thaMng sgrol bar byed// tshong pa dag par 'gro ba dang // myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing // snying po'i lhan
37b2(rgyud): gnas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba// 'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon kun// lus 'byung 'di las ma gtogs par// dga' ba'i dngos grub
37b3(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur// mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'ad// grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis// lha yi dgra dang brgya byin dang // grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang // nor sbyin tshangs pa la sogs pas// 
37b4(rgyud): zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yi// sdig pa'i'ajig byed 'di la/ spyod// myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dang ldan rdo rje sangs ni// gang zhig 'gro la pan
37b5(rgyud): bar ni// kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsungs// de ltar mchog tu ba sam pas gnas// shin tu gsad pa yo gis sgom// rtog batheng bral ba ni// dam tshig la ni spyod par bya// rgyu 'thun 'bras bu
37b6(rgyud): rang bzhin las// dang po'i rtsom par yo gi gnas// de nas bsgoms pas dub pa na// bsdus nas byis pa'i rtse bar bya// sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la// 'jam pa'i gzugs can rang nyid sgom// grub par
37b7(rgyud): grags pa ma lus pa// ci gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// spyod pa bla na med pa yis// kun bzong mtshungs pa maud 'grub pas// spyod pa des rig rdo rje can// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te// 
37b8(rgyud): dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can// kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshalo// gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni// blo gros chen po bya ba byas// de nas rang gi 'dod sbyar bas// sbyor ba kun la kha
38a1(rgyud): phyir bltas// kun tu seng ge lta bur ni// de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyad// ji ltar byung don yang dag rig/ 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// yang dag lta bar bsgyur bdag brtan pa'i sems ni
38a2(rgyud): gnas med pas// phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni// thang rmi lam sgyu ma ltar// khams gsum 'di dag thang ni// mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes bya// sgrib pa kun las rna ra grol// 'tsho bar dbang phyug 'du
38a3(rgyud): ba dang // de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni// thang shin tu ring du spangs// rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pas// gnyi su med par nges byas nas// pha rol byin drug rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab grub
38a4(rgyud): phyir// seMn don la legs nus kyang // sen yongasu brtag mi bya// byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas// phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i bdag/ sbyor ba
38a5(rgyud): kun la rgyab kyis phyogs// de nyid goms par rab byas paso// skye bo 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa kun las rna grol// sin bsam pa'i khyad par las// sgyur ma ltar sogs rnal
38a6(rgyud): 'byor gyis// tha de nyid ni bza' bar bya// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar 'dod por rab tu bza'// longs spyod rdzogs don
38a7(rgyud): 'di dag kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje se do'i rnar sprul// yis mtha' yas thob pa yis// de bzhin gshegs phyag mi bya na// rtag tu sgom pa ldan pa yis// dbang
38a8(rgyud): bskur med sogs smos ci dgos// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhini 'di// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// dpyir de nyid lha rnams nyid// dkyil 'khor bsnyung ba mi bya zhing / phyag
38b1(rgyud): rgya mchod rten las mi bya// dang ldan rdo rje mgon pos ni// gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams// lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang / de rnams kyis kyang de nyid rig / ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bas// snying po blangs nas dang
38b2(rgyud): ba spong // de ltar chos kyi snying po ni// thob nas rtog pa zad spangs// rtog med gang cha blo ldan pas// dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ci gsungs bzhin// de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// rtog pas
38b3(rgyud): dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar ni// 'khor ba ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur// rtog pa med na grol 'gyur zhing // gnas ni dri med zhi ba nyid// de phyir rtog pa'i dra gzhom phyir// dam tshig sangs rgyas
38b4(rgyud): mdzad pa gang // de ni rtag tu goms par bya// gang gis dam tshig gan sa gyur pa// sngags shes bsam pa'i nung pas bya// dngos po kun la blta bar bya// nges par thang mo skyes pa'i// rnam pa yi na
38b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis/ khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang / glang po la sogs khrag 'thungs nas/ sha yang rtag tu bza' ba nyid// sha chen khra ga gis gos pa ni// dzang khyad par du ni blta// dman pa'i sha na
38b6(rgyud): thaMd dang // srog chags 'bum pag brgya ldan bza'// rnam snang shin tu rul ba yaM// srin bu brgya phrag zi zer ldan// khyi dang mi skyugs bsres nas ni// sha ni rdo rje'i chu gos ldan// rnal 'byor pas ni spro ba yi// 
38b7(rgyud): rnam snang bsres nas bza' bar bya// rdo rje'i chu ni btung bar bya// gang gi cha sha yang za bar ma gyur na gzhan du rnar rtog pa'i sha'i rang gi ngo bos bza' bas bza' bar bya ste/ gang zhig gzhan pa'i 'jig
38b8(rgyud): rten za ba de bza' bar bya'o// de kho na sgrub sngod 'ang gang zhig bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa de la bgrod par bya ba dang / gang zhig bya ba ma yin pa de ni nga'i bya ba dang / bgrod pa dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin par rnar rtog
39a1(rgyud): / ba dang / brda' dra dang bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sdug par mi sdug pa dang / gung dang btung nga ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/ sku dang / gsung dang thugs mnyam par gzhag par 'gyu'o// 
39a2(rgyud): ltar yang sems 'khrul pa ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor pas rtag tu btung bar bya ba dang / dman pas shin tu sgeg pa dang / rigs dang bcas pa dang / rigs med pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa'i sen thaM la bu
39a3(rgyud): gcig pa'i tshul gyis rgyal ba lta bur lta ba dang / glegs bam bklags par gsungs pa mi bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang me tog bsdu bar mi bya ba dang / sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bye ba dang / lha dang dbang bskur ba la
39a4(rgyud): sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / pha rol gyi bud med skal pa bzang mo bsten par bya ba dang / gdug pa can la byam sa pa mi bya bar gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang srog chags
39a5(rgyud): bsad pa dang / rgyal pos mchod pa'i slob dpon dang / yis kyi dmache ga sen te dam tshig rtag tu dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed// blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnar bzhugs pas mchod par
39a6(rgyud): byed do// gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub se de'i bsod nams gang zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo la mthong ba de'i phyir byang chub se de'i slob dpon la sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa
39a7(rgyud): mthong ngo // nges par rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma dam pa la smad par mi bya ba dang / rdo rje spun la mi gos por mi bya ba dang / gang zhig byin pa de bzung nas mchod rten la
39a8(rgyud): phyag mi bya ba dang / spun dang / bu dang / pa dang / rgyal srid kyi longs spyod dang / gter dang / nor bu dang / 'bru thad la ts+tsho lta bur mthong nas khams gsum gyi rgyal po bsgrub par bya'o// 'khyud pa'am spyod pa ste lnga pa
39b1(rgyud): las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// spyod pa pha rol phyin mtshan nyid// gang gis rang nas shes pa de// rdo rje yo gir the tshom med// mkha'agro ma sogs gtor ma ni// ji ltar rnyed dang bza' btung ni/ 
39b2(rgyud): de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// ro yi khris ma'i gos bzang dang // ro bsregs thal bas rnar rgyan// phru chag shin tu gsang bar ni// mtshan mo'i dusu rgyu bar bya// bzhi mdo dang ni ri bo dang // shing gcig gam ni dur khrod da
39b3(rgyud): bzhir ni de nas sngags pa yis// sgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod// ma me'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa'am pas mthar ni// cung zad drod ni thob pa yis// gal te spyod pa byed 'dod na// bdag nyid gal te 'grub
39b4(rgyud): 'dod pas// byis pa bzhin du spyad nas ni// seni rje su bzung ba'i rgyur// blo ldan chen pos rgyu bar bya// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// kha dog can gyis rtag sgrib pa// ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse bug nas// phyogs bcu
39b5(rgyud): rnamasu dbyung bar bya// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rang gyur nas// dkyil 'khor/ par ni rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i tshal ni nyams dga' ba 'am// / bo 'dus pa rnamasu yang // der gnas rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ 
39b6(rgyud): dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// phug gam ri yi rtse mor ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas gnas// ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du bza'// zos shing zos nas gtor ma sbyin// 'bras bu sna tshogs do shal sogs// 'olam
39b7(rgyud): zi sogs de bzhin spras// srog chags yan lag gos gon zhing // bde don gnyer la bde ba sbyin// res 'ga' legs sbyar zur bcag ni// bzlog pa yis ni 'don par byed// bza' dang bza' min ci rnyed pa// smyon pa'i skyer
39b8(rgyud): pas bza' bar bya// gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub pa dang // ri yi phug dang tshang tshing dang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod che// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du yang // der gnas shes rab can gyis sgom// skrag pa tha~Md rnam spangs te/ 
40a1(rgyud): // de ltar byas nas rnal khyor bas// yang na phyogs las nas rgyal brtsas/ sgrib bkun las rngang grol/ phyogs bcur rlu gnas pa li// skye ba'i sgribabs bsgribs pa yi/ kun gyi bsam pa so su gas/ 
40a2(rgyud): bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa kun// sgom pas spangs shing rnar spangs// 'dis ni sgom pa tha~Md kyis// phyogs las rnam rgyal mngon par brjod// de ltar re shog gnas byas nas// de nyid mi shesas rnal 'byor pas// rig mi lha mo
40a3(rgyud): 'dod pa yi// shin tu gzugs can bsdus nas bya// chus byung yid 'ong rin chen dang // rig pa 'dzin pa'i nyams dga' ma// lha yi bu mo gnod sbyin mo// yang na klu mo rkang 'og tu// gnas pa dang ni lha min mo// 'di nang yo gis
40a4(rgyud): rig ma gcig/ rang gi sems la mngon 'dod pa// lcags kyu zhags pa'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor pa yis bkug nas sgrub// nye bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun// ma bslangs par ni lha yis ster/ 
40a5(rgyud): rga dang nad las rna grol// gnyis med gnas gsum sdig pa med// lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyis ni spyod pa yang dag/ brtsam// skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// 
40a6(rgyud): bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar bya// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir// zhan pa tsam du mi bya'o// bslab dang dbang las rnar grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i bya ba nyid// dngos po kun gyis rang bzhin
40a7(rgyud): gyis// yo gis rnam dbyang snying rje che// mchod sbyin sbyin sreg dka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rjer spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// shin tu rnal 'byor ldan spyod kyis// nges par sbyon du
40a8(rgyud): lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu yin na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/ seng+ge'i gzugs kyis rnar rgyu// sen kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan pa'i
40b1(rgyud): btung bas bzi ba med// yang na dang ldan rgyal tshab che// brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang bsgrags pa yang // gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// san kun gyi don gyi phyir// sgom pa po yis rnam bzung ba// rna ba dag la rnam
40b2(rgyud): bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo rnar 'dzin// lag padag la lag gdub nyid// rkerkang pa la ni ska rags nyid// rkang pa de bzhin rkang gdu'o// dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin pa la ni nor bu ste// bgo bsdug gi lpags
40b3(rgyud): ba nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de/ he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas gnas par bya// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas// 
40b4(rgyud): spyod pa brtug zhugs rtogs par bya// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos med na// gang zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i// rigs kyis kya nga ni bya ba'o// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba// byang chub sa bon bcug pa
40b5(rgyud): yos// sbyang bar byas te khyer nas ni// gang tshe rdo rje mchog ldan par// de tshe glu ni blang bar bya// gang tshe dga' ba skyes pa na// / thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar// rtag tu rnal 'byor
40b6(rgyud): pa yis bya// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi mi bskyod pa// sna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi phreng bar rin chen bdag/ lag par rnar snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas// shes rab kha T+Ta
40b7(rgyud): ga gzugs can// thabs kyi gzugs kyi cang ta ru// sman ni rnar bza' bar bya// chu ni rtag tu btung bya ste// rga shis zil gyis mi non cing // kun tu srung bar gyur pa yin// rkun mi'i sgras byas cod pan can// de la
40b8(rgyud): hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sang+yas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnar 'dzin// sor lnga'i dum por byas nas ni// cod pan la ni rnar 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yo ska rags nyis skor nyid// 
41a1(rgyud): rdal bsna mi mchod par sogs rnal 'byor pa mi spyod pas 'dzin/ cang ti'i sgra ni bzlas pa ste/ sen thad 'gron gnyer ba'o// ba T+wAM ga nI shes rab ste/ rdo rje bzlas dang sgom pa yi// bod pacan durang gyur pa/ 
41a2(rgyud): rkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin 'jigs// blo dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni// rtag tu rnar spang bar bya/ he ru ka bdag rnal 'byor pa// rigs lnga la ni gnas par bye// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan par// rigs ni gcig tu rnar brtag/ 
41a3(rgyud): rigs gcig du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba bskyed mi bya// bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas// the tshom med par spyod pa bya// dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga pa'o// 
41a4(rgyud): lha lags mnyan par 'tshal lags no// rang byin rlab po'i rim ci lags// gsang ba la sogs dgongs pa ci// rdo rje sede'i snying rje tshe// yid ni gcig tu gyur por nyon// thad rgyud kyi gtan phab pa/ 
41a5(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bsgrag par bya// e yi rnam pa gang gsung sa pa// gnas kyi mtshan nyid mi gsal bar// 'gro dang rjesu 'ong ba nyid// khams dang sems kyi rtag 'gro ba'o// khams shes
41a6(rgyud): bya ba'i sgra ru lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste// rwa yi rnam pa khrag gi khams// ha ni de bzhin reg bya nyid// s+ye ni bad kan zhes byar gsungs// ba 'i
41a7(rgyud): rnam pa sems nyid dang // ra yi rnam pas ro nyid de// mes ni de bzhin lto tshil dag/ ra ni me nyid du ni gsungs// me yi rnam pa sha ru gsungs// sa yi rnam pa bshang bar gsungs// rba yi rnam pas de bzhin tshil// 
41a8(rgyud): tA ni lpags pa nyid du gsungs// ni yi rnam pas rus pa nyid// sa ni gci ba nyid du gsungs// de yi rnam pas glo ba nyid// sprin pad+ma nyid du gsungs/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rdzas dang ldan// ta yi rnam pas khug
41b1(rgyud): ni// byang chub sems las byung ba yin// rtsa yi sgra yi rang bzhin las// de ltar lha mo bsgrags pa yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid// ra ni me zhes bya bar gsungs// 
41b2(rgyud): khrag las 'khris pa yang dag blangs// mtshan nyid gcig 'dod bad kan las// rdul dang chu rgyus yang dag byung // de yi mgon por brjod pa'i rlung // ha ni kun 'gro bar gsungs// rus pa'i mtshams ni 'di
41b3(rgyud): rnamasu// sa bon lnga ni yang dag btab// rkan tu dang thad du// sa bon bzhi ni dam pa nyid// dang po'i ri mig gnas der ni// sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid// he ni dbyangs kyi drug ldan pa// rnar shes par yongasu grags// ha yi
41b4(rgyud): rnam pas tha~Mng du// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// sgra yi tshul las byung ba ton zhing // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yu dal nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog ma dbus mtha'
41b5(rgyud): yang dag gnas// srub dang srung byed sbyor ba las// ji lta ba ni de ba zhin no// sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan// rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis// rtsa gnyis skye gnas dbus ni// 
41b6(rgyud): g.yon dang g.yasu de bzhin du// g.yon du khu ba rnam shes bya// g.yas pa la ni khrag nyid de// de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang // chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin// snying stobs sku dang rdul dag bcos// mun pa sam
41b7(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin las// snying stobs khung rin chen rdul// mun po skyed par byed pa nyid// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dngos dang dngos med ro gcig 'gyur// bshang ba gci bad kun dang // khrag dang lngag bub
41b8(rgyud): nyid/ bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos// de phyir rdo rje can du brjod// rus po rgong dang khu ba ni// pha las skyes par de bzhin gsungs/ lpags pa dang ni sha dang khrag ma las skyes pa zhes byar bsgrags// gong bu'i
42a1(rgyud): // bsdud rnams kyi yang // tshad ni 'di dag gsungs pa ste// gong bu gcig du gnyisu 'gyur// gnyis gyur pa du ma rnams// gcig pu du ma'i rang bzhin gyis// de phyir rdo rje can 'dir gsungs// rtsa
42a2(rgyud): spyod yul nyid gsungs pa// de yi sgro yang de gnyis la// de rnams 'du ba'i dus su ni// lha na dmigs par 'gyur ba yin// steng gi sde dang 'og nyid de// 'og gi sgo ni rnam par shes// steng gi smon dbyings nyid do// 
42a3(rgyud): / rtsa ni thid mnyam sbyor bas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'jug par bsam// de yi lus kyi stang sgo la'ang // rdo rje can gyi rtag rgyun bzhugs// steng gi sgo ni sbyor ba gsu// sgo dgu rnams kyis yongasu bskor// kye/ bac+doMs
42a4(rgyud): sbyor ba gsum ni ci zhes bshad// ji ltar gang gi rnam pa yis// sems kyi rtag tu 'gro ba lags// bac+doMs bka' stsal pa/ gsum nyid sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum// rnam gsum dbye bas
42a5(rgyud): nir gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// tha ma 'bri nga po dam pa nyid// ke ba gcig dang sgo dgu pa// sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha// bug pa dgur ni son pa'i sgo// dgu yin
42a6(rgyud): yongasu grags// tha mi'i sgo ni skar ldan pa// sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o// sems dang skyes bu skyes su can// khyad par rnam 'byor pa yi don// rtag par kun ta dusu ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad par las// rang
42a7(rgyud): med rkang gcig rkang gnyis dang // rkang bzhi las ni sogs pa yi// rlung la sogs pas rab dbye bso// rtag tu 'gro ba rlung rnam bzhi// sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis// nub dang rab rgyu'i tshi ga yis/ 
42a8(rgyud): rtag tu nub dang rab rgyu ba// seni kun la 'gro ba'o// de ltar gang zhig mi rig pa// sems med skyes bu med pa dang // yid dang ldan pa med pa dang // rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa// me nyid gang dang rlung dang ni/ 
42b1(rgyud): dbang chen dang ni de bzhin nu// 'khor lo sems kyi kun spyod pa// steng dang ngos dang drang 'og 'gro// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gsum pa'i sgo ni yid dang bcas/ rngub dang dbyung ba gnyis ka yang // sgo yi
42b2(rgyud): dam pa nyid yin te// gtso bo dam pa yin sgro// steng dang 'og tu rab tu grags/ 'og gi smos ni rnar shes// steng gi sgos ni dbyings nyid de// rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// steng gi sgor ni g.yo
42b3(rgyud): zhing gnas// de rnams 'og tu rnar gnas// steng gis gshegasu gsol pa nyid// dgug dang gshegasu gsol ba yi// tshul gyi sems kyis rtag tu 'gro// dus gsum sangs rgyas tha~Md dang // mkha'
42b4(rgyud): 'gro rnam 'byor ma mo rnams// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// ston skyon ni rab brjod pas// bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis// lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gnas// rdo rje sede'i bde chen po// 
42b5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan lharma/ sa ni// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// sede'i chen po mnyes pa/ sa te// tshig ni 'di dag yang dag gsol// dpyid ces bgyi
42b6(rgyud): ba ji ltar lags// thig le bgyi ba ji ltar lags// mi phyed mya sogs ji ltar gnas// de yi gnas ni ji ltar lags// pul+li ra sogs ci gsungs dang // 'khor lo bkod pa de bzhin gzhan// ji/ 
42b7(rgyud): ltar rtsa yi rdzogs pa yi// de yi dbye ba bdag la gsungaso// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo bshad par ba yis nyon// gsang ba las ni ches gsang mchog/ rtsa yi rang bzhin dang / gnas la
42b8(rgyud): sogs pa dang / sa bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'khor lor son pa gnas kyi nang gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/ spyi bo ma la ya yi yul// de ba
43a1(rgyud): spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin// de bzhin du ni ur nyid// rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod// rtsib ma'i rgyu ba ni arbu ta// bzhi ni gnas shes pa bya'o// rna ba g.yon pa'i rang bzhin ni// de bzhin gong
43a2(rgyud): ba rir shes// dga' ba'i dbang phyug bshad pa ni// smin ma'i dbus gnas rab tu bskul// de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i mkhar// lag pa'i rtsa bar mA la bi// de ltar nye ba'i gnas nyid de// thugs kyi 'khor
43a3(rgyud): lor rnar gnas// gnas kyi khyad par rang bzhin gyi// mkha' spyod rnams kyi yang dag ba shad// mtshan khung kA ma ru ba nyid// nub ma o trer rab tu grags/ 'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod// lte ba tri sha ku ri
43a4(rgyud): brjod// sna yi rtse mor ko shau lA// nye ba'i zhing du brjod pa'o// kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod// mgron pa li pa ka ru gsungs/ tsAn+do ha zhes rnar ba shad// snying ni kany+tsir brjod pa ste// dbang po hi ma la
43a5(rgyud): ya nyid// nye ba yi ni ts+tshan+dor brjod// de ltar yul rnams thaMd du// gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad/ par yul gyi ni// sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad// rtag
43a6(rgyud): la yi dwags lhag par gnas// gsang ba la ni khyim gyi lha// 'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o// brla ni sau khaSh+Tar brjod// rje ngar gnyis ni gser gling gi/ rang gi ngo bo nar ba shad// nye ba yi ni 'du ba nyid// so
43a7(rgyud): mon ga re ru brjod// rkang pa'i rgyab ni sin+d+ha nges// dur khyod du ni yang dag brjod// mthe bong la ni mu ru zer// dbus maM ku lu tA ru brjod// 'di dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// mkha 'gro mar ni gsungs pa'o// 
43a8(rgyud): 'di dag yul dang rab lus skyes// rang gi nang dang phyi rol gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// thad du ni yang dag bshad// 'di rnam
43b1(rgyud): gnasumakha 'gro ma// rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ drug pa las rab tu byed pa dang / de'o// // de nas gzhan yang dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar gnas son pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo bshad
43b2(rgyud): par bya'o// snying gi nang son pad+ma ni// mdab ma ngargyad pa snying por bcas// de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa/ mar me'i rang gi ngo bo can// chu shing gi ni me tog ltar// brkyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi nang gnas dpa'
43b3(rgyud): bo ni// yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam// mi shigs hUM gis sa bon ni// khab lta bur 'dzag pa nyid// lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba// dpyid ces bya bar nar bshad// rgod ma'i me yi gzugs kyis ni// 
43b4(rgyud): bdag med ma ni thig ler brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yi sa// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// dpyid thob pa yi cho ga shes pas// snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas// dpa'
43b5(rgyud): bo shrI ni he ru ka/ 'di ni dpyid kyi thig ler brjed// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin ma// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas// skub/ sung thugs kyi dbye bas ni// sgo ni rnam gsum 'byung ba las/ 
43b6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed// 'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas// lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni// thung ngu ru ni rab tu grags// snying la yang ni hU~M nyid ni// ring po ma mo gnyis dang gnas// mgrin par oM rgya
43b7(rgyud): gzugs kyis ni// ma mo gsum brjod pu lu ta// dpral bar haM gi rnam pa 'di // sgra dang thig le mi shigs pa// 'khor lo bzhin ni rab dbye bas// sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // thun bzhir byin gyis
43b8(rgyud): brlabs pa dang // pad+ma bzhi las byung ba dang // dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor bzhi yi mngon du'o// mchog tu dga' bi'i ngo bo yis// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po las// rdo rje se de'i gzugs kyis ni// 
44a1(rgyud): 'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol// mdang ma rnams kyi gzhi la yang // 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa rnams ni// mar me'i rang bzhin lta bur ni// phyogs bzhi la ni rnar gnas// rtsa rnams bzhi yang mtshams rnams/ rnar
44a2(rgyud): gnas shing der son pa'ang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bab pa ste// de mchod rang gi gzugs gnas pas// de yi dngos po'i ngo bo las// mchod pa bzhi ni rnar bshad// lus kyi snying gi nang du ni// rtsa lnga rnams ni rna rigan
44a3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar brjod// gnas sogs dbye ba la gnas nas// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi// rtsa ni spyi bo skyes zhes brjod// rdul
44a4(rgyud): dang snying stobs mun ri'i tshul// de yi nang nas gtso ma ni// pul+lI ra ni mau phyed ma// so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod// 'bar ba 'a dzin pa pra gzugs ma// de bzhin sgo dang ba spu 'bab// ur+yan ga
44a5(rgyud): ni chen po la/ rtse ba ma ni rnam par gnas// rna ba g.yas par gnas nas no// lpags pa dri ma 'bab ma gnas// arbu dang ni ga yon pam// mkha 'gro ma ri sha 'bab ma// gang zhig mu rgyus
44a6(rgyud): 'bab pa'i rtsa/ ba yi mchog sbyin rnam par gnas// de ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas// thung ngu mar ni rnam par bshad// gang shig dga' ba'i dbang phyug gnas// de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar grags// smra bi 'dzangs
44a7(rgyud): bo gnas dri'i phyir// rus phyi'i phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas// lha mo'o mkhar du gang zhig rtsa// 'jam bsgom pa ma ru brjod// de ni rtag tu mchin pa'abab// thang lus la rtag par gnas// mA la bar ni dbangs
44a8(rgyud): ni/ rgyal 'i 'do bang thug snying le gnas/ ci ni gang zhig mig 'babam/ dod pa'i gzugasunang gnas/ gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ skyon bral ma zhes ba shad/ so Dar mkhris pa bab pa'i rtsa// 
44b1(rgyud): gang zhig mjug ma chen por brjod// tri sha ku ner byung ba ni// ma mo nges par glo bar bcas/ ko sha lar ni mtshan mo nyid// sgyu ma phreng bzang khyab cing 'bab// ka ling kar ni bsil sbyin ma// ngos kyi chu rgyus
44b2(rgyud): yang dag bshad// tsha ba ma ni lto gnas nges// lI pA kar ni rab tu grags// tshad ma nyid ni kAny+tsir gnas// thad du ni bai shang ba 'bab// mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang // kho yi gan su rangs pa
44b3(rgyud): gdong // shin tu gzugs can bad kan ldan// yi dwags lha gnas yang dag gnas// gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa// khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag gnas// mkha'agro dam pa'i dbang phyug ma// sgyu ma nyid du
44b4(rgyud): rnar bshad// sau raSh+Ta ra ni gang zhig rtswa// rgyu sbyin ma ni dmar po 'bab// rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni// gser gling du ni yang dag pa shang // yan lag gzi brjid kun khyab ma// sbyor bral mar ni rab
44b5(rgyud): tu grags// na ga rer ni sdu gum// tshil n+dan sbom zhing myos byed/ 'bab// sin d+hur shin tu grub ma nyid// mya ngan 'chim 'bab mar brjod// ma rung gnas ma lung skom 'bab// 'tshed
44b6(rgyud): ba me zhes rnar bstan// ku lu tar ni yid bzang ma// sha dong snabs ni 'bab ma'o// drug pa las yul gyi dgod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // lha lags mnyan par 'tshal lags
44b7(rgyud): na// nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod pa las// sogs pa'i las ni ji ltar lags// sbyin sreg las ni mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ru ka la
44b8(rgyud): sogs pa'i lha// rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung // lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar// sgo bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o// rang gi yan lag brgyad zung bas// ka ba de yis bskor nas
45a1(rgyud): gnas// dngos po kun gyis mnyam pa'i phyir// gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gcig tu gsungs// ri ni mgo bo'i ze 'bru la// ji ltar rtsom chen
45a2(rgyud): la sogs rim// bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis/ de ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ rkang nga'i 'thil du rtsom chen rlung // gzhu yi dbying su rnar gnas// sum mdo yi ni gnas ni// de bzhin gru gsum 'bar ba
45a3(rgyud): nyid// zlum po'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// chu ni lte bar rnar gnas// snying kar yang ni sa nyid de// kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do// sbal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni//  rab ri rgyal de bzhin no// de re spyi bo'i char
45a4(rgyud): gnas pa// 'dam skyes mdab ma sum cu gnyis// dbyangs dang gsal dang mdzes par gnas// sum cu rtsa gnyis byang chub 'dod// pad+ma'i nang du sen pa gang // de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod// spyi bo'i nang du
45a5(rgyud): klad pa ni// gang zhig gnas pa de ru gsungs// de nang te gi rnam pa nyid// dz+dza ga le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa/ 'i ngag rten kun gyi rtsa ba de// brtan pa'i bdag nyid g.yo ba'i bdag/ gsal dang mi gsal gzung
45a6(rgyud): las ni// sa don gzugs kyi rnar gnas/ lus can rnams ni kun gyi gzugs/ de phyir gdod nas rdzogs pa nyid// bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par ni// nyin dang mtshan du nar gnas/ de nyid kyis ni sgra 'byed cing // men
45a7(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa ste// des ni gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yin pa nyid du tshom med// de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog/ de ni len cing gcod pa'i phyir// lus ni dkyil 'khor zhing du
45a8(rgyud): brjod/ rgya tshon sum nu gnyis kyi// 'khor lor yang ni dkyil 'khor brjod// byang chub sems ni rin po che// dkyil 'khor de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/ phyi rol bcas pa'i nang gzugs kyis// sna tshogs khyad cing / 
45b1(rgyud): rnar gnas/ phyi rol gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ dbang po 'jug pa'o// nang gi khu ba la sogs pa/ grub pa'i rdzas ni rnar gnas/ phyi rol bcas pa'i nang nyid kyis/ rdo rje can gyi byang chub sems// sbom dang pA ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ 
45b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gnyen gyi rang bzhin can/ sangs rgyas byang chub sa dar yi// dam tshig don du gsungs pas ni// dkyil 'khor goms pas skye ba 'dir/ sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / 
45b3(rgyud): de bzhin rang rgyal rnams kyi dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor goms pas rdzogs pa nyid// shes rang mo ni tshor 'bar bar// nang gi khu ba la sogs dang // de bzhin phyi rol gzugs sogs kyi// sreg
45b4(rgyud): rdzas kyis ni sbyin sreg bya// skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang / phung po la sogs khyad par las// de rnams kyi ni gzugs can lha// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// des ni de mtsho gang gi phyir// rnal byor mchod
45b5(rgyud): par yang dag po shad// thong po 'di ni mgo bo nyid// sreg rdzas kyi ni snod du gsungs// blugs bzar ro mar bshad pa ste// snying gi 'a khor lo brkyang ma dag/ dgang gzar zhes byor yang dag brjod// thab
45b6(rgyud): khung lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yis// tshangs pa'i me ni sum mdor gnas// sgra ni sngags zhes brjod pa ste// bzlas pa 'khor bar byed pa yin// sgom pa mtshungs por snang ba nyid// dkyil
45b7(rgyud): 'khor gnyis med rnal 'byor phyir/ lhan cig skyes pa zhon pa 'di // de ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gzugs kyi phyir// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po nyid// de skad la sogs ci gsungs
45b8(rgyud): ba/ rgyud ni thaMd rtogs par bya// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// chos dang long spyod sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyis ni// mgon po ji ltar rol par 'gyur// de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos
46a1(rgyud): / bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyi bo lte son 'khor lo ni// e yi dbyingasu yang dag gnas/ snying dang mgrin par yang dag gnas// baM gi rnam pa lta bur brjod// lte ba'i nang gnas pad+ma ni// mdab ma
46a2(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhir ldan// 'das skyes mdab ma sum cu gnyis/ spyi bo'i nang du rnare gnas// mgrin pa'i nang du son pa yang // pad+ma lo ma bcu drug nyid// de yi snying ka'i gnas ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du brjod// mdab ma drug cu rtsa
46a3(rgyud): bzhi nyid// sprul pa la ni rab tu grags// pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad par// chos kyi sku ni rab tu bskor// longs spyod rdzogs pa bcu drug rtsibs// de bzhin mdab ma sum cu gnyis// bde chen yis chen po la// kun tu yang dag
46a4(rgyud): rnar gnas// sbrel pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus ni// sde tshan brgyad kyis yongasu bskor// yig 'bru dang po'i ngo bo yis// 'di ni a s+t+waM yig/ mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lor rnam bshad pa/ hUM ni mi shigs pa ru brjod// 
46a5(rgyud): dbyangs sgra la ni yang dag ldan// ya ra la was rnar rgyan/ lo ngaspyod 'khor lo'i nang gnas pa// oM ni yig 'bru gsal bar khyed// cha ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// kun tu yongasu bskor ba'o// bde
46a6(rgyud): tshon 'khor lo chen po la/ haM ni thig le'i gzugs ca no// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag la/ zla ba nyi mnar bshad// mgrin pa nas brtsams g.yon pa'i rtsa// long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku can ma// lte ba'i nang du ngal sos
46a7(rgyud): shing // kha ni 'og tu myos byed 'brab// gang zhig lte ba las stangs rtsa// de bzhin kha ni steng du 'bab// mgrin pa'i nang du ngal sos shing // khrag 'dab par ni rab tu grags// myos byed zla ba zhes byar bshang // khrag
46a8(rgyud): ni nyi ma zhes byar gsungs// sgo gnyis mnyam par zhon nas ni// steng dang 'og tu mnyam gnas pa// 'di dag zla ba nyi ma gnyis// rtsa ni gnyisu rab tu grags// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro mo'o// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong
46b1(rgyud): nga'i rgyur/ nub pa dang ni 'char ba nyid// log dang sad pa lta bur gsungs// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos la ni// dbyangs ni bcu gnyis yang dag gnas// kha ni steng du yang dag bshad// ka la sogs pa rnams kyis bskor// khan
46b2(rgyud): 'og gi gan su gnas// lhag par byas nas sbyar ba nyid// k+Sha ni srin po nyid gsungs pa// 'og gi char ni nor gnas// gang tshe mgrin par chags chen gyi// gzugs kyi zla ba gnas pa na// sang+yas rnams kyi dam pa'i sku/ 
46b3(rgyud): de tshe longs spyod rdzogs par bshad// gang tshe rdo rje'i rtser gnas pa// de tshe dar ni sna rtse ro// gang cha longs spyod rdzogs sku yang // nub par gnas par 'gyur ba na// b+ha ga'i nang du son de yang // yungs kar tsam du rna
46b4(rgyud): gnas// nyi ma'i gzugasu yang dag bshad// sprul pa'i skur ni brjod pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sa de'i yi// spros pa de yis bskyed pa'o// pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po ni// mdang ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba can// 
46b5(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs ni// der ni nyi ma nub pa na// gang tshe rdzogs pa'i byang chub sem so// gong bur gyur pa rnyog pa med// 'khor ba'i lam ni rnam bcad cing // spros pa nyer zhi dge ba ste// gnyis med
46b6(rgyud): mchog tu dag pa nyid// dang ldan rdo rje se de'i gzugs/ shrI ni he ru ka zhes bshad// rgyud ni srin bu'i gzugs can nyid// dgod dang lha dang lag bcangs nyid// rgyud ni de nyid rnam par gnas/ 'dod chags nyid dang
46b7(rgyud): chags bral yang // zos nas srin bu gnas pa nyid// rta thad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba mkha 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa ste drug pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sede'i chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang
46b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor lo'i sdom pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba dang // mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo khyad par dang / dgongs pa'i skad kyis khyad par ni/ 
47a1(rgyud): bac+doMs kyis sngar gsungs na// sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas par// a yi nar sdom pa'i gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin
47a2(rgyud): nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thaMng nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni/ 'khor lo
47a3(rgyud): gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yong su shes pa las// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po nyid// skye gnas mgrin snying dbus ni// sku gsum
47a4(rgyud): bo ni rnyer gnas// ma lus po yi srin gyi// skye ba grang la brjod bya ba// gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// de la sprul pa'i skudra yin// chos ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi 'khor lo snying khar
47a5(rgyud): yin// ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// chos rnams kun la brtan pa'i phyir// thaMd ying pa'i rang bzhin can// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang // bde
47a6(rgyud): ba chen po spyi bor gnas// e baM rnam pa rgyu 'thun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las/ skyes bu byed pa longs spyod la// bde chen 'khor lor dri med nyid// rgyu 'thun la sogs rab dbye bas// 'bras bu rnam pa bani
47a7(rgyud): zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskal ba yis// las la bcom ldan shes rab brjod// gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas brtan brjod// chos ni ngagau las byung ba'i phyir// 'khor
47a8(rgyud): lo tha~Md yod par smra/ gang zhig mi sran pa kun bkur byir// longs spyod 'khor lo kun bkur nyid// gang zhig bde chen mgor gnas phyir/ bde chen 'khor lo dge 'dun che// sde bsku nis brjod pa ste/ lto ba
47b1(rgyud): gnasu brjod par bya// skye gnas 'dod chags bral ba nyid// mngal gyi khru ma chos gos te// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba dag// 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyis gnas// de bzhin sngags bzlas a dang
47b2(rgyud): haM// sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// gcer bu skra dang kha spu dregs// 'di rnams rkyen gyis sen rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams te// se ne sa bcu'i dbang phyug// btsun mo'i b+ha ga
47b3(rgyud): bdecan du// khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas// de med pas na bde mid 'gyur// bde ba spangs na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po man// de na
47b4(rgyud): dngos med tshul kyang min// zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig/ skyes// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i
47b5(rgyud): sems kyis ni// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni// lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnor gnas// 'on kyang bag chags phal nga so// 
47b6(rgyud): de skad lha mos bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor kun gyi gong na maud// de nas rnal 'byor mi bdag med ma la sogs pa lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/ spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khroganya
47b7(rgyud): can dang / bskul byed ma dang / ri khrod ma shing lo can dang / 'og zhal ma dang / sdom pa ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgya
47b8(rgyud): ba dang / skrag por gyur to// de nas me bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs batha~Md kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byir ma ni kun gyi tshogs/ brjes kyis bslang du gas/ de nas bac+doMs phreng mkhyen pa
48a1(rgyud): rlung rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rnal 'byor mthong bslang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa ni rnams ni sangs rgyas cing // 'on kyang blo brang dri mas bsgyings
48a2(rgyud): de bsal bas ni sangs rgyas nyid// brjos de de bzhi no// rigs kyi bu gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa/ btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yi de nyid yong su gcod// dug gi
48a3(rgyud): dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo dzad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin da la/ ma sha'i bza' ba sbyin par bya// bzlog pa'i sman ni rtags pa las/ 
48a4(rgyud): rlung gis rlung ni snun por byed// so sor rtog las rnam rtog dang // sri nga ba nyid kyis srid dag byed// ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/ nu gzhan gyis ni dgugo par bya// de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang / 
48a5(rgyud): nges par sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa la// yang ni ma yis gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mos tshig pa/ 'dod chags mo yis gdung bar bya// skye bo mi bzad pa yi las// 
48a6(rgyud): gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// 'dod chags kyis ni 'jig rten 'ching // 'dod chags kyi ni rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa
48a7(rgyud): 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu sngags kyis mi shes/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las// kun tu rul lnga ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig pu nyid// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bi la kAk+ki la sbyor bas/ 
48a8(rgyud): reg pa sra ba'i bag chags kyis/ sra ba gti mug chos yin phyir// gti mug nor snang mdzad brjod// gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// go sher ba chu yi kham su brjod// chu ni mi bskyod doba'i phyir/ 
48b1(rgyud): zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa// gnyis kyi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// rtag tu drod ni skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// ka ko lar ni gang zhig sems// de ni rlu
48b2(rgyud): gi rang bzhin can// don yod rlung las 'byung ba'i phyir// phrag dog don yod grub pa yin// bad nga 'dod chags sems yin te// rin chen khrag dang 'dod chags nyid// ser sna na mkha' las byung ba// na mkha' ser sna
48b3(rgyud): rdo rje yin// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa nyid// rigs ni lnga po skyes pa la// de la stong phrag du ma nyid// da pyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu phan pa nyid// 'dod
48b4(rgyud): chags la sogs sems lnga yis// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'a gyur// gang+gA'i klung na bye ma snyed// rigs gcig la ni dang bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ rigs chen lnga ni rigs ni du ma rnams
48b5(rgyud): de rnams rigs las brgya phrag du ma rnams// de rnams la yang 'a bum phrag rigs chen rnams// bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// 
48b6(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// zhes bka' stsal to// 'dir gsol pa/ ci gong bu'i gzugs tsam du dung chu ba rnyed kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur pa ci lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye ma'i lam
48b7(rgyud): ni gcig pu la// sangs rgyas du ma dag min cing // gzir min stongs nu mnga' ba'i lha// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag gi ni// sdum par ston mo bzhes par 'tshal// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rigs kyi bu// yang
48b8(rgyud): dag byung ba bka' stsal pa// yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni// bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon// gsang ba la ni sa yi khams// mchog le de bzhin du ni chu// dgyes pa la na me ru bshad// thaMd bdag nyid rlung
49a1(rgyud): la gnas// rtag tu bzhugs par 'dod pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa bdag/ yang na me long lta bu'i tshul// de bzhin du yang mnyam pa nyid// so sor rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// de bzhin pa
49a2(rgyud): ba nan tan la// rtag tu bzhugs par brjod pa 'di// shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin can// de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad nyid// gzhan yang mi bskyod pa nyid dang // yang na rin chen 'byung gnas la// yang na 'od pog/ 
49a3(rgyud): med pa yis// gang tshe rtag bzhugs don de la// bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos// thig le'i gzugs te yid lte bu// shin tu rnam dag yes cher// lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje sengar zhes byar bshad// bde
49a4(rgyud): bdam pa ru ni brjod// rang byung ngo bo 'di nyid ni// chos kyi skur ni/ rab tu grags// de ye shes rab lhan cig skyes// de phyir gnas pi'i gzugs can ma// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// lte ba'i
49a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// bdag med ma zhes rnar bshad// dpyid kyi thig le nyid du brjod// skra yi rtse mo brgya stong lus// / glog gi zer ma mnyam pa'i 'od// lha yi rnal 'byor du su ni// ba
49a6(rgyud): spu'i khung bu'i rtse bugs nas// phyogs bcur rnar phyung nas ni// kun tu lha dang lha min bsdigs// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor ni// bsregs nas longs spyod 'khor lor song // sna yi bu ga g.yos pa nas// dzad
49a7(rgyud): du ni phyung nas ni// mdzod spur song ba dag gis kyang // bug pas nges par phyogs bcu yis// sangs rgyas byang chub se de ra yi// shangs kyi bug g.yon par ni// zhugs nas spyi gtsug 'khor lor ni// kun
49a8(rgyud): bsregs rnam par phyung nas ni// sngar gsungs nyid kyi bug pa nas// yang ni spyi gtsugazhugs par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yi/ dga' ba de nas bskyed par bya// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor byin na ni/
