114b7(rgyud): phyir gnas pa ni 'dir sems kyi ting 'dzin du rig par bya'o// de nas yang dag par spong ba'i mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de yang las nyid// skyon lnga spang ba dang / 'du byed brgyad bsgoms pas rig par bya'o// 
114b8(rgyud): skyon lnga gang lags bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ dol le lo dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bying ba dang / rgod pa nyid do// mngon 'dus ma byas pa dang / de nas mngon par 'du bya ba skyon
115a1(rgyud): lnga spang bar lnga po 'di rnams brjod do// de la bying ba dang rgod pas skyon gcig byed de/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa bying ba dang rgod pa 'jug pa'i dus skye no// mngon par 'dus byas pas rab tu zhi ba la
115a2(rgyud): 'di rnams spang ba'i phyir ji ltar spang zhing 'du byed brgyad nar bzhag ce na/ bzhi yis le lo spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba dang / dad pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa de rnams yang ram pa ji lta bar rig par bya'o// 
115a3(rgyud): gnas dang de nas gnas pa dang / de'i mtshan ma dang // 'bras bu nyid de/ gnas ni 'dun pa'o// gnas pa ni rdol ba'o// nga'i gnas 'dun pa'i mtshan ma ni dad pa ste/ yid ches pa dang / dang ba dang / 'dod pa'o// de'i gnas pa
115a4(rgyud): rtsol ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu sbyangs pa te/ 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ting 'dzin gyis khyad par rtogs par bya'o// lhag ma spong ba'i 'du byed bzhi ni dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / senga' dang / 
115a5(rgyud): btang snyoms te/ grangs ji lta bar skyon bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyog/ so// de yang dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa de bzhin du rig par/ bya ste/ dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas bying ba dang rgod pa rjesu
115a6(rgyud): rtogs par bya zhing / de nyid kyi mngon par 'du byed pazhi pa la shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung // dran pa dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas shes bzhin to// rmugs pa med par gyur na bying ba dang rgod pa rtog so// ma rtogs
115a7(rgyud): ba de rtogs por bya ba'i don du mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems kyis bying ba dang rgod bzhi pa la dam pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i sems kyi btang snyom so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mthar dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga
115a8(rgyud): bo do rnams kyi rnar gzhag pa ji ltar dgod ce na/ thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa gang zhig 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag po dang / dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas brjed pa med pa'i bdag po'o// bdag po zhes bya ba ni/ 
115b1(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i las ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o// thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'dun pa'i bdag po dang / rab tu sbyor ba'i bdag po dang / dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pa'i bdag po dang / 
115b2(rgyud): brjod pa med pa'i bdag pa dang / rnar 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po rnams rig par bya'o// de la zab po dang bza' bar bya bas stong pa bka' stsal pa/ nang gi skye
115b3(rgyud): mched rnams nas brtsams te/ phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang / de'i lus kyi zab po dang / bza' ba dag gang zhig byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus de'i lus dang stong pa nyid la'ang lta zhing skyobs 'du byed spong bar
115b4(rgyud): byed de/ dge ba mi zad pa dang / gang yang khyad par du bltas pas nang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du gsung so// rab tu gnas pa'i da sa po snod kyi 'jig rten rgyas pa'i phyir de stong pa nyid ni chen po
115b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid ces gsung so// de yang nang gi skye mched rnams la/ sogs pa gang gis stong pa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyidayis kyi de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// ji ltar don
115b6(rgyud): dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba'i de'i stong pa nyid ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do// de'i don du yang byang chub se de'i rab tu spyod do// de'i stong pa nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba gnyis
115b7(rgyud): ma thob pa'i don du dge ba'i 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas gnyi so// rtag tu sen la phan pa'i phyir dang / seMn la shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor ba mi spang ba'i phyir de'i stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// 
115b8(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du ma mthong pos skyo ste/ 'khor ba yong su spong bar byed do// gang yang dge ba mi zad par khyad par du lta bas mya ngan las 'das par yang mi byed cing de'i stong pa nyid spong bar yang
116a1(rgyud): mi byed de/ 'di ni blang ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rigs kyang nar dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ rigs ni rang bzhin te/ ngo bo nyid do// mtshan dang dpe 'ang thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu chen po
116a2(rgyud): mtshan dang / dpe byang dang bcas par thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub sede' rnams rab tu spyod de/ khyad par gyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyang ba'i phyir re shig
116a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid bcu banir rnar gzhag par rig par bya'o// yang 'dir stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos dang gang zag gi don dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de/ de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos po ni der de stong pa nyid dang / phyi rol gyi chos
116a4(rgyud): dang gang zag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las byung ba'i gcig pa'i dngos po'o// der ji skad gsungs pa'i zang mo la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyi dbacu drug tu mtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyi su stong pa nyid
116a5(rgyud): rnar gzhag par bya ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa 'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ chos dang gang zag la yang dag par 'a drug pa de'i stong pa nyid ji snyed pa yong su spang ba'i don du rim pa ji lta ba
116a6(rgyud): de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye bar shes par bya'o// ji ltar sgrub par rnar shes par bya zhe na/ gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na lus can thad grol bar 'gyu ro// gal te 'di rnar dag par ma gyur na brtsams pa
116a7(rgyud): 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid blo bur gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na kun nas nyon mongs pa dngos po med pa'i phyir
116a8(rgyud): 'bad pa med pa nyid dusan zad grol bar 'gyuraro// de nas ma skyes pa'i yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rnar dag par ma gyur te/ thar pa'i don du rtsom pa 'bras bu med par 'gyuraro// de ltar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / 
116b1(rgyud): mangs yang ses kyi rang 'a gas sa pa'i phyir sa can na mongs pa lang pa'i na zhing mdag pas mtshan da/ ta ma sa tho dur bya bya ma tshan tsam pan mami ning ga par ma mam/ sa
116b2(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsung so// de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don sgrub pa yin no// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang / zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang / gti mug gi gnyen
116b3(rgyud): bor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// de la ji ltar 'dod chags rnar ldag ce na/ gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na/ yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// de
116b4(rgyud): bzhin du gsungs pa/ bac+doMs kyis rigs kyi bu e ma ho sangs rgyas thaMd kyi 'dod chags kyi yis ni rnyog pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde bathad sbyin par byed do// 'dod
116b5(rgyud): chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha tho ba med pa dang bcas pa ste/ gzhan rgyu du zhugs pa'i 'dod chags rnyed pa yin na de'i 'dod chags la sogs pa yongasu mi spong bar spyod na/ 'on te rim pa'i khyad par las
116b6(rgyud): yon tan gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dper na ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang po ches zos na gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dngos por 'gyu ro// glang po che phal pas zos na lci ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro// de bas na de la ke ta ka'i me
116b7(rgyud): tog gi skyon ma yin te/ de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro// dper na 'o ma
116b8(rgyud): sbrul la sogs pas 'thungs na dug gis dngos por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang skyes bus 'thungs na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyuraro// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis rang
117a1(rgyud): bzhin gyis kha na mtho ba med pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gang dang gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu
117a2(rgyud): khyad du 'phags pa 'byung // dper na ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la gnas na'adod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnar dag pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par
117a3(rgyud): sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha ba ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal sta nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya yai spyi bsgyur cing zhus pa gtan la phab pa/ smad nas yang bod kyi lots+tsha
117a4(rgyud): bogazhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang gi ming bcug cing / gnan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang / mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud ba ni dang
117a5(rgyud): dge slong shAkya yis de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya badz+nyA tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang brdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po
117a6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// / gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsungs pa// bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs// de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bac+doMs kyis
117a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lho mo spyan bzang ring // gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin tu zab// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// gsong ba de rgyud kyi rgyal po las gleng bslang ba'i
117a8(rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o// // lha mos gsol ba bcos// gsang ba zhes bya ji ltar lags// de li 'khor lo dza ltar lags// de yi rdo rje ji ltar lags// de yi pad+ma ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal
117b1(rgyud): pa/ gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste/ bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste// de yi
117b2(rgyud): mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin// de rnams don ni gsang ba ste/ brtul zhugs byed cing gtong podo che// e ba~M zab cing chags la dga'// khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta
117b3(rgyud): 'bab/ 'di la ston gyi gzhan la gsang // rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te/ dper na khang rten ka ba bzhin// rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i
117b4(rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// lha mos gsol ba bac+doMs/ re re'i dbye ba sa ma 'tshal bas// 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du ltung // 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi bzad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bac+doMs
117b5(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug/ 'dab ma'i grangs ni gnyis 'gyur ro// rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes/ gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs
117b6(rgyud): yin// rigs pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// b+ha ga rab 'bring gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bskul la/ 
117b7(rgyud): gzhan kha nas ni phye mas bdug/ gsang ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug/ de nas rnal 'byor po'am mos// rtsa nga so mos legs par btsalo// ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas// sor brgyad par ni gar gnas pa// 
117b8(rgyud): shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang // de bzhin b+ha ga grang dro dang // mu rnams chetshe zhing bde ba chung // de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// b+ha ga chen bde ba chung // b+ha ga chen chung du bya/ chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs/ 
118a1(rgyud): grang na de bzhin bsro bar bya/ mu rnams chen chung bar bya// 'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la yod/ bud med 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// de phyir bud med bcos/ thabs kyi rdo rje phra sdom dang / ring ba dang ni thung ba ste// shes
118a2(rgyud): rab ji bzhin thabs la'o// de yi gan su bzung bor bya// gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le ru ste gsum pa'o// / lha mos gsol pa bac+doMs/ e baM rnam pa'i dbus gang du// bde ba'i khyad par
118a3(rgyud): tshol ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu dben pa'i gnas btsal la/ bza' ba bcud can sna tshogs dang // btung ba zhim po mang po dang // gur gum la sogs dri zhim dang / shin tu 'jam
118a4(rgyud): pa'i stan bting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhim thig le re re bya// / rnal 'byor pa yi gnas lnga ru// de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya/ de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// e las gru gsum bting ring
118a5(rgyud): bsam// de yi nang du paM las ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// de yid du su 'khor lo bsam// 'khor lo'i dbusu reg mi bzod// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang / hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam/ oM las rdo
118a6(rgyud): mgo bor bsam// phaT las rdo rje b+ha ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan thog tu// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu 'am/ chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byug/ bde bskye ba'i
118a7(rgyud): zas zos nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// thabs kyis gnas dgu ra'o yang bya/ shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyis shes rab pad+ma la// 'o byas pad+ma rgya su gzhugs/ shes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// 
118a8(rgyud): chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste/ de nas gcig gis gcig 'khyud nas/ he ru ka dang phag mor bsam/ shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas/ thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyed nas// nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir
118b1(rgyud): shes rang ma la rtags gsum 'byung // lus 'dar 'phar bsku yi rtags/ mi bzod skad 'don dag gi rtags// shes pa brgyal ba thugs kyi rtags/ de la ngo bor bshad pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ 
118b2(rgyud): 'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong // nad kyi zug rnguthud 'joms/ 'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor sbom bu min// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas// sbyin bsregs la sogs bya ba min/ 
118b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i rdo rje rgyud 'di ni// kun gyis thos par mi 'gyur te/ glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs bam gsang ba'i gnasu snga/ yong su smin pa'i rnal 'byor ma// 'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sa// gas
118b4(rgyud): ba ston pa'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu/ gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas na sa/ lnga bcu nas bzang stong gi bar// rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang // 
118b5(rgyud): sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyong byas nas// bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba ma nyam// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pas// rlung mkhris pang kan kun nas skye// shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste// sbyor thabs mtha
118b6(rgyud): pa'i shes rab ma// thabs kyis rtog tu brten par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor ma ni gsang la bsten// lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba bstan pa ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
118b7(rgyud): mi srid tshul lam rje 'babs tshul// pa spang tshul lam mkhan slob tshul// gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tsha srung // dben pa'i gan su sbyor ba bya// gal te ma bsten dam tshig nyams/ tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar ltung // lha mos gsol
118b8(rgyud): pa bac+doMs// thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// bde ba khyab med ji ltar lags/ phyag rgya ma bsnyen ji ltar lags/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas gsang pa'i do na// khyod kyi der mdza dang yis bcwa
119a1(rgyud): sbyor ngas mi shes rnal 'byor dang / stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya// gal te de 'dra sten gyur na// 'jig rten pal ba'i 'dod chags te/ shi nas man med dusal bar
119a2(rgyud): skye// 'dod chags spyod pa shal ma rig/ lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// yar la 'jig cing mar la 'bab// thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba 'bod// de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bsten// sbyor babs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde
119a3(rgyud): ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba thabs med lus zungs nyams// rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skyes// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bsten// phyag rgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya bsten pa'i dusu yang // rnal 'byor mi
119a4(rgyud): sring brda yis mtshon// gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa na// 'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang // mthe bong drang por ston pa dang // de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste/ 
119a5(rgyud): pad+ma kak+ko la zhes bya// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// brda yi bye brag ma lus pa/ saM pu Ta ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa ba cos// rdo rje pad+ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru bzung ba ji ltar logs// 
119a6(rgyud): bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ru bzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyis dbugs dang shes pas bzung // dang po btsan thobs sbyor bas bzung // sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru bzung // gcig ni sbom po khro mos bzung // bzung ba'i rten ni
119a7(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de ru ma zin na// 'khor bar ltung bas rang gi su// ting 'dzin gyis hUM la bsdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas
119a8(rgyud): dam tshig nyams// lha mos gsol pa bac+doMs/ shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' shig gas// thabs kyis bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lagrag/ 
119b1(rgyud): bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod// sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis kyang // de las bde ba khyad par 'phags// dper na dar dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong // shes rab
119b2(rgyud): dar gyi sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal 'byor ma yin rgyud// rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus
119b3(rgyud): dang srung ba la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// yis lnga yi spros dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang // mkha'agro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tsom yongs
119b4(rgyud): zad nas/ bac+doMs la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ba de ba chen po'i ras gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sdom pa'i
119b5(rgyud): rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzog so// / paN+Di ta rat+na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur te
119b6(rgyud): gtan la bab pa'o// // / rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin+da tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sada' la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos
119b7(rgyud): ba dus gcig na bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhug so// de nas byang chub se de'i rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon phyogs
119b8(rgyud): nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar
120a1(rgyud): lags// de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/ dang po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'i// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten par bsgoms
120a2(rgyud): pa ni/ snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnaram rtog rnams// spong phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la// dang po rtan
120a3(rgyud): gyi dgongs pa yang // thugs kha'i yi ge hUM las ni// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsum thugs yin te// dug gsum 'joms
120a4(rgyud): pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngas yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab/ de phyir
120a5(rgyud): rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang / byang chub seMd rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin/ pas// gting ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad// de nas thugs kau'i hUM
120a6(rgyud): las yang // hUM 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang po che yi bar chod dang // gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod de// bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi yi bgegs dang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis
120a7(rgyud): tshe yi bar chod byed// nang gi thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis srung bas// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// yaM las byung ba ri gong dang 'angadra // dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnar rtog pa spong ba dang // mi
120a8(rgyud): rtog pa ni skye ba'o// dbang du byed pas dbang gi don// bdan bani mi dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yin// dgongs pa yin pa nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zu ga su
120b1(rgyud): drag po'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don// baM las chu yis dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros bzhi par gsungs/ bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi// laM las gser gyi sa bzhi ste/ gru bzhi rgyas pa'i
120b2(rgyud): rang bzhin to// rdo rje rtse lnga yis lnga// de steng ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrid brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re re'i bya
120b3(rgyud): brag rnam rtog yang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongasu rgyas// shing rnams rims bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi don// 'joms pa'i rtag su phyogs skyong dgod// 'dod
120b4(rgyud): chags zhe sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gis sen gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char smin
120b5(rgyud): mdog/ nang dang gsang bde bzhino// de bzhin mthar thug pani pra/ yang // snyan nas brgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhan yas khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// rtsibs brgyad
120b6(rgyud): rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos// yongasu gyur pas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal// thad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku lnga'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs
120b7(rgyud): lnga'i don// gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa nye ro gzhag bzhi// ka ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// gdung bzhi yis bzhi yi don// ta ra na la sogs
120b8(rgyud): pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad+ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtag su pad+ma'i gdan// de steng nyi ma zla ba
121a1(rgyud): / ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi badz+ra// dang po ra ning bdag gam// rnam rtog 'joms phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdar// 'khor la re re gdan du sbyin// gse bo'i yan
121a2(rgyud): lag yin pa'i phyir// dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung bsdus pa'i tshul// dper na tu gting las
121a3(rgyud): ni nye// rkyen las skye ba drod gsher tshul// dper na nyi mas pad+ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo los zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// yar la sreg cing mar la ga so// dper
121a4(rgyud): dper na spra tshil lo ni lugs// pheM brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs pa// rje su bsgreng ba he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstong pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa don yod grub pa'o// bdud rtsi
121a5(rgyud): myang ba 'od dpag med// yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa 'am sgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i ste// rab kyis yongasu rdzogs pa yi// 
121a6(rgyud): sgom pa 'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs// 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin// thang dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom// 'bring po yis kyang de bzhin
121a7(rgyud): te/ gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di yis bstan pa shin tu zab// gong du gsungs pa tha~Md kyang // 
121a8(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin tu zab// phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gas/ 
121b1(rgyud): ba'i don// la su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po sgo mched khams rnams la/ re re lha ru byin rlabs la// lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun/ 
121b2(rgyud): g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ba// sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i// yongasu rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes bya ji ltar lags// de ya~M
121b3(rgyud): rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar 'jug/ lha spyod zung du ji ltar lagos// dga' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ sum cu rtsa
121b4(rgyud): bdun yang dag rgyu// 'bras bu gnyis med yis bskyed// de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru/ kar gyur gcig la yang // rgyu rnams yongasu rdzogs pa ste// gnas
121b5(rgyud): ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ rgyu na ra ba las ma yin te// gro las gnas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las
121b6(rgyud): ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyu de rkyen medo pa las min// nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// 
121b7(rgyud): bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang / khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i
121b8(rgyud): dbang du gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin thun bzhi yi dbye ba yi// nyin thun bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad sgom
122a1(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor bas// thun dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi chen rnal 'byor pa// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas pas// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul/ 
122a2(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la/ rgyan dang bdud
122a3(rgyud): rtsi'i spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab yis dang 'brel bas// gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/ khyad par phyag rgya'i
122a4(rgyud): spyod pa gnang // lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan ltar gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste// mnar med sen dmyal bar skye// de phyir lha meng spyod pa spang // srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o// spyod med
122a5(rgyud): lhorang spang ba med// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing // pu sogs rnam spang la sogs pa// brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yi/ na// des na lta spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang rnar bzhengs
122a6(rgyud): glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs/ rdo rje snying pos yang nus pa// bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar 'jal byung pa gad sa sa rgyun la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcos
122a7(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi rnams pa gsum du gsungs// dang por phyi yis bdud rtsi sten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si h+la mi bskyod lud skam blang / 
122a8(rgyud): bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // yud skam snying po blang bar bya// yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo // brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la thaMd bzang po'i dusu gsungs// seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzad/ 
122b1(rgyud): lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten// glang po glang po chen po ste// ke ta ke yi rgyu nyid las/ glang rtsil sogs 'byung ba'i sha ba glang gi wang ldan pa'i sha/ rta ni rta yi rgyal po ste/ kha dog dkar min dmar
122b2(rgyud): ba min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha/ mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha/ lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dus bu cig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni// 'bru dang dud pa spong
122b3(rgyud): rnams// mtshan ma pi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel// skad ma phyin na dngos grub med// skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang 'byung yin// dril can bu ga dgu lam nas/ 
122b4(rgyud): 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// a bad+hU tir dbugs chud pas// steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yi/ dan// sih+la ga bur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pa rgyu ba yin// 'di ni
122b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ skra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod/ pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las da lo// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rigasu 'dzin pa spang
122b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin// las dang po la phyi ning gnyis// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/ skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas/ lnga pa goms par gyur pa/ 
122b7(rgyud): yis// drug pa bzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbusu gzhug/ lte ba'i gnasu dbugs gnas pa/ steng gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang dum ste// sred pa med cing
122b8(rgyud): yang ba'o// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du// nam mkha' 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad// gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa sa
123a1(rgyud): dum ste// dril can bu ga 'gag par byed// rgyan gyi dang po na sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen pos hA ling // ru tra 'dul ba'i rim pa'o// bdud rtsis rnam rtogs la sogs 'joms// phrin las bzhin
123a2(rgyud): thun mong yin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rjes snying pos yang gsol pa// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ 
123a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa na mkha' 'byung ba yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral
123a4(rgyud): ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bde chen rang bzhin med par dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de'i phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang / bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongasu rdzogs pa
123a5(rgyud): sgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po la// gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis// zangs nyid gser du 'gyur ba ste// zangs la sa ma gtogs gser nyid dang // lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni// 
123a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsung so// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// nyin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung // las dang po yi spyod yul min// dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa
123a7(rgyud): gcig bzhag pa// chu ru nyam su myong ba las// gcig shos nyam su myong ba med// tshul rten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyam su myong bar byed pa ste/ de bzhin spros bcas lnga pa la// brten nas spros med drug pa 'byung // rgyud
123a8(rgyud): gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan// las kyi phyag rgya yongasu spangs// yes phyag rgya la gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'don
123b1(rgyud): gang dag cog yin te/ 'di yis drug pazin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dpung dang 'brel ba ste/ 
123b2(rgyud): tsang 'brel pa 'a mo'i den// dang ba lci yi nga rgyal ba// ma' 'gre cu ru shes par bya// dpa'abo byang chub sem su shes/ 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang / de nas bsgru bya shes parabya/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/ tshangs
123b3(rgyud): mdo bar du sor mo'i tshing // bcu chen bani dang brgyad yin te/ sor gsum la ni 'khor lo ra/ sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gi gnas dang 'khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo me la ga'
123b4(rgyud): kha rlung // ser gsum sor bani mkhas pas brtag/ gnas gsum gas nga nga'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o// sor zhi rta mgrin gnas yin te// sor brgyad gsang ba bang skyong gnas
123b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i// lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las// sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad nyid las// brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'kho ra lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu la ni 'khor lo gzhan// bla ma'i zhal nas
123b6(rgyud): shes par bya// thad rgal tshigs dbyug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtag/ 'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis// dang por 'khor lo gnyis par rtsa// rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// 
123b7(rgyud): rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi// rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthob na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod
123b8(rgyud): chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i don la rgyab kyi phyogs shing skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags bar du gtsad cing rnal 'byor gzhan lag she/ 'di ni mnar med seMn dmyal ba chen por skye// sangs rgyas
124a1(rgyud): / stong dang rtsa gcig rdzogs pa che yi tshad // 'di la sbas kyi thang la// nga yis sba bar ma gsung so// de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sbas// rgyud 'di dang yis rgyas par bshad// sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha/ 
124a2(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bani grangasu sngas// sum cu rtsa gnyis las ni zung // bcu drug grangasu sbas pa yin// sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams// brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa'o// spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong lnga
124a3(rgyud): bar sbas/ bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba// brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa yin// bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangasu sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs sbas// mgrin pa longs
124a4(rgyud): spyod 'khor lo ru/ ro drug la ni longs spyod bas// ro ma longs spyod ra khor lor sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi cha// bcu drug grangasu sbas pa yin// brgyad
124a5(rgyud): las g.yas g.yon steng 'og pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangasu sbas / brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og pa ni// mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi ma// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangasu sbas// tshangs mdo'i mi ni me la
124a6(rgyud): sbas// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni zung // sum cu rtsa gnyis grangasu sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni bani// bcu drug grangasu sbas pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad/ 
124a7(rgyud): brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa'o// gzhang kha rlung ni rlung las sbas// gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo ra la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru srog gi rnar 'khyud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed
124a8(rgyud): kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen sku// nar thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying kha chos kyi sku yin te// rnamathar la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin pa longs spyod de dong 'dra/ 
124b1(rgyud): bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og dang por bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og/ bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor ba nu// 
124b2(rgyud): rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te/ zung rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang // rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po
124b3(rgyud): brgyad// lnga la ka li dang po lnga// rigs pa'i ngo brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin dbyangs yig g.yon dang g.yas// a gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dgu yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus
124b4(rgyud): byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi mi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ sha la gnas nas tshil bu skyed// nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni// tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o// gsang ba
124b5(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing ga pur skyed// de Sha/ yi rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar gnas shing bde bskyed// khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa gsum// khang pade
124b6(rgyud): gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/ grangs ni 'bum du shes par bya// nang dang gsang ba'i rtsa la yang // srin bu'i rigs ni grangasu gsungs// de kho na yi rtsa gsum las// 'dod chags skyed pa'i srin
124b7(rgyud): bu dgu/ nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum// dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya// rtse der gnas pa'i ga pur dang / bdud ci sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsil sogs gong du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / 
124b8(rgyud): rilas mo yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ de steng a las ka pA la/ baM las pad+ma mang ba brgyad bsam// nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am/ mtho gang car du
125a1(rgyud): bsam pa ni/ yi ge go bzlog bsam par bya// sngon dmar po dkar po ste// hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam// de stengs yi ge me bsnam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du ngasam/ 'di ni bdud rtsi kha sbyor/ 
125a2(rgyud): sha lnga las ni gdan lngar gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi rlung gis ma bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhu// lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya// 'od zer gyis
125a3(rgyud): bkug yis kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs// lan gsum bskor bar sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin rlabs rnal 'byor ro// de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs// de nas rol pa'i
125a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor te/ g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas zhu de'i rnal 'byor yang // mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes// yais nga bzhi ying bor gyur// cha gcig mi bskyod rnam snang ste// sha za'i mkha' gro
125a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid // cha gcig bya ba nan tan te// srin bu las kyis rma kha 'gro mchod// cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas dkan la sogs pa/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsa ni yis mkha' gro/ 
125a6(rgyud): ste/ so sor kun rtog yis mchod// cha gcig rang bzhin med pa ste/ me long lta bu'i yis kyis/ rdo rje mkha 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ste// \u0f7f ni yes mkha 'gro yin// ga pur sha za'i mkha 'gro ste/ srin
125a7(rgyud): bu las kyi mkha'agro yin// gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa la// mkha'agro rnams kyi bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' gro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha 'gro'o// thugs ni yis mkha'agro yin
125a8(rgyud): bde chen rdo rje mkha 'gro ste// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus gnas ni// mkha'agro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha gro ste// mchog dga' sha za'i mkha 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba yis yin// bde chen
125a9(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'go ma ni nyi ma'o// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru bsdu// bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'khor
125b1(rgyud): lor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang / thig le la ni thade 'dus// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la// nyi ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus// dper na 'khor
125b2(rgyud): mos bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang // nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tsan ka yi chad// de yi dbusu thig le yungs kar gyi ni chad // 
125b3(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng ba baspu'i nyag mi tsam gyis ni// g.yas bskor g.yon skor ka li A li sbrul ltar 'khyil// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te/ 'di la sems ni brtan gyur nas// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom/ zla ba A \u0f7f
125b4(rgyud): ka li la/ A li nyi ma la thim nas// nyi ma zhabs bskyed la thim byas ma// zhabs bskyed la sogs rim par// / yan lag lnga ni yis lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te// de nas na dbra mo la// sems ni rim par
125b5(rgyud): sgom pa'o// de nas rang rig yis te// chos kun stong par rog/ cig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yin/ 'khor lo gnyis/ 'bar ba dang ni 'jig pa'i tshul// bla ma'i zhal nas
125b6(rgyud): shes par bya/ phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba ste/ nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtsenas// sor bzhinas ni rtsa gsum gcig/ dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin
125b7(rgyud): bas// dang por de ru bzung bar bya// de nas sprul pa'i gan su bzung // yang na bgrang bar shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni// shes rab yis dang 'brel ba'i// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// gzhang
125b8(rgyud): khag ya zhing baspu ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang zhin yin por gsungs/ byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam/ mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga/ gsang ba'i nor bu mong su gas
126a1(rgyud): / lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'// de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang
126a2(rgyud): sbyor ba dngos// dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o// skar ma'i tsho gas ltar du mar spros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang // sgra gcan lta bur gnyi su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos
126a3(rgyud): yang gsol pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// zung du 'jug pa ji lta bu// gnyisu med pa ji lta bu// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni// rgyu yi khyad par spros pa'o// sku gsum dang ni yes lnga/ 
126a4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin// rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang // / 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste/ 'bras bu gnyi su bsgom par bya/ chos kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sem
126a5(rgyud): ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin// theng stong par ro gcig pa// 'di ni bla/ nga dor med pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnar dag pa'i phyir// 'de// chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga// phyag rgya chen po yis gnyis// dam tshig
126a6(rgyud): chos dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brten pa shin tu zab// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse e la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang
126a7(rgyud): ba yin// rig pa la sogs de bzhin te// gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// til dang til mar ji bzhi no// dper na shing sna bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji
126a8(rgyud): bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid las/ skra yi rtse mo brgya stong dang // khri dang 'bum gyis rnam pa ste/ gnyis pa du ma lta bu'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste/ bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// 'di dag kun gyis rim pa yang / 
126b1(rgyud): sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni/ a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu'i 'chi ba yi// haM gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa na mkha' lta bu ni gnyi su med pa bar ma do'o// mtshan ma stong
126b2(rgyud): bar shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ba la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang // shes rab yis 'brel pa ste// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang lam g.ya' zhing ba
126b3(rgyud): spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdo rje rtsalam nas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam// mchog dgar yi ni ngo bo ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'gags pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin// bde ba'i rgyun chad
126b4(rgyud): bde ba snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi ngo mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub chen po la sogs pa// gong du gsu sa par shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste// mchog dga'
126b5(rgyud): snang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig/ skyes pa 'od gsa'o// yis bzhi yi rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i bsnyen po yin// rags pa bzhi yis gsang ba
126b6(rgyud): 'joms// phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid yis bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten dug gsum
126b7(rgyud): ni// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// 'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbas pa bzhi ni lnga
126b8(rgyud): yi bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'joms// skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med 'chi bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bani// bzang po bzhi dang bden
127a1(rgyud): / nga ba ni// 'byung ba bzhi dang sum pani dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// yis bzhi po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste/ rnar rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang mos pa'i bye
127a2(rgyud): brag dang // chos tshul du mi 'bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod ba'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thang bya bar gsungs/ rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ 
127a3(rgyud): dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags// de yis bya ba ji ltar bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang
127a4(rgyud): bzhi dang bcu dang ldan// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rims kyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang // shin tu gtong dang nar gtong // bstan gnas
127a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub se der yin// dkyil 'jo ra du zhugs dge ba ste// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin/ bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum be brag kyang // 
127a6(rgyud): bum bu'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// dge ba shes ra
127a7(rgyud): yis te/ de nyid slong bas dge slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnar smin dang 'khor ba dang // theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba
127a8(rgyud): gsum ni go rims bzhin// theg pa gsum gyis ngas 'thung zhing / rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas/ 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ cha lug su ni gnas byas la// dbang
127b1(rgyud): bskur rab gnas la sogs bya// theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par ma gsungs te/ dper na rdo las zang su 'gyur// zangs las gsar gyi rnam pa ste/ zangs kyi dus na rdo med de/ gser
127b2(rgyud): du gyur pas rdo mi snang // rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la/ so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsung so// de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang // bzhi pa'i dbang dang
127b3(rgyud): 'brel ba ste// rtag tu g.yon pa'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni// bsgom par lhan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te bsgom par bya// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi// dmigs pa thed
127b4(rgyud): rnam spangs te// sems nyid bsam du med pas ni/ cir yang sam par mi bya'o// sems nyid snang par bcug nas// stong pa sem su rab btsug nas// stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'o// rtog pa
127b5(rgyud): bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur// rteni yod ma yin rten pa med/ de ming gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal
127b6(rgyud): pa/ khro tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// de yi gnas skyes par 'gyur// phyi nang
127b7(rgyud): sbas dang mthar thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas// sgrom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gshe/ rnal 'byor kun la bskur ba 'debs// rdo rje spun tshig slob
127b8(rgyud): la 'phyar/ rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis// mnar med sen dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel ba zab mo yin// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs// lcags gri sor ni bcu drug pa/ 
128a1(rgyud): // 'dzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad // gab pa'i gsang bam gtogs par// sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du seMn dmyal bar skye// shing rje'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor
128a2(rgyud): shes pas rang gis rang zhi dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa// rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang // dbyings dang yis la sogs pa/ lta ba'i don nyid 'chad pa'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum/ 
128a3(rgyud): bde chen 'khor lo rgyu yi rgyud// gsang ba sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang babed skyong 'bras bu'i rgyu dbum pa rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// gsang 'thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// shes rab yis 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu yi rgyud
128a4(rgyud): du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma do ni 'bras bu'i rgyud// rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum pa las dang po le gsang / 
128a5(rgyud): gsang ba bum pa'i dusu gsang // shes rab yis gsang bar gsang/ rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang // gsang ba'i 'khor ma bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub se dang rdo rje snying po dang // mkha 'gro ma'i
128a6(rgyud): tshogs ri rab kyi rdul rnyed kyis bac+doMs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal gsang bzang gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// // paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shakya yis gyis
128a7(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o// // / rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra se ba ra gu h+ya a tsan+ti tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag
128a8(rgyud): 'che'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje brkun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhug so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thaMd kun rdzob
128b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol
128b2(rgyud): bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ slu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa/ bsam gyis mi
128b3(rgyud): khyab sems nyid kyi// dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang / dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // gnas pa'i tshad dang rim pa dag/ gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis
128b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ bag tshogs nyon mongs yis sku// rigs drug rtsa shing 'khril lcug go// rang bzhin ngag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin// 
128b5(rgyud): bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis bshad kyi sa nyon// rtag tshang skye 'gag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spang sa sems nyid rang rig cing // gdod nas spros bral bde ba nyid// 
128b6(rgyud): de don bsam gyis mi khyab nges// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam gyis mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab/ 
128b7(rgyud): chos dang lha spyod pasam mi khyab// yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mdor bstan de nyid rnar dbye// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste// khong nas 'thung ba skye ba med// skye
128b8(rgyud): ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa/ yi ga dam pa bsam mi khyab// phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan chagacer bu thal gos sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang / ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// rol pa'i spyod pangs ma
129a1(rgyud): / mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sen la// mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chang spro skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam chi
129a2(rgyud): mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'dar dang 'bar dang drod la sogs/ rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha skem rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyis mi
129a3(rgyud): khyab pa// rang gi na mkha'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu 'bras tha dad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar bcom pa yi// spyi dang rang
129a4(rgyud): gi mtshan nyid dang / rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sbrul sogs kyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// yi gre'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug sogs// bcu
129a5(rgyud): dgu phra rab rdul gyi bar// sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin// gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg
129a6(rgyud): pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang // ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems
129a7(rgyud): rtags bdud rtags 'byung ba'i// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rong rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das
129a8(rgyud): mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang / tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang // zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te/ nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas
129b1(rgyud): nyon mongs nar byung // 'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs// rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems dang namakha' yas dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan mar
129b2(rgyud): snang ba dang // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang // rim min mos pa khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrud byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar ltung
129b3(rgyud): lta ba de// rang rig gzhan rig sems ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge sgam po dang // mthar ltung dbu mar khas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis mi khyad
129b4(rgyud): ba'i// mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin te/ de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig les chen po yin// sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yis// rang rig yas chen po la/ thabs
129b5(rgyud): dang thabs las byung ba'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rang byung yis yin pa'i phyi/ 8// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang // de la sgrib pa ma
129b6(rgyud): yin te// na mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no// rang gi gzhan rig bye brag gis// sen sangs rgyas gnyisu snang // rang rig sprin med na mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog na mkha' mtshungs// sprin cho gas rlung gis gtor
129b7(rgyud): byas te// sprin med mkha' 'dra ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu na mkha' lta ba la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mog la bsgrib
129b8(rgyud): pa las// na mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// 
130a1(rgyud): / kun nas nyon mongs na byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung
130a2(rgyud): thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi yi grangasu nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang
130a3(rgyud): chags sdang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgya sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig
130a4(rgyud): gzhan rag gnyis// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas// rang rig med par gzhan rig dang // so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs
130a5(rgyud): rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das// kha gcig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rig pas blang dor gnyisu rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu// theg pa
130a6(rgyud): mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rog gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen po'i
130a7(rgyud): ros gang ba// khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes na// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la/ 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis/ 
130a8(rgyud): spangs// sems med na mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing rim pa med pag da kyi sa pa da/ dngan da no gnyis les yas med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste// 'di
130b1(rgyud): rtogs khong du chung pa dang / mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rlom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu'o ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste/ 
130b2(rgyud): des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bangad de bslag/ rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te// bco lngas yi bdag nyid las/ sku gnyis
130b3(rgyud): gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgya med// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang // rig 'dzin sa la gnas
130b4(rgyud): pa'i bar// rang gi spyi yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba
130b5(rgyud): yi// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdog gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad // thun dang
130b6(rgyud): 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon// gal te dben par gnas pa ni// snang med mthar phyin chad yin te// rang rig byi yi tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// 
130b7(rgyud): bya stsol med cing bgrod pa med// rang zung lhun gyis grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no// 'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom
130b8(rgyud): 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo gdung ba'i dus/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi// gzugs
131a1(rgyud): la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhino// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// 
131a2(rgyud): nyon mongs rjes nas rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no// bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams
131a3(rgyud): dang snying rje la sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal la sogs dang // bskyed rdzogs sgom pa'i rim pa kun// skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i
131a4(rgyud): chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed dang / rdzogs sogs mi gnas shing // rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// 
131a5(rgyud): bar mchod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs ni bco brgya de// mkha' mnyam bzhi bcas gzhi med dang // g.yul drug dug gsum rten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la brten// sa chu ma
131a6(rgyud): rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i// rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla mas sems gzung dang por gces// chos rnams thad sems yin te// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rab
131a7(rgyud): rig rnal 'byor ro// sems ni gzod nas rang rig pa// gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro rag bya chos// de brten sems bzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags
131a8(rgyud): zhe sdang dang // gti mug rje su mkhas pas bzung / lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par sgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg chen la// man ngag yod dam
131b1(rgyud): yin te/ lta ba spyod pa sems gzung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal dub mtha' spangs tshegs chung dang // tshogs sogs pa yi khyad par dang // 
131b2(rgyud): khang par dang // khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// / rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab pa la// sbyin dang byams sogs dgongs pa ci// sku gnyis gzhan
131b3(rgyud): don gang las byung // bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin dang byams sogs pas// gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don
131b4(rgyud): mdzad pa'i// sen rnams ni sangs rgya su// 'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na// bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang // sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya// de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jig
131b5(rgyud): dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin la sogs kun// sbyin la sogs pa spyi na byas na// bsam mi khyab pa 'byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor
131b6(rgyud): bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sems kyi yig mgo bcad pa ces// rang sems la su rung ba ni// do na phyi rtags
131b7(rgyud): nang du ste// de las nang rtags phyi rur byung // lus la dri med srin bu ming // skra dkar gnyer ma sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'a khar ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // sbyin med mkha' ltar gang snang ba// bsam
131b8(rgyud): mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thang chos thaMd kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rje su yi rang bar 'gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
132a1(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs brdzog so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+har dang // lo tsA ba shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kha sa ma tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ khong skang du// dpal nama'
132a2(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par
132a3(rgyud): nug so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas mkha' spyod dang / sa spyod dang / sa 'og na spyod pa ma gsum la bac+doMs kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dang ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems/ 
132a4(rgyud): / lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis legs par nyon/ mkha' gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// mkha'
132a5(rgyud): / skyospyo steng sgo'i rlung yin te// sa spyong bar du thig le'i sgo// sa 'og spyod pa/ shu kri sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang po mkha' spyo/ mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bems po'i rlung dang rnam
132a6(rgyud): rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid yis rlung // mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang // lte ba'i lus
132a7(rgyud): ni khyab pa ru// rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // ngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de// thun ro la ni 'pho ba gnyis/ rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'pho ba gcig
132a8(rgyud): la chu chod gnyis// chu tshod ra la dbyug gu gnyis// rlung gi dubyugu drug nu ba ni// de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogaso// sems dang sems med 'dres pa'i rlung // rags pa dang ni dra ba la/ mkhas pas/ 
132b1(rgyud): sems kyi bzhon par gzung // rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid yis rdo rje'i rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te/ de dag man ngag
132b2(rgyud): mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis/ rlung gis mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon pa ma// 'di ni gzhu yi rnarare gnas// bems po rlung gi lam yin te// dbang po mngon
132b3(rgyud): sum lam yin pas// sna yi ri rang gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang nub lhor rgyug gis// thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la// 'bad pas sems ni bzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas/ mi shes pa yi rang rib kyis// rin
132b4(rgyud): chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyi na lum gyur pa// ro ma dang ni rkyang ma'o// sbrul 'khril lta bu'i rnam pa ste// / rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'ag go/ 
132b5(rgyud): rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid yis rdo rje'i rlung // kun 'dar ma yi rtsal rten// tsaN+Da li ni shing lta bu// rang rig yis spyod yul te// gnas dar 'bad de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir
132b6(rgyud): 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin te// de nas sa spyod ba shang bya ste// rang rig yis gang 'dod pas// tsaN+Da li yi bye brag brtag/ dang por rang bzhin tsaN+Da li// gnyis pa gtum mo tsaN+Da li// gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+Da li// de bzhin gcer bu'i tsaN+Da li/ 
132b7(rgyud): de nyid la yang dbye ba ste/ gcer bu gtum mo shin tu gtum// yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang / shin tu gcer bu gcar bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar ba
132b8(rgyud): dbyen rnam pa'i cu gnyis te/ yan lag bcu tshan pa ni dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yin rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs/ gzhan skyes kyi ni khro ma tsam/ pra ba de las bzlog pa'o// brgya dang nyi shu sgra yi rtse/ sum
133a1(rgyud): / gnyis sgra yirtse/ lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'das yungs kar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom bya// gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngas mdang ni snyigs mi char// rang bzhin du ni gnas
133a2(rgyud): pa la/ yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di la rten nas thad 'byung // rigs 'chol gnas 'tshal tshad 'chol dang / 
133a3(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol ba las ni dngos grub min// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma yi dngos grub ste// thad kun gyi rten yin no// sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ byang chub
133a4(rgyud): sems ni rnam pa gsum/ dang po chos nyid sems yin te// 'di ni shes pa rjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang rig byang chub sems// dper/ na rgyan gyis shel sgong bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems/ 
133a5(rgyud): sih+la dang ni ga pur ste// don dam kun rdzob gnyisu gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems// yes rlung dang ye sase mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// rangs snyigs las ni
133a6(rgyud): rim pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las kyi me yis mi 'dzag par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las// mi shes haM gi dbyibs 'dra ste/ nor bu
133a7(rgyud): kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'char dang gzi mdangs snum// bde ba chen po'i skur byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la gdab pa'i rang bzhin la/ khyad par bzhi ni thub mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de
133a8(rgyud): las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing sred pa ste/ dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzob kyis/ sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'tshal pa las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba la de bzhin
133b1(rgyud): te/ bla ma'i nal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba bden pa'i yul/ sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum sgom mi byed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ yi ge dang ni yan lag dang / bsdus pa'i
133b2(rgyud): don dang spyi yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don// sna tshogs sems las 'thung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'thung // A li ka li ma ning dang // drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya// sgra mtha'i
133b3(rgyud): yi ge bsam mi khyab// yan lag rnam pa gsum yin no// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni brjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las gzhan/ thun mong spyi ru ngas pa ste/ bye
133b4(rgyud): brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa dbang dang sngagasu bye// sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag/ de dag kun gyi ma tshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// snod dang snod min phye
133b5(rgyud): brag kyang // bla mas le gas par brtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung / bya ba du
133b6(rgyud): gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya med rnal 'byor de lhag la/ de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang pa de ltag la/ byi nas rnal 'byar ma rgyud ni/ 
133b7(rgyud): shes rab snying po rtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bsrubs shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ron nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngas grub
133b8(rgyud): de 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ma bkrogs 'o ma las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu ba zhi// bdud rtsiro 'dra seng ge gzugs/ gnas
134a1(rgyud): ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs kyis byin rlabs te// mang 'gro nyi shu ba ni la gtad// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas bta'o// dam du snga zhing dam du spel// rgyal las 'das na dam tshig thams// sngags dang
134a2(rgyud): dbyibs dang chos bdag ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag/ sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// dbyings kyang gnyi su shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par
134a3(rgyud): bya// phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug pa ni/ rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin te// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag/ da nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyi ni tsan+da lau// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ rtsa gsum
134a4(rgyud): gis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bani ru// mkha 'gro shu rtsa banil// rgyud ni ci shu rtsa bzhi gtang // pu nub gtum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod// o ru 'ong ldan pasam mi khyab
134a5(rgyud): A ru sna rtsen mkha' mnyam// go ru brtan blo na mkha' che// ra ru miru thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin chen phred // ma ru shing gri ba dam tshig che// ka ru ser stobs po che// o ru 'jigs byed yis
134a6(rgyud): gsang // tri ru rlung shugs yas breng // ko ru chad 'thung yis 'bar// ka ru sha ma zla ba'i phreng // la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar// ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i 'khog he ru kha kha yis rgyal// phre ru 'khor shugs mkha 'gro gsang / 
134a7(rgyud): gri ru khaN+Da gsang me 'bar// so ru shon ti gsang ba bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor lo dur khrod rgyan// na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal// si ru stobs chen yis rgyal// ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus mkha'agro
134a8(rgyud): sdom// de dag gtad lo legs par spos/ nang du tsaN+Da li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni gtad ba ste// dang po gsang ba gnyis pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang // rkyen ni thams gsungs pa ste// mkha'agro khyad kyi rang bzhin te/ 
134b1(rgyud): de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pa// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi'i ro yaM ra li
134b2(rgyud): las/ bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang // yid la zung la dran par gyis// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thaMd rje su yi rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
134b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba rdzog so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya yis kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kha sa ma tan+ta rA dza bod skad du/ dpal na mkha' dang mnyam 'tshan
134b4(rgyud): po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshe/ gas pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la
134b5(rgyud): zhug so// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang // mkha'agro ma grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub se de'i sede' chen po rdo rje snying pos// bac+doMs la g.yas phyogs nas
134b6(rgyud): bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa tsho// bcom pa yang bzha ba na ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par ba// ldan pa da ya gnyan pa
134b7(rgyud): ste// dang pa bum dpung bdud ban yang // kha dag dbyabs la lag rtag gas// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsolo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
134b8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang // kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis/ 
135a1(rgyud): bskyod pa'i gzung 'dzin du mdag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// yang dag lam ston bla ma med// zhe sdang ru drar skye ba yi// rgyu dang
135a2(rgyud): lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus// srog 'chang pa ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas// lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom// log rtogs du ma'i
135a3(rgyud): rtog pa 'gag/ des ni phung po'i bdud bcomo// rten dang rten pa ro mnyam pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dus min 'tsho dang che zad pas// 'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe yis
135a4(rgyud): 'chi ba'i bdud bcom// gzhan yang bdud 'joms bye brag ni// phyi yi tshe yi bdud kyis len// grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'jom so// de bzhi na lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems
135a5(rgyud): kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste// rten dang rten ni sgyu mar ldan// de nas ga sang dbang bdud bzhi yang // de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs/ 
135a6(rgyud): phyi ru dum phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin// dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi bu 'i rdzas/ phyi yi tshe yi bdud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan
135a7(rgyud): yang bdud kyi bye brag na// sgo gsum 'khrul bar gang ston pa// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i cha// de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud// de nyid 'bad de sgrub byas kyang // 'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon
135a8(rgyud): mongs// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// de 'i tshe yi bar chad byed// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha li bu yi bdud bcom// de nyid sgyu mar shes pa dang // de nyid shes pas/ 
135b1(rgyud): dpung po dang / nyon mo sa pa yi bdud panam/ dngos po'i mthar ltung skye bas 'chi/ rgyud med las skyes 'chib ste/ rgyu rkyen ma bskyed dang bzhin gnas/ snrums 'chi bdag bdud pan mo/ chel dang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen
135b2(rgyud): bo'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rang yis bdud bzhi yang // rtsa dang shu kra la sogs pa'i// dman pa'i lam stan lha yi bdud// de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud// de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa mi
135b3(rgyud): bdud yin pas// kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yino// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang // 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'o// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhini du ma ste/ rgyud la
135b4(rgyud): spungs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems nyon mongs nyon mongs bdud/ 'khor bar ltung bas skye bo ste/ skye ba las byung 'chi bdag pa dung // rnam par rtog pa skye bso// did chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud
135b5(rgyud): ma spangs sum cu drug nyid dang / nges pa sum cu rtsa drug gis// la/ ma brten bla mas lha bdud bcom// dga' ba zhi rgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen ror gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig les sbyin/ 
135b6(rgyud): rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bco mo// de yis 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bco mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi// dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste// rgyal po
135b7(rgyud): dmangasu phab pa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin// bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la/ bizhi pa'i lam ston bla ma ni// lha yi bu yi bdud yin te/ 
135b8(rgyud): bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal las shes// snod min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang // mar dang kha ra la sogs par// 'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste// rigs ngan rgyalas 'dzin pa 'dra// dang
136a1(rgyud): dang gdam ngag 'brel bcas pa'i// 'dud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags// bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis// thob na de nyid dam pa ste/ bla ma
136a2(rgyud): gcig la mnyan par bya// bla ma rnam pa gnyi su gsungs// phye yi bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dang ngag yi sde rnams kun// tha~Md 'jigs shing skrag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// ngagra dang
136a3(rgyud): bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdud dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / thams cad rgyud la
136a4(rgyud): dga' zhing mgu nas rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal na mkha' chen bo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
136a5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA ya bAkrIt+yAtan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpa' sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dang 'al phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mtshan
136a6(rgyud): gyur la ni yang dag gnas// mgon bi thugs rje che ldan pa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo ba yin// thugs kyang shes
136a7(rgyud): yis te// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma ki/ dam tshig sgrol mgos dkar mo// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsol// rgyud kyis don la rab goms shing // smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs shing // gzhan gyi rtsod pa mi DI yang // 
136a8(rgyud): dbang dang man ngag mthob par// dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags spyod ngal ba don med de// shi nas sen dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bos dbang gsum gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// 
136b1(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ dang por bum dbang rim pa yang // gnas ni shin tu sngags pa bcal// bkra shis yid dga' shin tu sdum// bkra shis bya rnams skad sman sgrogs/ dpag bsam shing rgyas yod
136b2(rgyud): bar 'dod// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs ngag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtar ma sbyin srid mchod yon gyis// sa blang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs// de nas dang po bsnyen
136b3(rgyud): pa dbul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring tha// mtshan mgrangs dang dusu gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni stong dang khri dang 'bum// dus ni bco lnga bcu
136b4(rgyud): gsum dang / bdun du bsnyen pardzogs pa dang / lha rnams bsnyen pas nanyes byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par ga/ nas pa tshul bzhin bya// bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi/ bu mo ku
136b5(rgyud): phyogs 'thun pa'i// kuM sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag so shing / rtse mor me tog dri// srung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag dang nga gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring
