136b6(rgyud): tha/ ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgra ma// khaM ba ra yi sngags kyis kyang // de la rdo rje byab par bya// de nas ku sha la sogs la// spobs pa'i cho ga dang ba#
136b7(rgyud): bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang // dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang glang po ma he dang // rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs pa/ 
136b8(rgyud): brgya'am stong ngam khri'am 'bum/ bla re brgyan dang ba dan sogs// byin rlabs tshogs bsag phyi ru dgod// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lag dri yi byug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrun
137a1(rgyud): / pa las sad na// he ru kar grags chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam// dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis// rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa
137a2(rgyud): dgongasu gsol/ byang chub chen por lung ston pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tsha'o// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol// pad+ma las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba las byung bdag la stsol/ 
137a3(rgyud): thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ mgon pos bdag ni gtsug tu gsol// legaso leg so rigs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thang 'jig byed pa// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod
137a4(rgyud): bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi non khyod kyi blang // dam tshig spyod pa spyad na ni// mchog ga de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug/ nam yang khyod kyis spangs mi bya// tshangs sbyong nga bzhin
137a5(rgyud): bsam gtan la// 'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya// nga ni rtag btung khri mi bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gan na gyi phyag rgya brten par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yino// dkon mchog
137a6(rgyud): gsum la skyabasu 'gro// thun mong sdom dang sems bskyed sbyin// bskor ba lan gsum pag gsum bya// yol bas bar du bcad nas ni// mig lo sogs pa lnga bkab la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed rku
137a7(rgyud): yis bsal dag bya// me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang // de yi snying la bzhag la sgom// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab// sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral// 
137a8(rgyud): mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri// lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg/ dngos grub phrin las so so ru// mkhas pas shes shing brtag par bya// me tog dor te lha yang sbyin// 'khod
137b1(rgyud): rnams gtso ba'i yan lag yin// gtso ba'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis/ dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis// mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams
137b2(rgyud): kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bston// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa ru// bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// chu khams mi bskyod me long gis/ rdo rje
137b3(rgyud): rigs kyi phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi phrin las 'grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje'i dbang // so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i
137b4(rgyud): rigs kyi phrin las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// rnam snang
137b5(rgyud): chen po'i ngo bo ste// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin la sa// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri steng su// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pas
137b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan 'dzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab// gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsum yin te/ 
137b7(rgyud): dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang // rje su gnang dang phyir mi ldog/ brtag par byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thug mong yin par nga yis gsungs
137b8(rgyud): bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum te// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin// gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsung ba bshang byed/ lus ni ri rang lhun po la/ byang chub
138a1(rgyud): sems kyi gnas bcas nas// bde ba'i stan la gnas na su// gsang ba'i dbang gis rtog gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes
138a2(rgyud): bdag par sbyang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bye ba dang // bar chod bgegs rnams bzhi pa dang // srung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri yi thig le du ma bya// g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang // srub dang bsrub thab sbyor
138a3(rgyud): ba dang // bsrubs las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis// lus kun khyab na gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro mo'i 'khor lor d+hu bsams la// lce dpad+mar byin rlabs te/ 
138a4(rgyud): lce yi rtse mar bya bsams la// sih+la ga pur 'dres pa yis// b+hu la bzhag te de la bstim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyor la// / dbus mi dmigs bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum
138a5(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje gtso mos sbyin pa dang // khro mo sbom pos sbyin par ngo // // rdo rje gre tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang lo ya nga // dang por shes rab brtag po ni// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsu
138a6(rgyud): mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tshe longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyod par lnga// phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// sems brtan rdo rje mi
138a7(rgyud): ni rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba'i rdo rje yi// lang tshe'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas rgyan shes pa ste// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// 
138a8(rgyud): mi nus chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thaMd stong pa nyid// de yi ro la longs spyod pas// rdo rje'i longs spyod khyad pa'o// kun dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad
138b1(rgyud): bar yin pa'o// de nyid mda' ltar mkhrang ba ni// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad pa'o// rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas// gnyi su med la dkar ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// 18
138b2(rgyud): la brgyus pa ji bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad paro// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tir gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par// dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang // gsum pa gsung ba'i rtag
138b3(rgyud): pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtag thug su 'gyur ba'o// sgyu ma tsam gyi dgongs pa'i don/ kun la khyad par shes par bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi
138b4(rgyud): bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por smrig rgyu chur 'khrul dang / gnyis rab smig rgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya// tshul bdun no mar la gcig/ drin
138b5(rgyud): bdun te/ gnyis// sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams bal bi'i rten gyur pa// lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs// kar gnyis te bu ram gcig/ chang ni gnyisu shes par bya// rgyan
138b6(rgyud): ni bye brag sna tshog so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha/ zhag gcig na no bcud dang ldan// dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drod dang ldan na bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// 'dun pa byas na dam
138b7(rgyud): tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no// kha bas kun gyi bcud skyed de// mngar ba kun gyis ro \u0f7f
138b8(rgyud): byed// bcud bskyed sha ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa sha ni bco lnga yin// bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsres// chang ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgo
139a1(rgyud): / ngam mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya// kha ra 'i chang ngam 'o ma'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya/ 'di ni yan lag spros btsa'o// de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang // dam tshig sna
139a2(rgyud): tshogs bya ba yang // spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang bskur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma gtad dang man ngag sbyin// brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// rtag pa shin
139a3(rgyud): tu spros pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud// dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsung so// dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs pa tsog bu gan rgyal dang // kha bub phreng
139a4(rgyud): dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa
139a5(rgyud): dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smi/ na brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba
139a6(rgyud): dngos/ khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman ni dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa tinge 'dzin yin te// sngags dang sman gyis kun da drang // rked bcing tshad dang gnas pa'i
139a7(rgyud): tshad// grangs pa'i tshad rnams shes par bya// 'byung ba bzhin dang rigs 'thun pa'i// rked shing rked pa'i tshad dang mnyam// sor gsum por bzhi dar ma min// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsang ba'i pho
139a8(rgyud): brang gnas// skye mched rig par gnas pa'o// stong parta mgrin 'khor lor gnas/ khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas// 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas/ he ru kar
139b1(rgyud): ni ma gshegs shing / rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'i chad ni sor ba ni dbyug/ dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la/ sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum// sum cha sum gnyis stong smad du// lus la sku zhing me la bdug
139b2(rgyud): rtse gsum rtse ni shin tu zag// bslu ba dang lba ba dang // mar nye ba dang nye'u shing dang / ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas/ rdo rje la sogs lnga sbyar dang // gnan yang sman dang snum dang dri// dar la sogs pa'i nang du thug
139b3(rgyud): sgo gnyis nas ni tho ldos bdug/ zab pa'i sngags btab sgom byas nas// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'byung // tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye brag
139b4(rgyud): shes gyur nas// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab// gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na/ 
139b5(rgyud): dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// da chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang / 'khor lo 'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang / sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yis go bzlog sbyor ba dang / 
139b6(rgyud): 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dbugs kyi go
139b7(rgyud): bzlog sbyor ba dang // dga' bi'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rtsa yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang // brda' yi go bzlog
139b8(rgyud): sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams// kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs kyi gsang // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting
140a1(rgyud): / 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par ma dpags par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin// dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang // gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// 
140a2(rgyud): shes rab ma la brten na su// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na// shes rab ma la brtan nasu// bad pa' ya shes bskyed pas na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// sih+la ga pur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba ye shes yin// 
140a3(rgyud): sih+la shes rab zhes bya ste/ ga pur ye shes ni bshad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la la nA ni ye sheso// ra sanA ni shes rab ste// rtsa ni shes rab zhes bya ste// byang chub sems ni
140a4(rgyud): yeso// mkha'agro ma ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum na ba shad// dga' ba gsum ni yis te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab zhes bya ste// steng la yi su yang bshad// 
140a5(rgyud): g.yon pa shes rab zhes bya ste// g.yas pa yi su yang bshad/ chos dbyings shes rab zhes bya ste// yes bzhi ni ye shes yin/ phyag mtshan ming dang yi ge rnams// gnan yang bye brag shes par bya/ 
140a6(rgyud): shes rab yis la yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'ang gnang ba yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pas sgom pa gsungs// e baM ma ya'i rnam pa yang // e ni sa ste bo ni chu// ma ni me ste ya~M
140a7(rgyud): ni rlung // e ni snying rje de ni byams// ma ni dga' ba ya btang snyoms// e ni spyan pa mA ma ki/ ma ni gos dkar ya sgrol ma// e ni sbyin pa'i tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya bsam gtan// e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// ba ni
140a8(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya yin// ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste// ya ni shes rab phyag rgya'o// e ni shar te ba lnga phyogs// e ni sku yi thig le ste/ ba ni gsung la ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// e ni sngon po ba ljang khu/ 
140b1(rgyud): mni dmang po la ser po// seM nim 'gro ba lngam/ ma ni dum skyes la gzugs can/ e ni yis mkha 'gro ste/ ngan rdo ma 'gro yin// ma ni sha ba'i mkha 'gro ste/ ya ni las kyi ma' 'gro'o// seM ni 'gog/ bdun
140b2(rgyud): lam// ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung // e ni bde chen po longs spyod// ma ni mtshan ma'i stong pa// me ni rnam thar ya dpe byad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// nga ni rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnar nyid ba ste// ya ni rnam pa mtshan
140b3(rgyud): nyid bral// e ni chung ngu baM 'bring po// / ma ni lhag pa ya cher lhag/ e ni g.yas nas mi rgyu ste// baM ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o// ma ni 'og nas sa rlung rgyu// ya ni steng nas chu rlung rgyu// e naM gnas brtan baM pal chen// ma ni
140b4(rgyud): bkur ba ya thams cad// e ni bsnyen pa'i ge bsnyen/ ma ni sgrub pa ya sgrub chen// a ni shar lho ba lho nub// ma ni shar mtshams ya nub mtshams// e na rgyud la be ni sngags// ma ni yes ya gsang ba/ 
140b5(rgyud): e ni snang ba ba snang mched// ma ni snang thob la 'od gsal/ e ni bad ga gi bzang po yin// ba ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma ni ye shes bzang por gsungs// yini rlung gi bzang po yin/ e ni bdag gi gnas
140b6(rgyud): yin te// be ni rnal 'byor gan su bstan// ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te// ya ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba be mchog dga'// ma ni lhan cig ya dga' bral// e ni me long baM mnyam nyid// ma ni kun rtog ya nan
140b7(rgyud): tan/ e ni chos sku ba longs spyod// ma ni sbrul sku ya bde chen/ e ni zhib bo ni dbang // ma ni rgyas pa ya gsong ba// yi ge btus pa'i sngags chen gsum/ oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste/ AHni gsung gi 'khor la
140b8(rgyud): hUM ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// oM ni rnam snang AH'od dpag/ hUM ni mi bskyod rang bzhi no// oM ni phyag g.yon hwe ni g.yas// AHni dbus kyi snying kha yin// oM na gaMyon gyi spyan yin te// hUM ni g.yas pa AH
141a1(rgyud): // dbus ma// oM ni srog la hU~M rtsol ba// AH ni gnas par shes par bya/ oM na sku la d+hu ni thugs/ AHni gsung du shes par bya// oM ni lus la A ni ngag hU~M ni yid du shes par bya// oM ni thabs la hUM shes ra
141a2(rgyud): AHni gnyi su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gyi la la nA// hU~M ni g.yas kyi ra sa nA// AHni A ba d+hu tA yin// oM ni g.yas kyi ra sa nA/ hUM ni g.yon gyi la la nA/ A ni de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga pur hUM si hA/ AHni dkar
141a3(rgyud): dmar rtsa dag yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM khyang dga'// AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don// dga' ba lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/ lhan cig skyes par dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang // rgyu la rgyu yi sbyor ba dang / 
141a4(rgyud): 'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyi su med par sbyor/ thabs la shes rab sbyor ba da // shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis
141a5(rgyud): med sbyor/ sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang // kun mkhyen gyis kyang / rtogs par dka'// a ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa/ noraro rin mo/ na 'byung ldan te// d+hU tshes 'od dpag med pa yin// thig la don yong
141a6(rgyud): grub pa'o// oM na bid gshegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs bskyed don yod grub pa ste// 'ani de bzhin 'od dpag med// ha ni nor snang mdzad te// zla chos rin chen 'byung ldan yim/ thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no// zhabs bskye
141a7(rgyud): sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te/ 'a ni gos dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni rdo rje dbyings byug ma// zla tshes mA ma ki rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dgo' ba lnga// ga rims bzhin
141a8(rgyud): du shes par bya// zhabs bskyed bya ba nan tan yin// 'ani mnyam nyid meso// nyan chos kyi dbyings yin te/ zla ches so sor rtog pa'o// thig lem long ye shes/ 'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa'i don// sangs rgyas kun gyi
141b1(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang // kun tu gsang zhes dpyad par dka'// yi ge'i tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha'agro ma'i tsho gas kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar 'gyur to// 
141b2(rgyud): mang 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom bsku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA lo tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ 
141b3(rgyud): dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// rin chen phreng ba'i don ma rtogs// khyed kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bac+doMs
141b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/ ma gsungs nga yis khyod la be shad/ rin po che ni rnam pa gsum// de yi phreng ba'ang rnam pa gsum/ dang po snod kyi rin po che// 
141b5(rgyud): gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che/ snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// / de ni rin chen gsum pa yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa las// de rnams rin chen ji ltar
141b6(rgyud): lags// de yi phreng ba ji ltar lags// de rnam su yi spyod yul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po snod kyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ ka ka ru ni dkar ngo che/ mi bskyod pa yis byin rlabs te/ 
141b7(rgyud): dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu la// rab ni ngang ba'i sgo btsam// 'di ni rin chen 'bar ba ste/ ba dkar ra dkar lug dkar mo'i// 'o sa sku zhing spangs pa dang // mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi bor gdags pa'o// mchod pa'i
141b8(rgyud): brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang / gang la yod pa de la skyob/ 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom po cas/ 'di ni rin chen dge ba ste/ dngul sku rnam pa gnyis blugs la/ byin gyis rdzas rnams tshang ba dang / Sha
142a1(rgyud): / yi nang du gzhug pa ste// ro mi 'khor lo lces mnan la// de nas dal gyis bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan// dper na sprul
142a2(rgyud): gyi sha zos pa/ mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'thung // de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems// sna rtse las kyang gyen la ldog/ til dang til mar bzhin du gnas/ khyad par bde ba gyen la skye// bde ba ster phyir
142a3(rgyud): rin po che// de yi phreng ba du ma rabashad// tha ma skyes pa'i khro mo tsam// e ran la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu btags gyur na/ lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yong // 
142a4(rgyud): rluR+Ya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin rlabs te// dbyibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste/ rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i mig// 'di ni rin chen myur gu ste// ngang ba'i sgo nga ldong ros dang // spang sha ma dang gsum
142a5(rgyud): sbyar nas/ de gdugs rna ba g.yasu gdags/ lho yi gdon na/ mas thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni ngang pa'i sgong tsam// 'di ni rin chen e ran da// ga pur rak+ta
142a6(rgyud): dngul zhug sum// de yi nang thugs lce nag tu// gyen nur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug/ de mos byang chub sems bzung ste// 'gal ma'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas/ tha ma bye'u sgong chad tsam/ a rungang sgyu ru/ 
142a7(rgyud): ba rur dang ldong ros rnams/ bsres te lus la thug bskus te// 'di ni d+han d+ha kas pu ra// lus kyi srin bu khyer bar byed// de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad+ma ra// dmar po ste// dbyibs ni zlum po lta bul/ 
142a8(rgyud): 'odod dpag med kyi byin rlabs te/ rab ni kar sha pa ni stong // gur gum ga pur lnga sbyar la// de la bsku ning thug bya'o// lte ba'i dbusu bzhag la bcing // 'di ni ratu ke ru ra// nub kyi gdon rnams thub par/ 
142b1(rgyud): bsungam/ 'bring ni kar sha pa ni ste/ 'di ni hwA ka ra ste/ mar dang sa le sbram dang ldan/ 'ono ru byas pa'i bsu mu rnams// de yi na thugs lte bar mnan// 'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste// chul chub nas
142b2(rgyud): ji bzhin no// tha ma kar sha pa ni ste// 'bras bu gsum dang ru rta dang // mar gyi snying po nga sgyur te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sgru ba dang // 'di ni rat+na bde bsar// skra dkar med par byed pa'o// de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang / 
142b3(rgyud): de ni ma rgad sdang ku ste// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste// don yod grub par byin rlabs te// rab ni btson du byug pa tsam// 'di ni rat+na ga ga ni// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags// 'di yis
142b4(rgyud): byang gi gdon rnams thu'o// bring na bya mo sgong cam/ ma hA ga u ma // gnyis kyig pur ra mas// thugs la lte ba'i nang dug tu de// ga pur si sgra gnyis ka 'dzin// tha ma gzhan skyes sgra nga cam/ 
142b5(rgyud): ldong ros ser po gser dang gsum// man cha gcig ni byin nas ni// 'di ni e ru na ste/ srin bu mi skye ba de dang ldan// 'di nir sa na da ha// de nas yang dag lnga pa yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du ma
142b6(rgyud): snang // rnar snang mdzad byin rlabs te// don rnams so so du ma byed// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ong so so skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang nas btsal// rin chen mi 'tshal ji ltar lags// rin
142b7(rgyud): jo che ni ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na// rin po che yi gling yod do// de yi gnas nas bcal bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngulal
142b8(rgyud): sogs rdo rnams kyi// gnas ni kun na yod par gsungs// rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyud rnams thaMd la// rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang / bla ma'i mkhag shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor
143a1(rgyud): / bcas pas shes// gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la/ zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen po des sheso// lngang rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang // rgyal po dang ni 'brel pa yis/ 
143a2(rgyud): gser mgar ma khra pA rtogs par 'gyur// lhams gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dang po'i man ngag ji ltar yin// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum brgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tan ji ltar lags/ lnga
143a3(rgyud): pa 'brel pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po man ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la/ yon tan du mar shes pa ste/ dper na rdzas kyi pa lam bzhin// chu la mi 'bying 'jigs la sogs
143a4(rgyud): du ma shes pa man ngag yin// rnal 'byor shes brtse gcig ste// de yis thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi// tshong dpon de yi sra shes pa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon kun ldan rgyal po
143a5(rgyud): shes// rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i// sa 'og gser gyi blangs pas shes// gser mgar de yis shes pa'o// brtag pa rnam/ pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste// rdo rje palam la
143a6(rgyud): sogs dang // e ran d+ha la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin// ma hA ni la la sogs pa/ gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang // tshe rnams ring ba la sogaso// dang por gdon gyi
143a7(rgyud): mtshan ma ni// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas rten gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru// gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang // gser dngul snod du chu blugs la// lha 'am
143a8(rgyud): klu 'am gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Da la/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzhag par bya// gom pa gsum gyis bcad par bya// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thob tu ni// chu yi nang du me long bzhag/ byi ru gi ter ma chag cig bzhan
143b1(rgyud): nang du sol ba dag ngos bcad// de ru tshogs dang bkra shis banag/ rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la/ lha yinal 'byor rdzogs pa dang / khro bos drag tu mtshams bcad la/ sbom po khro mo lhar sgom// de yis rin chen dang po gzung / 
143b2(rgyud): de nas sor ba ni 'phyang du bzhug/ thub pa ma mi thub la sogs pa/ mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dbyings dang kha dog rin po che// yon tan med pag la srid// dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na// pa med pa yang ga
143b3(rgyud): la srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la sogs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni gzor
143b4(rgyud): byas yin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba slu// bzo byas pa ni rnam pa gnyi sa/ gser 'gyur gser gyi rgyan yin te// brdar ba'i lam ni srid lam 'gegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba byed// mkhas pas brtags shing
143b5(rgyud): shes rab bya// dngul la sogs pa'angang bzhin te// mdor na snang ni/ nga srid pa'i rdzas// thams cad rin po che yin te// man ngag can gyis shes par 'gyur// de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus kyi ri rab

143b7(rgyud): ti rin chen las// thig le dum phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// a ba d+hA ti ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a ba d+hU ti'i rang bzhin las// steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas/ 
143b8(rgyud): bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las// yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig le ha yin no// oM dang AHhUM ha dang be zhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs
144a1(rgyud): dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi// snying khar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni rin chen la/ 
144a2(rgyud): stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don// pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa la/ a ba d+hU ti rin po che// a phaT e dang baM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i theg le bzhi rub shad// a ni me long lta bu ste// phaT ni bya ba nan
144a3(rgyud): tan yin// e ni so sor rtog pa ste/ ba ni mnyam nyid ye sheso// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams// a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba ba ni// phaT kyi gan su yes
144a4(rgyud): lnga/ e yaM gnasu snyoms 'jug dgu/ baM gi gnasu lnga bcu brgya dra// de kho na ru shes par bya// kA e e ta sa bon bzhi// yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lha mos
144a5(rgyud): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis gdon rnams ji ltar thug/ byang sems dgag pa ji ltar lags/ skra dkar ba nyer ma ji ltar ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na rtog/

144a7(rgyud): dgag rim pa yang // g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs kyis te// g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag/ sags na mkha' dgag par bya// zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtser dgag/ la la nA dang ras n+ta/ a ba d+hU ti'i na

144b1(rgyud): dbu su gnas pa dang / rim nas rim par gyen la drang / skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar/ skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin 'gag/ gang la rten pa de yi tshad// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ dbusu gnas pa ji ltar
144b2(rgyud): lags// rim nas rim du ji ltar drang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab zhes pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par zhugs pa dbu ma'i don// g.yas kyi srog ni
144b3(rgyud): rtag pa'i mtha'// g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'// de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don// ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems// rkyang ma khrag ni chad pa'o// kun d+har ma rung gang gnas pa// de ni dbu mar shes par bya// mchog
144b4(rgyud): gi dga' ba rtag pa'i mtha'// bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'// / lhan cig dga' ba dbu mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis taM/ AHyi rnam pa dbu mar gnas/ A li kA li mtha' gnyis te/

144b7(rgyud): bur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rim du drang ba yang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni// bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa// pad+ma rdo rje 'gas pa snyam// don yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshangad// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas// 
144b8(rgyud): bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang por de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur na// bde ba chen po ri 'khor lo nas// gsang ba'i sna rtse'i bar du drang // lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// bcud
145a1(rgyud): / kyi rin chen gang na gnas// de ni shes pasu yis shes// de yi brtag pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du/ 
145a2(rgyud): a ba d+hU ti'i tsan dan gnas// la la ra swa sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa thag khug par gnas// 'di rnams rang bzhin kun la gnas// rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por
145a3(rgyud): gsungs/ phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug ni// man ngag yod pas shes par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa gnyi su brtan// dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang
145a4(rgyud): bye brag gnyis// snyun rlung gi rang bzhin te// yan lag thung na chu yi khams// / yan lag rgyas pa sa yi khams// smad zheng chen me yi khams// sna tshogs duman mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkar ba chu yi khams
145a5(rgyud): dmar ba me ru shes par bya// ser na de bzhin sa yi khams// sngan rlung du shes par bya// yang na rlung gi khams yin// drod rnams chen me yi khams// brtan pas yi kham su gsungs// chu khams
145a6(rgyud): chen chu yi khams// de rnams kun ldan na mkha'i khams// 'jug pa bde chen sa yin te// ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni bye brag gis// sems kyi gnas pa shes par bya// shu kra rlung la
145a7(rgyud): si h+la ma/ sbrul dang chos sbyar ba yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yin/ dbyibs dang kho dog mtshan ma gsungs// kun la mkhas par shes par bya// dang por dbyibs
145a8(rgyud): kyi brtag pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang // glu gsum du yang shes par bya// dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra// rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bar// kun la brtag cing
145b1(rgyud): shes par bya// skad ni phra dang sgom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang // 'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags de brtag pa'i mtshan ma ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod
145b2(rgyud): chags sku dang zhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsung du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la// mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag/ nyin
145b3(rgyud): par bzhi dang mtshan par ba ni// de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzum pa spu ldang la sogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs ldan su zhig dmar/ sna
145b4(rgyud): bug dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'dar kha ni skam la sogs// 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtag su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags// kha dog dbyibs la brtag par bya// sra phyir 'dod pa sa yi
145b5(rgyud): rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// gsung dang thugs la'ang shes pa ra bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// da ya
145b6(rgyud): zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba
145b7(rgyud): la zhes nas/ srid pa'i sa bon mi zad pas// dper na rgyud kyi mnga' bzhin du// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te// 'bras bu gnyis med yis bskyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang ba
145b8(rgyud): ste/ de yis chen po gnyen por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// the rten bsku ru bstan// brjod pa dang
146a1(rgyud): bral gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral ba thug su shes// rnam rtog chung zhing gtong pod che// bla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // bla ma yon tan
146a2(rgyud): kun ldan zhing // dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang // gsang ba'i don lam rmongs shing // thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// chos la ser sna med pa dang // gsal la gsung por smra ba dang // rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba
146a3(rgyud): dang // las kyi phag rgya 'chang ba dang // dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste// 'di la bkur gyi thad la// bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// de nas rin chen gsum pa ni// gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste// rtog bral spros pa med pa
146a4(rgyud): yin/ de rtogs rin chen phreng ba'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar smin// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis
146a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gab pa zhes pa ye shes te// sum cu rtsa bdun sku gsum thugs// chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsung // dga' ba ba ni ru mdor bsdus pa// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o// bdun
146a6(rgyud): dang ldan phyir chen po'o// sum ducu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po stobs kyis ma zhugs par// sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye// 'di ni rkun mo ma rungs pa// dper na ljon
146a7(rgyud): shing rtsa ba las// yal ga me tog thad skyes// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags la// dus gsum la sogs thad do// sbas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba mnar med
146a8(rgyud): dmyal ba dang // dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can/ snying rje med cing sha khrag za/ shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas/ mya ngan 'das pasku gsum ste/ skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni
146b1(rgyud): tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yi su// sems can don la yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral na mkha' bzhin// sku gnyis sprin dang char lta bu// sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa// sems can las dang smon lam
146b2(rgyud): stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// sku gsung de nyid bzhi bcu'i don// dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes/ sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda// rgyan ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi
146b3(rgyud): gabarda/ gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni// sbom po gsang ba'i rdo rje'i brda// khro mo gsang ba'i pad+ma'i badz+ra// sku dang drang ba yon tan skyon// mdzub mo la rten mthe'u chung ni// nga yau gan du chur shog yin// mthe bo
146b4(rgyud): la brten mdzub mo bar// khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis yin/ mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni// b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin// b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston// bde ba'i gan su 'du ba yang // srong dam
146b5(rgyud): nam gung po rangs gsum// mdzub tshigs dang po nas bzung nas/ tham 'bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// la na gsum bar du nan tan gnang // gzhan yang brda yi bye brag
146b6(rgyud): rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// gnas ni thabs kyi 'dug stang so// nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'du ba thabs ni 'o/ 
146b7(rgyud): ste/ shes rab 'ong ba nye 'du yin// tsAn+do thabs kyi bstan dang rgyan// shes rab de bzhin nyi tsAn+do// dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de
146b8(rgyud): bzhin dbyibs dang yang // yan lag tshul las shes par bya// de nas lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar 'gyur to// dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang
147a1(rgyud): // pa yang gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang brdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// smad kyis kyang
147a2(rgyud): dpe phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
147a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhug so// de nas byang chub sede' chen
147a4(rgyud): po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi
147a5(rgyud): 'gyur te// rgyu med pa yi 'bras bu bzhin// tshe yi 'dus byas dmyal ba ra 'gro/ de phyir dam tshig shin tu srung // sangs rgyas bla ma/ las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin bla ma yi// lnga bcu'i bdag
147a6(rgyud): nyid bsrung bar bya// thun mongs brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste// de rnams nges par shes par bya// de rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste/ bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum
147a7(rgyud): lnga'o// skye mchod sems dpa' sems ma yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjid dang bsnyas pa la sogs spang // de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// don dam par ni rang rig ste// tshogs bsags
147a8(rgyud): phyir na nga yi gsungs// tsher ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma yengs shig/ gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin srung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// mig la sogs/ 
147b1(rgyud): bde bzhino// gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin srung // dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin mchod// bskus shing gshe ba la sogs spang // sems can po dang mo kun la/ dpa' bo dpa' mo ngam/

147b3(rgyud): zhing mchod pa'i phyir// lus kyi nyes sdom sku yin te// ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs// yid kyi nyes sdom thugasu gsungs// oM gyi 'od zer dkar po yis// 'dod khams dag par gyur pa ni/ sku yi dam tshig srung
147b4(rgyud): ba'o// de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang oM du shes par bya// AHni/ kha dog dmar po yis// gzugs khams dag pa'i gsung dam tshig/ hUM gi kha dog nag po yis// gzugs med dag pa dam tshig
147b5(rgyud): go// oM na spyi bor yang dag gnas// AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas// / hUM ni snying khar spro dang bsdu// sku yi mkha 'gro bcu gnyisasu// 'dod khams dag pa'i ngam chi'o// gsung gi mkha 'gro bcu
147b6(rgyud): gnyi su// gzugs khams dag pa'i dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha 'gro bcu gnyisu// gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig ste// oM dang AHdang hUM la bsdu// oM ni rgyu yi sku bcu gnyis// AHni lam gyi sku bcu gnyis
147b7(rgyud): hUM ni 'bras bu sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// yes gcig sbyar sdom pa'o// dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs
147b8(rgyud): sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs// yis gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// bde chen snying po ha nyid la/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // yis dang ni rnam pa pa ni// oM dang AHdang hUM dang yang // yan lag bzhi pani brub pa
148a1(rgyud): / gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// oM dang haM gnyis rang bzhin ba ni// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong // drug brgya bzlas par shes
148a2(rgyud): par bya// lag pa bskyod pa rang bzhi na gar// rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas na dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang // 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang // 
148a3(rgyud): dpa' bo mkha'agro ma zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun// tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag ban// theg pa tshan la smod pa dang //

148a5(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra// rang gi dam chi/ ga srung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro tsa'i sha dang ba nud kyi sha kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang // ma la gcig ste

148b1(rgyud): bo mkha'agro ma rnams kyi// mchod dang srung ba la sogs byed// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi gdon// srog gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs/ 
148b2(rgyud): srog chags 'dod pa spyod mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig srung phyir dben par 'dug/ lasu rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam// 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu bzhi yin par gsung

148b4(rgyud): mdzes/ b+ha ga mnyam par 'joms paso// snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no//

148b7(rgyud): smin che ba rang yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra// kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur ba dang // lag gis rdzas rnams mi thub cing /

149a3(rgyud): na nyes pa bsam mi khyab// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ril bu mig sman la sogs pa dang // zhi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang //

149a7(rgyud): nas kyi myu gu ste// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus// bstan pa gzhan min nga yis te// skye ba gzhan min pha dang ma// man ngag gzhan min sa

149b3(rgyud): byas kyang sanyes ngar mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'i rgyud ni ngo re mtshar// dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hu ra dang / 9ts+tsha
149b4(rgyud): ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la

149b9(rgyud): song su gnos pa'i phyir/ mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med// klog dang sgom pa bsam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i chos dang skar mi 'tshogs/ thams cad spangs ti bde
150a1(rgyud): // ba yi/ sun la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste/ shes rab ye shes bsrub pa rug/ shing na sri ni 'khor lo ltar// yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bzlog nasu// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos/ 
150a2(rgyud): ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste/ skye ba med pa'i gnasu bzung // de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog
150a3(rgyud): nasu// rang sems stong par bsgom par bya// chos la dag med rtogs pa na// de che sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong par ros gang ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal
150a4(rgyud): bci yang med// bsnan par bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par 'grol// rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di la tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas/ 
150a5(rgyud): glang po'i rjes ni mi btsal ltar// sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na// rnam// rtog gang yang mi bca'o// ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid dug du sbyar te sbyin// sman las dug 'byung sbyor ba yang // sman pa mkhas
150a6(rgyud): pas sbyor ba shes// gzhan yang mar dang kha ra dang // mar gyi snying po la sogs pa// 'thungs te zhun sman du 'gyur// de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang // drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min// dgongs pa
150a7(rgyud): dang ni dgongs pa min// bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du// yong su brtags nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya yi mos pa 'am// gzhan gyis mkhas 'jug mi bya// ji ltar skye bo blun po sa// dgra ru gyur pa'i skye
150a8(rgyud): yis/ sman yin byas te dug byin na/ sman du da migs te drug thos na// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur/ thabs rnams thams cad sgyu mar shes/ shes rab brjod du mo par gsungs// ji ltar rig pa ma khas pa las/ 
150b1(rgyud): sa kyis kya skyed/  se ga yoms gsu /  tugs la/ 'dod ga nga kyi nga gyu rdzos na rje ba sa ba nga ni kyi nga bya/  zhi
150b2(rgyud): che ba la/ gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// dper na rlung ni mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu// de nyid nags sreg me yi grog su 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la rten pa bde ba'i yul// drug gis ngadagra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ril bu
150b3(rgyud): mig sman la sogs pa/ 'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung / ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas// gzigs la rten nas pha rol 'gro/ pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig tshol bas kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten te/ 
150b4(rgyud): rang rig les thob par bya// rang rig yis thob pa dang // bud med sgra mdor bar bya// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma shes shing // zab ma dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zang mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed// sems can
150b5(rgyud): dmyal ba chen por ltung // ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig ltung gyur na// de ni ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gan ya dbu l+r-i tshungs dpas 'ang gis paci babyed/ mtshan ma me yi srin bu yang // rang rigs rang ni
150b6(rgyud): sreg par byed// sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// smras pa thams cad nye bar zhi// mtshan cha mtshon byed ma yin te// lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o// dpal sto
150b7(rgyud): po che'i rgyud las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang / gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa ro// khru do ba yi maN+Dal la/ dang pob yi rnam lnga yis/ sor gcig cam du thug pa
150b8(rgyud): bya/ de nas dri chen dri chu yis/ thugs te me tog sngon po dgram/ rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par rgyan// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus// de nas bzlas pa khri'am 'bum/ bdud rtsi mur byin rlabs te// gang zhig brtag
151a1(rgyud): ba'i mi de la// dang po mtshams bcang khrus byas te// rlog pa nag po phyir bzlog gyon// skra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang // be ra ka thogs te shar sgor bzhag/ tshil chen me mar shar du bsdam// nub
151a2(rgyud): tu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri lngas byug ste bkru bar bya// de nas me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya te/ gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi ming dang sngags brtags
151a3(rgyud): ni/ lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan mar 'byung bathe tsom meng // mi nga rgyun ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong bye ba'o// dus ni 'byung po'i nyi ma sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe// de che gdon ni dbang du bsdus
151a4(rgyud): tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // mdza' bshes zug rdul so gas pa// gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir// dang ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/ brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang
151a5(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs// bskor la mtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dusu yis kyang / dbab pa de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag la ni// brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma
151a6(rgyud): brtag pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig pa las gsungs pa'i// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa dang // 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhir 'khor
151a7(rgyud): lor gnas pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas lag pos mnye bya ste// me long dkyil du brtag byas na// rlung la sogs pa shes par nges// de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba
151a8(rgyud): shes par bya// dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nang grol yan lag thad la/ gang du dug zhugs mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te// mkhas pas brtags na sa gso
151b1(rgyud): babya/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mtshan mthang brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gang zhig srung ba'i rten de yang / gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis/ srung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gtso bo'i bzlas pa
151b2(rgyud): khri 'am 'bum/ bsnyen par byas te de nas yang // gser ram dngul las gzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas// rdo rjer la sogs bya// yungs kar la sogs 'bru
151b3(rgyud): lnga dang / rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // de nang bzhag ste rab gnas bya// yongasu rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang gro ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gis ro ras la/ bsang dang bgegs bskud tshul
151b4(rgyud): bzhin bya// bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs gyur na// sngags kyang yong su rdzogs par bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongasu ma rdzogs
151b5(rgyud): zur drug la/ dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par sgom// rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gis// yi ge drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par sgom// dbus
151b6(rgyud): su yig k+Sha bris te// bar chad thang bsal bar bsam// cho ga yongasu rdzogs bya ste// bzo byas snod ni kha dog sgyur// legs par sbas te spyi bo 'am/ mgrin pa de bzhin dpung ba yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar longs spyod mnyam
151b7(rgyud): sor ba na ngag tu bcing bar bya// gzhan yang nad pa'amanal 'byor pa// dgal srung na dang po yang // gdon pasal ba sangs te gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni
151b8(rgyud): sum nu bdun// thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas gau cha mtshon cha yang // tshul bzhin 'thun par shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal cha la/ oM AHbadz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ bsgom 'am gzhan la'ang
152a1(rgyud): / pad+yabya// gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthil du gur gum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sdom mo khro ma yis// spyi bo dpral brnab mig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang // dpung pa snying kha l+le ba dang / 
152a2(rgyud): 'og gi snod gnyis yan lag la// sngags dang bcas nas legs par 'tsho// gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la/ sngags dang bcas na srung bar 'gyur// dpal spobs po che'i rgyud las srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
152a3(rgyud): mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal to// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// srung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar na// yes bye brag ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ yis kyi ni de nyid kyi// rtog pa rab tu bshad
152a4(rgyud): par bya// de la yas kyi ni gnas// rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che// ngo yi bshad kyis legs par zhon// de la phyi yi yis ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan dang 'brel
152a5(rgyud): ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes// nang gi phung sogs lha ru rtogs// / de nyid dang bral yiso// de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa dang rlung / dang thig ler rtogs// rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ye shes
152a6(rgyud): yin par bshad// dga' ba mchog dang bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa/ bde bar rtogs pa rnam rtog ste// de spong rab gsang ye sheso// de nas ye shes chen po bzhi// dang po ro mnyams mtha'
152a7(rgyud): spangs pa'i// ye shes de nyid yod pa la// rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen po'o// de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud
152a8(rgyud): las ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang por ro mnyam gyur pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs
152b1(rgyud): pa// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // ga la mchog dga' bral ba dang // de la sogs pathad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste// rang rig sems kyi de nyid la/ 
152b2(rgyud): gnyi su med par sgom pa ni// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyir brtag pa rdzogs pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga po'o// // de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
152b3(rgyud): stsal ba dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang 'bo la 'gro nga khyo dgam mo'i tshogs thaMd rje su yi rang nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas// g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang
152b4(rgyud): bar gyur to// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// // paN+Di tA ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+da
152b5(rgyud): rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po da dal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub che phyogs sum nu rtsa bdun gyi// rang lus rtsa 'khor bzhi yi gtso bo yi// snying po de la
152b6(rgyud): yang dag phyag 'tshalo// dbang bzhi'i de nyid bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje snying po'i bdag/ bskyod pa'i rim po'i lha rnams kyi// de nyid dang por bshad bya ste// drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yin// sum cu rtsa bdun byang
152b7(rgyud): chub phyogs// lnga ni ye shes lnga yin te// dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs// gu phyi'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod// de nyid thabs dang
152b8(rgyud): shes rab yin// don dam nyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med de sgom pa med// bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med// sems kyi gni la sku lnga dang // ston pa med cing bstan pa med// 
153a1(rgyud): 'jigs dang rnam rtog kun dang bral// de nyid bzhi pa'i de nyid do// dang po rlung gi de nyid do// srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang haM// a ni chos rnams thog ma nas// ma skyes pa yi don yin no// ha ni gzung 'dzin gnyis
153a2(rgyud): kyis stong // ldang 'jug gsum ni sku gsum thugs// sems kyi gzhi dang sku lnga dang / rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyid de// de nas thig le'i de nyid kyang // nyi zla thabs
153a3(rgyud): dang shes rab ste// sngags kyi phreng ba mtshan dpe yin// thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyi su med pa'i de nyid yin// phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes// de nas 'og gi sgo dag ni// de nyid yang dag bshad ba ste/ 
153a4(rgyud): gsum sku gsung thugs go/ rtsa lnga yis lnga yin na/ ny+dza lin shu bani// dri nyid ye shes nyi shu ba ni// chos sku'i phrin las nyi shu bani// kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste/ 'jag dang 'bar ba gnyis med
153a5(rgyud): yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drug ni de nyid drug yin te// sgro la ma rlung gi de nyid de// me ni gos dkar ngo bo nyid 'jug spong pa 'dubya/ yi bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhi/ 
153a6(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad dang // rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu/ yis lnga bcu la sogs pa// rtsa 'dab de nyid yin par nges/ rtsad gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'khor lo ba thag khug pa las// g.yas g.yon sprul
153a7(rgyud): ltar 'khril ba ste/ phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang // sih+la shes rab chos dbyings te// ga pur thabs kyi yis bzhi// rtsa ni 'og min gnas yin te// dga' ba mchog dga' byang
153a8(rgyud): chub phyogs/ rang bzhin dga' nga chos su ste/ bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis/ bcu drug stong pa bcu drug go// rgyud kyi chung du sgyu ma tsam// gang nig rang rig 'dod pas kyang // dang por ngo bar shes bya ste// 
153b1(rgyud): de nas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo'i lam nyid sgom byed na// 'bras bu med cing brlag par nges/ lha yi de nyid ma shes na// dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra// de bzhin dur khrod srin mo
153b2(rgyud): 'dra// spyod pa'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer gnas pa'i smyon pa 'dra// khyi pag srin bu rak+Sha 'dra// phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po pang
153b3(rgyud): gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung gi de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin spyi bo'i dud pa 'dra// rtsa yi de nyid ma shes na// tsan ngan shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra// lus kyi gnyer ma dag dang 'dra// lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra// thig le'i de nyid
153b4(rgyud): ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi 'dzer ba 'dra// 'khor lo'i de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra// de bzhin srid pa'i khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra/ 
153b5(rgyud): stug po'i de nyid ma shes na// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// kha sbyor de nyid ma shes na// thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// / gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po brang 'dra// 
153b6(rgyud): byang sems de nyid ma shes na// mi gtsang sgo yi lug pa 'dra// sih+la'i de nyid ma shes na// mtshon sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra// dga' ba'i de nyid ma shes na// smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra// spang ba'i nga
153b7(rgyud): nyid ma shes na// grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra// gnyen po'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer 'dra// rang rig de nyid ma shes na// 'dus byas na mkha' stong pa 'dra// gzhan yang de nyid bco brgyad
153b8(rgyud): ni/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// de nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur// kye ho mgon po thugs rje che// rang rig ye shes tshol ba la// rang dang gzhan
154a1(rgyud): gyi sde pa la/ 'di la khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyad par chen po de nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang // de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags/ chad pa bdag dpa
154a2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang // phya dang byed pa po nyid las// rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags// gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen dang // rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings// dman pa rnam
154a3(rgyud): kyi snang bas khyab// theg chen rang bzhin lha yis khyad// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs// de nyid kyi ni khyad par tshe// legs par bstan gyis legs par bzung // de nas 'khor thad dga' zhing yid rangs par gyur
154a4(rgyud): to// dpal rdo rje sede'i yis gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na mA la tan+da rA dza/ 
154a5(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal yis phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sed 'al phyag 'tsha'o// kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gas nga ba bla na med pa yi// lta ba zhes pa gang zhig lags/ spyod pa gang
154a6(rgyud): dang gang lags pa// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub// rang rig ye shes dbyings nas gsal// 
154a7(rgyud): mi rig mun pas bsgribs pa med// shes rab snying po rtser byung ba// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse yin// don dam rang rig yis la// blang ba med cing dor ba med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// sbom po po med bsgom bya
154a8(rgyud): med// dmigs med gnasu snying rje dang // dmigs med gan su shes rab gnyis blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa// na mkhar na mkha'i rang bzhin no// rang rig yis gang 'dod pas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa
154b1(rgyud): min// dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgro mi gdags// dang por bskal par sgom pa dang // rang rig skad cig thob pa gnyis/ brgya stong la sogs char mi phod// dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te// dper na
154b2(rgyud): mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin// dngos po sgom pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dngos med ro mnyam na// ma sgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// sgom dang mi sgom gnyis ka med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// gzung 'dzin dgra/ 
154b3(rgyud): yi dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spang // 'bring gis rjes thob stong par blta// tha mas rjes thob
154b4(rgyud): sgyu mar blta// seng ge lta bu'i lta spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te// kun tu bzang po 'bu su ku// a ba d+hU ti gsum/ 
154b5(rgyud): yin no// spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang // thabs dang dgongs pa dgos pa dang // mkhas pas kun la sbyor bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs dang ngo // 
154b6(rgyud): rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa lnga// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa
154b7(rgyud): dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod// dam tshig yid 'ong dus bzhi ru// sbyin pa rnam pa ni rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin// pad+ma gar gyi
154b8(rgyud): spyod pa yin// dam tshig zad ldan pa dang // ma grol la sogs dgrol ba yin// rta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa ni// za ba nyal ba 'chag pa gsum// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba ni// 
155a1(rgyud): / 'bra lu gu yi spyod pa'o// rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang / phyag rgya bsnyen dang rnam pa gsum// abad+hu ti'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la drug ste phyag rgya lnga// bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas// mi gtsa
155a2(rgyud): 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha na mtho med// phyi nang g.yeng med gnas yin na// rtog pa 'joms pa slob pa'i dus// grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i dus// thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang // sgro dang skur ba
155a3(rgyud): med pa'o// dgongs pa mnyen pa'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur spyi grags pa dang // zug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te/ bla ma'i dus thabs lags bsten blang // kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yis// las dang po yis bya
155a4(rgyud): bar gsungs// dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsung nyes pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid// gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston// 'di nyid grub pa'i tshad yin no// dgos pa la yang gnyi
155a5(rgyud): yod de/ gtsang sbra spangs pa'i dgos pa las// dgos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan g.yo brtag pa dang / phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang // des 'dul gang zag bzhug pa dang // mi mos skur ba dgag
155a6(rgyud): pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lha spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' gro tshogs// dus dang brgyal dang 'gyel gyur pas// dbugs dbyung ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// thad dran pa slar rnyed nas// thad mgrin gcig
155a7(rgyud): 'di skad gsol// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che// g.ye la gang bsgo ma'i spyod pa 'di yang ngo mtshar che// chos rnams spong bar ro mnyam na// lha dang mi lha ga la yod// gtsang sme bdud rtsi
155a8(rgyud): ro gcig la// spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod// thad sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal
155b1(rgyud): ba/ 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgribs g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ zla ba rab rib sel byed de/ mig gi rang gi rdul ma mthong // sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs par// tha dad gzung
155b2(rgyud): 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi'i de nyid mi shes te/ gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs brtags// de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rkyen dang
155b3(rgyud): g.yeng ba'i rkyen// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan/ rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// 'khrul pas gzung 'dzin gnyisu brtags/ de phyir
155b4(rgyud): sems kyi rgyal po bston// lha spyod 'di la nan tan gyis// de nas thad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/ phyi nang gis mchod pas mchod nus mi snang bar gyur to// dpal yis phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lha
155b5(rgyud): spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogaso// rnal 'byor maHn+da mA le dang / dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na dz+wa la n+da rAH/ bod skad du/ 
155b6(rgyud): dpal yas 'bar ba gang // dpal na gang lags bdag la gsungs// dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// ngo mtshar rmad
155b7(rgyud): du byung ba yi// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // ye shes gang lags 'bar ba dang // dpal ni gang lags bdag la gsungs// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med yis te// gnyis
155b8(rgyud): med pade chen ro las byung // gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes me// rang byin rlab palte bar te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// 
156a1(rgyud): zung du gnas shing ring du 'gyur// de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang // rgyas par bya ba gsum yod de// dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang // 'drongs pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de// sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan
156a2(rgyud): ni/ sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges// 'bring la sor gnyis tha ma la// sor dong nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sdom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas// rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa
156a3(rgyud): bcu drug khams bco brgyad// nyi shu lte bar nyi shu lnga// snying kha ru ni gnas pa'o// sman la sogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor ba btsam par bya// rnam snang sku rags bcing ba dang // rgyab yol dbul dang mchod
156a4(rgyud): ba 'bul// gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus 'bul// sman mchod nga shul dang me mchod 'bul// de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo 'am// khro mo mdzub mo'i rtse mo la/ bdud

156a6(rgyud): bzhi'i tshad// rked par sku regs dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyi su// ras bal la sogs rgyab yol dbul// shing bu rigs dang 'thun pa yi// sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// dri med sman dang

157b8(rgyud): bcu gsum las byung ba/ sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o// brgyad cu rtsa ldi'i yi ge bzhis// mtshang ba las gang 'gyur ba// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig
158a1(rgyud): / rin chen 'bar ba'i ljang tshang ngo // sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis las byung ba/ na mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yino// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi dang // drug cu
158a2(rgyud): yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang ba rdo rjer rab tu grags// drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug stobs po che yi tshad// bzhi bcu ru gcig yi ge lnga// na mkha' chen po'i tshad yi no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ya
158a3(rgyud): shes 'bar ba'i ljang tsha do// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu/ ye shes phreng ba'i tshad yin// sum cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu ba ni// mkha'agro gsang ba'i tshad yino// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ me yi phreng ba'i tshad yin// nyi shu
158a4(rgyud): rtsa gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye shes rgyal po'i ldang chad do// bdun cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa byed// chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no// tshig su bcang pa nyi shu lnga// yes bsam pa'i ldang tsha// dgu cu go brgyad

160a1(rgyud): de phyir dang po rgyu mi snang / lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te/ rang bzhin ldan cig skyes pa dang / lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'i phyir/

160a7(rgyud): mi spang ba// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes/ phyi ni dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha// gang ba dang ni stong pa'i cha// 'pho ba ma spangs brgyad pa'o// rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas/

160b3(rgyud): spangs rnam pa gnyis// ye shes me ni cher 'bar bas// phung po 'byung po dbang po sogs// thad bdud brtsir gyur pa ni// rkyen gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lus kyi bi spu'i bu ga dang // brtan dang g.yon pa'i dngos po kun/ 
160b4(rgyud): bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba// ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// bzhin mdzes mig yangs pag rgya ni// ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o// 
160b5(rgyud): dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang // de nas ye shes phyag rgya che// phyag rgya/ 'i khyang par ma spangs pa'o// chags pa'i phyag rgya las yin/ te// dam tshig chos ni ma ning gi/ phyag rgya gnyisu shes par bya// yis
160b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i 'khor lor te// phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin// 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por
160b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i gtu mo ste// gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mo ni// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni// don dam gnyis med
160b8(rgyud): yin te/ rkyen gyi dadrub 'am spangs pa'o// srid pa bskyed cing 'dzag pa bde// kun rdzob shu kra'i las yin no// srid pa mi len rang rig skyes// don dam byang sems las yin no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// sbyor thabs
161a1(rgyud): rtsa ni rgyas pa dang // kha 'byed pa yi las yin te// sbyor thabs bzhi la marmongs pa// 'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// spyi thun las las grub pa yi// mi drug la sogs grangs kyis bsten// rang rig yis
161a2(rgyud): gang 'dod pas// bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten te// mi spang nges pa'i gdam ngag blang // 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu// de las byung ba khyad par 'bras// dang por ma ste thig le dang // tshul dang tshul can mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di
161a3(rgyud): nyid de nyid drug yin te// de nyid drug ni tsaN+Da li/ re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu ba ni/ ra li nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges// phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi// spyan dang phyag rgya'i shu ba ni/ tsaN+Da li dang ra li yi/ phyi dang nang du
161a4(rgyud): grangasu nges/ he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang // ra la'i 'thung ba'i rgyu gang legs// ra li'i ngo bo gang gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku dang phyag mtshan rigs pa kun/ ra li'i ngo bo dman pa'i
161a5(rgyud): lam// mkha' spyod sa spyodas 'og spyod// sgo gsum la gnas khyad par gyi// ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin// dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas/ zab pa'i ra li'i di bor brtag/ rang rig stong
161a6(rgyud): pa thabs dang bcas// mthar thugs ra yir shes par bya// a ni thog mar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang spyod bskye// ra ni chags dang rin po ma// rA las 'dod chags khrag yin te// la las ne sdang khu ba'o// a las
161a7(rgyud): gti mug khu ba ste// sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs// kun la ldan pas ro lor gnas// sku yi ra li spyi bo yi// gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o// gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las// 
161a8(rgyud): thugs kyi ra'i thugs ka nas// byung ba rnam par nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ spyan rnams la ni rang bzhin byung // sku gsung thugs kyi gnas la ste// spyi bo la sogs dag las byung // phyag gi mtha'i nas rim
161b1(rgyud): bas byung // bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin te/ he he sems can sangs rgyas kyi// rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan ste// zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs ni// brdzus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags// 'on te
161b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas min nam ci// sems can thams cad gdod ma nas/ sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// brdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs// sems kyi gnas bcu sa bcu ste// rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga/ 
161b3(rgyud): mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste// rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs// oM dang haM gnyis sngags kyi don// thad sems la gnas pa ste// sems med sangs rgyas ma yin te// ngam grog
161b4(rgyud): la sogs bems po yi/ sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir/ sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bres bu'i tshuladang yang // bag la nyal dang kun tu rgyu/ nus pa'i tshul dang mngon
161b5(rgyud): sum tshul// gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag/ sa ngas rgyas sems can de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas// ra li sems can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas
161b6(rgyud): gdang/ ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab// sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa las// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// dman dang gyo nom gal
161b7(rgyud): yod// 'khor ba yongasu shes pa la// mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod// thams cad 'jigs dang rnam rtog spong // 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs par gtad kyis dam du spos// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thad
161b8(rgyud): ngo mtshar du gyur te mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ba dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
162a1(rgyud): / rgyag skang nga/ shrI sU sakra tsA rA dza nAm// bong gang du// dpa la'i ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po nas bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'ama'o// sa la la ho nga 'pho rgya/ ngos par mang du thub
162a2(rgyud): dA yi/ bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po ste// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag/ mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste/ phung po khams dang skye mcher dag/ bskyed
162a3(rgyud): nga'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs// phyagamatshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i mnang ga rkyen ma spangs/ lus dag sgo bsdam sa dam tshig las// skra gnyis 'byung ba 'dras ma spangs// zhe sdang ru drang skye ba'i las// zhe sdang rang rig bskyed
162a4(rgyud): pa dang / lus kyi drim 'khrud pa las/ las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o 8// pu li'i dang dza lan sogs/ nang du spyi bo spyi gtsug sogs/ ro// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// shar sogs bdud kyi sring karau/ 
162a5(rgyud): zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang du sha sa// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// gsar 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin// phung sogs lnga ru 'pho byed na// 'di ni 'pho bam spangs
162a6(rgyud): 'o// rgyu yi gnas ni snying ka ste/ 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te// ma spangs pa ni gnyi su shes/ phung sogs sgyu mar 'dzin byed pa// 'di nirten pam spangs pa'o// gal te nang du ma zin na// phyi ru de'ing ngo nga
162a7(rgyud): sgom// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs sgyu mar sgom// phung sogs la ten lha rnams la// sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa// tha mAl pa dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste/ sgyu mas
162a8(rgyud): gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdun po rnams dag la sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog pa las log nas/ phra ba'i gan su gnos pa byed// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lha yi
162b1(rgyud): jug pa dang / gong du gyur dog pa gcig pa pa byung ba ma sa cid/ me shes chen / bu mom gyum ga zhi ga rten mi kyang ba pa ma sa gsas
162b2(rgyud): thob kun 'gags te/ rbad rten dang rten par snang / ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// shes rab phag mom spangs pa// phyag rgya ma spangs pa ru 'dong // 
162b3(rgyud): ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra// gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro// zhe sdang thugs lnga 'dod chags gsung // gti mug sku yi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// bde ba chen
162b4(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo dga'akhor lo'i dbye pam spangs pa'o// dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me// gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang me// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spongs pa'o// phung sogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing // phung sogs sgyum
162b5(rgyud): yang dag sreg/ kun rdzob rtogs pa'i rkyen yin te// sgyu ma ltar snatra/ las g.yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid lhar bsregs pa// don dam ga/ sa med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba spel
162b6(rgyud): zhing rnam rtog bskyed// kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las// 'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig bskyed// don dam sems kyi las yin te// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'di dag ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// bum pa'i dbang
162b7(rgyud): dang 'brel pa'o// gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas blang // shes rab yis gzhan du'o// bzhi pa'i ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// rang rig lhan cig skyes po yi// chos nyid ma dag bzhi pa'i rgyu// zhal gyi man ngag rkyen ma spangs// 
162b8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes/ bsregs pa las ma spangs pa yin/ gong 'ag rim pas dbye ma spangs/ oM ba d+hu ti 'og min gnas// gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa/ de nyid phyi dang nang du nges// byin
163a1(rgyud): phye bas spangs pa'o// byung ba dang ni gzung ldan ra/ 'pho ngam spangs sa dang // rkyen ma spangs te rtog pa la/ sems 'gros de nyid dang rig sgom/ shor ba ma spangs par rig pa/ dbang par
163a2(rgyud): sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs// rtog bcom gnyen po ma spangs pa// rang rig spyi la sems dpa' las// sngon du ma spangs ma spangs brgyad// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang rig mtshan nyid la// 'pho ba ma
163a3(rgyud): spangs rang rig sgom// phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// phrin las nyi shu rtsa ba ni 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad mod bla ma ma bsten dang // bla ma dam pa ma
163a4(rgyud): rnyed dang // ma spangs ngo bor ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bco lnga yang // rgyu dang rkyen dang
163a5(rgyud): gnas dang yang // gtad pa go rims grangs dang rim// nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spros bcas spros med do/ sa// rkyen ni ye shes me rlung nges// rgyu 'bras gnas ni a
163a6(rgyud): nges/ dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges// sum 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang // ngo bla nges dang dbye ba des// lus nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes// ma spangs
163a7(rgyud): pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongasu shes gyur no// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ dngos grub zing 'di las byung // gong du chu dang
163a8(rgyud): gzug su gnas// de bzhini gzugs las 'das pa ste// gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste// rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma
163b1(rgyud): mnyes byaste/ rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang / de yi man ngag shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing / dbang rnams thob bar ma byas par/ nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ 
163b2(rgyud): de bas 'badang nan tan bya// dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga yad+hA ra dang / lo nu ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab nga'o// 
163b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyAn rA dza tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad
163b4(rgyud): pa legs// gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob pa'i phyir// dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rje su 'jug/ par bya// rang rig gnyi su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis
163b5(rgyud): 'dzin pas 'khru'o// bzod nas ma skyes mgrub la// skye dang grub par/ 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos por mnyam gyur pa la// da / dang gyon ma 'dzin pas 'khrul/ 'khor ba yongasu shes
163b6(rgyud): nyid// mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la// sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis skyes pas 'khrul// brda dang tha srad bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul byed pas
163b7(rgyud): 'khru'o// mtha' bralang dum gnas pa la/ rtag dang cha par 'dzin pas 'khrul/ shes brjod yul 'as pa la// dig dang bdag gi 'dzin pas 'khrul// dengs pa mtshanam la sogs pa'i/ nom ma
163b8(rgyud): kun gyis stong pa la// dngas por u 'dzin pas 'phrul/ rang nyid gnyi su med pa la/ bden pa gnyi su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gdul bya na tshogs 'dul ba yi// theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la// sgo dang skur pa 'das
164a1(rgyud): la gas na rdzun la sogs/  zu ba mas pa 'phrul/  sa gas gsapa su das rgyag
164a2(rgyud): masags gdon dzin pa 'dzidzis 'jul// 'tshul ba dang ni 'phrul pa ga na/ 'ad dgas 'dod chags chen // khrul gni 'phrul ba las 'das na/ 'dod chags chen po mamam ldan 'das/ rjong
164a3(rgyud): chen po dang // de bzhin ni sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di mos nges par grol 'gyur gyi// 'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag po lha dang
164a4(rgyud): bla ma dbun/ bdag pa ldan cig rnal 'byor cam// theg pa skye bsdus de las gzhan/ skye bo'i bems pa che dang brgyad// de dag rang rig thob pa 'i rgyu// de phyir dam tshig gtso bar srung / 'bras bu'i khyang
164a5(rgyud): par rang rig 'byung // kye mA mgan po kyi sangs rgyas/ 'dod chags dbyedade ltar ni// de mi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// legs par nyan la ying
164a6(rgyud): la zung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug ste// lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis// kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mtha'// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod
164a7(rgyud): chag so// dbang sogasong bo gang ma shes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste// ngo bor sgyur mar gang shes dang // dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs
164a8(rgyud): yin te/ gong ma skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i// phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang // de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang // mang pom mos spong ba dang // nyon mongs spyi yis zil mnon// bya brag
164b1(rgyud): na nga da/ pa tsu na 'gas / mdog gang yang ni sbyi dang / na sa sbyi bye ga spyod/ na man pa nges bdag can mas ces mi the/ gtan ga
164b2(rgyud): tsun kyis ngacag chen po da/  maldan lasas masus pa ste/ ni sang sa gas na no//  byu gas par/ thugs byung bzlas pa mag byed// da ga sa pa
164b3(rgyud): yin/ de dag du mdam pa las/ man dag dam pa btsal bya ste// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las/ sa bar byed pa'i tshig byung // nga'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dag la ning rje u li rang bar gyur / dpal ye shes rgyal
164b4(rgyud): bo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// rgya gor gyi mkhan pa ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo cu ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur dba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA/
