164b5(rgyud): gu d+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ dad skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha 'grogasang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// gya ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye// dbang rnams dam pa yod dam ci// gtsal
164b6(rgyud): khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis// de nyams gshegs thabs yod dam ci// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog gzung
164b7(rgyud): 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na ste// lus ngag kun nas bzang ba la// de phyir sems kyi dri ma
164b8(rgyud): ni// 'khrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang / mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // namakha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rims kyis ma 'gro dbang mi thob/ 
165a1(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/ thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang // 
165a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa yan la'o// 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel ba'o// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi
165a3(rgyud): rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongasu
165a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // ras dang mtshon pa la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yodasu rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcom la sogs de ltar na// 
165a5(rgyud): phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// bcos mnye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin pa lta bu
165a6(rgyud): yi// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i sred pas sred par 'ching // 'khrul pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud spangs te// bla ma dam pa
165a7(rgyud): rtag tu bsten// yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spangs shing gong mthob// man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang // mas pa'i rje su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 
165a8(rgyud): 'jig rten lta spyod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbu su ste/ rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba'o// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs/ de nas gtso
165b1(rgyud): 'khor bye brag kyang // phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las/ shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis/ pha rol phyin pa'i
165b2(rgyud): ming mi thob// dkyil 'khor dbus gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbu su mi gnas na// 'khar rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong dang grong khyer rdzi
165b3(rgyud): bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams
165b4(rgyud): gyur na// brdzun dang mabyin lon pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de 'dra/ 
165b5(rgyud): dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun bo de dag gis// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems
165b6(rgyud): can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang // rang sems la su rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongasu rdzogs
165b7(rgyud): dang ma rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis snang // tha dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu khams gser dang na mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang rigs rtogs pa na// sems can
165b8(rgyud): gdod nas sangs rgyaso// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang / 
166a1(rgyud): / gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog gcod nyams pa tung ngur nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dang // nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig sa
166a2(rgyud): byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa'i brang du nges// cher b+hungs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po
166a3(rgyud): ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dag/ brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// tshe 'bring chung ngu'i ldang chad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga yis// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung
166a4(rgyud): ba'i ngobs zin pa dang / phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'u khor chen po bzhengs// rdul dang 'thun par bshad pa bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyila'ikhor shes par bya// gzhan yad
166a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bye brag la// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen pa tsam// zab pa'i me ni rgyun bzhag me// / thab kyi rgyun bzhag me yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi
166a6(rgyud): rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtus
166a7(rgyud): ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// 
166a8(rgyud): nyams pa'i shrI sogs 'tshig par nges dgang bzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rje mkha' gro gsang
166b1(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga lang+ga ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la ag+ni gu h+ya tan+na rA dza/ bod skad du
166b2(rgyud): dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nged kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
166b3(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhug so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang // 'chi ba gang lags shing gang // ro na gang lagasar chen gang // de bzhin shi ba
166b4(rgyud): chen po gang // thal ba gang lags tha' chen gang // tsha cha gang lags cha cha yi/ chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
166b5(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug la// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsu ngas pa yin// dus min lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i gas dang yang // dus tshod nges par shes bya ste/ bar chad med pa'i ting
166b6(rgyud): 'dzir gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par bgyi// 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog kyang rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste/ 
166b7(rgyud): rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bdun par du bzhag/ lus kyi mkha' gro mya ngan 'das// de ni shi ba chen por grags/ lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra/ 
166b8(rgyud): 'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shes bstan// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka ru// dri yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thug su byin gyis brlag/ thog mar dri zhim
167a1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas gnas ni bcu gnyisu// dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya// dnga' bo mkhas 'gros byin gyis brlab// gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun/ dngosu gnas pas rag tu nges/ 
167a2(rgyud): ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste// dri yi thig le tha mar nges/ g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs// de la dus drug mchod pas mchod// 'di dag ro ni chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni
167a3(rgyud): rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gan su khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas// chos sku gzugs brnyan rim bzhin rtsig/ yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas khang pa rtseg mar
167a4(rgyud): brtsig/ mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang // tsan dan gur gum la sogs nga'i// dri yis byugs shing bsgo bar bya// tsan dan dmar po las/ gas pa'i// dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu 'am// yang na 'bras bu yod
167a5(rgyud): pa yi// bud shing chad dang ldan pa yis// thag khung chen por rdzogs bar brtsig/ bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dgashes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi mi
167a6(rgyud): 'jig seng ge brgyad// ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// chog yongasu rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te// me lha la
167a7(rgyud): sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyang // me yi khang pa mdzes pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugasu gsol// me mchod sdig pa sreg pa'o// sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du brlung
167a8(rgyud): sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bye ste/ bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg par bya// gdung la sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa
167b1(rgyud): rnams/ 'di ni thal ba chen po ste// de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs// de nas rus pa zhag gsum ni// gur gum la sogs dris gtor te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri drang ngo // bla ma'i zhal
167b2(rgyud): nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung // ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs pa yi// steng du seng ge'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'om
167b3(rgyud): gi rgyan// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas der rus pa bzhag byas la// me tog byas na zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la// gdung byung sta gom bdun pa la// cha tsha rab tu gnas par bya// dang
167b4(rgyud): bor ra sreg dusu yang / shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lngayi bsnyen pa ste/ drug pa ri yi sta gan no// bdun pa dur khrod rab tub/ nas// dang por snang ba gnyis pa'o// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das/ 
167b5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman la med cing de rjes med// thab su ma gsungs shes/ rab kyi// chu rgyud bshad rgyud phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma
167b6(rgyud): gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron mar li yi// rgyud du khyod la nga yis bshad// de nas sa tsha'i rim pa yang // snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// 'thun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs
167b7(rgyud): blang // mi snang sa bdag la sogs pa// gtor ma me yis so sogs blang // de nas skud pa rnam pa lnga yang // phan pa rdo rje can dang yang // gzi brjid gor dang rdo rje rgyal// srang bus sa gzungs sbyar sogs// 
167b8(rgyud): cho ga gzhan dang 'thun par bya// dur khrod gan su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor mar btang // sbyin sreg dag gis ni byas te// gcig gam lnga 'am bdun
168a1(rgyud): nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad// ci nus par ni gang ba par bya// dus ni mtshan mo zhes pa ste// dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste// gsum pa bzhi#
168a2(rgyud): chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum dbang sa la gdab pa ste// gsang dbang sa dang chu la gdab// gsum pa me dang rlung la gdab// bzhi pa na mkha' gsungs pa'o// dang po 'pho bas ma lhang la// gnyis
168a3(rgyud): pa ro bsred ma ltung ba'o// gsum pa cha tshas ma ltung na/ 'chi ba slu ba'i dam pa ste// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas sring las
168a4(rgyud): grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam parab mnyes te// 'pho ba la sogs gdam ngag blang // rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par bzung // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa
168a5(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab po// dpa' bo dang mkha'agro ma dang dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thang rgyud kyi don la rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
168a6(rgyud): rdzog so// / paN+Di tag ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a mr-i ta gu h+ya tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i
168a7(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde bachen po la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis rjes 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag la/ 
168a8(rgyud): bdug so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol gdakyil 'khor skye ba dza lta bu/ sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu// sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu khyod kyis bdag la ba shang du gas la/ rjon/ 
168b1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang / phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te/ nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te/ bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems/ 
168b2(rgyud): de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang // sku mdog phyog mtshan rags pa'i lam// khro tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / 'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag rgya drug mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la/ tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // lus kyi dri 'khrun
168b3(rgyud): sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbu su gang gyur pa// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang // pad+ma
168b4(rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang // rnam grol steng du gdan lnga
168b5(rgyud): rlung // rang rig bdag po lha yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba dang // zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang // tshig s+ho/ nga drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// las ni rags pa'i lam 'joms
168b6(rgyud): shing // ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa// mkha' spyod rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig snang bsgom pa dang // de bzhin mun pa sgom pa dag/ nyin dang mtshan mo rab tu grangs// gnod
168b7(rgyud): mdzes sta stangs dman pa ste// tshul deng las bzlog pa'o// dang por yid btsong sna rtser bya// de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang // na mkha' sor ba ni de nas stong // de nas bar du thig le yang // yan lag
168b8(rgyud): dang bcas 'ag skar tsaN+Da la// kha sbyar dang na stug pa sags/ dang bcas yan lag med/ shin tu yan lag med pa ste/ yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste/ thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ bla ma'i zhal
169a1(rgyud): / nas shes par bya// ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og skor tsaN+Da li/ kha sbyor dang ni stug po sogs/ rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang / bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang / gtum mo rang
169a2(rgyud): bzhin sbar ba dang / gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo zhar la sbar ba dang // gtum mo bye brag sbyar ba dang // spyi yi gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum
169a3(rgyud): mo dang // chags pa'i rang bzhin gtum mo ste// nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga'
169a4(rgyud): ba la sogs sgyu ma yis// phra ba'i lam spang las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu// de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med
169a5(rgyud): namakha' bzhin// rang rig stong par 'ong gsal ba// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa yin// sgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste// mi sgom pa yang rtog pa nyid // sgom
169a6(rgyud): du rdul tsam med pa la// yengasu skad cig med pa 'angadi // lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes me bo che// thaMd 'di la gnas pa ste// dper na 'khor
169a7(rgyud): mos sbyar ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun/ sems kyi de nying
169a8(rgyud): shes gyur na// thaMd 'di la bsdud par nges// las ni zab pa'i las spong ste// sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum 'joms// gzugs sku gnyis ni 'thung ba'i rgyu// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// spyi yi
169b1(rgyud): thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang // lte ba snying ka spyi bo mgrin// rigs ni nges pa'i thab khung ste// sku ni spyi bo gsung mgrin pa// snying kar thugs te yon tan dang // phrin las gtu mo gnyis
169b2(rgyud): nges// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i ye shes me// mo lha dag pas bdag po'i lha// sku mdog phyag mtshon rnam rtog dag/ sreg rdzas bsreg ste me mchod bya// nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang / 
169b3(rgyud): rnam rtag sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste// rang lus yes me yis ni// rtog pa'i bud shing bsreg bya ba// 'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste/ til sogs sdig par nges pa'am// las kyi me nyid yis sam// bsregs
169b4(rgyud): pas nges par tshig gam ci// sreg rdzas rtog bsreg byed me// dbang dpo'i spyod yul mo yin te// de phyir las kyi me nyid la/ til so// gas bsregs pa'i las byas kyang // nges par sdig pa
169b5(rgyud): tshig mi 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bstan pa tsam du nges pa ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtog pas bstan pa med// dgang gzar glugs gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i
169b6(rgyud): zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang // thab khub lte ba 'am sna rtse ste// chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi// gtum yis me sbar te// g.yas g.yon
169b7(rgyud): dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// shu kra D+ha dang rlung sogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog pa'i sreg rdzas sreg/ bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya// zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas
169b8(rgyud): sngags kyi bye ba yang // phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhUM/ nang du bdud rtsi mtshan nyid de// gsang bar mchog chad dbus na gnas// mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go// smos sogs phyi yi mched pa ste// 
170a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o// gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar thug stong pa'i ro yis mchod// 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed// a bad+hU ti'i
170a2(rgyud): ka pA la ra// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi bar byed// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsangs// rang rig stong
170a3(rgyud): pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros// bde chen don ni zhi byas pa// 'di ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges// phyag 'tshal bskor ba la sogs pa// sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes// gang gi phyir na sbyin sreg na// dngos grub dam pabaskor
170a4(rgyud): ba dang // rnam rtog sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste// shing sogs sreg sbyin sreg min// mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// spos sogs phul bas mnyes pa med// rang sems la su rung ba dag mnyes pas
170a5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po ste// gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // bar chod zhozhi dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste// 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te// 
170a6(rgyud): rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul ba'i rnam rtog ma spangs par// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir// sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yi// sems kyi gtor ma
170a7(rgyud): gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pazhi pa dang // dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'go// dngos grub zad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gter mar nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang // lus las 'byung phyi
170a8(rgyud): lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor lha ma yin// lus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang ba sgo gsum g.yeng bdagag// rang gi lus lor/ 
170b1(rgyud): lus 'byung // sgo gsum ni phyir lha zhes brjod// yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems la su rung ba dang // rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs// gzhan yang dngos
170b2(rgyud): grub 'dod pa yis// thaMd bla ma'i zhal nas blang // rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus bzang rgyud kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// mum tsham
170b3(rgyud): zags 'o lo pa kyi so// 9 dasu tha ma gdus pod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tsholo// 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs
170b4(rgyud): btud nas// dur khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legaso rdo rje snying po legs// legs par nyon la legs par
170b5(rgyud): zung // dang por dung klong bshad bya ste/ dur khrod spying bye bra/ gnas// gnal yas khang gi phyi rol te/ rdo rjer ba'i nang rol// / 'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas/ bye brag shar la sogs pa ste/ 
170b6(rgyud): snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang // lcags rinag po chun chad de// rdo rje ra bas de nyid do// chen po khru ni nyi shu ste// chung ba khru gang tshun tshad // de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshong las nges par 'das pa'o// 
170b7(rgyud): rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad// mi mnga'i rtag su dur khrod brgyad// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod// tsho gas brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtagasu shing brgyad rim pas dgod// de bzhin
170b8(rgyud): gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i// rtag su gru brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom pa'i// rtag su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag gnyis kyi sems can gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char sbyin
171a1(rgyud): dgod/  nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyud// ma tog zil gnon brgyad por bshad/ mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ dang por du
171a2(rgyud): khrod bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru ha har dgod ser che// nub tu mi bzad dmar po che// byang du chang tshing ljang gu che// me ru ga yer ka can yin te// bden bral mtsham su 'bar ba 'dzin// 
171a3(rgyud): rlung mtshams dmal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du ni dbyibs cano// b+hu tsa ri khi tsi sha ni// sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod// pa ta li dang bA sa ni// sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnams gzugs rnam
171a4(rgyud): kyang // 'bar ba tshig dang mchig sogs// keng rus thod pa la sogs dang // ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// lho spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// shar du shi ri sha yi shing // lhoru
171a5(rgyud): a shwad tha yi shing // nub tu wang ge ling gi shing // byang du tsu ti shing du nges// gong dang mtshungs pan+ya grong// parka ti lcug pA thA ngag/ me nas dbang ldan mtsham su dgod// ji ltar grags
171a6(rgyud): pa'i gzugasu 'dod// shar du dbang po gnas pa ste// lho ru ga shin rje gnas pa'o// nub tu klu dbang gnas pa ste/ byang du gnod sbyin yang dge gnas// shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o// lho nub mtsham su srin po
171a7(rgyud): gnas// nub byang mtsham su rlung dgod de/ byang shar mtsham su dbang ldan dgod// nyi zla shar las bdag nub/ ji ltar grags pa'i gzugasu dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste/ 'jog po lho ste stobs rgya
171a8(rgyud): nub// pad+ma byang la pang chen me// hu lu hu lu srin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan mtshamasu ni// gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugasu dgod// kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// 
171b1(rgyud): shar du char smin dkar por dgod// lho ru bu mi ti dgod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas/ byang du ab yang dag gnas/ sngonya la mer ni yang dag gnas// g+has srin po'i mtsham su dgod// rlung gi mtsham su pa
171b2(rgyud): sha na// gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad// cod kyi mdog 'dra gur gum mdog/ namakha'i mdog 'dra du ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru
171b3(rgyud): 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs// de nas yis phun sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtag su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas// de nas nang gi dur khrod sogs/ 
171b4(rgyud): lpags pa rdo rje rab ste// rus pa rdo rje gur du nges/ dpung pa nye ba'i dpung ste/ brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i brla/ brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du dngos// rje nga re nye ba'i rjeng ra ba zhi// lag ngar nye ba'i lag par
171b5(rgyud): bzhi// brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshogs dang de bzhin nye darje/ tshigs// de bzhin nya da' chags/ steng dang 'og tu bzhi pa ni ste/ nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de bzhin te
171b6(rgyud): ba'i mthil// steng 'og de bzhin klu brgya do// rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te// bskyed rims rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas/ rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa brgyas/ 
171b7(rgyud): de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas/ bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir// char sprin brgyad ni nang du gnas// de nas gsang ba'i dung
171b8(rgyud): khrod kyang / sna rtse rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyadado// snying kar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad// mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de// spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad/ gsang bar rnam
172a1(rgyud): rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bas gnas// thaMd bde bar snang ba'i phyir// gsang bar shing brgyad yang dag gnas/ phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi// bdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad
172a2(rgyud): dgod/ bde bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas// de yi phyir na char sprin dgod// de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing // lhag ma
172a3(rgyud): gsum dang tsher sogs lnga// brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis// brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni// de ni bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad// gzung 'dzin rnam
172a4(rgyud): rtog mi mnga'i rtags// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i ston na rgyas// rtagasu shing brgyad nges pa'o// rnamag gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtagasu klu brgyad nges pa'o// gzugs
172a5(rgyud): sku gnyis kyis seMn gyi// don mdzad rtag su char sprin brgyad// phyogaskyong bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal
172a6(rgyud): khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'i bka'// gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang // du ma nyid du so sor snang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag dang // mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang // 'du shes du
172a7(rgyud): mo'i bye brag gis// theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab// nga yis rje su 'brangs pa yi// bla mas rab non pa dang // de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes// de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi ba pa/ 
172a8(rgyud): rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyangs// mkha'agro ma yis lung bstan pas// brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yas nges// de lta'i man ngag ma thob par// sngags kyi lha spyod gang spyod pa// rang yang phung la gzhan yang
172b1(rgyud): phung // mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bla mdam pa mnyes byas te// man ngag dam pa blang bar bya// nges pa'i lha spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i lha dang spyod pa dang / mos pa'i rje
172b2(rgyud): gang byed dang // nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag/ gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod// 'di dag rkun po ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye// dang po srid pa skye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang
172b3(rgyud): gsum// sah+la'i dang po tha ma dang // 'bras bu sred pa skye ba yi// dus deng kun tu ru byed na// 'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsduso shing na dog ni skyed// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung // de la 'dod
172b4(rgyud): ba'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba med dang gtar ka bya// phyi nas rig sa kyi bdag po so// srid par skye ba'i dus chod kyang // rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang // 
172b5(rgyud): de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la gtad kyis legs pa ra zung // de nas 'khor thad dga' zhing mgu ste rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// 
172b6(rgyud): paN+Di ta ga~M ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya las kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra rA dza ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i
172b7(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus ga cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bdun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo
172b8(rgyud): mkha' gro grongs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas// bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la zhal 'dzum pa
173a1(rgyud): /  po sa gsungs gsol pa/ tsug gru ngogang/ rgyu nig lags rgyal po gang / com ldan dus kyis ga' sa pa/ nga kya rnam / 
173a2(rgyud): dbang bani'i byang su shes par bya/ nas dag 'jor su par rdorje ste// de larnam pa ba ni yid te/ byi dang gsang ngarang gyis banyis ci gsung rtse gcig rje lnga pa/ rtse dgu ngag cid yin no// bcu gnyis dacing rdo rje sam
173a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyi su rang brtse gcig pas// rnam rtog tha~Mng spangs pa yin// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// 'dod chags ni sdang ga'i mug gsum// 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga yis
173a4(rgyud): lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos/ dbyings shes/ nyin mongs ldani spangs pa ste// zhe sdang nga rgyal/ 'dod chags dang // phrag dag gti mug 'jom par byed// rdorje
173a5(rgyud): rtse dgu gang yin pa/ yis rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khams gsums dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzu gas med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig
173a6(rgyud): 'dzin sangs rgyas yis che// sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i// sgrib pa skyong bar byed pa yi// rdo rje rtsi dgur bstan pa yin// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i yis bcu
173a7(rgyud): gnyis yin// ma rig pa la dkyi sol kyang rkyen gyis rnar shes// ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang lan// srid bskye dang rga shi ste// de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste/ chos kyi
173a8(rgyud): yis mngon du byas// de las yis drug rang bzhin// de las sku gsung thug song po// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med rig pa ni// de las nyams myong ba de chen po// rang rig de nyid
173b1(rgyud): sreng ba ste/ chos kun sngor byed len pa ste/ srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad // rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das// 'od gsal stong chan dang du thim/ de phyir rdo rje bcu gnyis pa// rdzas kyi rngo/ 
173b2(rgyud): rje bzhi yin te// 'bigs shing rna ba zur gsum ste/ gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas// 'jam zhing dang la 'joms par byed// pa lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms// zur lngas thad ci dgar byed// de
173b3(rgyud): nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang // de bzhin yis chen po ste/ re re la yang bdun bdun sbyar// de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyud ni
173b4(rgyud): rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi nga dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang ga sang ba che// de rnams rgyun tu gnas pa la// rgyu yi rgyad du bstan pa yin// de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du
173b5(rgyud): bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rgyu ni gnyi su med pa yi// rang rig yi sa mthar thug pa// mthar thug bla na med pa 'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lnga yin te// phyi nang gsang dang rang / 
173b6(rgyud): tu gsang // shin tu gsang ba chen po ste// de rnams don la dbang bskur dang // de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir// de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji
173b7(rgyud): lngar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga dzaM ltar lags// rdo rje gang lags snying po gang // dang 'obo gang lags mkha 'gro gang // dpag tu
173b8(rgyud): med paji ltar lags/ thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyi nang gsang ba bu med pa'i// mchod nas zhes paji ltar lags// mngon phyogs 'khor ba ji ltar lags// zhal 'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar
174a1(rgyud): lags// gzigs pa zhes paji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa'o// 
174a2(rgyud): ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal pa bzang // yis phun sum tshogs pa la// drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de ltar
174a3(rgyud): bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings
174a4(rgyud): de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste// dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs pa bshad// rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs po che// snying po ye shes/ chen po ste// sogs pa mang po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga
174a5(rgyud): phyi nang gsang ba la sogs kyo// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyi yin// mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' gro ste// rtsa sogs la yang she sa par bya// thaMd de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa
174a6(rgyud): yin// de yi don la mi dpogs pas// de yi phyin na dpag tu med// thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don dang dbyer med phyir// gcig gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de don du// phye nang
174a7(rgyud): ma yin mchod pa ni// phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri dang lha ba shos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // sgeg dang dgod dang gar nyid dang // rta dang glang po rin chen
174a8(rgyud): sogs// de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa ba tsir// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// de la sogs pas mchod par bya// 
174b1(rgyud): rgyas nganal/ 'da'i byad pa maud kyig/ rang bzhi dgang zugs pa mad/ denas tha me mchong ngas ni/ rang rig spang bar rtags pa yis/ dgas mas kyi sa// song bla ma mchob
174b2(rgyud): maldan po ces pa/ 'gyu sa/  ti la migs pa 'i ba na padag de sus su 'i sa par gyur te/ ga gas da byes ma sa
174b3(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rgyal po'i rgyud rdzog so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mA le dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya garas du/ 
174b4(rgyud): shrI dz+nyA nA tsan+tu tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod ska du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo
174b5(rgyud): mkha'i gra mo'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / yis gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dusu dpa' bo yis mkha' gro zhes bya bas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te// thal mo
174b6(rgyud): sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnga' bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang // yis skye gnas gang dang gang // rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byad gang gis 'dul// de nyid
174b7(rgyud): bdag la bshad du gsol// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo ye shes mkha'agro nyon// yis zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang // log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i yis bshad
175a1(rgyud): ma/ pa'o// me longs shes mnyam nyid dang // seMs rtog dang byanan tan// chos dbyings yis lnga pa'o// del me long yis ni/ dper na ga yang dag me long la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin/ 
175a2(rgyud): de bzhin sems kyi me long la/ nyon mongs gsa' ni dag byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong // sems kyi mi long gang yin la// sgyum tsam du snang bde// tha dang mi byed mnyam yis// mnyam nyid yis gang
175a3(rgyud): smin pa// kun rdzob sgyum tsam de ni// las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa/ de nyid so sor rtog yis// de nyid nan tan spu byed de/ de nyid don grub yis te/ thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings yis yin/ 
175a4(rgyud): yis skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyor dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang yis gnyis med tshul// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // yis bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings
175a5(rgyud): yis skye ba'i gnas// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // sa sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings yis la sogs pa// bad ga po byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags dang
175a6(rgyud): ni phra dog dang // de bzhin gti mug la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs tha~Md 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes ni brtan pa yin// yis mkha 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye ba gang
175a7(rgyud): lags dang // de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang // de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang // rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
175a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang rig ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyi su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te// gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor te// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni// go bzlog pa yi tshul yin// 
175b1(rgyud): de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus la khrag 'byung dang // baspu langs dang 'dar ba dang // kha zas dang chung lus yang dang // skra dkar gnyer mdengs pa dang // le lo med dang brtson 'gras ldan// de la so ga/ 
175b2(rgyud): pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa ni// rkang mgyogs sa stengs sa 'og gi/ 'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas
175b3(rgyud): rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do// ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags ni 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung sgom pa brtag/ lus
175b4(rgyud): sems chagasu bcu gnas ni// rang rig sems kyi de nyid/ la// de nyid dbyer med bsgom par bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu/ thob/ bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang // yis mkha 'gro la
175b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'khar thing rje su yi rang nas de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// // paN+Di ta ga
175b6(rgyud): ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra nAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha'agro la
175b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs brjod kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun po'i thag la bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sed chen
175b8(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na// mtshan dang dpe byang gang dang gang // stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang / 
176a1(rgyud): / brdzus skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang // drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a ni dbu yi gtsug tor to// A ni dbu skra g.yasu 'khyil// i ni
176a2(rgyud): dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste// u ni spyan mig mthon 'thing la/ ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// A tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// re rI tshams mnyam tshems thags bzang // l-i l-I tshams
176a3(rgyud): dkar ro bri mchog/ e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// oM ljags shin tu srab pa ste/ oM ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// oM ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum// a ni mdun mtho ba ru gsungs/ a ni thal gong rgyas pa ste// 
176a4(rgyud): 'di dag bcu drug g.yas bskor// de nas g.yon bskor mtshams nas kyang // a ni lcags srabo mdog gser 'dra// An bzhengs bzhin ma btud par// phyag gnyis pus mo slob pa'o// i ni
176a5(rgyud): stod seng ge 'dra// I ni shing khro lta bur// chu dang zhang ni gang pa'o// u ni mdzod spu g.ya su 'khyil// U naM spu rnams gyen du phyogs// re mdoms lba ba sbub su nub// r-I b.rA legs par
176a6(rgyud): zlum pa'o// l-i ni zhabs long tshigs mi mngon// l-I ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon// l-I ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel// ai ni sen
176a7(rgyud): me ring ba ste// oM ni phyag dang zhabs mthil la// 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ni shin tu gnas// aM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste/ aHni byin pa ri drags ni// e na ya ya~M lta bu ste/ spyi bo'i mi
176a8(rgyud): shigs snying po te// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha ni sen mo mdog snum pa// ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnams zlum pa// nga ni ser mo rnams rgyas pa// tsan
176b1(rgyud): sor rnams byin gyis pra// cha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa// dza ni rtsa mdud med pa yin// dz+ha ni long bu mi mngon pa// ha ni zhabs mi mnyam pa med// Ta ni seng ge'i stabasu gshegs// bla ni glang po'i stabasu gshegs// Da ni// 
176b2(rgyud): dang pa'i stabasu gshegs// D+ha ni khyu mchog stabasu gshegs// tsa ni g.yas phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mdzes par gshegs pa ste// tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa// da ni sku la 'khril bag chags// d+ha sku
176b3(rgyud): byi dor byas pa 'dra// na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o// pa ni sku gtsang pha sku mchog/ bsku rnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid// ma sku kho lag yangs shing bzang // ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o// ra sku
176b4(rgyud): shin tu gzhon mdag can// la ni sku la 'khrul pa med// wa ni su lus rgyas pa ste ni ga tu grims pa'o// Sha ni yan lag thad mdze ngas// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag/ ha sku zlum pa nyid yin te// 
176b5(rgyud): kA ni sku skabs phyed pa'o// ya ni sku snyoms pa yin te// ra ni phyal phyam me ba yin// la ni lte ba zab pa ste// wa ni lte ba g.ya su 'khyil// da ni kun nas mdzes pa ste/ d+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma yin
176b6(rgyud): 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcu ni// ka ni sku ste gnag dag me// kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag/ ga phyag ri mo mdangs yod pa// g+ha
176b7(rgyud): phyag ri mo zab pa dang // da phyag ri mo ring ba'o// tsa zhal ha cang mi ring ba// tsha zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang // dza dz+ha ljags mnyen ljags srab pa// nya ni ljags dmar ngo bo ste// glang po'i nga ro 'brug
176b8(rgyud): smra Ta/ Tha ni gsung stan gnyen 'jam pa// Da rna mche ba zlum dang no// rta ni mche dkar te tshams mnyam// tha ni mche ba byin gyis pra// da shangs shin tu mtho ba dang // d+ha shangs shin tu gtsang ba'o// na ni sbyin
177a1(rgyud): 'arnam pa ga pa rdzun kyang rjem stug nas bye dma'o// 'bu ma'i mangs 'dra d+ha'i b+h+ya/  ni na sbyin ma rnams ring// mus smin pa ma na gyul/ 
177a2(rgyud): ra ni de bzhin smin ma snum// la ni stan shal stug cing ring // de bzhin wa ni spyan shal mtham// bran gyi dbang po ma nyams sha 'bral ba legs par 'byes pa'o// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyis che /  ni dadu
177a3(rgyud): shin tu rgyas// dbu skra bu bltar gnag kA/ dbu sgra stug pa ya yin te// de bzhin dbu skra 'jam par// dbu skra mi 'jing ba ni la/ dbu sra mi gshor bo ni wa// dbu skra drini ma nga yin to// phyag la dpal gyi be'u dani/ 
177a4(rgyud): bkra shis gsung drung 'khyim pas rgyan// sdong ris lnga bu d+ha yin te// lce basprul pa'i snying po a// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad nung ldan// a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// A ni stong pa nyid stong pa/ 
177a5(rgyud): ni chen po snang babang // sbyi ni chen po stong ba nyid// sbyin don dam / nga banyid//  nI 'dus byas stong pa nyid // spyan 'dusu ma byas/ stong pa// rin mtha' las 'das stong pa/  thog mtha' snga
177a6(rgyud): nyid// mni dor ba med pa spang // lde ni rang bzhin stong shad // e ni chos rnams thang stong // e ni ring gi mtshan nyid stong // oMn mi de gos stong pa nyid// oM ni dngos po mang stong nying // i ni dzab stong pa nyid// ngas
177a7(rgyud): med do bo stong nyid aH/ mgrin pa longs spyod snying po oM/ shes rab stong ba bcu drug rtsa// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa dang po a/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas// 
177a8(rgyud): rol gzugs rnams la lta ba/ rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// de dag rnamathar gsum pa ca// gzugs kyi 'du shes la 'angs pa// sna tshogs
177b1(rgyud): 'du shes les mi byed// na mkha' mtha' yas la gnas Ta// na mkha' mtha' yas las 'das te// rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing // rnam shes mtha' yas rdzogs pa te// rnam shes mtha' yas
177b2(rgyud): las 'das na// ci yang med pa la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no// ci yang med pa las 'das te// 'du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes med min rdzogs pa yang // 'du shes med min las 'das te// 'du
177b3(rgyud): shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// rnam par thar pa brgyad pa sha/ snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo hUM// gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag rtsa yi rnam par gnas// 'khor lo'i
177b4(rgyud): rgya ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas/ de phyi/ sems can sangs rgyas yin// sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / ring du 'byung zhing thung du gnas// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod
177b5(rgyud): spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas g.yon bu go lnga lnga ste// steng 'og kha yi bar nas 'byung // ro ma shar du ma don du phyogs// rkyang ma nub ste 'og gi char// roms rkyang ma la
177b6(rgyud): 'khyud cing // g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid// rkyang mas rom la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsum thugs// de sgra sngagasu rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang
177b7(rgyud): dngos grub sogs// de nyid las ni byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim pa yang // snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snang ba'i
177b8(rgyud): thig le yang dag bcas// 'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul// A li kA li nyi zla ste// sems ni thig le'i ngo bar gnas// nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod// ka dang a las nyi zla ste// rang byung thig le
178a1(rgyud): drong gsher yin// de dag skang cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba brdzus skyeso// rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las// bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu// thang dran pa gsang ba yi// mngal na skyes pa'i
178a2(rgyud): tshul yin te// sar la sreg dang mar la gso// gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis// rdu rgyas bde ba ster ba dang / rin po yi pho brang du// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// 
178a3(rgyud): nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon ma yis// bde ba skyang drod gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdod nas bde ba'i rgyud skyes la// ba ba skyes pa bsdus skyes// gtum mo go bzlog rkyen gyis spar // gtu mo rkyen
178a4(rgyud): gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog spor ba dang // gtu mo// rang bzhin sbar ba ni// mngal skyes slong skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skye sa rim par sbyar bar bya// du ma'i gzhi bcas gni bcas dang / 
178a5(rgyud): gzhi med shin tu gzhi med de// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gi/ sher skyes// brdzus skyes bzhi tshor rim par sbyar// rgyu dang lo ma ste 'bras bu kun// skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor gcig/ de phyir sangs rgyas sems can
178a6(rgyud): gnyis// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// log tog snrums gnyi su 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sdom
178a7(rgyud): gsung ni mgrin pa thugs ni snying // yon tan lte ba phrin las ni// sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang // rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags// sa ni bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'odod
178a8(rgyud): bdun pa dang ni dgu bdag/ gsum pa hUM las rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// bcu dgu oM las rab tu grags/ ci shu rtsa lnga'i shu dgu// he gi ngo bor yang dag gnas// sum nu bdun dang drug cu
178b1(rgyud): bzhi/ a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te// skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags/ 
178b2(rgyud): 'byung bzhir dngas ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad// gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blong // g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// mdom gang mnyam 'gru bzhi yin// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga/ 
178b3(rgyud): rtsa na thig gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// sa sen bsU tA ra sogs// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma ma yin
178b4(rgyud): te// rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor sgom pa yin// rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min// spos la sogs pas mchod pa min// rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i
178b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod// sku na/ dgun dus rang bzhin te// 'thung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsung ni// dpying dus ngo bo ste// 'jug pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// thugs
178b6(rgyud): ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste// gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum// ye shes ston gyi dus yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang po rgyu yis pa yin// 'khor lo chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams ni dkar pos gnas/ 
178b7(rgyud): lam gyi sang rnam pa gnyis// ring ba dang ni nye ba'o// de nas 'bras bu'i sa pa yin// 'khor lo yang dag gnas pa ste// 'khor lo de rnams lha rnams kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral// rang bzhin gas
178b8(rgyud): ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can// zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can// bye ru sku mdog phyag mtsham lha// nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs// gsang ba'i bde ba lnga rungs
179a1(rgyud): de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha/ lus las byung phyir lnga zhe'am/ rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lnga// chags pa'i phyi na lha yin te/ rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ mamra
179a2(rgyud): ba chen po'i rgyud gsung so// de nas sa chen po yang cher g.yos par gyur te// mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po babs par gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste rje su yi ra
179a3(rgyud): nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ shrI DAki
179a4(rgyud): nI saM b+ha ra n+d+ha rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la bya/ dag 'tsha'o// bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// theng stong par gyur nas kyang / 
179a5(rgyud): haM mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha 'gro ma ni ji ltar lags/ de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig srung baji ltar lags/ rje phag mo bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyan// dang po ngam
179a6(rgyud): tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // 
179a7(rgyud): nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang gzhan 'khrugs pa tha ma yang // nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang // 
179a8(rgyud): gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi/ bdag gi g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan la nyes pa chung bos na// 'di lnga nyams pa 'bring du bshad// 
179b1(rgyud): g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang // 'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lha spyod gang la gzhan ma mos// zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis
179b2(rgyud): mnyas gzhan cher 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad// re re'i dpe ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dga' khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems
179b3(rgyud): 'khrugs na phyi rol pa// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur// g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyi su med par mkhas pas gsungs/ 
179b4(rgyud): dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas mkha'agro'i mtshan nyid kyang // mkha' gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad// / gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// kanas
179b5(rgyud): gnas bskor ka yi bar// ma' 'gro drug cu bzhi rungs/ ka/ sogs zung rtsa mkha'agro te// phyi nas rtsar mkha'agro re// mkha' gro nas bskor mtshams kyi sa ra// sum cu rtsa bdun mkha 'gro ma// lte
179b6(rgyud): sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgya de ni mkha'agro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa mkha 'gro bzhi// snying ka ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha'agro ra// gzhan rnams rtser mkha'agror// bcu gnyis bcu bzhir
179b7(rgyud): mgrin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas/ gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bde de sdom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can
179b8(rgyud): nges par sdom pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bas// sdom pa de tshig tu ni bshad// mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen ni gang
180a1(rgyud): lags dus gang lags// tshad ni gang lags srung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon mongs ldan dang mgus
180a2(rgyud): dang / brje dngas dran pa mi gsal ba// 'di drug dang tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bstan grogs ngan 'grogaso// mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chod
180a3(rgyud): chang gis myos// log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// spyir ni rtsod ldan du su gsungs// gdon sogs
180a4(rgyud): gzhan gyis byin rlabs ma// srung ba'i 'du shes sngon sang na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song na// bag med nyams pa son gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong
180a5(rgyud): na// de yang nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor bas skyo dang / rnam smin dran/ bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar tshad bral ba ni/ shags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos bzhi 'jug dang gsum// gang rdzog
180a6(rgyud): tshad ni mthar phyin te// che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba ltung ba chung ngu ste// dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // 'jug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges// rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag/ 'chang ba bsten
180a7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bza' bar bya bar dam chi'o// sems can dpa' bo mang 'gro la// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dmatshig// rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa/ 
180a8(rgyud): shes par bya ba'i dmachigo// sgo gsum sku gsung thug su bsam/ bsrung bar bya ba'i dmachi go/ nyon mongs drug drug bzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bsgral// bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po yin/ 
180b1(rgyud): dam tshig don du dam tshig dag/ dus drug dus gnyis lo bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig srung / dngos grub don du rtag tu srung // skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi
180b2(rgyud): lus kyi nyes 'byung ba// 'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las/ gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste// gzhan la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan yang mkha
180b3(rgyud): bas shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang // legs pa las ni nyes 'byung sogs// bla mo'i zhal nas shes bya ste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don
180b4(rgyud): rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje dpag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par dka'// mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par nu// bcom
180b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zes slar la/ dor ba med// ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la zab med// rang rig byed chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor na/ log tog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol/ 
180b6(rgyud): de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thad kyang rgyud kyi don la rje suM yi rang bar gyur to// mkha 'gro ma'i sbom po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo
180b7(rgyud): bdage slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ shA~M yak+She mA le wA nAdza/ bong skad du// dpal mo'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sengar la phyag 'tsha'o// sa
180b8(rgyud): kye// bdag la byed la zhu ba mchis/ shrI ni gang lags te gang lags lags dbang bzhi'i he ru ka gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu
181a1(rgyud): sogs nar spangs/ ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du mi gnaso// de lnga'i dang ldan he ru ka/ rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi nges pa ste/ 
181a2(rgyud): dang bor bu dbang he ru ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems la su rung ba ste// de tshe 'jig rten tha mal ba'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod// las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang
181a3(rgyud): bral// de yi phyir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi// gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i// phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas/ gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags gnyisu
181a4(rgyud): med// de yi phyir na shrI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim he ru ka/ pag mo la/ sogs tshogs dang ldan// zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de nas gsang dbang se ru ka'i rna
181a5(rgyud): mtshan ma yig 'brus tshogs// bskyed rims rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs la su rung bas na// de yi phyir na hi zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// 
181a6(rgyud): tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru// bskyod pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang // dmigs dang lha skyong gang la yang / mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med ma'o// phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste/ rgyu
181a7(rgyud): rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// chu rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs ldan// nang gi dang ldan he ru ka/ de nas
181a8(rgyud): shes rab he ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi// rgyu spangs phyir na he zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // tsaN+Da li yi kha dog dang // 
181b1(rgyud): dbyibs la mi gnas phyir na ka/ sems nyid bde bar gnas pa yis// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med// de yi phyir na shrI ru gsungs// mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar gnas paso// sems nyid
181b2(rgyud): bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la rten tshogs dang ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde bar gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsang ba'i dang ldan
181b3(rgyud): he ru ka/ de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka/ rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// pha rol phyir drug bde ba'i lam/ thams cad stong par ro gcig pas// tshogs gnyis
181b4(rgyud): bral pir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la mi gnas phyir// ka zhes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig spong bar gnas// stobs sogs phun sum tshogs pas na// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
181b5(rgyud): ba dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan/ shrI zhes bya bar mngon par brjod/ dbyings dang yes gnyi su med// dngos po mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa'i// bzhi pa'i
181b6(rgyud): dang ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la tho 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol// mi gnas gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin// mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang // de ltar
181b7(rgyud): don ni ma rtogs par// kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la// he ru ka yi rnam par rtog kha cig gzugs brtan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod// de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang rig
181b8(rgyud): ru ka/ bla ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med// rigs dang rigs pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa rnyed la dga'// rgyu des log tog sna tshogs bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
182a1(rgyud): pas// dngad dang gus bcas pha rol phyin// rdzogs byas bla ma dan pa las// man ngag yang dngag / blang bar bya// ma ma'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa/ he ru ka dpal de ltar na// rdo rje phag mdzo ltar lags
182a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje gsum sde ngag mo gnyis// don gyi rdo rje de nas brtags// tham rdzas kyi rdo rje ste// don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi byed phyir na rdo rje sde// dbang
182a3(rgyud): bzhis rdo rje ri ro'o// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtswa gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste/ rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga yis lnga yin te// khams gsums dgu 'joms pa yi// gsu rdo rje rtse dgur/ 
182a4(rgyud): rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/ mi shes dri mtshogs pa'i/ dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rabu mar phyug pag/ mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi rungs/ bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug pag/ 
182a5(rgyud): gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag// gsum pa chags dga' gti mug phag/ bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag/ 2 de nyid khyed la legs par gtad// thams cad rje su yi ring // dpal
182a6(rgyud): me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka'i nges pa 'byung ba rdzogs// / bla ma ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki gud+ha
182a7(rgyud): tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// kye ho mngon rdzogs rgyal po kye// dbang rnams dam par yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med
182a8(rgyud): dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung med dam ci// de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog gzung
182b1(rgyud): 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig yis glugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na ste/ lus ngag kun nas brlang bas so// de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang
182b2(rgyud): 'thor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // na mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas
182b3(rgyud): shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim po dang // mngon par rtogs
182b4(rgyud): pa'i yan la'o// 'di yis ngan 'gro'i srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pa so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med // 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste/ slob dpon
182b5(rgyud): sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thaMd grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo rje nga 'gram 'bag sogs la// gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs pa
182b6(rgyud): yi/ ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs pa la/ byin rlabs yis byas nas ni// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs ste/ bcos ma'i lha sogs de ltar na// phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas
182b7(rgyud): la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa yi ni 'khrul gzhi dag/ bcos pa nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba dang ni lta bu'o// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i
182b8(rgyud): srid pas srid par 'ching // 'khrul pas 'khor lo sa 'khor bar bskor// de bas dngas grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud spangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rig dang nges shes skye/ 
183a1(rgyud): lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spong zhing gong mthob// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang // mos pa'i rje su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lnga spyod 'dren pa yi// sdong
183a2(rgyud): bzung blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi byed par dbus ste/ rgyan gyi khang par thal ba ste// rigs kyi khang par drug pa'i rigs/ phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyis// gtsa'akhor la sogs
183a3(rgyud): khyad par 'phag so// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin po'i ming mi 'thob// dkyil 'khor dbu su gang gnas pa'o// de nyid kyis ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbusu mi gnas
183a4(rgyud): nu// 'khor rnams dkyil du mi 'gyur te// dper na rgyal po med pa'i grong // grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye bra ba kyang / rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dang tshig
183a5(rgyud): de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta bA
183a6(rgyud): dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi shes song ba tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun pa de dag gis// 
183a7(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thaMd shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sen kyang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang // rang sems la su rung ba dang / ma
183a8(rgyud): rungs pa dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongasu rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang // sangs rgyas sems can gnyi su snang // tha dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu khams gser dang
183b1(rgyud): na mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems can gdong nas sangs rgyaso// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig la// dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsus/ 
183b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog bcad nyams pa chung bar nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag / nyams pa 'bring du gsungs
183b3(rgyud): nga yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// 
183b4(rgyud): de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dang // brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// ga zhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// tshe 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshad
183b5(rgyud): dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yi// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba ngos sa zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang 'thun par
183b6(rgyud): bshags pa bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gi/ bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshogs pa'i bye brag las// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen po bsam// zab
183b7(rgyud): ba'i me ni rgyun bzhag me// thabs kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun bzhag chen po'i mi// zla ba gsum dang bdun dang ni// 'bring du gsungs te// zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung
183b8(rgyud): ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// ga tu mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud
184a1(rgyud): shing sogs// yis mi yi bud shing yin// mnangag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// 
184a2(rgyud): rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal mkha' 'gro gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis
184a3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ba bi dA ra Na tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di
184a4(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus byang du/ ba sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du
184a5(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gang lags 'jigs byed pa/ nga / 'joms pa gang lags rgyud gang lags// rgyal po gang lags
184a6(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms par byed// nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms// rgyu yi rgyu dang phrang bu'i rgyu/ ya dus rgya
184a7(rgyud): ni gang yin la/ rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin
184a8(rgyud): te/ don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum// de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir// don gyi rdo rjer bshad pa'o// dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste/ rdo rje bani ru bshad pa yin/ 
184b1(rgyud): rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu la// rje gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rje lnga ye lnga yi rtags// rtse dgu khams gsums dgu'i rtags/ rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi no// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel
184b2(rgyud): ba yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs lha// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// 'jig snang 'joms pas rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa deng rlung dang thig le la// gzung 'dzin gnyisu gang rtogs pa/ 
184b3(rgyud): 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// shes rab yis dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes dga' lam sogs pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// 
184b4(rgyud): rang rig sems nyid spong nyid la// gzung 'dzin gnyisu gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni// rtse gsum sku gsung thugasu bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
184b5(rgyud): gsum/ 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste/ rtse lnga yis lnga yi rtags// nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa lnga// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pani// zur gsum rnal
184b6(rgyud): 'bigs pa dang / gru bzhi dag cing gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed// zur lngas 'dod sgrub sras rdo rje// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud kyi
184b7(rgyud): rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pa// log lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu
184b8(rgyud): nas rje su yi rangs te/ g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs// / bla ma ga
185a1(rgyud): d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza n+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du// dpal stobs chen yis rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal/ 
185a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i thag la 'khor dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pama' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshigs kyis bskor
185a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i dusu// dpa' bo rdo rje mkha'agro la sogs pas g.yon phyogasu bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtugs te/ ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod
185a4(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ Ta ni gang lags rlung gang lag/ sa/ thig le gang lags grangs ni du// de la sems gzung ji lta/ ra lags// 'khar la ji ltar 'gas// 'khor lo ji ltar lags
185a5(rgyud): pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar legs// yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni// yi ge dgod pa gang dang gang // gtum mo sbyar ba ji ltar lags/ zla ba nyi
185a6(rgyud): mji ltar lags// gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi// rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // de la dga' son
185a7(rgyud): ji ltar 'byung // stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // dgongs pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod// 
185a8(rgyud): khyod la bshad kyis legs par zung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// na mkha' gnyis med thams cad bskyed// der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni// g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin// thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong
185b1(rgyud): nyid bsam du med pa'o// thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste/ rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no// de nas sems gzung bstan pa ni/ rtsa dang rlung ni thig le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin/ 
185b2(rgyud): te// bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos// de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par bya// me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor
185b3(rgyud): lo dbang bskur gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin te// bde skyong 'khor lo dang po ste// rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yin// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhin yin no// nyi shu rtsa
185b4(rgyud): bzhi grangasu bstan// rtsa rnams rang bzhin nga yis bshad// rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo sum cu gnyis// gsal byed sum cu rtsa
185b5(rgyud): gnyis ni// g.yas nas bskor te dgod par bya// longs spyod 'kho ro lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dag/ nga // chos kyi 'khor lo mdang ma brgyad// yum bzhi'i sa bon
185b6(rgyud): g.yon nas bskor// thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i mdab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la// gsal byed g.yas bskor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig gnyis ldan
185b7(rgyud): g.yon nas bskor// bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus// saM ni dkar brdur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lteng dbusu// oM ni dkar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbusu// ts+tshin
185b8(rgyud): sngon po thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbu su// AHni dmar po gyen bltas bsam/ rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis yin te// dang po'i gan su yi ge yaM/ gtum mo 'bar ba'i yaM yin te// nag
186a1(rgyud): po yongasu gyur pa las// rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyings// dbu su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas// ba dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o// gru gsum gnasu yi ge raM/ me yi 'khor lo gru gsum dmar// dbusu / 
186a2(rgyud): AHhUM ni dgod// zur la rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan// rkyen gyi 'khor lo de ltar yin// rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig mes// yes me ni bskul ba mkhas// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// bde chen ma rtogs gnyis
186a3(rgyud): tsam bsregs// bde chen haM ni bsros byas nas// zhu ba 'chi med bdud rtsi ni// zla ba zhu ba'i bdud rtsi yis// srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab// rgyun tu 'bab par gyur pa yis// 'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te// gzung ba mdud pa'i
186a4(rgyud): nang du gzung // go bzlog lug su bzlog pa ste// mthar thug gan su gzung ba'o// gsang ba'i 'kho rolo bzhi pa ni// gsang ba ba'i skyong 'khor/ lo ste// hUM ni lte bar dgod byas nas// mdab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi
186a5(rgyud): grangs// gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya// dbyangs yig rim pa nyis dag bkod nas// tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste// de phyir bde skyong zhes ni bshad// rna mgrin 'khor lol
186a6(rgyud): 'dab bzung la/ dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod// lte bar u ni dgod par bya// bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir// rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad // rig pa'i 'khor lo mdab ma lnga// lte bar ha ni dgod byas nas
186a7(rgyud): mdab ma lnga la oM hUM traM a// g.yas nas rims kyis dgod par bya// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// rigs pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim pa drug/ lte ba mdab bzhi mdab ma brgyad// bcu drug
186a8(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis te// drug cu rtsa bani bshad pa yin// lte bar oM ni dgod pa ste// e baM ma yid rnams ni// mdab ma bzhi la g.yon nas dgod// mdab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba// sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad// g.yon gyi'om
186b1(rgyud): pas dgod par bya// mngabu ma bcu drug gang yin la// ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// mdab ma sum cu gnyis sogs la// dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgod// mdab ma drug cu rtsa
186b2(rgyud): bzhi la// g.yas nas/ ka li lugs bzhin dgod// A li rim gnyis g.yon nas dgod// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yi phyir// gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni// mdab ma gnyis la lte
186b3(rgyud): bar bcas// ma ning bzhi yi mdab gnyis la// lte bar de nyid thur la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// b+h+ya ni gyen la dgod par bya// yi ge gnyis kyi dbus ni/ byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro// nyam su myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
186b4(rgyud): nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas dbang bskur 'khor lo/ ni// steng gi tshangs sgo'i mdab ma brgyad// lte bar oM ni dgod pa ste// daM laM kha~M ru// g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod// hUM traM hri
186b5(rgyud): a/ g.yas nas mtsham su rim par dgod// byang chub sems kyi chu/ rgyun gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang bskur te// de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lor bshad// de na
186b6(rgyud): yang ni bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus sgom pa bshad par bya// gong du bsten pa gang yin pa/ sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// rang rig sems las gzhan min te// rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin
186b7(rgyud): du ci yang mi rtog shes gyur na// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// de ltar sems la legs par zung // bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang // dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma dang / ma mo
186b8(rgyud): la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rje su yi rang bar gyur te// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen yes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad ngadu zung ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi
187a1(rgyud): mkhan po ga yang+ga ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid+d+ha dz+wa la saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdorje grub pa'i dra ba'i sdon pa'i
187a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ rin po che khang bzang gi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dag 'bod
187a3(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs pa'i dusu// rigs rgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de/ thams cad
187a4(rgyud): kyis lha'i pi nang gi gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa de'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ mngon
187a5(rgyud): po thugs rje cha ldan pa// de nyid don dam gang yin pa// dpal dang rdo rje'i don dang ni// dri ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don// nges bstan sdom pa ga/ nga yin pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
187a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun// phyi rol don la yengs pa'i sems// nang du bsdus la rtsa gcig nyon// dang ldan yis gnyis med de// de nyid mchod pa'i las yin la// gnyis med
187a7(rgyud): bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya yis lnga// gzung 'dzin rtogs pas mi phyed phyir// rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dra ba
187a8(rgyud): zhes pa mang ba'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig du bstan pas// grangs mang rgya tshor bstan pa ni// na mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don// na mkha' dang mtshungs rang rig ni// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'o// skad cig
187b1(rgyud): de nyid rgyud nyid la// rgyud zhes bya bar bstan pa yin// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las// mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de las gzhan ning yis bshad// yis skye ba'i rgyu dang
187b2(rgyud): gnas// rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul// bye brag ming gi rnam grangs dang // don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang // phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang / don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings// de nyid 'dir ni bshad par bya//
