187b3(rgyud): rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te// rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin can// rang rig rgya mar byung ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// yis skye ba'i
187b4(rgyud): rten yin la// gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa// grogs ni yis rlung yin te// yes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas de nyid 'byung ba/ yin// grangs ni snga ma ltar du shes// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te// thag
187b5(rgyud): la nyang yan ta// thig le mdud pa'i grangasu shes// de yi pha na yon gang yin pa// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin// 'bras bu
187b6(rgyud): 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las yis kyi rgyu dang gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams
187b7(rgyud): kyi dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i mngab ma ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas langs spyod 'khor lo ni// mngang ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor
187b8(rgyud): lo'i mdab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi dag yin no// bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste/ longs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor
188a1(rgyud): lor lte ba ru// haM ni dkar po thur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbusu// oM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbu su// hUM ni sngon po thur bltas nga sam/ sprus
188a2(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo'i lte dbu su/ AHni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// dang ngo'i 'khor lo'i mdang ma la/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni// lugs 'thung lugs min dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i mngab ma la// dbyangs
188a3(rgyud): yig bcu drug rim bzhin dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdab ma la/ lAM mAM paM tAM/ yi ge 'di rnams g.yon nas dgod// oM traM hri a/ mtshams nas g.yasu dgod par bya// sprul pa'i mdab ma bzhi rtsibs la// gas
188a4(rgyud): byed yi ge gsum cu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog chu la dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni// dbus nas drang por gnas pa ste// hU~M ni dkar po thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtse la thub
188a5(rgyud): bar dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te// ka li sum cu rtsa gnyi sa ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas nas// lugs 'byung 'og tu kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la/ 
188a6(rgyud): ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni// gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// skal tshigs la gnas srog la rten// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdung pa ni// dgu por gnas pa bya gdong tshul// chos
188a7(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis/ gru gsum gan su yi ger// deni yo su gyur pa las// mo yi 'khor lo gru gsum po// changad ni ser gsum
188a8(rgyud): nyid yin te/ lte bar ron dmar po bsam// mdab ma gsum la oM AHhUM/ gru gsum zur la dag dbya ba// rdo rje rtse gsum ba sim par bya// rlung gi gan su yi ge yaM/ de nyid meng su gyur pa las/ mdog pan/ 
188b1(rgyud): bzhu yi dbyings 'dra la// tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no// dbu su mdang ma lnga yin te// lte bar yang ni nag po bsam// mdab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gi dam tshig me sbar bas// dam
188b2(rgyud): tshig me yis gtu mo bskul// ye shes mes ni gtu mo bskul// 'khor lo gsum bsregs rnyed pa tsam// yi ge hri ni bsros pa yis// haM bzhu bdud rtsi'i char yang dang // lte ba'i gan su thig ler gyur// rgyun tu
188b3(rgyud): 'bar bar gyur pa yis// rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas// rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas// rang rig sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos sku rdo rje
188b4(rgyud): 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba 'i sdom pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste ga sum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid
188b5(rgyud): bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni nga yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed rnams kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zu // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
188b6(rgyud): byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dngag tu med pa thaMd dga' zhing mgu nas rje su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni
188b7(rgyud): mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang / pa ta hi la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / zhal zas kyi
188b8(rgyud): mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / gtum pa'i mchod pas mchod de// gzhan yang nang dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po mang du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
189a1(rgyud): te/ so sor rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar 'gyur to// dpal rngon grub pa dra bsdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya ng+ga ra dang / lo rlung dge slong shAkya rjes kyis
189a2(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gar+b+ha ar+tha tan+ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi thugs kyi snying po don gyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phag 'am
189a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag/ snying po mchog ni bzhugs pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// sangs rgyas rnams
189a4(rgyud): kyi ye shes sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ mtha' dang bral ba yin mod kyi// srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags // de nas rdo rje seras dpa' yi// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ 
189a5(rgyud): kye ho rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// nam kha'i bdag po sna tshogs ra lus// gsung gi mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// skye med dbyings na sa snang byed 'khrungs// 'gro drug 'dren pa khyod kyis gsung // nyid kyi zha
189a6(rgyud): nas thig pa shor// ke ke ru dang margad dang // sdug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen kha dog sna lnga pas// ye shes gzhal yas kha dog spras// nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs byed dang // rgyal sras dad pa gtam nyan dang / 
189a7(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor rnam so// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub kyi// gsung gi dgongs pa mkhyen nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi// rang 'byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs kyis 'di skad
189a8(rgyud): du/ ched du brjod pa rnam par mdzad// gang zhig rtsol med pade chen don// lhan cig skyes pa ma mthong na/ sgrab dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang / byis pa don med ga chad du// rdzas bzung ba ni 'ching ba nyid// rten 'brel sgom pa ga
189b1(rgyud): ba'o// don med bams myong 'dod pa yang / 'ching ba'i rgyu ste gsum pa'o// kha cig e ri'i thal bas byugs// dbang phyug na mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
189b2(rgyud): mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// gzung 'dzin nad kyis ci la 'ching // gdong nas dag pa'i namakha' la// bag chags mtshan mas ci la 'ching / skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la/ rgyu 'bras nad kyis ci la 'ching // ba
189b3(rgyud): dang bral ba'i yis la// rtog dpyod nad kyi ci la 'ching // e ma'o rnam dag sems nyid glong // lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'od gsal sna tshogs dus na bde// rnam dag 'khor lo bde ba la// bsnun pa'i blo gros
189b4(rgyud): log pa yis// srid rgyu nges pa'i rtsa bar 'khyams// gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhen chags can gyi gdul bya la// bde ba chen po bcos ma sbyin// khong khro can gyi gdul bya la// g.yo ba
189b5(rgyud): rlung gi bcos mi sbyin// 'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la// ngi/ drang rang rgyud bcos ma sbyin// kun tu rmongs pa'i yid can la// stong pa snying rje bcos ma sbyin// ston pas de skad bka' stsal pas// 'khor
189b6(rgyud): rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad gsol// ye nas rnam par dag bas na// khams gsum 'khor ba la ltar lags/ glo bur ba cig lags 'gyur na// thog mtha' yod par mi 'gyur
189b7(rgyud): ram/ yang na rdo rje sems sogs pa/ dmyal bar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ram// 'khor ba bde ba grub pa na// sbyang btub paM ni ci zhig gu// de skad gsol nas mi snang gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// 
189b8(rgyud): nga la nyan pa khyed leg so// rtse gcig yid kyis dang bar byos// mdes kha dog 'ja' tshon las// rigs kyi khyad par tha dad snang // ldan la lha mi gcig pa'o// ma bsdus gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// / smra ba'i
190a1(rgyud): seng ge 'jigs pa med// bka' yi dgongs pa shin tu zab// margad blo yi mching bu len// sna tshogs kha dog rig su bsgyur// dper na sA s+t+ri ka bzhin no// ka ran ta yi skye bzhin no// brtags shig/ 
190a2(rgyud): brtags shing skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// khyab bdag na mkha'i sna tshogs gzugs// deng bdag sems dpa'i lusu 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad du// bshad nas 'khor rnams
190a3(rgyud): drengs gyur te// phyogs gcig tu ni 'khor gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// lta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// ma bcos ngo bo ji lta bu// yis spyod pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
190a4(rgyud): legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen pos// rnam pa drug gi ma tshan nyid de// khyad par bdun dang mtshon pa'i dpe// bcu bzhi rnams ci rig su// bcu gsum ma nor zhesu bshad// lhan cig skyes pa khyab
190a5(rgyud): gnas pa// mngon sum dbang gi ngo bar shar// sbyin pas bzla gnas bltas pa yis// na mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas// zur du 'khor lo drug rim su// a ta rak+ta bde ba len// yaMs zer zhing sdug
190a6(rgyud): bsngal skye// rmongs pas mya ngan sdig pas 'dzin// de mi spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyur// si d+ha'i tshul du dge slong gnyis// dbang rdzogs zer zhing bde ba spyod// 'chi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar song // rgyal po'i khab na
190a7(rgyud): btsun mo can// chom du sdud cing rig pa yis// yis gzhan la 'chad cing ston// 'chi 'phos dur khrod sa ga yi// smad 'tshong ma yi srin bur skyes// 'jig rten khams gzhan sems dmyal du// shin tu 'tshed cing
190a8(rgyud): 'bod par 'gyur// brig sha'i drung na a ko ta// bka' yi bsgo ba rnam par byed// kha sbyor ba ni yis ces// bzhan bzang ma la legs par dgod// tshe 'phos nas ni ngu 'bod skyes// 'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir ngas/ 
190b1(rgyud): khyod kyis 'di pa bstan par bya// sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa/ mi rtog lta ba mi dmigs shes// mi g.yo ngo bo mi 'da' dam// de skad gsung nas mi snang gyur// 'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po chong// 'chad pa'i skyes bus
190b2(rgyud): yang gsol pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu// dam phog pa ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rang bzhin ji ltar lags// rtog pa gnyis pa dris pa las// lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi// 
190b3(rgyud): gang la ming de skad bya yi/ tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mtshon pa'i dpe ni 'di skad gsungs// nag po brtsegs pa pad pa ti// gri ta dang ni kang ka dang // phag dang glang po gzhon nu ma// zla ba chu shol glang seng dang / 
190b4(rgyud): oM danu bo gsum 'dres dang // gser dang nam pa'i ring me/ gsum pa bcu nir shes par gyis// de bzhin nyid ldan dam paste// de las gang zhig 'angar byed pa// dmyal bar yang dga' ched par bshad/ 
190b5(rgyud): e ma'o rang rig skal chen po// na mkha'i sprin la 'bud par bya da// byis pa rang bzhin mi shes pas// bcos med rang bzhin spro bsdu byed// rnam dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med// yis rgya mtshor zhugs
190b6(rgyud): rmongs pas// kun tu 'ching ba'i mdud pa nyid// kun tu 'ching ba rgyun mi 'chad// lhan cig skyes pa'i mnga' 'phangs kyang // bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis// gcig dang du mas sems bslad pas// rmongs par
190b7(rgyud): rgyal spel bar byed// rlung gi rgyu 'dril ba'i lha// yig 'bru kha dog go bar byed// yid dang rlung ni rgyu ba ni// snang ba 'gags pa yi so// de nyid log pas 'ching ba'i rgyu// tshangs pa yi ni tsaN+Da li// sbyar bas lha nyid 'od du du/ 
190b8(rgyud): ka sogs g.yos dang g.yon du a// yig mgo tshig dang g.yon du a// yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang / stong phrag bdun bcu'i rtsa lam nas// bab pa bde ba skyed par byed// don dam pa'o zhes smra// rmongs pa
191a1(rgyud): bsdams pas mdung bgrol// zag pa skyes pas 'ching bar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pas rigs pa yis// ci rigs pa ru gzhan la ston// grol bar 'gyur zhes nga mi sba// e ma'o blo ni gnyi su
191a2(rgyud): snang // ji ltar spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // gang la ming de skad bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de nas rdo rje seder yis// rtog pa gsum la bcad pa'i phyir// stan la
191a3(rgyud): langs te 'di skad gsol// namakha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// sgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rang 'byung sems// phyag rnams dag pa 'od gas la dbyil
191a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'gro ba'i bla ma yis gzu gas// gzung gi thigs pa lhan cig skyes/ rnam dgo rang gi/ dbyings la 'dud/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ 
191a5(rgyud): ma sedar rdo na nyon// mngon du gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs 'du ba yis drod// ci yang mthong la med rtogs na// ma mthong gan sa ni mthong ba ru/ mthong na 'gag cing bltas na skye// shes
191a6(rgyud): rab rjes 'ong bam/ ci dag bzhag na bde ba 'gog/ ye shes rgya mtsho yi gsal la// sangs rgyas sgom par mi mdzad// de la gnyen po 'od dam mi/ rigs pas ston pa 'ching ba'i nang / 'das dang byon/ 
191a7(rgyud): wAr ni// bde bden ston ma nga ngas/ rdo rje sa byed nyid kyis/ btsun par nus pa mgo to// bskrad du med pas brjod da prag/ rtswab tu med pas da brag mdzin du rnyed pa tshigs ma chad/ 
191a8(rgyud): skyes pas sdug tu med// mngon du gyur pas sgom du med/ dbyad du medapas bcos dang pral/ ma yengs blo yis rtogs pa'o// skam pa'i le'u'i dab shad pa'i tshe// 'cha pa'i skyis bu nyid kyang ni/ rgyal nasas
191b1(rgyud): 'gyel 'gyur te// lha min rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// so sor byed te dengs par 'gyur// lha yi bu mo stong phrag ni// chos la rdul mig rnam par dag/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri yang // de ma thag tu mngon sangs rgyas/ 
191b2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni drug g.yos pas// 'ur 'ur po dang che mtshem gyis// khams gsum po ni 'dar bar byed// de yi mod la sems rdzogs pa// ngo mtshor skyes nas 'di skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ 
191b3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog/ skra ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu// 'gro ba'i mar me yis sgron// khyod kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ ma rig sgo nga'i ling thog bas la// rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud// dga' mgu
191b4(rgyud): rangs nas gsol pa dang // thad 'dud cing 'dud par byed// sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de skad bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdo rje sede la gzigs te// bka' yi bsgo ba 'di skad mdzad// legs
191b5(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// yang dag ye shes la zhugs pas// rnam rte/ ga 'ching ba'i nad dang bral// mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// bzlog pas bltas pa tha dad 'dzin// gnyug ma'i rang bzhin
191b6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes// de yang bcings pas cil mthong // gang gis de nyid mngon gyur pa// de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin// dus gsum 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa// de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de la gal te gzugs
191b7(rgyud): yod na// dpag gam gzhal du btub bam ci// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la ci rigs skyob par byed// gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang // srung ba rgyun tu byed par 'gyur// grul bum srin po gdon rnams kyis// de
191b8(rgyud): yi bsam pa yong su sgrub// nad dang shu ba 'bras dang rims// de yi lus la 'byung mi 'gyur// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang // skad cig ma yis 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyun tu zhugs dang lan cig 'ong // phyir
192a1(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sems dpa' yis// de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed// de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon// khyab pa'i 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog/ de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan// yi ge med dang rig
192a2(rgyud): pa'i gsung // dam pa'i don la 'jal bar nus/ don gyis chos nyid 'jal bar ston// bla ma'i zhal nas dris na skye// rtogs na rnal 'byor skyes bu de// namakha'i rdul phran smon par 'gyuraro// ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la
192a3(rgyud): 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci// gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur// brtags na yengs te 'khyam par 'gyur// gnyis kyi blo la mya ngan snang // kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo mchog/ rnal
192a4(rgyud): ma la gnas 'ching 'gro la 'gyur// gang zhig bla ma'i drin shes drag/ skye ba med pa nyid du ston// bla ma'i bka' drin mi shes pa/ de yis lhan skyes ci la mthong // lhan cig skyes pa de yis bcings// de la 'gro ba
192a5(rgyud): skye zhing 'ching // tha dad gzengs pas nad du gyur// dus dang gan du bgrangs pas ldog/ bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog/ 'i/ dang phyi mar bsnyad pas gol// skye med lhan skyes bcos pas 'ching / 
192a6(rgyud): de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad// 'chad pa'i skyes bus 'di skad bstod// e ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku// khyab bdag gsung gi lde mig s+ho// ma rig sgrib pa dral ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa yis sku/ e
192a7(rgyud): ma'o rnal 'byor thugs kyi bdud// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir las bsgral// ma skyes lhan cig 'gag med cing // byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// phan yon gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// 
192a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs kyi snying po'i don gyi rgyud rdzogaso// / rje btsun gu ru li nal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba seng kar shAkya 'od kyis pa ma mthing du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// 
192b1(rgyud): / rgya gar gang du/ shrI kra sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza ud+g+hat+t+wa sh+ma sAn a laM kA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tsha'o// 
192b2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhug so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams
192b3(rgyud): kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang dang / gsang ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dpal zhes bgyi 'ji ltar lags/ 'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi// sdom pa
192b4(rgyud): nyid kyang ji lta bu// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ni/ gnyis med yis te// 'khor lo rnam pa bani ru brjod// phyi nang gsang ba
192b5(rgyud): de nyid do// dang po phyi yi 'khor lo ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan 'o/ yi sku// drug cu cu gnyis rim pa ste// yis dam tshig sku gsung chuH/ sa// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin// logs 'byung
192b6(rgyud): lugs las bzlog pa ni// tha mal gcad pas bI ru bshad// gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo ni// gnas sogs bcu yi rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang // 'khor lo sgo la dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa
192b7(rgyud): gcod pa'o// gsum pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis// gan su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga'
192b8(rgyud): dang // rnar dga' ba'i gnyen po ni// bde ba stong pa mi rtog gsum// dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la// de kho na yi 'khor lor brjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal
193a1(rgyud): la sogs nyon mongs pa/ gnyen pos yis ngang du sdom// bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang // tha mal ba yi rnam rtog kyang // dag pa lha yi 'khor lor sdom// gdod nas lus la grub pa yi// rta dang
193a2(rgyud): rlung dang byang sems kyang // a ba d+hU tI'i nang du sdom// bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang // dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang / 
193a3(rgyud): 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la/ gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'od ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang // nges pa'i don la dang byed dang / 
193a4(rgyud): gnyen po ye shes che ba dang // gzhan la khyab pas rgyal po yin// // rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags// // de yi dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
193a5(rgyud): pa phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur/ dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam// yang ni phyi ro la grwa rnamasu// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtum drag
193a6(rgyud): dang ni tshang tshing dang // 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang // 'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi// phyogasu g.yon nas bskor te gnas// ha har dgod pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags tshal byin za ro// 
193a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du// rlung mtshams ki li ki lir sgrogs// shar du ha ri ba s+ye la// gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong // byang du byang chub shing bu la// g+ha ra ser po mi yi gdong // nud tu mya ngan
193a8(rgyud): med shing la// 'bar 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong // lho ru nu tir shing bu la// 'jigs sde nag po ma ho'i gdong // me ru karan can ste// dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdod dmar// bden bral a rbu'i shing bu la/ 
193b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mun pa mche'i gdong / rlung du sring grub shing gul// ki lir sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdong // dbang ldan n+ya glo d+ha shing la/ ha har dgod pa ba glang gdong // galas na gri gugazod pa g.yon// shing lo'i steng na stong phyung
193b2(rgyud): shar du brgya byin dkar po la// rdo rje bsdogs mdzub glang po zhin// byang du lus dran ser po la// dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la zhon// nub tu chub dag dmar po ni// chu srin zhon nas zhags pa thogs// lho rugashin rje nag pa
193b3(rgyud): la// ma he zhon nas be con thogs// shar lho me lha dmar ser la// ra la zhon nas me thab 'dzin// lho nub srin po smug nag la// ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon// nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po// ri dgas zhon nas 'phan ni
193b4(rgyud): 'phyar// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs// thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud// nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dag/ shar nas brtsams te
193b5(rgyud): g.yon du dgod// pad+ma che dang mtha' yas dang // rigs rdzun dang ni dung skyong ni// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o// sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang // mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil/ shar nas byang gi
193b6(rgyud): phyogasu dgod// 'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab pa dang // drag po sprin tshogs mtshams la dgod// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha'agro rnams// shin tu 'jigs
193b7(rgyud): ba'i gzugs kyis ni// ro la spyod cing mkha' la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang / chu dang me sogs rim pa ste// gza' dang bar te grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdong dang
193b8(rgyud): langs dang // stag dang khyi dang lce spyang dang // wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // byed tshig pa dang rnam par sbyangs// mgo bo lus po keng rus rnams// a la phreng gi sgra sgrogs pa// de nas nang gi dur khrod ni// lus kyi skra sen
194a1(rgyud): la sogs// skye zhing 'jig par byed pas ni// dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// rgya chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs rgyu zhes pa
194a2(rgyud): dur khrod do// rnam par shes pa'i tsho gas brgyad dang // dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dur khrod 'chi// gsang ba rig pa'i yas khrod// de nas dur khrod dgos pa ni// rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la/ 
194a3(rgyud): phyogs srung mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // thugs rje'i rtag su shing brgyad la// zhing skyong sngags kyi theg bsrung // gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas
194a4(rgyud): kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chu ni brjod byang zab pa la// me sogs rtogs pa bral ba'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs bzad
194a5(rgyud): kyi// sku dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga kle lta'u// bzhugs pa'i don ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs bdud dang 'ching dag bdud// lha'i bu
194a6(rgyud): dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi chom pas bcos// skal ba yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug nga ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni// drug po de la ldan zhes
194a7(rgyud): gsungs// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de dang dral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor
194a8(rgyud): gnas// btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings// de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste// mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji
194b1(rgyud): ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad/ 
194b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thig la bsgoms pa yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas/ 
194b3(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin par rtog pa 'joms// de ni gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// gnyis med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir// de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad// dpa'
194b4(rgyud): mo la yang rnam pa bzhi// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod na/ sa spros bral lhun grub la// lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// da ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad// nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin med par
194b5(rgyud): byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' ba bzhin rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma// rang bzhin sems kyi ngo bo ni// na mkha' lte bur gang sgom pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// 
194b6(rgyud): phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po ti'i mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang lha ba shos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang / 
194b7(rgyud): 'khor lo rin chen glang po rta/ btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams/ phyi yi mchod pathun mong ngo // rang gi lus las byung ba yis/ bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang / sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang
194b8(rgyud): skye mched kyi// 'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nang // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yis// skra gzung b+hag kutsa bcir // rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs/ dga' ba mchog dga' dag 'bral
195a1(rgyud): dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i bdebs mchod// rang rig stong pa rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos sku la// zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// gtor
195a2(rgyud): mazhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni// thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du/ 
195a3(rgyud): ram las me dang yam las rlung // skyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i// nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha 'gro dgyes par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nung
195a4(rgyud): gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ lus ni lA li/ khor lo l-i/ d+ha ni yis mkha 'grom/ srin bu las kyi mkha 'gronatshod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor ma na// 'kho bo lo bzhi mi
195a5(rgyud): ka pA lar// rlung dang thig le bdud rtsil// dga' ba gsum gyis byin rlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dbyings kyi pang
195a6(rgyud): snod du// don dam sems kyi sngags kyi su// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang / phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // khams dang skye mched rnas pa dang // rgas
195a7(rgyud): sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang // 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// da nas
195a8(rgyud): kyi mdangs ldan nang // skra dkar gnyar ma spang ba dang // de nas 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar lags// de las yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems las ma/ 
195b1(rgyud): gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing // ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas dzad kyis// sems kyis gsang 'di gas
195b2(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang ba myong zhing grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ blo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sen
195b3(rgyud): gnyis ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang gzhan rig pa 'od gsal sogs// smrar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la// log rtog rtsi sogs rnar
195b4(rgyud): 'khrul// khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang // de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching // rang gis
195b5(rgyud): gcod cing rang gis za// rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang gau re/ nas spris bral la// sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul// rang rig rang / gis 'od gsal la// ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos
195b6(rgyud): po stong par ro mnyam la// blang dang dor bar byed na 'khral// dadod yon rang gis 'gags pa la// de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul// rang gi ye nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul// dman dang gya nom med pa la/ 
195b7(rgyud): sgro dang bskur ba 'debs na 'khrul/ gdod nas spros bral lhun grul la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// de dag gnyisu 'dzin na 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// bden pa
195b8(rgyud): gnyi su 'byed na 'phrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// stong nyid ro la mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan mar gzung na 'khrul// sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar// g.yeng ba'i
196a1(rgyud): sem su 'dug na 'khrul/ rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la/ rang rig les 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal smra na 'khrul// rang rig nyam sum myong bar// dkar po ches
196a2(rgyud): rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang gzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'a khrul// sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul// sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de// rang rig las 'khrul gzhan
196a3(rgyud): rig snang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag/ don du snang ba rab tu skye// skye ba mang bzhin skye bas 'khrul/ lcags bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems// me sogs byed pa gzhanan
196a4(rgyud): med// bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// zas skam bkres pa ga/ zhan na med// brdegs gcog lcag gizhus rang gi sems// srog ga/ tsad shan pa gzhan na med// 'gro bzad rang sems kun// rang gi
196a5(rgyud): semasu shes na// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// bla ma dam ba rtag/ tu bsten// theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta// sgom du med pa'i don bsgoms nas// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur
196a6(rgyud): pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung // sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung // de dag sems kyis rang bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa bac+doMs/ 
196a7(rgyud): rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol bko lpags mkhan la
196a8(rgyud): sogs// gzugs ngan gsad pa'i don gnyer ba// theg pa di las 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par sgom pa dang // gtso bo yab yum sgom pa dang // dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rims smos/ 
196b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i lam// rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam// gnas brtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod par byang
196b2(rgyud): sems dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dmigs pa thaMd rnam bsal te// lhan cig skyes
196b3(rgyud): ba'i don sgom pa// phyag rgya chen por rang byin rlab// de rnams gnyi su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// mchog la yang na phyi nang gnyis// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
196b4(rgyud): bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// / 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnams pa gsum// bshad rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis te// yan lag rgyud ni grangs
196b5(rgyud): las 'das/ rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang khyis kyis bsdus pa yin// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul ro/ na du// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla
196b6(rgyud): mad do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni gtso bo sgom// thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri rtse dur khrod ro steng du// gcer bu
196b7(rgyud): srab shig lhor bltas te/ A li ka lis lus bsrungs la// dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam/ lam gnyis la ni brten na su// sngags pas
196b8(rgyud): byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud/ gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud// gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste// de ni kun tu brtags pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa
197a1(rgyud): bshad // gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug dang yong su rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim// rim gnyis
197a2(rgyud): mnyam par gnas na su// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la// mtshan dpe bde ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul sku la// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen dang // lha mos gsol ba bac+doMs/ 
197a3(rgyud): gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/ gang la rab chad 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor bas skyo nas sngam gsum ldan// thos tshe dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang // dben par dkyil
197a4(rgyud): 'khor bris sgra bcad// tshes gos gyen la bdud rtsi spyang / thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'o/ de byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'thung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i
197a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor la// sgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung b.ra'i gyur// le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
197a6(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa bac+doMs// rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lhan cig skyes par
197a7(rgyud): rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa rgyu la sgrub pa lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// ngan rnams ston pas
197a8(rgyud): rtsa ba la// gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yis// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol
197b1(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sba// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod ji ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rje med cing khro la gdug
197b2(rgyud): khengs shing chags pa tshul khrims med// dad med rigs ngan bla mas skye// thos chung snying ring rnams la sba// dpa' zhing dul lo blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med// dad ldan rigs bzang gtong
197b3(rgyud): che// thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis/ sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la// yang ngo ma ra ngo'i tshes bcu la// dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// 
197b4(rgyud): lha mo rnams la rgyud gtad ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyu sde rnams// zung la sgrub pa ched du gyis// lan gsum brjod la rgyud rnams sbyin// phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la// chags sems gyong pa
197b5(rgyud): slob ma ni// gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos nas khung supa rang me byin// de la bstan dam tshig nyams// nges pa dad nas nu ba yo// gcig nas gnyis la ma spel na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig
197b6(rgyud): rgyun 'chang // bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / yis mkha'agro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor tha~Md kyis rgyud kyi don rtags nas rje su yi ngo// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rma du
197b7(rgyud): zung ba rdzogs// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo sna ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur ba'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ a nA bi la tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bad skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes
197b8(rgyud): bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' gro la phyag 'tshalo// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das// zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid/ 
198a1(rgyud): mtshan med mtshan gni rnam par spangs/ rang gis sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul// mtshan med mtshan gni rnam par spangs// khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa
198a2(rgyud): yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas/ snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang // kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang // kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni// blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed/ 
198a3(rgyud): de nyid nges par yang dag par// rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nying // rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// bsgoms pa med cing byang chub med// rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di/ thog mtha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i yis laso
198a4(rgyud): ga rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du/ kha cig zhi pa chen po che// kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs/ kha cig 'angar zhing g.yo ba dang // glu gar de bzhin sil snyan
198a5(rgyud): dang // lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgong // kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus/ de ltar la
198a6(rgyud): sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de bzhin 'gyur ba ni// phan 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya/ 
198a7(rgyud): nga la lo chog rnams kyis gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa// lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir// tshogs kyi
198a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag nga ste/ rang bzhin med par bsgoms par bya// me long lta bu'i gcig nyid de// dang po grur ni rtogs par bya// so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas/ 
198b1(rgyud): shar gyi grur ni nar rgyan// ba ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa/ byang gi grur ni rnam par spras// mnyam nyid yis chen po ni// bag chags med gru rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwa yi dbus ni thang du/ 
198b2(rgyud): de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// yis spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba// de bzhir gra bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dag pa// dbus dkyil 'khor gzugs ni// 
198b3(rgyud): mi bskyod pa yi rnam par rgyan// zhi dang chos don rgyan pa las// de dag thaMd dkyil 'khor 'grub// drang dra phyed zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang // rta babs la sogs thad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babla
198b4(rgyud): sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs// gang zhig sems kyi rab phel ba// ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas// de nyid dra ba zhesu gsungs// dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste/ 
198b5(rgyud): bril bu do shal brtag pa ni// rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed// sgra ba na rnam pa lta bur ni// chos rnams thaMd so sor rtogs// chos rnam sam skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgya lo mtshan phreng bar
198b6(rgyud): gsungs// bla re la sogs gang bres pa// dngos po la sogs dang po nges// sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad// dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o// gos phreng de dag thad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// 
198b7(rgyud): gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems// dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan// de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs// grwa yi mtshams ni thad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs
198b8(rgyud): pa/ thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems/ yis 'dis ni rnam par rgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs// sku gsung thugs ni/ 
199a1(rgyud): nye bar phyir// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rnams gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin sreg yang ni bshad pa yang // lha rnams tshim pa yis brjod/ 
199a2(rgyud): rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni// thag zung sgra yis mtshan ma nyid// bye brag phyed pas me nang du// gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams// sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid // thaMd kyi ni bsreg lugs bya// 
199a3(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas ni// rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa// 
199a4(rgyud): nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci// gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de ni gsal bar brjod par bya// yi/ da rnams kyis ni skad du yang // gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis
199a5(rgyud): brjod// skye ba med cing snang med pa// mtshan ga ni mtshan nyid rnam paraspangs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni nga yis sngag su gsungs// sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni// lha rnams yang
199a6(rgyud): ni brjod par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing // gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang // lha zhes bya ba
199a7(rgyud): yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal ba rang yis brjod par bya// de nas skyil krungs bcas nas ni// sna yi rtse mor
199a8(rgyud): bltas nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid mthong bar bzhag par bya// snying ka'i gnasu lag pa gnyis// 'bad pas mnyam par sbyar na su// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du// gang tshe sems ni rab
199b1(rgyud): rgyu ba// sangs rgyas tha~Md 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thaMd 'dus pa'i bdag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thaMd 'dus pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog pa'i bdag/ thugs
199b2(rgyud): kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thaMd 'gyur// nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don// 
199b3(rgyud): sems can don du snying rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// sna rtse dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thad ma byas// res 'ga' dam tshig 'khor lo yang / 
199b4(rgyud): de nyid zhes bya ma gsung so// rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang / grub de ni re 'ga' yang // gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin// rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas// sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par
199b5(rgyud): bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid// dam tshig zhes bya rab 'bad par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa// de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams
199b6(rgyud): tha snyad tsam gyis gnas// gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems// de ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa// de ni sems can yod ma yin// de la kun tu rtog pa yi// khrag ni za bar 'gyur
199b7(rgyud): ba'o// khrag ni chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya// gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa// khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya// de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza' bar yang dag gsungs
199b8(rgyud): ba nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// sha chen du ni rab tu dbye// mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par rjod// gong zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjesu sbyor ba las// phyag
200a1(rgyud): rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis// de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod// chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i char ni gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thad rab rtogs pa'o// bshang za bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig
200a2(rgyud): nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di rnams thaMd gsal bar bshad// 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i
200a3(rgyud): rim pa chen po mkha' gro ma dra bsdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
200a4(rgyud): / rgya ga skad du/ shrI saM bar kha sa ma tan+da rA dza nA ma/ bid skad du/ dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal yis sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha'o// 
200a5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gde/ gas pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bdun mo'i b+ha ga c-i bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pazod kyi byin gyis
200a6(rgyud): brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig/ srog dang
200a7(rgyud): lnga pa de bzhin te// lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten
200a8(rgyud): nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/ lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
200b1(rgyud): 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rje chen po la skyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog/ bde ba chen po lam yi no// rdo rje snying pos
200b2(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / gnyi su med pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis
200b3(rgyud): med bde ba che// thabs ni he ru ka dpa' nyid// shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// gnyi su med bzung 'jug mchog/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ bac+doMs
200b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang ni he ru ka khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te/ rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid do// skye mched de/ yang de bzhin du// lha yi ngo bor shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos
200b5(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ruka dpal bdag nyid dngos// dri ma med po'i kha dog can/ 
200b6(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis rgyan cing dgu dang ldan// zla ches sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rigs kyi bdag pos rnar rgyan// spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste// chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab rang bzhin
200b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma// ban+du rA ka'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lngas rgyan cing // dag pa lnga bcu'i phreng bas mdzes// rdo rje pad+ma'i snod bsnams pa// yab la 'khrud cing brkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes
200b8(rgyud): pa/ chus skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying // khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskyod pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ 
201a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gang lags/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brtan dang g.yo ba thed kun// shes rab ra
201a2(rgyud): bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'dagasal nyid// ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab/ brtag tu med pa na mkha'i dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med/ 
201a3(rgyud): gnyisu med pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bac+doMm
201a4(rgyud): nor rtog pa rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang / dbang gi rnam pa/ ra dag pa dang // maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du// bum pa'i ngo
201a5(rgyud): lhaltar shes pa// sngags kyi de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / sbyin sreg ni gang / gtor me ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang / bum pa ni gang / sngags
201a6(rgyud): kyi de bzhin ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po ste// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ oM hriHha ha huM huM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha
201a7(rgyud): DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+d+ha nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis// bskal pa stong la sogs pa yi// sdig pa ma lus dag byed chu// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhig/ 
201a8(rgyud): 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes// a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang // dur ba la sogs de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// gyen du pheM gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor/ 
201b1(rgyud): / makun dgyes/ dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do// bdud rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// rin chen snod bzang bru gyis mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu// zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od
201b2(rgyud): zer gyis// bdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing / spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha 'gro ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcar
201b3(rgyud): bu thal ba'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
201b4(rgyud): gra.oM dz+wa la mu khai Ta ki tI kaM ka ni hUM phaT/ oM pa ri nA ya ni tsA ki n+ti hU~M phaT/ oM man+ta ki nA~M hU~M Ta/ oM ba ra mu khi TA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM u ny+tsa kra ti nI hUM phaT/ oM a ra Na ma DA ki nI hUM phaT/ chu skyes dag
201b5(rgyud): gis rnam rgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpa' mo dru ga ni mnyes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsal ba/ bcom lnga/ na 'das smin pa'i lam ni gang lags / bcom ldan 'das
201b6(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang / sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
201b7(rgyud): sprul pa/ rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang gi kha dog dmar
201b8(rgyud): po ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtsings la gnas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis mnan pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bac+doMs
202a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de/ oM ga Na pa ta ye swA hA// nag po 'bru yi ril bu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// dpal bde mchog
202a2(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las las sna tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
202a3(rgyud): rdo rje gnod gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rje su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badz+ra sa rang 'gyur ru 'dzad pardzog go// 
202a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma hAk+Sha la krA d+hAH/ hu s+ya sid+d+hi b+ha ba tanA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyung// dpal he ru/ 
202a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i// 9/ sa mngon par mkhyen pa yis// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa// / bka' yi 'khor la bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thad
202a6(rgyud): kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi zab bde ba che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// ji srid 'khor ba'i ge nasu ni// kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa// mya ngan 'dar
202a7(rgyud): bar mi mdzad cing // de srid mtshungs med sems can don// rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba kun// srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/ byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad
202a8(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par// smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing // snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bos srid pa skyong bar mdzad// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// 'di ni rgyud rnams kun tu
202b1(rgyud): yang // kla klo'i skad kyis sbas pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'o// rdo rje sed mnyam gyur pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid te// myur du dngos grub ster byed pa// 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed// bsam pa gang dang
202b2(rgyud): gang dag gis// mi rnams sems dang 'thun par 'jug/ de dang de yi gzugs sprul te// sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs// de phyir 'bad pa du ma yis// sna tshogs tshul gyis 'thun par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ruH/ 
202b3(rgyud): dpa' bo rnal 'byor mchogs can// rang gi lha yis rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid yis mchog 'grub 'gyur// 'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang // dkyil 'khor ba dang zhing skyong tshogs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas// 
202b4(rgyud): mkha 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las tshogs// yis yon tan rigs kyi lha/ nag po chen po 'khor/ dang bcas// lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas/ rdo rje 'dzin pas
202b5(rgyud): dus kun du// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che// bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis// ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ 
202b6(rgyud): thaMd na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yis// 'gro ba dmig su med pa ste// mthong ba dang ni thos la sogs// bad
202b7(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bur 'char// gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa// de nyid yongs shes rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum bde ba chen por bsgyur// nyon mongs med na yes med// nyan rang byang chub lam las
202b8(rgyud): ring // phung po khams dang skye mched dang // 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams// tha gdod nas dag pa yi// yis chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dngos po du ma gsal bar snang // yis med par skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas yis
203a1(rgyud): kyis rab bskul// de bas bla med rgyud 'di ru// 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med// dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dag/ thob pas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // sku gsung thugs
203a2(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin te// brtan pa dag ni longs spyod yin// nges par brtan pa mya ngan 'da'// rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas// brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang // dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ster// bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa
203a3(rgyud): dang // rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas/ dkyil 'khor nag po bla na med// sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang // yang dag bla ma bsten par bya// 'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni// bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen par dang / 
203a4(rgyud): sgrub pa sgrub po chen po yi// khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus// las da la sbyar ba shes par bya// ji srid las kyi sbyor ba yis// mgon po ra khor bcas mnyes gyur na// las dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa// myur
203a5(rgyud): du 'grub par the tshom med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
203a6(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin par gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar gsan te/ gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad gsung so// sgyu ma brag tsha'i sgra brnyan ltar/ 
203a7(rgyud): yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// 'byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa// kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni// gsang bzhid skyong mgon po che// sangs rgyas
203a8(rgyud): kun gyi mgon po 'dis/ bstan pa srung bar mdzad pa yin// zhes gsung so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das
203b1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan ba srung byed pa'i// snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa yis bstan pa srung / 
203b2(rgyud): 'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang // rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa// ting 'dzin gang du sgom
203b3(rgyud): gyur pa// bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste// rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad// thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la// 'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad// sku
203b4(rgyud): gsum yis lnga ldan par// gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor
203b5(rgyud): ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu sangs rgyas kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang skyong bla na med pa'i rdorjerab tu rgyal ba'i snying po mi byed pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
203b6(rgyud): zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po yis kyi dngos grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ston par mdzad// rdo rje gzhi la gnas
203b7(rgyud): de'i cha// gter gyi bum pa kha skyer ldan// dus kyi rgyal po 'ad gsal ba// chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid// sgra dang sgra las khyab / dum ma yin gnas pa'i yul// dom tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las// rgyal
203b8(rgyud): ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso// phyogs dus med par rang byung ba// chos 'thung po brang dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni// na mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub// mi phyed
204a1(rgyud): / lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa// ge sar pad+ma'i dbus ni// kun nas zlum por 'khor ba ni// chad med phreng bas
204a2(rgyud): rgyan pa ni// bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan// ri rab lhun po mchog byung ba'i// de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te/ shin tu mnyam zhing ratshud par 'khor// de nyid rim pa
204a3(rgyud): yongasu brtan// bye brag mtshungs med dmar chen mtsho// rim pas chu gtor 'o ma'i gnas// 'thung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi// phung po rus pa'i ri bo la// phyi nang mnyam pa'i rang can gyi// lhun gyis
204a4(rgyud): 'grub par bstan pa yin// de las dngos po sna tshogs kyis// tha dang snang ba yis gzugs// rang byung bde ba chen po nyid// mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byung // dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa
204a5(rgyud): yi// 'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gdan// rdo rje skyil krung mi phyed las// thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can// gsang ba chen po'i rig sa dag pa'i// 'dod chags rdo rje'i skur ldan pa/ 
204a6(rgyud): phyogs bya rkang ri dang ni// dpal gyi ri la mdun phyogs pa// d+ha na ka Ta parba ta// pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus// chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par ga/ nas// dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs/ gsang
204a7(rgyud): bsngags kyi rgya mtsho yi/ ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul// gsang ba chos kyi dbyings chen po// dang ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du// kla klo'i yu rtsi'i rnams dang // lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// gas
204a8(rgyud): chen yongasu rdzogs pa yi/ rang byung ye shes pho brang du// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcu gnas kyang // skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir// mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po
204b1(rgyud): gsungs// phyogs bcur gnas kyi sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa// de dbus
204b2(rgyud): seng+ge'i khri bzhugs pa'i// thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// pus mo'i lha nga sa la bdugs// thal mo sbyar
204b3(rgyud): 'di don zhus// gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che// mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam// dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste// spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par gyi// sgrub dang sgrub pa
204b4(rgyud): phrin las tshogs/ thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste// rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa// de nyid bcom ldan gsung du gsol zhes gso la to// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' ste
204b5(rgyud): pa bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ dga' zhing mgu la rab dad pa'i// sedang chen pos gsang ba'i don// rab tu zhus pa legs legs/ shin tu rmad du byung ba yi// gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du// byang
204b6(rgyud): sems kyi yis mdzod// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// de nas dngos grub thad kyi// grub pa rab tu ster byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba las kyi rim pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
204b7(rgyud): cad kyi// bstan pa srung zhing bka' la gnas/ dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gso// dang ldan rig 'dzin thad la// mchog tu gyur pa'i las sgrub pa// dang ldan nag po
204b8(rgyud): ni// 'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin/ lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// mchod 'os gtso bar gyur pa yin// dang ldan lha mo chen mo dang / nag mo re ma tir gyur pas// 
205a1(rgyud): chus spyan srung / rlu gsu dang thugs gas ga byin da khon don/ na tan zinams dang thug tu// dang tshig ma nan pa nang myong gnyi kun nig ces/ ga
205a2(rgyud): gsusu sa byed do'o// ra mgo can pa de grub zung ba'i rgyud las gas bskyil dgangs pa'i ladu sti gnyis pa'o// de nas gas pabasha byab/ 'di nyid pa med sgru pa / 'kha
205a3(rgyud): / mtshor myong ba ni/ mas can sdug bsngal gcig na na// ji lta gA'i grol 'gyur ba/ de dang de sa pangs ston mad/ du ni skal pabarang ba ni// rdzogs ldan pa ma gyur pa 'o// ngag ni dus las
205a4(rgyud): mA~M gas ldan gsum ldan mis/ dring kyi sa kyi ma la/ ma ldan chos brgya dis/  bdun pa phyogs ma'i/ rdzu ba rgya ba yi sa ky-i mang // shin tu gdu chu pa 'i/ mthun pa ma
205a5(rgyud): gyi tshe// de ma mgon pa'i bstan pa 'byung // gang zag sa yang gnyisu / de/ bsgral bar bya ba'i gang bag dang // sgrol bar byed pa'i sgru bos+t+waM/ dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing // gon mchogs
205a6(rgyud): bo smod pa dang / bla ma la snang bdag la smod// de dag la sogs byabar bshad// sgrub pa po na rnam po gsum/ he ruka dpal rnal 'byor ma// dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gas la/ rim pa go 'phang thob pa ste/ rdzun
205a7(rgyud): nod sbyi dang bye brag tu/ dam tshig gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin/ gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang / bstan pa'i dus dang sgrub pa dang // las la sbyar ba'i'adus shes pas/ ying 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs// bsam gtan
205a8(rgyud): 'phel dang khyad par byo'o// yul dang dang po'i spyod yul du/ mthong bad nigs pa dang / reg pa dang ni dran pa yis/ dkyil 'khor pa'i snang bayang / ma lus ngos po gang gang gi/ bde ba can du shes pa bya/ 
205b1(rgyud): bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang // gsang ba 'bras bu lam byed pa/ rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de// bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum/ 'di ni khyad par srung ba yin// grub pa bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang / 
205b2(rgyud): nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang // dang ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che// rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa// rnam dag stobs ni rgyas par byed// bsnyen pa'i dusu rang lha yi/ he ru kar ni gnas pa
205b3(rgyud): yi// mdun du bka' sdod dam tshig gi/ mgon po phag bzhi bsgom par bya// de nas thugs kha'i rang sngags las// 'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las// khyad par du ni sgra bcas dang // shin tu dal bar bzlas pa bya// nye bar
205b4(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i dus ni/ bdag nyid he ru ka las ni// hU~M byung mdun du 'od 'phros pas// / bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu// sgrub pa'i dus mgon po yi// rgyas 'debs skye bor he ru ka/ de nyid gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa/ 
205b5(rgyud): de nyid sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsam// gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po che// cho ga gsum gyis sgrub pa'i tshul// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ba'i bdag/ thad bde chen gnas pa la/ dus gsum 'khor lo
205b6(rgyud): gsum du gnas// brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po bla na med// ye shes mgon po chen po nyid// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad// rim pa bzhin du yongasu bskor// dkyil 'khor pho brang dbusu
205b7(rgyud): yang // dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba// dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni// rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o// phrin las khyad par gang yin pa// las la sbyor ba
205b8(rgyud): rim shes bya// rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang // rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/ rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed// dug gis 'dzin dang 'on long dang // rang sha rang gis za byed cing // gshis ngan dug dang khrag tu
206a1(rgyud): skyug// 'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa// las kyi khyad par yongasu bstan/ char dbub pa dang sprin dral dang // thog dang ser bdabab pa dang // rang phyog su ni bzlog cing srung // bdag bzlog dang ngag bcing dang / 
206a2(rgyud): nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang // phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o// thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste// rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// dang por bla ma mnyes par bya// gnyis par dbang bzhi thob pa dang // gsum
206a3(rgyud): bar byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bka' bsgo'i rjes gnang tshul bzhin du// ma nor 'jug pa'i go rims shes// rten tshul khyad par shes par bya// stobs ni chos rnams thams cad la// sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang // 
206a4(rgyud): yang dag bden pa'i stobs kyis ni// rang bzhin med par rtogs pa sa 'byung // 'jug pa thun mong ma yin pa// byams pa snying rje bya/ nga chub sems// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba'i don la
206a5(rgyud): sems pa'o// mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste// dus dang grangs da nga mtshan ma ste// dang po par dang tha mar yang // gtso bo dang na 'khor rnams kyi// gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru// rtags kyi phye
206a6(rgyud): bstan pa yin// rgyu ni thogs pa med pa yi// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste// mngon sum dun 'byung ba ste// mngon sum du ni 'brang ba la// gang gis dgag par mi nus pa// de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// snying
206a7(rgyud): po smin pa bzhin du 'byung // gang du thogs med rdo rje yi// snying po zad pa med pa'i don/ yang dag yis snang ba po// bla ma'i drin las thob par 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las
206a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dbang ldan bdud 'joms pa'i// sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi// sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi// gsang
206b1(rgyud): ba mkha 'gro ma bani dang // lhan cig tu ni dgyes par rol// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// mi thung khros pa ut+pal mdog/ mgo skyes gyen 'greng
206b2(rgyud): rngam pa'i sku// ro yi gdan la bzhugs mdzad cing // klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// khros pas char sprin nag po ltar// me stag phung po lta bu yi// spyan gsum drag po'i lta bas gzigs// glang po'i tshul can stobs
206b3(rgyud): ldan pa// rgyu ma'i do shal sbyangs pa yi// mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas klubs// shin tu mi srun sgeg pa'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po lha yi lha// nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs// ma rig nun sal sgeg pa'i nyams/ 
206b4(rgyud): rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston// brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'jigs par ston// log lta spong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs par ston// ngo
206b5(rgyud): mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // blo chags mi g.yo zhing 'i thugs// g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin// g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'dabs
206b6(rgyud): g.yon pas kha T+wAM 'dzin par mdzad// gsung gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar bcas// rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis
206b7(rgyud): gnas// de yi mdun du gtum pa mo// lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can/ gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad// yab la phyag rgya drug
206b8(rgyud): gis brgyan// yum la lho yis rgyas btab nas/ sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs// me 'od phreng bas yongasu bskor// yas rgya mtsho'i 'khor bsrungs ma// shar phyogs mkha'agro 'drog ma dang // lho phyogs glang
207a1(rgyud): snam zhes bya/ nub kyi srin mo ral ba can/ byang dus yis gtsug yin no// gang du rgya mtsho rku dngas dang // nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku// ma rungs 'joms byed nag po che// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa nyid/ 
207a2(rgyud): bsad par ba pa brjod pa nyid// snying rje mengan mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa khrug byed pa// zhe sdang rigs kyi tingange 'dzin gyis// re shig sam du bsad
207a3(rgyud): par bya// gzas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol// kun tu gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba// yul dang yul du rol byed pas/ shing rnams la ni gnas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed// dur khrod gnas kyis
207a4(rgyud): songasu bskor// ma mo'i gnas sogs khyab par byed// klu yis/ mchod pa'i zhing skyong ba// mo yos phye mas yongasu bskor//  dang mig gis khyad par 'gyur// gtso bo'i sngags kyi lus can te/ sgrub
207a5(rgyud): pa po yi lus la gnas// de dag rim par dus bstan pa// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad bar las// 'bru nag gtor ma rab tu shis// sha chen gyis ni rgyun pa
207a6(rgyud): yi// tshogs rdzas pu dza gus pas dbul// phyi nang gsang ba khyad par los// bstan pa'i tshul gyis phrin las las/ bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pa// grub dang sgrub pas mngon du gyur// dus rnams kun tu zhe sdang
207a7(rgyud): gis// rnam pa kun tu gzhom mi bya// yul min pa las bsad byas na// rnal 'byor sa tshig las nyams phyir// grub pa nam yang yod mi srid// khyad par yis bla med pa// dam tshig mgon por sgrub pa yi// dam tshig
207a8(rgyud): 'di ni rmad po che// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad// byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di// yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas// yang ngo yis ni bskyeng byed la// mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed// yang ngo yi ni bco lnga la khyam
207b1(rgyud): chub sems kyis mkha' gro yang // bde ba chen por 'du ba mdzad// 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs// dkyil 'khor lha nyid lus nyid yin// gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor ni// btsal yang rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes// 'dren pa
207b2(rgyud): dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la// drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa// yon tan phrin las dbang phyug gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag po yin// ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'khor lo
207b3(rgyud): dgug pa gnyis med bstim// dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang // gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te// 'khrul dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa// khams gsum kun la dbang byed pas// 'jig rten las dang yis kyi// 
207b4(rgyud): mgon po'i khang par mngon du 'byung // gdags pa tha snyad khyab pa po// thun mong bar ni bstan pa yin// 'di dag las dang skye bo las // sgrib pa thun mong lha yi cha// dngos dang rgyud pas lung bstan pa/ 
207b5(rgyud): srog dang srog ma yin pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas pa mngon par phye// 'di ni mngon du 'byu nga ba'o// dang la mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las
207b6(rgyud): gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshang ba ba// he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi ni// gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che// 'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya// gsang ba'i sgru
207b7(rgyud): pa'i thabs mchog ste// skal pa can la sbyin par bya// gang du sgrub pa'i sa pogasu// mi mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas// de nas nag po bsgrub par bya// 'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas// tshad maung bang chub sems
207b8(rgyud): kyi blos/ snying rje chen pos bskyed byas nas// bde ba'i stan lo 'dug nas ni// lhor bltas skra grol gcer bu yis// dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni// rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying kha ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'a
208a1(rgyud): yang / bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam// rang steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang // me yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam// de dbus yi ge hUM nag po// yis lnga pa'i rang bzhin can// de
208a2(rgyud): yis 'od kyi snang ba las// dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam// rang bzhin gan su 'phros pa las/ bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha/ dkyil 'khor lo bcas pa dang // nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// mdun gyi namakha
208a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa la// skyabasu 'gro dang mchod pa dbul// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa// bzod par gsol nas gshegasu gsol// de rjes dngos po tha~Md kun// ma lus stong pa nyid gzhug cing // oM swa b+hA ba
208a4(rgyud): shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA sA b+hA shud+d+hoH/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/ dzadz+rashud+d+hoH/ oM ya ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+hohaM// zhes badz+ra dad par bya'o// phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun// gdod nas dag par
208a5(rgyud): ngang du bsam// de nyid hUM dang bcas pa yang // nA da tsam du gnas pa las// na mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni// tshangs pa'i gnas ba ni khyab par bya// de las sa don 'di dag ni// 'chang bzhin
208a6(rgyud): ba las rim pas bsam// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las mo yi dkyil 'khor dang // baM dkar chu yi dkyil 'khor te// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid// de steng bruM las ri rab 'byung // de dag phyin
208a7(rgyud): ngo bo nyid// de dag steng gi cha la yang // dbusu paM las pad+ma ni// sna tshogs pad+ma rgya che ba// lte ba ge sar bcas dbu sa// ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni// kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam// de dbus raM las nyi ma yi// 
208a8(rgyud): hUM yigs bon las byung ba// sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur// steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang // ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni// phur bu gri gug kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni// rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa
208b1(rgyud): lnga'i sngags// du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni// shin tu rgya che bsam par bya// bla re ra ba sogs dang ni// gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcing bya// me 'od 'bar ba khyang par 'gyur// 'di dag srung ba'i khyad paro// bruM las
208b2(rgyud): byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsigs bcu pa ni yongasu 'khor// de stengs raM l-is nyi dkyil 'khor// de yi dbusu hUM mdzad do// zhal gsum pag ni drug pa ste// rin chen klu dbang rgyan dang ldan// rol pas rnar sgeg par
208b3(rgyud): bsam// raM las nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dbus// de stengs hUM bcu rnar bsam// de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu// zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam// khro bo de dag re re zhing // phyogs skyong bcu po gdan la ni// bkug
208b4(rgyud): nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam// de la gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis// phur bus gdab dang brdung bar bya// des ni bla med mchog dag gyur// khro bo de dag rer zhing // brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags
208b5(rgyud): brjod// oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa// 'od ldan de las spros bsdus pas// bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab// 'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang // rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa// 
208b6(rgyud): gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi// 'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o// pho brang nang ma zlum po la// re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor// phyi ni pad+ma mu khyung bcas// de yi nang na e yi dbyibs// 
208b7(rgyud): drag po'i gnas bsam par bya// dbus ma'i nang du paM las ni// pad+ma nyi zlar bcas pa bsam// A li ka li 'dus pa las// de las na mkha'i sa bon te/ na mkha' las ni hU~M byung ste// gnyis med zhugs las 'od
208b8(rgyud): du zhu// de la rdo rje gri gug bsam// 'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las// skad cig ni sku rdzogs pa// nag po chen po bsam par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpa' bo chen po rol pas
209a1(rgyud): bzhugs// yab yum gnyi su med par bsam// de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste// sngags brjod pas ni dgyes pa bskyed// de las dkyil 'khor lha chags
209a2(rgyud): rnams// yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las// yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du// so sor tshogs bskyed pas la/ phyi rol tu ni rim gyis 'byung // dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas// rdzogs par phyung ste d+hA ti
209a3(rgyud): nas// gyen du thugs kha'i pad+ma las// 'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas lo// slar 'dus ring la thim gyur pa// dang ldan snying rje'i stobasu gnas// de las rim pa ji bzhin du// phyung nas so so'i gdan la bzhugs// gtso
209a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhir mkha 'gro ba ni// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ba ste/ garar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni// g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying // dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o// mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis
209a5(rgyud): bkang // sna tshogs pad mdapa la gnas pa// nyi ma la gnas ma gon po ni// shar du sku yi mgon po dang // lho ru yon tan mgon po dang // nub tu gsung gi mgon po dang // byang du las kyi mgon po ste/ 
209a6(rgyud): thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o// so so'i g.yon du yum re re// gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang // bzlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas/ 
209a7(rgyud): de yi phyi yi gru chad la/ bong 'dzin pa dang kha T+wAM ga/ gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin// so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o// de yi phyi rol sgo dang grar// lha mo brgyad po gar gyis
209a8(rgyud): rol// thad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ gar stobs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang // de nas gtso bo yang yum dag/ snyoms par zhugs pas 'od duzhu// de nas lha mo bani yis ni
209b1(rgyud): rdo rje chad med dbyangs kyi bskul/ e baM si ta u Da na nI bA dza ti d+ha ma d+ha mag+na ma g+ha ma e ka ma/ d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha re/ sa ni sa sa sa ni gams sas/ rig mo bu ma te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa Shi/ ma hA ma a d+ha ma sa sa/ shru tra ni sA sa
209b2(rgyud): sA/ sa ni sa ri tag+ha ma aM g+haM/ a ta ma ta ya/ sa swa pa pa/ ma ya a pa sa d+he na ma a i/ de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las// de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni// thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de// nag po gsang ba'i bu
209b3(rgyud): dang bcas/ shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas// spros pa dang ni bsdu bar mdzad// de nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad// sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing // yis gzhug dang dbang
209b4(rgyud): bskur dang // byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang // sngags kyis ba rtan ched bzlas pa bya// bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul// ting 'a dzin don bsam nyer bsdu bya// de nas ldang bar gyur pa na// gnyis pa lha
209b5(rgyud): rnams thaMd kun// skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste// de yi dang la ting 'dzin// gsang ba khyad par brjod par bya// rnam rtag bag chags kyis bcings la// rtog bdag pa'i thabs mchog ldan// 
209b6(rgyud): rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na// de nyid thob du med pa ste// bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung // chags pa med pas kun tu spyad// 'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa// rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang // de nyid shes la
209b7(rgyud): bcing med de// rnam par rol pa'i tshul mchogo// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad pa ba/ 
209b8(rgyud): gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang // bzang po'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di// rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya// re mig bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni// kun nas mnyan par dgod par bya// mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni/ 
210a1(rgyud): sde tshan rim pas le ba nyid// kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni// rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya// sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni// ha yi mgon gnas pablang // u s+sa Sha yi bzhi pa nyid// wa 'og gnas pa de nyid
210a2(rgyud): de/ sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang por ste/ pa yi steng na gnas par blang // an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/ ya ya~M steng ma yang dag blang // sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni// ma yi steng na gnas pa sbyar// sde chan dang ngo'i gnyis pa nyid/ 
210a3(rgyud): hi yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste/ Da yi 'og na gnas par sbyar// sde chen dang po'i bco lnga pa// d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi// zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya// sde tshan dang po bcu bzhi pa// de yi 'og
210a4(rgyud): ma'i yi ge la// dbyangs kyi bco lnga pa yin te// d+ha yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// de nyid thog mar sbyin bya yin// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa yi na// na yi 'og na gnas pa ste// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang // ra yi
210a5(rgyud): 'og ma sbyar byas te// tha mar 'byung ba'i drug pa ste// 'di ni yid sbyin nor bu ster// che yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og mi rnam bar blang // Ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya// ha yi 'og na gan
