232b6(rgyud): ma he dang rta'i 'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi ma la sa ti tsa'i khu bas bris te/ de nyid kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu'akhrug cing 'bye bar 'gyuraro// yang na bi ta na ra~M pa la trai zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i
232b7(rgyud): thabs kyis kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs te lusu bya'o// yang nas nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang nang du bltas pa
232b8(rgyud): dag bkod de/ phyi rol rgol ba'i phyogasu bskyal na ni myur du yul dang bcas po brlag par byed do// sha ra chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa mdun du dmig
233a1(rgyud): la pur bus btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyis pha rol gyi dpung g.yo ba dang bcas pa bzlog par byed do// gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnarang rgyal
233a2(rgyud): bar byed do// ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bkod de phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las
233a3(rgyud): a sho ka'am gi Da ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongasu rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byeda'o// rdo rje bya lhung gi phyag rgyas bcas la des klu non par byas na de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam
233a4(rgyud): 'i spyod kyis 'dul ba la nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thang du ltas chen po drug byung bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ar+tha ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa skam byed nas myur
233a5(rgyud): bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i glang du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyuraro// gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpel
233a6(rgyud): nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bstims te bzlas pa bya// dben par sbas nas gsol ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sa kun la yang srung bar 'gyur ba dang 'das pa la
233a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i don shes pa dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te/ nyal na lung ston pa 'am/ dge mi dge gsal po ston par 'gyuraro// yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam dar nag po la yang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bris
233a8(rgyud): te/ mchod pa dang gtor mar ldan pas// rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par
233b1(rgyud): 'gyuro// yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du byas te shes rab yong su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yong su 'dzin pa dang / blo yongasu dag pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur
233b2(rgyud): srung bas srung zhing bcings pa thaMd las yongasu grolo// gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos grub thang
233b3(rgyud): 'grub pa dang bar chad thaMd las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no// khyad par du yang gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thang du yis kyi nag po chen pos rje su skyong ba dang rgyang ring po
233b4(rgyud): nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad// 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang tshe dang dpal rab tu ster cing mi zad pa'i yis thob par byed ba dang / nyam nga ba dang bag cha
233b5(rgyud): ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing bdud kyi rigs kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing / skrag ste mgo 'gyes pa tsam byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar thug par 'byed par
233b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gang gis gtum pa dang dpa' ba dang drag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la rdo rje'i ting 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o// gnas kyi mkha' gro mdang po nya'i
233b7(rgyud): mkha'agro ma dang 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang dam tshig gi mkha'agro ma dang sha za'i mkha 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyuro// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro po nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang phrin las thogs pa med par
233b8(rgyud): 'grub par byed do// zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang / phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o// gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rna
234a1(rgyud): rgyal bar byed do// gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang 'dzin pa dang sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gang gnas pa dang rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par byed do// nye bar dgongs
234a2(rgyud): bas mkhyen par 'gyuraro// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad ba ba/ 
234a3(rgyud): gsang po mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas// drang srong thub pas yang dag bstan// nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa// rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i gter// ye shes mgon po chen po dang // las kyi mgon pa/ 
234a4(rgyud): dumar bcas// dang ldan lha mo nag mo ni// 'khor bcas dkyi 'khor bstan pa ste// sbrul ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang / yis lung bstan gyur pa yin// gdug pa rnams ni gzung ba'i
234a5(rgyud): phyir// mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// cho ga kun mchog gi sa rab sgrub// bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin bdag dadam pa'i bdag/ dpal he ru ka yi go 'phang gnas// 
234a6(rgyud): 'di la the tsom mi bya ste// sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mo 'gyur// rnam dag rnam pa can sems kyi// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// ma rungs pa ni gang dag gis// skyebo bcings par gyur pa gang // de nyid tha
234a7(rgyud): dang bcas pa mi'o// sbed pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyur// de ltar grub pa'i lam brtan cing // thun mang khyad por 'grub par 'gyur// dus pani dag tu gtor ma 'bul// bgags med bsod namam
234a8(rgyud): yel byed pa'o// 'di 'jig rke nga 'jig rten pas 'das pa 'di ma mis kyi mgon po bum dral kho da bcas parnams la gte ma dbus par byas+t+wa~M/ chen po dang chas pa gti ma bshes/ 
234b1(rgyud): la/ oM ba li ma Ni ra hUM \u0f7f/ rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha mi// kha kha khA hi khA hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA ba la~M/ ma hA bi Sha NAM pras d+ha la pra swa d+ha la hu lu hu lu phaT/ ga ba khA hi khA hi mA ra mA ra/ sar+b+ba ta sa na sa traM/ wA rA di d+hi ra pra yats+tshan+tu swA hA/ 
234b2(rgyud): AHhUM zhes pas mtshan byed na gtor ma sreg spos dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o// oM hAHka ha ka ha mA li ni mu khe yaM sA d+ha ya/ ma hA kA la bud+d+ha dza/ pra ti tai si/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ pra duSh+TAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra
234b3(rgyud): kha kha khA hi khA hi/ shrI g+h+ra~M/ da ha da / btsa ba tsa/ tu ra hu ra/ mar hUM phaT/ oM de ba liM gr-i gr-ih+Na/ shrI sar+b+ba oM AHhUM/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'thung ba'i rgyud las gsang 'grub pa dang gtor ma'i le'u
234b4(rgyud): sde nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // dpal mgon po chen po khros ba'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa ston pa// bstan bsrung nges pa
234b5(rgyud): gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen kho dngos grub 'thung ba'i rgyud kun gyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no// rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi
234b6(rgyud): mkhan po ma hA pa N+Di ta a b+hA yA kar gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po khe rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ se badz+ra tan+da rA dza nA
234b7(rgyud): ma yongs du/ kyai'i rdo rjenis bya'i rgyud kyi rgyal lo// khyo rdorjel phyag 'tsha'o// 'di ska bdag gis thos padus gcig na/ btsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gang dang thugs kyi sna
234b8(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje bdun gsang ba las shin tu ches gsang ba'ang / de nas bcom ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa
235a1(rgyud): / ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rdo rje snying po snying chen po legs leg so// rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' chen po snying po rtse rdo
235a2(rgyud): zhes pa ba nyon cig/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags// gang gis dam tshig sems dpa' lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs/ 
235a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod// sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes par brjod// ye shes chen po'i ros gang
235a4(rgyud): bu/ sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya// ga tu dam tshig la spyod phyir// dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya// rdorjesnying pos gsol pa// ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu// gang gis
235a5(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje lags// he yi rnams pas ci zhig bshad// badz+ra mi sa kyang de bzhin ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ni snying rje chen po nyid // badz+ra 'ang shes rab brjod par bya// 
235a6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang // don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang // rengs par byed dang smod pa nyid// sde rengs byed dang mngon spyong

235a8(rgyud): bya// da snying po sno che// ngos pa nyid kyis nam grol nang // ngos pa'i cing bas 'ching bab gyur// dmongs shes ngas grol ba dzin// das po me pa'ang yangs shes pas// dam pa rnam / 
235b1(rgyud): shes rab can// dngos po med pa yongs shes pas// de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya// lus la ye shes chen po gnas// rtog pa thad yang dag spangs// dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las ma skyes
235b2(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba
235b3(rgyud): chen po'i gnasu 'dzag pa'o// de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso bo ste// brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o// brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyi se rom yang dag gnas/ 
235b4(rgyud): kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams par spangs // brkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste// ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing // shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa// de ni kun 'dar ma rab

235b8(rgyud): rnams ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid gsum mongs gyur thams cad ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// yang na ma sems kyis/ das pa'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag rdzu
236a1(rgyud): nga'i phye ba'ang bshad par bya ste// A li ka li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thab so// chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang ni sku dang / gsung dang / zug so// e 'am
236a2(rgyud): ya ni// e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan/ baM gi rnam pa bdag mar brjod// ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo// ya yi rnam pas sgrol mar brjod// sprul pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chos kyi 'khor lo la
236a3(rgyud): mdab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la mdab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyiso// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par bzhag pa/ skad cig ma

236b1(rgyud): a tri kha hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no// oM pa bi nu badz+ra swA hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ kye rdo rje'i snying po'o// sngags thaMd kyi rkang par dang po oM gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swAt+ma/ hUM phaT gyi rnam pa ni nang du gzhugo// oM akas
236b2(rgyud): ta pa ya sha swA hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngag so// a A i I u U/ r-i rI/ l-i lAM/ oM ai/ oM oM/ aM/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sangon// oM trai lo kA k+She ba tu huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'i'o// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hu ts+tsha rtsa

236b7(rgyud): mtha' yas dor bzhago// de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po// skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po/ ldong ris kyis ni rdul chen ser po/ dur khrod kyi so pas

238a5(rgyud): par snying rje rnam sgom zhing // gsum par dga' ba sgom pa dang // kun gyi mthar ni btang snyomaso// yang ni stong pa'i byang chu ba ste// gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// gsum pa la ni gzugs
238a6(rgyud): brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// re pas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang // gur bcing ba yang rnam par sgom pa nyid// dang por
238a7(rgyud): ni rnam bsgoms pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas// he ru ka nyid rnam par sgom// rang gi snying khar ri pa sgom// de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni
238a8(rgyud): hUM gi rnam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// rdo rje lta ba'i dbus gnas pa// yang ni hUM gi de nyid sgom// hUM gi rnam par gyur bltas
238b1(rgyud): nas/ zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom// rdo rje skye banag po che// 'das skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog/ dad pas nges par rnam par sgom// namakhar rje bdun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skye
238b2(rgyud): snying rjerje// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod// dkar mo ri dwags mtshan pa 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma// g+hasma ri ni sman
238b3(rgyud): 'dzin cing // puk+ka si ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdul// 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid// 
238b4(rgyud): A li zla ba ka li nyi// sa bon nang du son gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin tsa na// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gi lus mtshungs
238b5(rgyud): rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying kar dkug pa na// yo gi zhe sdang ba dag nyid 'gyur// sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog/ ban du dmar po'i spyan dang ldan// sgra ser gyen du'akhyil ba dang // phyag
238b6(rgyud): rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// 'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa// 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags// sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul// g.yon na rdo rje
238b7(rgyud): bod pa dang // g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid// hUM gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas// dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa
238b8(rgyud): 'dis// dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod// phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste// gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang / sku mdog dang / hUM las byung ba'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po
239a1(rgyud): na skyes pa'i bod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje// phyag lhag ma dag gis shes rab la 'byung ba/ shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni bac+doMs kyi gzugs can/ 
239a2(rgyud): phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu dang po sngon po'o// gcer bu gong bu brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// dag
239a3(rgyud): g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa ni dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud dam la snyoms par 'jug pa/ bac+doMs
239a4(rgyud): ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o// lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad
239a5(rgyud): par bya'o// rang gi snying khar sa bon pas mo// sa bon las ni 'od zer nag/ po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thang spyan drangs la ma mo brgyad
239a6(rgyud): kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hi Shi ny+tsan+ta mAM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i
239a7(rgyud): bum pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rnga'i sgra babyung bar 'gyur// gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro// gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod
239a8(rgyud): par+yabya'o// rdo rje'i glu spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// 'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do// thun gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'i sgom pa nar
239b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas 'angs te lha'i gzugasu banago/ dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// ngo ngos gzugs med mthong ba po// sgra med thos pa po yang med// dri med snom pa po yang
239b2(rgyud): med// ro med myong ba po yang med// reg med reg pa po yang med// sems med sems las byung ba'ang med// skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// gar mchos ma rdo rje ma// gdol
239b3(rgyud): de bzhin bram ze mo// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// de nyid rig pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar// rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid// ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang // sa spyod me yis sdug
239b4(rgyud): bsngal byed// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya// rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid// des na phyag rgyar ba rjod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las// de bzhin gshegs dang rin
239b5(rgyud): chen nyid// snying rje chen po dam pa yi// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid// de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid// las ni chos mar rab tu bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram
239b6(rgyud): ze mo// rin chen gdol mar shes par bya// phyag rgya lnga rin rnam par nges// 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// dang ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing // de bzhin
239b7(rgyud): slar yang gshegs pa nyid// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya// rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing // mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// 
239b8(rgyud): phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs dang 'thung ba lnga rnams dang // phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sgom pa po med sgom pa'ang med// 
240a1(rgyud): / lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// sngags dang lnga ni yang dag gnas/ rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang // rin chen dpag med sems dpa' bo// tshangs pa 'ab 'jug zhi ba dang
240a2(rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid// thang kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de// bde
240a3(rgyud): brtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid// lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// 
240a4(rgyud): dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya// gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi// shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya// gang
240a5(rgyud): phyir skal pa ston pa yi// shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid// gtso blag ma dang bu mo dang // gar mkhan ma zhes brjod par bya// sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir// btso blag ma zhes
240a6(rgyud): de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni// bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir// shes rab gar mar brjod par bya// gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor
240a7(rgyud): brjod par bya// A li kA li rab brtags pas// brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad// rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// 
240a8(rgyud): sor ma nyid pa'ang de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni// gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji ltar pha las bde thob pa// de yi bde ba rang gis bza'// bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di/ 
240b1(rgyud): de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid// gang gis dngos grub mthu gro ba// kye'i rdo
240b2(rgyud): dngos grung rgyus// sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dag la rnacha bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin// lag po dag la lag gdug nyid// rked pa la yang ska rags nyid // rkang bar de bzhin dang gdub po// 
240b3(rgyud): lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste// bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu byed de// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste// kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang
240b4(rgyud): mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/ kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang
240b5(rgyud): na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru// sgom pa bzang por brjod par bya// cung zad drod ni thob pa na// gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na// 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa
240b6(rgyud): nying / shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// rang rigs dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod par bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi dngas med na// rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis
240b7(rgyud): bya/ mngan gzhan gyis rigs byung ba// byang chubs bon ga ba dang // sbyang ba yis ni brdung bar byo// gal te dga' bos gru blang ste// dri ma rdo rje mchog ldan no// gal te dga' nga skyes pan// thar pa'i
240b8(rgyud): rgyar na ga bya ste// de mo rdo rje dang pas gor/ gisogs mnyam par gnag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa// rnama'i bdag nyid dngagamed // mgul gyi grong ban chen 'das/ 
241a1(rgyud): lag gdungab rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas// kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa// glu
241a2(rgyud): ni rnam dag sngagasu gnas// gar ni sgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi byir na glu dang gar// yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byas// sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid // rga shis zil gyis mi
241a3(rgyud): gnon cing // rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin// rkun ma'i sgra los cod pan byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// thod pa sor lnga
241a4(rgyud): pa yi chang // byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yi ska rags nyis bskor nyid// thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas
241a5(rgyud): 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste// kha T+wAM ga sgom shes rab nyi nga// rdo rjerjod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'di dang bzlas dang sgom pa yin// brkas dang rmongs dang 'jigs dpa'o// ngo che'i
241a6(rgyud): 'bras bu rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs nas// the tsom med par spyod par bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad// skal dang skal min rnam spyad pas// de phyir sbyin
241a7(rgyud): pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'o// maud 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir// zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang // de bzhin btung dang btung
241a8(rgyud): min nyid// bgrod dang bgrong min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang // yang dag ye shes snang ba'o// mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir// grub pas bla ma mngon
241b1(rgyud): phyag bcal// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin po che'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yo gis rnam dbyad snying rje me// sbyin sreg mchog sbyin dka' thub 'das// sngags dang
241b2(rgyud): bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ldan par spyod pa byed// nges par sngon du lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu yin na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng+ge'i
241b3(rgyud): gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med// spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
241b4(rgyud): de nas tsA ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gang gis spun dang sring mo ra yang // the tshom med par shes par bya// gang zhig sor mo ga cig ston dang // gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon
241b5(rgyud): pa'i mtho bong bcangs pa las// bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar rnam par/ shes// gang zhig srin lag ster ba la// de yi the'u chung rnam/ par sbyin// gang zhig gung mo ston pa la// de yi mdzub mo rnam
241b6(rgyud): bar sbyin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa la// de yi mgrin pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi rtse gsum rab tu bsten// / gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan// 
241b7(rgyud): gang zhig so ni ston pa la// de yi kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// gtsug pud dgol bar brjod par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// de yi rgyab ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig rkang
241b8(rgyud): mthil ston pa la// lho yis rnam par rtse bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lam gyis ni// dam tshig gis ni rnam par bye// de la rnal 'byor mas smras pas// e ma bu ni snying rje che// gal te phreng ba'i lag ston/ 
242a1(rgyud): 'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin// phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na// dam tshig la gnos brtul zhugs pazang // de la phyi rol zhes 'dub// bzang po'i spyod yul gnas pa ni// de la 'dubar rnal 'byor
242a2(rgyud): mas// gang smras de ltar thams cad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang ge ba'i zhing nyid dang // tsAn+donya ba'i nIn+do
242a3(rgyud): de bzhin 'du ba nye 'dub// 'thung gcod nye pa'i 'thung gcod nying // dur khrod ge ba'i dur khrod nyid// 'di rnams pa ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon pa nyid// 'dis ni gzhan gyis brjed mi byA// 
242a4(rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ni dz+wA lan d+ha ra bshad// de bzhin du ni u Di nyid// gnas ni ko lA gi nI nyid// de bzhin du
242a5(rgyud): ni k+She nA nyid// nye gnas mA la wa zhes brjod// sin d+hu na gar nyid do// / zhing ni mu rmu nir bshad de// zhing ni byed pa'i bring nyid do// de wi ko Te de bzhin zhing // zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do// 
242a6(rgyud): te zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod// de bzhin a nu ta nyid dang // bA yi mchog sbyin khA ba ri // nye ba'i ning ni mdor bsdus pa'o// tsAn+do ha ri ke la dang // lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang // laM pa k+Sha dang kAn+ti nyi/ 
242a7(rgyud): de bzhin sau raSh+Ta nyid// nye bi'i tsAn+do ka ling ka/ gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni// kong ka NA yang nye tsAn+do// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// 'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang // 'thung gcod grong gi
242a8(rgyud): mthar gnas pa// tsa ri tra to ko sa la/ bin d+ha gnon nu'i grong khyer// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// nye ba'i 'thung gcod de nye ba'o// dur khrod rob son dge 'dun dang // dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do// 
242b1(rgyud): bskyed chalar brjing bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rdo rje// rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya// kye bcom
242b2(rgyud): nyi ma gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yi dwags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid// lan bdun pa'ang bza' bar bya// 'bad
242b3(rgyud): bas snying rje bskyed pa yis// bsad par bya bar brjod pa nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid// thams cad bdug par gzhug pa ste// cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya// de la 'ang
242b4(rgyud): ltar blta ba nyid// nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya// mi bya cung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin// 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi smra
242b5(rgyud): gang yang med// ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin pad gnyid ngo mchog nyid// 'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ bza' dang btung ba la sogs sbyang // yan lag
242b6(rgyud): snyed bsgyur ba dang // tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas// de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin// shrI ni gnyis med yis te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang
242b7(rgyud): bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// skye ba gang dang gang rnams kyi// sho ni mkhrab bza' bar bya// sems can de de dbang du 'gyur// brda dang gnas gtan la bab
242b8(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor mi'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// namakha'i kham su b+ha ga bsam// dbu su rnam por sgom pa ni// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar
243a1(rgyud): 'thung ba nyid// 'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngo// ji ltar rigs par byin za dang // lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgoms pa po 'byung ba'ang // chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid// 'bar
243a2(rgyud): ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te// gru gsum gyis ni phyi mar brjod// de dbus shing bco lnga yi// gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng dus
243a3(rgyud): bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// a li zla ba'i gzugs kyi gnas// kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do// zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las// dkar mo la sogs ra
243a4(rgyud): tu grags// zla ba me long ye shes ldan// bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni// so sor rtog par brjo de par bya// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// rdzogs pa
243a5(rgyud): chos dbyings dag pa ste// mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis// rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid// A li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las thung gong bu la/ 
243a6(rgyud): hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par sgom// phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab
243a7(rgyud): rang bzhin las// 'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// A li shes rab ka li thabs// 'di las dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// re shig nang gi 'bar ma la/ 
243a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar// chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor mo// lus ngan rdo rje mkha 'gro ma// dbus su bdag
243b1(rgyud): med rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol gyi ni 'bar ma la// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma// g+hasma rI dang pug sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyad pa Don+ti ni ru brjod// 'og ldan ma dang sbeng ldan cing // mkha' spyod mdang
243b2(rgyud): sa spyod brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas// lha mo thams cad kha dog gnag/ drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba dang // lag par gyi
243b3(rgyud): gug thod pas khyab// 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang // lag par lag gdub ska rags ni// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar
243b4(rgyud): thams cad rnam par bshad// lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga nyid do// stag gi lpags pas rnam dkris shing // ro la zhon zhing gzi
243b5(rgyud): brjid 'bar// phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser// nga rgyal la sog/ sa skyon drug rnams// gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni// 
243b6(rgyud): bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga/ thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/ 'dis ni 'khor lo rnams bsgoms na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ 
243b7(rgyud): dang por nag po rab tu sgom// gnyis par dmar po rnam par sgom// gsum pa la ni ser po sgom// bzhi par ljang ku de bzhin no// lnga par kha dog sngon po dang // drug par dkar po'i lus can te/ 
243b8(rgyud): yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyis chos
244a1(rgyud): 'chad do// bskyed pa yi ni chab shad// namakha'i khams ni pad+ma la// b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod// sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid// de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod/ 
244a2(rgyud): sngon du thung bzhu ba nyid// rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid// lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems// ji ltar 'thung po khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// re shig btsun mo shes rab yin// skyes bu
244a3(rgyud): thab su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las// byi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis// re shig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid// skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang // de yi khub
244a4(rgyud): bde ba nyid// de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid// bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis// skye med rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'di lta ra lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi// dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid// mchog
244a5(rgyud): tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges// de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig/ dga' bab de ba cung zad do// mchog tu dga' bde bas lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas
244a6(rgyud): chags bral yin// lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// dang po reg par 'dod pa dang // gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang // gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid// des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya// mchog
244a7(rgyud): tu dga' ba srid par brjod// dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi
244a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'di las thabs dang shes rab med// yang dag de nyid snang ba'o// gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni mi rnyed de// bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa yis// bdag gi bsod
244b1(rgyud): nams las shes bya// dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang // ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta// dman pa rnams ni phra
244b2(rgyud): ba'i don// mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya// dbum gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo// 'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de// mnyam
244b3(rgyud): nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa ni// mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod// de yi 'khor lo ro zhes brjod// sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid// 'dis ni don gyis
244b4(rgyud): brjod par bya// nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung // nga las gnas gsum po yang 'byung // nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong // de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes
244b5(rgyud): na/ shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nam sa chung ba'i mi yis kyang // de ni 'grub par the tsom med// / bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang // nyal dang log dang sems pa na// 
244b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'a gyur// gang phyir yid kyis mi sgom par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad chos ni yongs shes na// sgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min/ 
244b7(rgyud): brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang // rtsa lcug 'khril shing lo sogs pa// bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya// de rnams dam pa gcig yod min// rang rig bde ba chen
244b8(rgyud): bo ny-id/ rang riganas ni byang chu 'gyur// rang rigi phyir na gom pa nyid// rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las// mnan pa las ni las skyes te// 'jigs 'phrog cing rang gis byed// rang rig rgyal po chen
245a1(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag drog dang // de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid// de kun gnas ni nyams dga' bar// bcu drug char yang mi phod// chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// mkha'
245a2(rgyud): mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan yin// de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang du ma bral ba ste// skad
245a3(rgyud): cig gcig las mchog dga' ba// rang gi rig pa'i yis 'di// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te// 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir// kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang mkha'
245a4(rgyud): da dag ni// rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis// kun gyis skad cig mi gnod te// mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og gi/ skad cig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur// rang bzhin tshe yi rnam rtog gis// 
245a5(rgyud): gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang // de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas// srid pa dag pa 'i dngos grub min// yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig
245a6(rgyud): rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// gang gis mi shes kye'i rdo rje// de ni ngal bdon med 'gyur// chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'ang ba dang // mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar// rtag tu de nyid
245a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor mi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nges par
245a8(rgyud): dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas r-i ri'i dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya// phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/ skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga// rang bzhin gyis ni rnar
245b1(rgyud): dag / nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib byang bya// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i
245b2(rgyud): yul rnams dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po de kun dag pa ste// 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
245b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyiraro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom
245b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis gzugs ni gzung bur bya// sgrani rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ron tshor bar bya// dngos po lus kyis reg par
245b5(rgyud): bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya'ang dag bsten pa nyid// gzug sa phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod// 'du
245b6(rgyud): shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed rdo rje mkha' gro ma// rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnos// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grab 'gyur// / 
245b7(rgyud): nang gi 'phar ma'o// de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI// mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma// bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing // rlung du g.yung mo rnam par bzhag/ phyi ma lha mo dkar mo
245b8(rgyud): sogs// dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma// chu bdag phyogasu ro langs ma// lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI// 'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// bskyed pa'i rim/ 
246a1(rgyud): pa nyid kyi phyogs// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas// gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad// sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags// dri yi cha la ro langs ma// 
246a2(rgyud): ro la g+hasma rI rab grags// reg las spyod ma zhes bshad// chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid// bdud dag pa
246a3(rgyud): las zhabs rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid// rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan// sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pam zhes brjod// me ni gtum mar shes par bya// rlung
246a4(rgyud): ni g.yung mo rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma// 'dodagus mu yi rnal 'byor mo// phrag dog rdo rje mkha 'gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid // gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad // ni
246a5(rgyud): sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten la ching 'gyur ba// de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te// de nyid mi
246a6(rgyud): shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing // de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med// ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med// reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag
246a7(rgyud): rang bzhin dag par 'gro la 'gro bar shes// rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// cho ga'ang
246a8(rgyud): rab tu bshad par bya// dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang // 'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub se de'i khyim
246b1(rgyud): dang ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang // dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// rdul mcho dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am// yang na 'bras la sogs paso// 
246b2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang // the bong gsum ni lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug/ yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid// ji
246b3(rgyud): sring khu ba ldan gyur pa// de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhino// bsten pa de las gang byung ba// slob mi'i khar ni btung bar bya// ro mnyam slob
246b4(rgyud): ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la yang bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' ma/ nyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid
246b5(rgyud): mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chag sa bral rnam par 'dres// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// de nyid
246b6(rgyud): thad khyab pa po// thad lus la rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med do las byung // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang // rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul// skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang
246b7(rgyud): gso ba sems can dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po dga' bo tsam nyid de// gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga'
246b8(rgyud): nyid// gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni rdo snying po la sogs kun// mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur
247a1(rgyud): nas ni// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs// de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid// gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med// 
247a2(rgyud): bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa// rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir// the tsom legs par sel ba ni// 'dod chags med cing chag bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyuraro// 
247a3(rgyud): gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir// lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdag/ yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon// dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs/ 
247a4(rgyud): dang po sbyin dang 'dra ba yin// grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur// gnyid log sad par mi byed par// nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i// 
247a5(rgyud): phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs// grub ni yang dag 'bar ba nyid/ sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste// do shal do shal byed pas rgyan// phreng
247a6(rgyud): ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar rgyan// rdo rje srang bu mnyam par ldan// me tog sna tshogs nye bar rgyan// bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad la sogs pas ldan// de yang yal
247a7(rgyud): ka la sogs ldan// mgrin bgos kyis dgab pa dang // rin chen ldan yongasu gzhug/ rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin// rang 'dod lnga yi gzugs kyis ni// sar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu
247a8(rgyud): tshad mar mdzes pa yi// srad bus shes rab can gyis gdag// 'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum// dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas na
247b1(rgyud): 'dzin rnam par sbyang // gong gi A sogs sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir// srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba// rang gi dkyil
247b2(rgyud): 'khor cho gas sbyin// mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir// 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas// myur du dkar mo la sogs bri// shar du gri gug rnam par bri// lho dang
247b3(rgyud): nub tu'ang de bzhin no// byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni// bden bral rlung du rang de bzhin no// dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa// de lta de ltar 'og dang ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snyoms byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang
247b4(rgyud): byas te// phyag gnyis kye'i rdo rjer sbyor// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri ni ma lus/ sna tshe gas rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// hUM hUM skems pa byas nas ni// hi yin
247b5(rgyud): 'jig byed dag/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad// rnam dag yis gzugs can dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyad par cung zad yod ma yin// mtshig dgar sgom pa med cing sgom
247b6(rgyud): pa po'ang med// lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang dzin pa med// ga dang khrag kyang med cing gshang dang gci ba'ang med// skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang // chags med sdang ba med dang
247b7(rgyud): rmongs med phrag dog med// ser sna ma ngang rgyal med cing mthong bya med// skom dang sgom pa po med pashes dang dgra med cing // rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di
247b8(rgyud): skad gsol// gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi// lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni// ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// mkha 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rlom
248a1(rgyud): sems med pa'i rang bzhin dag/ thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i snang du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga
248a2(rgyud): la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni// sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur// bang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las// chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste// 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags// 
248a3(rgyud): bde ba na mkha' nyid kyi khams// lnga po rnams kyis yongasu bskor// gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de pir bde ba de nyid min// lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa// lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya// rang bzhin ldan
248a4(rgyud): cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ bya ga rgya rgyu dang bral ba las// yo go snying rje thab su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlas
248a5(rgyud): med dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor can ya nga med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med// de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'kho
248a6(rgyud): nyid// mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can// dbang gi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// // mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can// rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod// dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na
248a7(rgyud): gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i chal dgug pa nyid// steng nas kyang ni gzugs/ brnyan gnyis// dbus rengs pa'i lha spangs nyid // sna yi rtse mo'i dbus gnyis// 'byung ba nyid kyis
248a8(rgyud): ltung bar byed// rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid// zhi ba yis ni rengs par byed// rlom pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// dbang ni me tog rab tu grags// rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid
248b1(rgyud): g.yo bcas rdul rengs byed nyid// zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lha spangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni/ 
248b2(rgyud): mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya// bsad par 'di la bya ba yin// dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur// sems can slu ba spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam
248b3(rgyud): gyis ni/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de la dam tshig bza' bya ba// na dang ga ha dang po dang // mtha'i yi shwa dang dang po'i shA// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'// kyai rdo rjes
248b4(rgyud): gsungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon// dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa// lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// / skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang // dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang // 
248b5(rgyud): de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste// gong du
248b6(rgyud): brtag pa bcu gnyis par// rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu// hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo no// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ut+pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin// 'di ni bsgoms
248b7(rgyud): btsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 
248b8(rgyud): 'bum phrag gnyis kyi lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzog so// 
249a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// 
249a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang // sta gon la sogs byas nas ni// namakhar bzhugs
249a3(rgyud): nga'i sangs rgyas kun// sku gzugs snying khar rag tu gzhug/ rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa// rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM swA hA
249a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra dI pe AHhUM swAhA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM swAhA/ oM ba dz+ra naM we tre AHhUM swAhA/ sna tshogs hUM ni rdzogs pa dang // me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim
249a5(rgyud): pas// mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid// rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa// bsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub// khru gang
249a6(rgyud): dang ni khru phyed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin// khru do dang ni khru gang nyid// rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod// sor mo nyi shu 'am de yi phyed// bsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang // zhi bar kha dog dkar
249a7(rgyud): po 'gyur// rgyas par ser po de bzhin// bsad pa la ni kha dog gnag/ dbang la dmar por rab tu grags// dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ bsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs// zhi la til dang
249a8(rgyud): rgyas la no// bsad la tsher ma de bzhin// sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher mar brjod// dbang dang dgug la ut+pal// oM ag+na ye ma hA te dza sarba kA ma br-i sA d+ha kaH/ ku ru Ni kr-i ta satwAr+tha a smin san+ni hi to b+ha ShA
249b1(rgyud): me dgug pa'o// ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin// kye'i rdo rje khros mchod pa'i// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri// sAr+b+ba k+She ba pa rAn+t+raH sA d+hi ta gats+tsha ha d+ya b+hu ka/ A ga mi
249b2(rgyud): t+ya si yaM thA kA le sar+b+ba sid+d+hi ku ru Sha me// me dga' ba'i sngagaso// oM dzaHhUM ba ho// khar mchod yon gyi sngagaso// oM ni ri ti hUM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngagaso// oM d+hU dz+haiM l+le bshos kyi sngags// kye'i
249b3(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las brtags pa gnyis pa rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// na mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la// rgya mtshor drub ji lta bar// rang 'dod lnga yi
249b4(rgyud): gzugs las ni// sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med rnal 'byoraldan pa 'am// yang na he ru ka dpal brtson// gzhan pa'i sem
249b5(rgyud): kyis skad cig kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du sngags pa 'i sems// gcig tu mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i// 
249b6(rgyud): gnas ni bzang por nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dusu// bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma sgom shes rab can// yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs// rkang pa 'khrud dang
249b7(rgyud): za ba dang // 'thor 'thung so rtse za ba dang // tsan don gyis na lag nyed dang // smad g.yogs kyis ni rked 'gebs dang // 'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang // bcom ldan 'das
249b8(rgyud): ma bsten pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par sgom// gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang // 'dug pa'i sems ni ma rigs pas// dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub
250a1(rgyud): phyi/ mkhas pas 'thad pas mi gnaso// bsam gtan non mongs 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje snying po nga yis bshad// brtse bas dngos grub don du yang // rlab byed du lo su rtogs/ 
250a2(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yi gzugasu sems pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu ma chad par// sgom pas yongasu brtag par bgyis// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// 'khor bar thabs
250a3(rgyud): gzhan yod ma yin// rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas// 'dral du mngon du byed pa nyid// 'jigs myong bzhin sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba 'che ba dang // 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug
250a4(rgyud): / sgrub pa po ni nyan mi mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'thung bar // de ltar nges par shes nas ni// ji ltar de na skad gra kyang // rnal 'byor pa rnams dung bong gnas// mtshams
250a5(rgyud): med lnga ni byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang // haM/ zhan yang skye ba dman gang dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las/ byed dang // gzugs ngan yan lag ma tshang bas// bsams
250a6(rgyud): pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // bla ma la gus dbang po dul// nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol// des ni re shig nges 'grub 'gyur// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
250a7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig tu gsang la sbyang // ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par// gnang ba rnyed 'gyur sngags pa la// rnal 'byor ma yis bstan par bya// phyag rgya che ge ma
250a8(rgyud): khyer la// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// rnyed pa de yang mig sangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyan// sih+la ga pur yang dag ldan// byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang // dge ba
250b1(rgyud): lungs ma na// de ma chos ba s+ye// sa mi gzugs kyi sems dang ni// rlu tshig sems da gcig banyid// zla ba gcig gis nam ldan par // 'gyu 'di la sa
250b2(rgyud): med// mchog zong ba 'i bud me gang // rtog pabams cad yang dag spangs// mngan bdag gi nus pa yis// lha dang rgya min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin mi 'amachi las kyang // phyag rgya gug la rag tu sa/ de sa
250b3(rgyud): 'aspyod srung // bdag gi das mngon du'i phyir / gang bgang 'jigs pa'i gdugs pan gyi/ spyod pa mo sa spyod phyir ma gsus/ 'di ni gzhan ma gso'am mi/ nga gi sems ni ma sar brtag rdo ldeng pos gsol so/ 
250b4(rgyud): bdag mod rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// phyag rgya di ces ji ltar yod// phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag gis// phyag rgya'i ngos grub ji ltar 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bud be gzugs ni sngas
250b5(rgyud): nas ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugasu bya// num spangs pa po las 'gyu ro// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// be 'bru bo la can du 'gyur// lhag ma bdag nyid
250b6(rgyud): nyid chen po nyid// dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid // 'bad pa med par skyes du 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// 'chags dang 'jig pa
250b7(rgyud): ngag gis kyang // thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur// gong phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid// 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed// des na rab 'jig yod ma yin// de nyid la ni chags pa med// la la 'jigapas mig par phru/ 
250b8(rgyud): 'dzag pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom// spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas// spros pa nyid ni spros med byed// ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang // ji ltar
251a1(rgyud): par ma'i srid yin pa// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor nyid ni de bzhin 'dod// phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur bar// ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po// 'di ni de yi byin rlabs yin// gzhan
251a2(rgyud): las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser// bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar// bde ba ljang ku bde ba sngo// bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// 
251a3(rgyud): bde ba dngos po dngos med bde// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen brjod// rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste// bskyed pa yis
251a4(rgyud): ni ci zhig 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oMma'o byang chub sems dpa' che// dad pa'i shugs kyi sa rab tu nyam sa// lus kyi dngos med gang las bde// bde ba smra bar mi nuso// khya
251a5(rgyud): dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid// ji ltar me tog la gnas dri// me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyu ra// de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas// bde ba nyid kyang
251a6(rgyud): dngos med 'gyur// dngos dngos po med pa nga// dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga // gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad
251a7(rgyud): gzugs// sang+yas rin chen za me tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs// 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga // rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pang // 'jig rten ston pa bsgrub byang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga // lhan cig skyes
251a8(rgyud): dga'i rang bzhin nga// mchog dga' dga' bral dang por ni// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde tshan du// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byang cu
251b1(rgyud): ldan// khrang zhes bya'i rnam par gnas// de med pas na 'di rer 'gyur// bde ba med na mang 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bdeb// de phyir sangs rgyas ngos po min// de nyid
251b2(rgyud): meng rdul yang med// zhal phrag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin ldan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// 
251b3(rgyud): rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pashing // lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags pal bas so// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis
251b4(rgyud): ngo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sre'u bza' ba sbyin// bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis/ 
251b5(rgyud): rlung gis rlung la snun par byed // rnam rtog las ni nam rtog/ dag/ srid pa nyid kyis srid po dag/ ji ltar rna bar mu 'ug sa pa// chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed 'i gli dngos po
251b6(rgyud): rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges par sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tsheng bas tshig pa yang // me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa// 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya// skye bo ma
251b7(rgyud): bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam
251b8(rgyud): grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i snyam pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// 'byung sayi rang bzhin las// kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro
252a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bo la kakro la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags nyid// sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod// gang byir byang sems gsher ba nyid/ 
252a2(rgyud): gsher ba chu yi kham su brjod// chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir// zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin/ 
252a3(rgyud): 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko lar ni gang zhig sems// de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// pra dog don yod grub pa yin// don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid// bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu
252a4(rgyud): 'gyur// dga' ba na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha' ser sna rdo rje 'gyur// ser sna na mkha' las byung nyid// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon// rigs
252a5(rgyud): ni lnga po de nyid las// stong drug du ma skyes pa nyid// de ra 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar
252a6(rgyud): 'gyur// gang ga krung bcu'i bye snyed nyid// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams// de nas rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya// de rnams la yang 'bum
252a7(rgyud): brag rigs chen rnams// bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i
252a8(rgyud): sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams rgyud thams cad kyi// gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa// sdom pa
252b1(rgyud): dang ni dbang dang yang // de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa// de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// 
252b2(rgyud): e daM rnam par rab tu gnas// e baM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur// de rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
252b3(rgyud): bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid// e baM rnam pa ci zhes brjod// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e yi cha byad bzang po gang
252b4(rgyud): dbusu bgyis rnam par rgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi ni gan sa// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye bas bye ba nyid// dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur// skad cig shes nas bde
252b5(rgyud): shes pa// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang // rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pas// de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur/ 
252b6(rgyud): 'khyung dang 'o byed la sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par nyed par brjod// 
252b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid// rnam nyid dga' ba dga' bral nyid// mtshan
252b8(rgyud): bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni// dga' ba la sogs rim shes byas// dgod pa dag pa slob dpon
253a1(rgyud): cid // lnga bags nga ba de bzhin no// lag bsungs las ni shes rab nying // gnyis gnyis 'byung la de snang cing // sems can rnams kyis dngos grub phyir// dang ni rnam paran
253a2(rgyud): ru bshad// gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis// des na dbang zhes brjod par bya// shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu panyam sbyor bas// slob dpon dbang du
253a3(rgyud): rab tu brjod// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro// slob ma'i
253a4(rgyud): spyod yul dag tu bya// ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod// rjed parabyas nas gtad bar bya// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// phag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer// phrag dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'i
253a5(rgyud): slob mtshar gyur shes nas ni// ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin// kun// tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btang pa'i// slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya// bla ma phyag rgya ldan
253a6(rgyud): mthong nas// bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya// bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye// rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhad pa// mi phod phyag rgya sgrub pa po// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che// mnga'
253a7(rgyud): bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bying bskyabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim po'i bza' ba btung ba dang // ba la che mchog ma da na// bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang // dril
253a8(rgyud): bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis// 'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni// slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la// ston pas smras pa sems dpa'
253b1(rgyud): che// bde ba chen po rnam par zung // ji srid byang chub bar du ni// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma snying rje can mthong nas// rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras// 'di ni ye shes chen po nyid// thams cad lus
253b2(rgyud): la rnam par gnas// gnyis dang gnyi su med pa'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas// sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs kyis
253b3(rgyud): ni// rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes brjod// sangs rgyas
253b4(rgyud): kun bdag grong khyer la// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil ni snying po zhes brjod de// byang chub sems ni bde chen
253b5(rgyud): po// dang po mthar byed zhes bya ba// 'dus pa dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod// / 'khor lo zhes bya na mkha'i khams// yul la sogs/ pa rnam par sbyor// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// de yi bde ba
253b6(rgyud): shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang // dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang / 
253b7(rgyud): brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang // khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // pha rol bud med bsten par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyir srog ni semasu brjod// 'jig rten bsgral pa
253b8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba// brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags// btsun mo'i khub ma byin par// gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor thaMd kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yul de
254a1(rgyud): rnams kyang ci lags// dbang po ni gang lags/ skye mched ni ci lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ khams rnams de yang ci lags/ 'di rnams kyi rang banini ci lags/ bac+doMs
254a2(rgyud): gyis bka' stsal pa/ yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid// 'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod// dbang po rnams ni drug ste// mig dang
254a3(rgyud): rna bsna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yang // 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan// yul dang yul can dag gis ni// skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga na
254a4(rgyud): gzugs la sogs// mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che// dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid// rnam 'byor ma rnams go cha'i phyir// khams ni bco brgyad rnamasu bshad/ 
254a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bden min de ba zhin du// thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byo rams shes kyis// 'di lta ste// gtsub shing dang gtsu bstan dang
254a6(rgyud): skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol bas glo bur du me skye bar 'gyur ro// me 'di ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la yang ma yin/ skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te/ rnam pa thad du yongs btsal na
254a7(rgyud): gcig na yang yod pa ma yin pas me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no// de ltar chos thaMd rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje
254a8(rgyud): mkha' gro mdzad bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed// kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rje su chags par byed// bdud rtsi lnga'i ro yang 'thung bar byed// 
254b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje mkha 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa// rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ 
254b2(rgyud): bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur// rangs par gyur te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btong nas/ bcom
254b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gsung nyano// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang // bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing // khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni rab tu
254b4(rgyud): spangs// blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya// gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang po rnams ni mi dgag/ ba la thams cad bza' bar bya// kha dog lnga la
254b5(rgyud): mnyam par spyad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya// mdza' bo sdug par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid// rdo shing 'jim pa'i
254b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// g.yung mo gdol bko lpags mkhan// phyag dar mkhan sogs rag ring dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rmangs rnams// bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid// 
254b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang // dug dang nim pa bu bcas skyes// skyur dang mngar dang ska la sogs/ kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang // dring dri zhim mchi rnag dang // byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med
254b8(rgyud): ye shes sems kyis ni// mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin// rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa dang // lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis// bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung // snang
255a1(rgyud): g.yogs pa dog sna tshogs dang // ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin rgyan// me tog rab song gnas rnyed pas// mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya// de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ 
255a2(rgyud): thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis lngar gsungs na// nges par dbang po drug gi grangs// rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig la gti mug rdo rje
255a3(rgyud): ma// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma// dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir// 'dis ni go
255a4(rgyud): cha sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis nges gsung gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos la sogs mi shes
255a5(rgyud): pa// dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang // 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dge sapa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa// bcom ldan nges par gsung du
255a6(rgyud): gsol// dgongs pa skad ni skad chen po// dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru// rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis// khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// mdan chang ba la sha/ 'du ba ma la ya dzaM brjod// 'gro ba
255a7(rgyud): Ta ro ni shrA pa// rus pa'i rgyan ni raM shu// 'ong ba pre khaN ru brjod// cang te kr-i ba ta ru brjod// skal med du du ra zhes brjod// skal ldan ka liny+dza raM brjod// reg min Di N+Di maM zhes brjod// thod pa pad+ma
255a8(rgyud): b+ha dza na// bza' ba tri pi ta zhes bya// tshad ma mA la tin+ta naM// bshang btsa tu sa maM brjod// gci ba kastA ri zhes brjod// rang zung sit+pa re shes par bya// khu ba ka pur zhes brjod// sha chen shA li dza zhes
255b1(rgyud): brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje bo la zhes bshad de// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer// kha dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no// phyag rgya lngani
255b2(rgyud): bsdus pa nyid// g.yung ma rdo rje'i rigasu bshad// gar ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs// rang 'ched ma ni rin chen rigs// skyes gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// chos ma las kyi rigs nyid do// phyag rgya 'di
255b3(rgyud): rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khub rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung // rdo rje snying po sems dpa'ache// gsang ba'i sang ni mtshar che ba// nga yis khyod la gang bshad pa// de rnams thang gu
255b4(rgyud): bas zung // kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang // gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba// de yi dam tshig nyams par ni// 'gyur ba 'di la the tso ma med// 'che ba dang ni rkun ma dang // gdon dang rims dang dug gis
255b5(rgyud): kyang // gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad// mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed na// gal te tshig 'di mi smra ba// gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor ma// 
255b6(rgyud): de yi tshen khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng bzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje
255b7(rgyud): mkha'agro ma thams cad the tshom du gyur/ yid gnyisu gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das the tsom gsal du gsol/ spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad
255b8(rgyud): ga/ klu dang ga ni dngos grub sbyin// de la bdag ni the tso mi mchis// spu na ci lags gar kyang ci// lha'i le'u las gang gsungs pa// zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rna mas// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// gang
256a1(rgyud): gi bag rgya phyag rgya ci// sngags btub las gang gsungs pa// bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul par 'gyur// gang gi sa bon sa bon gang // rigs kyi le'u las gang
256a2(rgyud): bshad pa// bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kolpa i renI a bo lA mu m+mu Ni re kak+ko swA/ 
256a3(rgyud): g+ha Na ki piT ho bAdz+nyA i ka ru Ne ki a in ro lA/ ta hi ba la khadz+dza i ga Da ma a tA bidz+nyA i a i/ ha li kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i du d+hu ra badz+rI a i/ tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha ri sir+b+ba kab+hA ra lA i a ai/ mA la i
256a4(rgyud): an+d+ra Na shA liny+dza ta hi b+ha ru khA i a i/ po kha Na She Ta ka ra/ gar+N+Na shud+d+ha na mu Ni a i/ niraM shu aM ga tsa TA wI ti haM dzas rU ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya dzaM kun+du ru br-i Ta i DiN+Di ma hIr+N+Na bA dz+nyi a
256a5(rgyud): i// dran pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// he rugazugs kyis gar// chags bral min goms sems// kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis sgom pa nyid// rdo rje chos dang
256a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo yis// glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis// legs par glu blang gar kyang bya// 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs srung zhing // de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid// 'dis
256a7(rgyud): ni 'jig rten dbang du byed// 'dis ni sngags kyis bzlas pa nyid// gang du gus pas glu len dang // gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// de la dri ni mtshon par bya// 
256a8(rgyud): sgrog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri// ga pur ma la ya dza nyid// ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya// ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni// phyi rol tshal du mtshon bya ba// glu yi
256b1(rgyud): yi byin rlabs mtshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste// 'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya// rigs 'tshol sgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med cing sgrub po'ang med// zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma/ 
256b2(rgyud): gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid// chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab// phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha 'gro ma// zhe sdang phyag rgya puk+ka si// gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma// ser sna'i
256b3(rgyud): ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid// yang na dka mo 'i sdang las// gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+has rI/ 
256b4(rgyud): gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas ma kha' spyod ma// 'dod pas phyag rgyar shes par bya// A li dang po bdag med ma// A li gnyis pa rdo rje ma// A l-i gsum pa
256b5(rgyud): dkar mo nyid// bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha 'gro ma// drug pa buk+ka sI zhes brjod// bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma// brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod// dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo
256b6(rgyud): nyid// yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid// bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes bshad// bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod// bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma rI// bdu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma// bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma// 
256b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid// rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang // bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs/ rtsa ni gnyis nal 'byor ma// re rnam pa gsum du brjod// brkyang ma ro ma kun 'ad ma/ 
256b8(rgyud): bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod// gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas// 'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spangs// ci'i slad du zhe na/ don gyi bya ba mi phyed phyir/ bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub
257a1(rgyud): sem su 'gyur// bde ba chen po A la'i gzugs// rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// rnal 'byor ma kun las byung ba// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid/ 
257a2(rgyud): 'gro ba med btung mchog na mkha' nyid// ga pur nges par cis mi spang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems
257a3(rgyud): bskyed pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni// rang byin rlabs pa'i rim pas kyang // kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems ni rab tu
257a4(rgyud): bskyed// kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med ko la bde can// e baM rnam pa'i rang ba ni na du// bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir// bde ba can zhes rab tu
257a5(rgyud): bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje 'dzin ba rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di ni da mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya
257a6(rgyud): ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid do// 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das// rmongs
257a7(rgyud): phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam tshul can// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs
257a8(rgyud): mo// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyan// sngo bsangs ngal la rigs bzang ma// si h+la ga pur 'thung ba'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// sra bzang sgrub pa pa la dga'// de yi chang yang btung / 
257b1(rgyud): babya// de nas rang yang bdung ba nyid// rang gzhan don ni rab sbu phyir// phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo la kok+ko lar bcug nas// kun du du byed brtul zhugs can// der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i// gsu
257b2(rgyud): mkhas pas mi spangs ste// de ni lag tu mi blang zhing // nya phyis dung chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi 'chi lha yis blang ba nyid// ga pur nyid ni bdag med ma// bde ba bdag med tshul can
257b3(rgyud): nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las// de nyid bcom ldan
257b4(rgyud): shes rab ma// de ni ring min thung ba min// grub ni ma yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bde ba myong ba nyid// 
257b5(rgyud): de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur ra// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang // shes rab nyid
257b6(rgyud): kyis dpyad par bya// de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs// bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// de ni me long yas gzugs// mnyam
257b7(rgyud): nyid yis dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te// chos dbyings shes tu rnam dag ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag pong // de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma// chos kyi dbyings kyi
257b8(rgyud): rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos gsal ba// 'khor lo bskams pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol// sdos
258a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus// a yi rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched
258a2(rgyud): thabs chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis ni bstan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yangasu shes pa ni// 'di
258a3(rgyud): bu chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyad sprul pa dang // de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang // sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/ 
258a4(rgyud): skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// lte ba sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// gang gis bskyed dang sprul bye/ dpa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin
258a5(rgyud): to// chos kyi sku yang snying khar 'gyur// ra rnams drug gi gzug sa can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// mgron par longs spyod 'khor lo'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas// a
258a6(rgyud): rnam par rgyu 'thun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las// longs spyod skyes bu'i byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyidi// rgyu 'thun sogs par rab bya ba'i// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi
