258a7(rgyud): rlung gis bskul ba yis// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu 'thun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// las chung 'bras bu phye ba'i phyir// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ rnal
258a8(rgyud): 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// bskyed pa skyes bu byed pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid// chos kyi smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thaMd yod// 
258b1(rgyud): gang byir mgrin par kun bkur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas// bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod// lto ba gan su brjod par
258b2(rgyud): bya// skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi khru mchos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa
258b3(rgyud): a dang haM// skyes gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa a// bde chen gyi yang rnam pa haM// gcer bu sgra dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas
258b4(rgyud): nyid du the tsom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams yin// sems ca na sa bcu'i dbang phyug/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mo so gas pa'i lha mo thams cad la// 'di lta ste spyan dang / mA ma ki dang
258b5(rgyud): gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA dang / pan+d+ha raM khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la so gas pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
258b6(rgyud): tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing brgyal ba dang / skrag pa dang / sa la 'gyel ba dang / 'drar bar gyur to// yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas bslang
258b7(rgyud): ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa// sa dang chu rlung byin za yi// lha mo snod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa// de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu
258b8(rgyud): nye ba thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyi por gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs// de nyid bsal nas
259a1(rgyud): rgyas nyid// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bden pa yang ma mchis shing brdzun pa yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig mi
259a2(rgyud): shes 'jig rten pa// bcan du gzos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yis de nyid yongasu gcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // kye'i rdo rje rang la bsos nas/ 
259a3(rgyud): ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing // gti mug la sogs 'ching bas min// rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dwags
259a4(rgyud): byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang // bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa// rtag tu rang bzhin badre bcan// 'jig
259a5(rgyud): rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi'// gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med// gdol pa smin mkhan la sogs
259a6(rgyud): ba// gsod don don du sems pa po// de rnams kyi rdo rjer shes no// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// 'di yi 'grod pa mi shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar
259a7(rgyud): gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// kye'i rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas// gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba// de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// sa ni puk+ka sI
259a8(rgyud): bshad pa// gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid// suni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa// ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems spangs nas ni lus kyis ni// mdzes
259b1(rgyud): ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa// mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid/ 
259b2(rgyud): gtseb mi bskyed phyag rgyas no// ri 'od ma la phyag rgya rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni// gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur// debyir sems nigaN
259b3(rgyud): mug 'gyur// thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa// 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol ba ma// rigs te phyag rgya gzhan minan/ 
259b4(rgyud): ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ sha stsal pa/ gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa// khrag ni ro rin chen 'byung gnas nyid// drod na khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 
259b5(rgyud): 'dod chags sor sna phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gso la pa// gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de// don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid// don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la// ga
259b6(rgyud): bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni// gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te// de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas
259b7(rgyud): g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// sngar gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis// sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pas
259b8(rgyud): chom rkun mo// de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang // de yi rigs pas g+has+sa rI// me log pa las phyag rgya'o// kye'i rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor
260a1(rgyud): mam de la bdag med mas zhus pas// e rnam par zhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las// sems can rnams kyi srog srung byer// rdo rje sems pas gtor ma nganan/ 
260a2(rgyud): oM in+da dza mdza la dzaH/ b+hu ra ba h+ni d+da u rak+Sha/ n+da sut+ta mA da pA pA ta la pA tA le ar+tha sap+pa swA hA/ i daM ba li b+huny+dza dzi g+ha phulA d+hu ba mAM sa/ oM b+ha kad+d+ha sa pA sA da khan+ti khu Ni pe Da gA da/ oM akA ro mu khaM sarba drA/ 
260a3(rgyud): trAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM aHhUM phaT swAhA// gang gi tshe 'di'i gtor masal zung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te// de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang // lham
260a4(rgyud): rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// gam te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na/ dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i snga 'jigs pa dang / 
260a5(rgyud): bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas par yang 'gyuraro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod mo// gang gis phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngar
260a6(rgyud): ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus ni// sku gsung thugasu phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i/ 
260a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbusu rnam par gnas// sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can// steng zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can// 'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma/ 
260a8(rgyud): sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid// sems ni dbus kyi gnasu ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // bsha
260b1(rgyud): kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon// mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'thung // dpag med phrag dog rdo rje sems// zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni rim pas sgom pa nyid // rdo rje se la
260b2(rgyud): spangs nas ni// phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi// thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig nyid/ 
260b3(rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs
260b4(rgyud): bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// bdag med mas ni mgul nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la// bdag me da ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bco lngas yongasu bskor ba yi// 
260b5(rgyud): bdag gis 'khor lo khyod bshad na// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bdag med num b+ha ni mdzad nas// rdo rje thod pa stsal nas ni/ 
260b6(rgyud): lha yi nu ma mnyes mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa// do shal do shal phyed pas rgyan// mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje srad pus yang dag
260b7(rgyud): rgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las// khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzang ma// de la dbusu nga yod de// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu
260b8(rgyud): drug dag gis rgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal mdzad// nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas// kha dog nag po
261a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyi sbyi nal nas m+b+ha sgo zhing // thalangs lus la thugs pa nyid// bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gcis
261a2(rgyud): snyoms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs med pa'i bde bathog// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa la ni kun da mtshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i
261a3(rgyud): zhar ni gtsigs pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang nga // dga' bas shi na tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang gi phyogs phyung nas// 
261a4(rgyud): shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// cho ma rkun ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas lho yi sgo ru ni// chom// rkun ma ni sgo srung ma// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// ro langs
261a5(rgyud): ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni// bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas// dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug las// g+hasma rI yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni// 'jigs
261a6(rgyud): ba'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+ka sI yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas dbang ldan mtsham su ni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni srung pa'i sbyor
261a7(rgyud): ba yis// 'tshed pa'i mtsham su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtsham su gdol pa mo// rlung gi mtshamasu g.yung mo nyid// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khu bar 'gyur// sna tshogs klu yi
261a8(rgyud): mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyar bzhed mdzod// khyod/ 
261b1(rgyud): med na ni bdag 'gum pas// kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gtso 'jig rten 'gron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs
261b2(rgyud): sam ci// khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo bdeg zhu ba bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mngal ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyam
261b3(rgyud): pas snying rje rgyun chang ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang shar b+ha byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang
261b4(rgyud): zla ba'i ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// dgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba// snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yis/ 
261b5(rgyud): gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// aM dang hUM gis rdo rje che// khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sa la rdebs pa dang // lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad// gtsa
261b6(rgyud): baM g+haM paM shaM laM DaM// 'di yi sa bon phyung ba dang // bdag po'i sa bon dag gis ni// aM hUM sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po
261b7(rgyud): bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po// gtso bo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid// dkar mo g.yas na gri gug ste// de bzhin g.yon na ro hi ta// chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma
261b8(rgyud): g.yas ru sbal te// g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i smod// g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// prak+ka sI g.yas seng+ge ste// g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no// raM khrod ma/ 
262a1(rgyud): g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pas gsil byed de bzhin no// gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje cing // g.yon na bsdigs mdzu
262a2(rgyud): de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod// spyan gsum sra ni gyen du ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gaun+thi ladag nag por 'gyur// chom rkun ma ni btsod
262a3(rgyud): dang mtshungs// ro langs ma ni gser btsos bzhin// g+hasma rI ni mar gang mtshungs// puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mtshungs// ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo na mkha'i sngo bsangs ma// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa
262a4(rgyud): zhes brjod// tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzang ris// gau rI la sogs pa'i gdan// bo la gzhib par mdzad nas ni// dam du 'khyud cing 'o / 
262a5(rgyud): mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni// bdang / med ma yis sngags zhuso// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngag sa// de bzhin gdug pa bsdigs pa dang // klu rnams bsdigs par byedapa
262a6(rgyud): nyid// lha dang lha min rnam nyid pa// de ni nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo bde ba sbyin mayin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' lo// bdag gis gnan du ma bstan no// 'di yi sngags kyis gang byung ngong // 
262a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa// lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// ngo mi tshogs pas khyod la bshad// 'bar de'i phreng 'khrug pa yis// dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir// 
262a8(rgyud): thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid// bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang // skra ring ba dang bzang ba yis// kye'i rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya// bzlas pa'i bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag
262b1(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed// rigs byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// zla phyed thig les rnam par rgyan// de nas oM aSh+TA na nA ya bi ga
262b2(rgyud): un+da ke sha bar+tha ne/ tsaturbi sha ti na tA ya/ de'i rje su Sho Da Sha b+hu dzA ya/ kriR+Sha dzI nU tawa pu She ka pA lA ne kad+hA ri Ne/ At+mA trakrU ra tsit+ta ya an+dan du dr-iSh+Ta Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya k+Sha ra ya/ gar+b+ha ya ba
262b3(rgyud): sa/ ta trA ya/ tar+dz+dza ya/ sho Sha ma sho Sha ya/ sar+b+ba sA ga rAn/ ban+d+haSh+T+rIn+ta gAr+b+he ka gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na shahUM/ hah+na hi hrI/  hUM// ha~MheHphaT swAt+ma// de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// srung dang sku
262b4(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba las// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// de kyi la'i khor yid du 'ong ba zhus// de la ston pa ye shes che// / rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/ dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam gzhag pas
262b5(rgyud): nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad// 'phar ma gcigadu nga sgo bzhi pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dga'akhrugs// rnababs pa zhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srang bus mnyam par rgyan// re khA lnga dang yang
262b6(rgyud): ngag ldan// de nas bum pa brgyad po bri// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pa yis// dur khrod kyi niso phag gam// de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis// de dbus pad+ma mdab ma ni/ 
262b7(rgyud): brgyad paze bar bcas 'bri// snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid// mdog dkar ma ni gsum babri// dbang ldan du n-i shar b+ha// me yi mtsham su dge slong bri// bden bral du ni 'khar lo bri// rlung du rigs
262b8(rgyud): gyi bdag po bri// shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid// lho ru cang te'u bri ba nyid/ nub tu ru sbal bri ba nyid// lci 'phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rag tu grags/ 
263a1(rgyud): dbus thong pa dkar po yang // sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan bkri// de nas ma rgyal bum pa cing // yal ga'i rgya mogs bzung na// stong ri chen lngas gang sa// sa su skyes pas yongs paka
263a2(rgyud): bzhag/ mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor mog de bzhin bya// bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi// rigs ma bde chen brgyad pa nyid// do sha'i rkang gdub kyis rgyan
263a3(rgyud): nas// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang // ma yi spun dang sgyug mo dang // de bzhin pa yi sring mo nyid// rig ma brgyad
263a4(rgyud): du rab tu grags// dam du 'khyud dang 'o'abyed pas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// de las ga pur btung ba nyid// des ni dkyil 'khor btang gtong bya// de rnams rnal 'byor pas btung ba/ 
263a5(rgyud): dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de la chang yang ba/ nga ba dang // sha dang sa lu skyes pa bza'// de yang / sa dang bral byas nas// b+ha ga ra'i ni yang yang byed// des kyang po la ba no
263a6(rgyud): par bya// gar bya glu yang blang bar bya// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya// de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la// gos kyis mig ni bkab nasu// der ni slob ma gzhug pa nyid// phyi nas dkyil
263a7(rgyud): 'khor rab tu bstan// mtshan mo skye bo med khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas// dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar mchod dang bstod pa// slob ma bzang
263a8(rgyud): po sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan pa ni// dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can// thams cad chud du sbas pa ste// mtha' yi mtha' yis bye bo nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas// de la lha mo des
263b1(rgyud): zhus pa// lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags// gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ni mchog tu
263b2(rgyud): bde chen nyid// bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid// longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la// rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// de ni rnal 'byor pa yis bcir/ 
263b3(rgyud): de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhen// gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta 'am// lkugs pa'i rmi la mji lta ba'o// mchog gi mtha' dang dag 'bral dbus// stong dang nga min he ru ka/ rje
263b4(rgyud): rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // lha mo lani dma' khyud cing // bo lathod par bcug nas ni// dam du num gzung mdzad nas// skyes
263b5(rgyud): pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma ma chu btsir nas ni// mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de// mnyam sbyor bde ba myang mdzad nas// phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba// bla ma slong dpon 'dod lha la/ 
263b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// smon tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir// rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin// sngags kyis bzlas pa'ang mgul rgyan nyid// gdub bu srog chags gsod
263b7(rgyud): pa spangs// phag rgya sten pa ske rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab// de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas// tshems kyis ma mchu bcir nas ni// kye'i rdo rje zhes
263b8(rgyud): bya ba// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid// de la lha mo des nus pa// gtso bo cho ga gang gas dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni// kye'i rdo rje'i bris sku yi// byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs// bac+doMs
264a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can// sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni// bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid// skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga// ro yi sgra yi pir nyid kyis
264a2(rgyud): bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid// gang gang skud pa mkhal ba dang // gang gang ras yug thag pa yang // de yang dam tshig can nges pas// dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor las// zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi// bcu bzhi pa la
264a3(rgyud): khyim dben par// phyed nam rungs sems kyis ni// chang gi btung ba cung zad las// lus la ni raM shu bsams nas// de bzhin gcer bur gyur pas kyang // 'phags pa dang ni ma dag pas// de nas dam tshig rab tu
264a4(rgyud): bar// bzhin parang snying rje ldan pa dang // gzugs dang yang man lnga bzangs/ mi tog pacas shing sgrub por dga'// rang gi phyag rgya gzhon du bdag/ kye'i rdo rje las bris rgya mo ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
264a5(rgyud): de nas de la lha mos zhus// bo la kAk+ko la sbyar nas// tshem/ sa kyi ma mchu btsir nas ni// glegs bam yang ni ji ltar la// gyur// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yis rab bye ba/ 
264a6(rgyud): glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon// sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni// mi yi rus pa'i smyug gus ni// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa// gro gar dam tshig can gyis bri// glegs
264a7(rgyud): bam dang ni bris sku nyid// gal te skal med mthong na ni// skye ba 'dir ni dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol spyod yul me da// yang dag rab sbyin ldan pa la// ras 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid// glegs bam
264a8(rgyud): lam gyi spyod yul du// sgra dang mtshan khung nyid du swa// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas// yang dang yang du'o mdzad nas// bde chen mnyam par myang mdzad de// rdo rje can gyis bza' ba bstan// tshogs kyi dkyi
264b1(rgyud): 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cig lha mo mig yangs ma// gang du zos pas 'dod don kun// sgrub pa can gyis dngos grub 'gyur// dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs dang // de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang // yang na dben pa'am rgya mtsho
264b2(rgyud): mtha'// brda' ba 'di ni rab tu brda'// de la gdan du brtag pa ni// ro yi gzugs can dgu dang ni// yang na stag gi lpags pa dang // dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no// dbus kye'o rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngur
264b3(rgyud): bzhin gnas shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang // de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// dam tshig mA la tin+ta naM// stag gi lpags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bad nas rgyal po'i sa lu yi// bza' bder
264b4(rgyud): ni bza' ba nyid// der ni bza' ba zos nas yang // der ni ma mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo rgyug mo dang // gal te ma srid// yin na yang // de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil
264b5(rgyud): 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// skyes pa'i thod chen ma gcig par// chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste// bla mA la dbul skal chen ma// phyag mtshan nas ni rang yang btung // pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang // de nyid
264b6(rgyud): kyi ni lag pas dbul// yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar bsgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa// phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu/ 
264b7(rgyud): kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bde ba sbyin pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min thung ba min// gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min// pad+ma'i mdab mi'i rnam pa'ang / 
264b8(rgyud): de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul kyang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te// ri dgas lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri// skad cig pad+ma lta bur 'byung // de yi ga pur sih+la dag/ mkhas pas dri
265a1(rgyud): bzang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ga ru ni nag po mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang // snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma// skra bzang dbusu gnyer ma gsum/ 
265a2(rgyud): phal pas pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma// de snyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par
265a3(rgyud): bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigasu skye dang dam tshig can// skyo med kyi'i rdo rje ston// bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ lag pas rdo rje dril bu' khrol/ 
265a4(rgyud): zang mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can// / skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ de nas lha modo dgyes nas// tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa// skal med sems can gdul dka'
265a5(rgyud): ba/ gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid// de la bye brag smra ba bstan// 
265a6(rgyud): mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid// de yi rje su dbu ma bstan// sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas// de rjes kyi'i rdo rje brtsam// slob mas gus pas blangs nas ni// 'grub 'gyur
265a7(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med// kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos
265a8(rgyud): grub thob 'gyur ba// bsgrub pa'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la// brtul zhugs can gyis lag pas gdon// he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas
265b1(rgyud): kyang ni nges par 'jig/ bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla ma thub pa la zhugs nas// snying rjes bsad par bya ba nyid// ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas// khrag ni skyug pa nyid
265b2(rgyud): dang yang // 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang // kha ni 'og tu rnar sgom// de yi lam du khab ni me'i// gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste// snying khar byin za'i sa bon nyid// dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed/ 
265b3(rgyud): rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med// phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po// srid pa sbyong pa
265b4(rgyud): nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshang bya yis// nyon cig/ lha mo bzhin bzang ma// rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi// phreng ba'akhrugs pa lha mo ltos// ma phug pas ni sbyor bral
265b5(rgyud): 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa po// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// ma dag pas ni dug du 'gro/ dag pas bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa he
265b6(rgyud): ru ka// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyid// gang gis gzugs kyi 'gyur ba nyid// de ni nga yis smra yis nyon// snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la// byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/ bsdu ba'i dngos
265b7(rgyud): po bzhi yis ni// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// phyag ni stong pa bcu drug nyid// gug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo nyid// shan
265b8(rgyud): puk+ka sI ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma// gdol pa mo ni khu bar brjod// g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dang // lpags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid// bdag med mas
266a1(rgyud): gsolag/ sngags btab ni ji ltar 'gyur// gang gi sngags kyis skye bo mi// las kyi dngos 'grub 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po ga
266a2(rgyud): brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni khyod langs bshad kyis// lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa las// puk+ka swas rgyan stong pas mnan// mdog dkar
266a3(rgyud): mthar ni swA hA sbyar// 'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni// 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yi ge'i bdag po bzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas// mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang
266a4(rgyud): dbang du byed// rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin// dang po yi da ni gnyis pa la// stong bcas mtha' ni swA hA byug/ sangs rgyas kya bstod shes rab can// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa
266a5(rgyud): yi ni gsum pa la// ra dang ldan zhing chu mas rgyan// stong bca sa swA hA yang dag ldan// mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed// dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug bzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong
266a6(rgyud): pa mkha'agro ma dang ldan// mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod che// yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin// hUM ni khrag dang 'dra ba la// mthar ni swA hA thig le mchog/ dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs// gti mug rig
266a7(rgyud): ni dang por sbyin// g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni swA hA yang byas na// lha dang ma rnams gsod par byed// dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ dang po nyid kyi dang po la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dang sbyar// mthar
266a8(rgyud): gnas pa yi gnyis pa la// rdo rje mkha'agro ma dang ldan// yang ni dang po'i rtse mo la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan// steng du chom rkun ma yis
266b1(rgyud): rgyan// de rjes hrIHyis rnam par sbyar// mthar yang swA hA spyod pa nyid// ku ru kul+le yi sngagaso// oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis rgyan// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// pi tsu badz+ra sbyar
266b2(rgyud): ba dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// puk+ka sI yis rnam par rgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yis ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o// snang mdzad dang
266b3(rgyud): bor dz+wa la gnyis// sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// g+hasma rIs ni rnam par rgyan// uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yis rgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum
266b4(rgyud): 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i// dang po mthar swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i sngagaso// dang por rnam snang dang po yi// dang po nang gi dkar mos rgyan// gsum pa nyid kyi
266b5(rgyud): dang po la// nang gi dbang mos rnam par rgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis rgyan// hUM gi rnam par gsum sbyar nas// lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang // gsum
266b6(rgyud): pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// phyag drug pa'i sngagaso// dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi// dang po byin za yang dag ldan// ro langs ma yis rnam par rgyan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// g+hasma rI yis rnam par
266b7(rgyud): rgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // rdo rje ma yis rnam par rgyan// k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis rgyan// lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yis
266b8(rgyud): rgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te// phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngag so// bdag med dang po'i dang po dang // gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang // gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang // bzhi
267a1(rgyud): pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi dang po nyid// dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA// grong khyer dkrugs pa'i sngags kyi
267a2(rgyud): bzlas pa ni 'bumo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // kA yi rkang pa gnyis 'gyur nyid// hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan// dang po rnam snang phaT nyid kyi// rnam pa nang bcug mthar swA hA// sa sbyong ba'i
267a3(rgyud): sngagaso// dang por rnam snang de rjesu// rdo rje mi yi mtha' ru hUM// bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid// de rjes a kA ro mu khaM// uSh+ma rnams kyi gsum po dang // 
267a4(rgyud): mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni// steng du me yis rnam par rgyan// d+harmA/ NAM de rjes rdo rje ma// byin la d+ya nut+pan+na tAta// oM A hUM pha/ Ta swA hA// 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor mi'i sngag so// 
267a5(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas chom rkun sdom cig pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs// bdag med me la'o mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye// 
267a6(rgyud): shes gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid// lung btang gis ni mngon spyod nyid// ni raM shus ni sdang ba la// rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid// bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa nyid// glang
267a7(rgyud): po'i rus pas char pa la// ma he yis kyang bsad pa la// rengs pa 'o ma'i btung ba nyid// dbang la rang gis 'dun pas spyad// bsad pa la ni sih+la nyid// dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid// sdang la sa lu
267a8(rgyud): skyes pa brjod// bskrad pa nyid la gla rtsir brjod// yang na mtha' shA dang / dang po'i shwa dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no// kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// 
267b1(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni// 'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad
267b2(rgyud): gsungs// lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon// bud med dam ni skyes pa yis// gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la// rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid// 
267b3(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid// rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid// las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang nag po nyid// de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa/ 
267b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che// de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// rnal 'byor pa grang sngo bsangs che// de yi lha ni don yod nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che// rin chen bdag po rigs kyi la// rnal
267b5(rgyud): 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid// 'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha// rnal// 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rig su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas// nga rgyal mi
267b6(rgyud): gcig thob mi brtsam// kun rdzob gzugasu gnas nas ni// de rnams bde gshegs rigasu 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di// ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni// 
267b7(rgyud): de yi rig su'ang de 'gyur// b+ha gar ling gi'i 'o mdzad nas// de la rdo rje che mnyas nas// bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa// lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // bdag gyi khyim gyi
267b8(rgyud): nang du yang // gcer bur phyag rgya che byas nas// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchog/ 'odang 'khyud pa byas nas ni// de bzhin b+ha gar reg par nyid// skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa nyid// ma mchu'i sbrang rtsib tu
268a1(rgyud): panyid// rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las// bol ldan pas lag pas bya// phyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin shin tu bskal payis// yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya// steng du 'on/ 
268a2(rgyud): tu blta ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la ga pur btung bar bya// de la ga pur rgyu ba'i phyir// sha ni bza' ba nyid du 'gyur// khyad par du ni tshad nyid do// kye'i
268a3(rgyud): rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang // bani pi'i don ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// cha dang dril bu chen po zung // de ri
268a4(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyur// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis// ji da ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gis gsang ba'i dpung gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyi
268a5(rgyud): dbang bskur to// lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// snatsho gas gzugs can yid 'ong ma// khyer cig khyer cig sems dang 'tshe// khyer la mchod pa dag tu gyis// yes 'di ni ches phra zhing // rdo rje
268a6(rgyud): na mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul bral thar pa zhi ba nyid// khyod rang yang ni de yi pha// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni// oM pad+ma su khA d+hA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM dad tsa tu rA nan+da swa b+hA ga bi shwa hUM d+hUhUM
268a7(rgyud): kAr+yaM ku ru Sha me/ oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nan+da dA ya kaHkha ga mu She ka ra sa nA tha hUM hUM hAM kAr+yaM ku ru Sha me/ oM AHhUM// spyi bor ni oM gyi rnam pa// snying khar hUM gi rnam pa// ze 'bru li ni A'i rnam pa'o// 
268a8(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogaso// / rgyag
268b1(rgyud): gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yis kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya DA ki ni badz+ra bany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza ka mA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
268b2(rgyud): 'phags pa mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang // go skabs med dang 'byid pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi
268b3(rgyud): gnas khang // sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang // sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang // sa dang sa 'og bar snang dang // yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang // drug sa
268b4(rgyud): dang drug gnyis dang // bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams dang ni// ga cig gis nyi shur mtshangs dang // khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni// pha dang bu dang ma mo dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang 'am// btsun
268b5(rgyud): mo kun dang chos dang ni// thams cad las dang bdag med/ dang // 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba nas// bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdorje dang // de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang // chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung
268b6(rgyud): dang // nam kha'i khams dang rang dbyings dang // bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang // dngos pa rang dngos med mon// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang // a skyes dang ni skyon dral dang // rdul grol dang ni sdig
268b7(rgyud): bcom dang // dpa' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang // gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la// sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni// mkha'agro ma yi rdo rje gur// 'di ni
268b8(rgyud): rang byung bcom ldan 'das lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // 
269a1(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid// bad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // nu bdun rgyal po lnga po'o// rdo rje mkha 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dkar mo rkun ma ro langs sa// g+ha sA nI dang puka sI/ 
269a2(rgyud): ri khrod gdol pa g.yung mo'o// rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// skam pa nags banyi ma dang // dos thum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin// me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje'i ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 
269a3(rgyud): nyi lag ma dang mar me dang // rin chen sgrom grog lag ma// lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma ches 'byung lcags sgrog dang // 'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// gling bu mo sogs mtshams kyi char/ 
269a4(rgyud): bdag nyid ma byang sbyor bas// rta 'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdorje sgo lcags sde kyog ma// sgom dang ni gos 'dzin ma// de bzhin mtsham sa spyan la sogs// rdo rje mkha 'gro de rnams kun// rkang pag
269a5(rgyud): pa brkyang bas gnas// snying khar g.yon bcas bsdigs mdzub ste/ kha dog sna tshogs che 'bar ba'o// shin tu 'phe che// gau rI la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu gti mug rmongs chen
269a6(rgyud): las// skams pa ma sogs cher gzung // shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu 'dod chags chen po las// pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phra dog chen po
269a7(rgyud): sgrib chen las// sgro lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni// gti mug thaMd zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che// rnar rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni// 
269a8(rgyud): 'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro phrag dog che// theg pa gzhan ni rnar spangs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mi bskyod yis 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro mi zad 'gron gnyer
269b1(rgyud): phyir// sgrib pa lnga ni 'jom pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams// bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la/ 
269b2(rgyud): rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin// shin tu gdug pa drag po la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// 'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni// rang gis kye'i rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi// yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin
269b3(rgyud): rnams kyi// sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du// rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// shin tu nga rgyal gdugs rnams kyi// skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal// 
269b4(rgyud): rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms// byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs// sems can gang zhig bde byed pa// chags pa sa byang chub rab grub phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
269b5(rgyud): gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i las gnas shing // gang zhig lom gzhan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid// 
269b6(rgyud): de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gang dang gang gis dngos pa yis// skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la// des na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// sna
269b7(rgyud): tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam pa yis// chos kyi bshad du bya ba'o// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i// sems can sna tshogs
269b8(rgyud): rang bzhin can// sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis// skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas// de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas// sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang // sems dag pa ni bde ba yin// son mongs dug ni zad 'phrog// ga
270a1(rgyud): te stong bzabs yin na// de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir// thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin// lnga ba rnams la log rnams kyi// bdag tum
270a2(rgyud): rnams kyi// bdag zhen bsam pa bzlogs pa'i phyir// stong ba rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes// thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste// sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/ 
270a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo depe byad brgyad cur ldan// de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub pa dang // de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no// thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog
270a4(rgyud): tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje khams gsum thong // rnal 'byor mo ni rdo gur// dam tshig mchod dang yid 'ong ba// 'khor la rab tu bka' stsal pa// rgyun
270a5(rgyud): rdo rje can la dbul// gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul// hi rA mchog la de bzhin dri// 'jig rten rje la bza' dang / btung // gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la// 'di rnams dam tshig
270a6(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yin// rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed// a ga ru gnag kyi rdo rje// phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar// dmar po 'jig rten rje la 'bul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal
270a7(rgyud): po thams cad te// hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri// 'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob po// tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul// mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la// sbyar ba rdo rje nyi ma la// de bzhin lan cha
270a8(rgyud): 'jig rten rjer// rta mi rgyal po thams cad dam// ngargal pa rab tu brtag par bya// kye'i rdo rjerje can gyis// me tog mdog gnag rkang 'jung byung // ma l+li k+Sha dang ma'i ti// kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas
270b1(rgyud): 'dul// shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog/ snang byed la ni sbyor bar bya// dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang // than d+hu dmar po btalang // pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul// rtamachog rdo rjenapa
270b2(rgyud): kun// rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bzhi ga// snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid// pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste// sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun// bza' ba rjorje ma 'i// lam
270b3(rgyud): du lcags kyu mchog gi dang // gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi// shin tu 'dra la gar dbang gi/ glu ga ringade bzhin ro la mo'i sgra// sa gni yongs gzung dus ni// rdo rje'i gzugasu banag rnams/ 
270b4(rgyud): bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrug// rdo rje'i dbang po sde na po ste// zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi// mkhar byin skyes de'i me tog dmar// pad+ma demir po spyan ras gzigs// rta ma ya
270b5(rgyud): ma ra ka ta ste// rin lnga'i rdul gyi rdul tshon mchog/ de na sa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin la bzhug so// dam tshig yang dag rab phye ba/ 
270b6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/ dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od// phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste// mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus// dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste// g.yas pas rigs kyi
270b7(rgyud): bdag po nyid// lag pa g.yon pas mi lpags nyid// gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas// cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed// mgo bo
270b8(rgyud): phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste// mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni// ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// 'thung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang // gnod sbyin mo dang / 
271a1(rgyud): mo dang / mam 'i mas ni// klub po mas sa par gru/ oM r+dz+nyAta ya rA d+hA ba rdo nasas/ khre A d+hu yA/ den na pa
271a2(rgyud): ma' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ti 'dzin la 'azhugs// tshor chen rab tu dab bya ste// pad+ma na dpe ma brgyad pa bsam// de ni klu ba rgyad dgod par bya// stobs pa che ni ba sbyar bas// de rnams rngam
271a3(rgyud): yang dag mnan// char med stobs po chel ni// mu'i tshogs ni dbab par bya// kha dog gnag cing cher gsal ba// 'jig pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// phyag brgyad nal ni bzhi pa ste/ 
271a4(rgyud): rdo rje gdan mdzad pa// phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams// du zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlos shing // hUM dag nang du chud byas te// phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya// dang po'i zham
271a5(rgyud): neg po ste// gnyis bzla 'od bzang po nyid// gsum pa ser po'i mdog lta bu// bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan// rdo rje sems dpas rnam par rgyan/ 
271a6(rgyud): klu rnams kyis ni tshar dbab phyir// stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o// 
271a7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang // ri dwags rgyan pa zos pa dang // rdo rje chu'i thung nor ldan pa// sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig pa// dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba// rdo rje rin chen
271a8(rgyud): kun khyab po// gang gyur nga yis bshad par bya// phan pi'i grong khyer yi 'ong bar// mkha 'gro rdo rje lu gu rlud // zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun// lcags smrig rdo rjes bcing ba bya// dgar/ 
271b1(rgyud): ldan du ni ldeg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thog// rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni// ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rgyal po'i tshogs rnams
271b2(rgyud): bcings par bya// gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na// sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya// rdo rje kyob dkar mo tsho// rdo rje zhags mchom rkun ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs ma// rdo rje dril bu g+haswA rI/ 
271b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed// bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal te mi ster na// de tshe mkha'agro ma bzhi yis// sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul sgrub// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal
271b4(rgyud): ngo mkha 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum// rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bu mo// 'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi/ 
271b5(rgyud): 'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o// 'bum phrag byed kyis rdo rje ste// 'byung po' dul ba stong phrag lngas// lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa// lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid// stong phrag sum cu
271b6(rgyud): dag gis ni// ku ru kulpA brtag pa'o// lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni// cho ga'i rim pa rgyud kun gyi'o// rdo rje mkha 'gro kye'i rdo rje'i// 'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin 'ad+mo dang ldan pa mkha
271b7(rgyud): 'gro mardo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting 'dzin la bzhug so// gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i// sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo
271b8(rgyud): yis// 'od chags can gyis byang chub sgrub// de nas rdo rje can 'thung ste// me tog snyim pas rab sbyor bas// sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i// dam tshig der ni bshad par bya// sems can ji snyed pa
272a1(rgyud): rnams sems can du rtsubs bsdus bzo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngalas su skyes pa'am/ rdod ga shengasas skye smra ba'am/  / skyes smra/ gzus can rnams
272a2(rgyud): gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'bang la dgod par bya'o// dam
272a3(rgyud): tshig che bshad de nas ni// zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung ste// mi bskyod ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i// ston pa la ni rnam par smod// ci khyod dam tshig hU~M zhes bya// thub pa chen po gnu can yin// da ming
272a4(rgyud): snying rje'i stobs dang ldan// bdag stobs bcom pa mi/ na namatsho// ci khyod dam tshig oM zhes bya// khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams// dming rnam par snang mdzad dbul// khyod ni mi bcom
272a5(rgyud): 'dod pa bral// ci khyod dam tshig aHzhes bya// mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci// da ming pad+ma gar dbang dpal// khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan// ci khyod dam tshig tA zhes bya// khyod ni
272a6(rgyud): gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog/ nga ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal// gdugs kyi rnam khyod ji ltar min// ci khyod dam tshig khaM zhes bya// khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhino// nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin// khyod ni rta ste pha rol
272a7(rgyud): 'gro// ci khyod dam tshig snying rje 'chang // e ma chang 'tsheng mdzes pa'o// mi g.yo bdag min mA ma ki/ zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci// ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid// bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci// bdag ni
272a8(rgyud): ma yin lha mo spyan// spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas// ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che// smad 'tshong ma la sgrar ci yod// bdag ming lham dkar mo'o// ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin// ci khyod dam tshig dang
272b1(rgyud): byed che/ btsun mo po nya min nam ci// bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o// sgrol ma rig ni cos pa yin// mig yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal// de ltar ngom med pas legs// do ma med pas sangs rgyas min/ 
272b2(rgyud): mthong dang mi mthun myur du smos// de nas rdo rje mig yon po smod pos gsungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag/ ser sna
272b3(rgyud): snang byed do// don yod skyon ni thams cad byed// 'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no// sgo nga skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am// drod gsher skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin// gzugs can rnams sam gzugs
272b4(rgyud): med dam// brdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes// khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa ni// khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad// 
272b5(rgyud): de nyid phyir na brdzun gsungs pa// mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs// sems can bslus na khyod kyi gang // sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad// 'chi bdag tshe 'am mu ge 'am// phas
272b6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i gnod pa dang // rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // char med pa dang zhi ba dang // sngags dang bsgoms par ldan par ni// gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa// de yi mdun du bdag
272b7(rgyud): 'dug ste// der ni brdzun du mi 'gyur// slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bani// mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// khams
272b8(rgyud): gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am// ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar// bde ba dag 'a bar byed dang bcas// chos dbyung grong khyer nyams dga' bar// rdo rje dmatshig
273a1(rgyud): / glu yis dang // rdorje rkang pa'i goms pas gang// mthar ni rnga rdza la s+ye sogs// phyag rgya chen po bster pa'i// de nyid 'dir ni cher gso // rdo rje sems dpa'i bka 'ji bzhin// ra
273a2(rgyud): 'bang bus bsrung bar bya// glu sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra dang / gar dang / 'dul bar 'jug pa dang / char dbab pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba ri le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
273a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung po'i gtor ma gsungs pa// na mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par// mdab ma ni brgyad bsgom par bya// dbang po
273a4(rgyud): shar gyi mdab mar bsam// mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya// chu bdag nub kyi mdab ma la// byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya// mer ni byin thu chen po nyid// bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no// 
273a5(rgyud): rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan du ni 'thung po'i gtso// zla nyi tshangs pa la sogs dang // tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa dang // tshangs pa'i 'dun 'du nyid dang // dga' ldan 'a
273a6(rgyud): bral gnas pa dang // rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang // gtsang mi'i gnas su gang gnas dang // bde ba can du 'dug
273a7(rgyud): ba dang / 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang // de kun steng du gnas pa bya// chos 'byung nang du son pa ni// stobs kyi rgyu
273a8(rgyud): dang du skyong dang // de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid// bad chen pad+ma bzang po can// lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams// chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu / 
273b1(rgyud): oM las tshangs pa la sogs lnga// hUM las ma chags pa la sogs// AHlas stobs kyi rgyu la sogs// lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste// steng gi lha rnams dkar po che// dbang po la sogs nag
273b2(rgyud): por mtshungs// stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che// rang mtshungs rig ma lus sprad ldan// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas// tshangs sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gdag/ 
273b3(rgyud): mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis// stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar bdag gis// thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o// dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni// chom rkun mas ni zhags bcings pas/ 
273b4(rgyud): ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas// g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbang // de nas mchod de zhabs bsil dbul// sngags ni 'di yi// sa bsang gtor bya// oM AHhUM/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung
273b5(rgyud): dbul bar bya// sngags ni 'di yis gshag su gsol// oM badz+rA satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa tIn pa tiSh+Tha dri n+dom b+ha wa/ su toSh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha we/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ 
273b6(rgyud): hr-id yam+me d+hiSh+Ta/ sarba sid+d+him+b+hi pra yats+tsha/ sarba kAr+the'u me tsit+taM shwe yai/ ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga waM sarba ta thA ga to badz+rA mA me muny+tsa badz+ra b+ha wa ma hA sa ya satwa AHmuHde nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po
273b7(rgyud): mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi ting 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye bo'o// ming gi dbang gi dus ni// slob me bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas
273b8(rgyud): nyid// bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma rdo rje dang / pad+ma myu gu
274a1(rgyud): do dang / skal la gro dang / bad+ma lugs rdo dang / ye she rdo dang / yidi bzhinan rdod+hA dang / yan lag med du'i rdo rje dang / shes bu myu gu'i rdordo dang / phying / myu gu'i'ado pa
274a2(rgyud): dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / namakha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod
274a3(rgyud): chags rdo rje ni dag pa'i gan su phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no// bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha dang / rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang // rdo
274a4(rgyud): bdag med ma dang // rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sbrum dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'dril shing dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje'o langs ma dang / 
274a5(rgyud): lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje lnga s+ya mad nga / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo rje khyud ma dang / rdo rje phye ma dang // rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'thung ma dang / rdo rje chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags
274a6(rgyud): ma dang / rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje kong ka NA dang / rdo rje lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyug ma dang / rdo rje rnam par ma ni mkha'agro ma rnams kyi'o// de nas de bzhin
274a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye'i rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang // rdo rje a ral+li skems pa'i khro bo dang // de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i khro bo nyid/ 
274a8(rgyud): bdud ci thabs sbyor dang // he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do// rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang // rnam par snang mdzad mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob// sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mdzad dang // sku yi rje
274b1(rgyud): rab tu grags pa dang // sa snying dang ni gti mug chen po dang // gshin rje gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang // sangs rgyas zhes bya rab tu grags pa'o// 
274b2(rgyud): nyi ma de nas rin chen bdag/ rin chen rgyal po nyid de bzhin du yang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che// rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do// rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang / rdo rje chos dang spyan rA
274b3(rgyud): gzigs dang ni// pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang // 'jig rten mgon po rab tu grags pa'o// dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang // bdun gyi rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang // dam tshig rdo rje
274b4(rgyud): dang ni rta mchog dang // de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyi da// don yod dang ni don grub dang // rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can// rnang rgyal ba
274b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dang // depe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang // dam pa dang po bde ba chen po'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni// 'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod// 
274b6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i thar rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub// brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid// sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa
274b7(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje gar gyi gsum po'o// bzhi pa sna chags brtag pa ste// rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa'o// brtag pa drug pa stobs po che// brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon// brgyad pa gzugs kyi brtag pa ste// mkha'agro
274b8(rgyud): ku ru kul+le dgu/ bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste/ rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcig la// dngos grub ba rtag pa bcu gnyis pa// sgrol ma'i brtag pa 'acu gsum pa// rdo rje phag mo bcu yin pa// bco lnga pa ni sa
275a1(rgyud): rjid // rad med gag pa bcu drug pa// ga shin ga shed kyi bdu 'dun pa// rdus dang na co kyad bya// byang can gyini 'du la// sbyin sregasag sa shug// shags
275a2(rgyud): gcig pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni// nyi shuca ni gnyis na 'dod // gtor ma'i brtag pa ci shu gsum// nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon gnas// mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga// de bzhin phyag rgya ci shu drug/ byed pa
275a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// klu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni// sum nur gcig med sum cu pa// brtag pa sum cu par ni bshad // stong sum cu yi grangs kyis ni// mkha 'gro mkha' gra ma rnams
275a4(rgyud): kyi// 'bum phrag ldi la rgya mtsho che// kye'i rdo rje rdor 'chang gi/ rgyud ni e ma rgyas bstan pa// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kyi rdo rje// dag pa 'i snying po yongasu gzung // rdo rje mkha' gros gsungs pas/ 
275a5(rgyud): 'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa'o// kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud// dang por rgyal rnams kyis bshad// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// de nyid bud med gzung phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na spros pa
275a6(rgyud): lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur na// ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ ji ltar na/ 
275a7(rgyud): sems par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phal pa che thung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// re shig gang dag slob dpon rnamasu 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung
275a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag so so'i skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bung mi
275b1(rgyud): gyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste// de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin
275b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa// snying rje chen po kye'i rdo rje// nga ni dur khrod zhu 'gram dang / nags chal skye bo med grang du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster
275b3(rgyud): mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong // sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang // rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni// nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster// tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni// tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim
275b4(rgyud): du ni// rdo rje nyi ma brtan pa dang / bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang // chang 'tshong ma yi khyim du ni// 'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhanang // bsnyen bkur can la
275b5(rgyud): dngos grub ster // rtag tu 'gro mgyogs zhon 'gyur dang // res 'a ga' lam du 'gro ba na// rta ni don yod brtan pa nga // dngos gru ba rdo rje rnams ste ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen
275b6(rgyud): bo mkha 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgyal ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las/ phyag rgya rnam gsu
275b7(rgyud): shes par bya// sku la log pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya// sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin// de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o// lag pa g.yas na skam
275b8(rgyud): bste// g.yon na sdig mdzub de bzhin no// mkha'agro skam pa ma 'jigs ma// gdug pa rnams kyi 'khur ba 'don// g.yas bi'i lag na zhags pa ste// gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de
276a1(rgyud): 'di nags pa ma shes bya// g.yon pas gdug pa sdig mdzub ma// g.yas nas rgya zlum po ste// gdug pa rnams ni 'akri bar 'dod// 'di ni rtag tu dol zlum bshad // g.yon pas gdug pa
276a2(rgyud): bsdig mdzub mdzad// lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod// 'di de rdo rje gyo mar bshad// g.yon pas bdud la bsdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas pa nyi ma ste// gti
276a3(rgyud): mug mun pa rnam par dral// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub mar ni bshad// de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// lag g.yas mar me'i sdong snod de// de bzhin g.yon par bsdig mdzub po// 'did rdo rje mar mer bshad// rnam par
276a4(rgyud): rtog pa'i rab ri'i 'joms// lag pa g.yas ni rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rin chen sprin ma 'di rang brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas par ste/ 
276a5(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms// de 'di glog lag mar shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya// g.yon pas
276a6(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub ma nyid de// 'di ni mkha 'gro'i pad+mar brjod// g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste// bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod// g.yas
276a7(rgyud): pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste// byang chub zhon pas kun 'ching ba// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni rdo rje sgrog mang brjod// sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis// bdag nyid 'byung bar 'dod pa
276a8(rgyud): ste/ byang chub chags pas rab sgrub ma// de'i rdo rje 'khyud mar bshad// g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lcags te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo// g.yon na bsdig mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di rdo rje sgo lcags brjod/ 
276b1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste// yis blangs nas gcod pa mo// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di rdo rje lde kyog brjod// g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo ma ni// yis skyes pa ma sbyangs pa// g.yon na bsdig
276b2(rgyud): mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod// lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni// rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas
276b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi// mkha' gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs// mkha'agro lnga ni rab sgrub phyir// mkha' gro ma yi rgyud gsung so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtsha
276b4(rgyud): skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi che ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa lags sam/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ing
276b5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yodang de 'di ni de'i yin te/ De be ha la
276b6(rgyud): sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun tu na mkhar spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' gro mar rab tu gragaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos
276b7(rgyud): nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'dir gsol pa/ e ma mkha'agro ma yi rgyud// rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang // rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang // rig dang mi rig pa nyid
276b8(rgyud): pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bskyed pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir/ 'di skad gsung so// bcom ldan 'das
277a1(rgyud): byangab chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub
277a2(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa// sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i
277a3(rgyud): phyir na srog chags rnams bsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnam spangs lags lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// mkha'agro ma yi rgyud bshad do// bde
277a4(rgyud): ba'i thubs ni 'dor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste// blo dam na rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges// sngag sa rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes
277a5(rgyud): bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni// bdag med rnal// 'byor ma nyid kyis// sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje
277a6(rgyud): sems dpa' dang // gal te rdo rje chos dang ni// rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang // bdag gi spangs na mi 'grub ste// nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yum gyi gzugs kyis bskyed par byed// de
277a7(rgyud): rnams kyi ni mdzes ma nga// de lang ni dngos grub ste// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gris 'og sgrub pa dang // ril bu mkha' la spyod pa dang // mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len// rig 'dzin
277a8(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur nyid dang // bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni// bdag mas pas ni bsgrubs pa blo// dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// smras pa 'dir ni ci zhig bya// bdag spangs
277b1(rgyud): nges par mi 'grub cing // byang chub med cing sgom pa med// gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing // rtag tu klog cing sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang // da mi spya ni sgom byed pa// gal ng+gets+tsha
277b2(rgyud): ma'i tshul gyis sam// gal te rmi lam 'dra bar lta// shin tu bsgoms pa'i rim pa las// mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las// de yi dngas grub sbyin par bya// rdo rje
277b3(rgyud): pad+ma rab sbyor bas// shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba// lus can de la sgras ci dgos// gang zhig nyi ma gcig sgom pa// rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las// shes rab pa
277b4(rgyud): rol phyin dngos sgrub// ster de 'di la the tsom med// bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing // rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas// gang ni ga rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa// de rnams la ni nga mnyes
277b5(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing // spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang // glu gar rol sgra'i rnam pa dang // 'dod kun bde ba spro ba dang // sna tshogs sgrog par ldan pa dang // sna tshogs ro yi btung
277b6(rgyud): ba dang // sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can// sna tshogs 'di yi byug pa yis// gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba// de yi dngos grub ster ba nga // phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa// de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to// 
277b7(rgyud): oM a A i I u U rai r-I l-i l-I e ai o oM oM swAhA// gang zhig 'dis nga bskul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug go// 
277b8(rgyud): rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o// lho phyogasu dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o// nub phyogasu ni chu yi mkha' gro ma'o// byang du ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ma'o// dbusu bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'kho
278a1(rgyud): du gang zhig pas ma byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste// phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o// gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas brel ba// stag gi lpags pa bgos pa// spyan gsum pa/ 
278a2(rgyud): skra gyen du brjes pa// phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa// shar gyi sgor ni dkar mo chen mo'o// lhor na chom rkun ma'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ni nu ma'o// de bzhin byang du ni gAswa rI'o// dbang ldan du ni phug sde // 
278a3(rgyud): 'tshed pa'i mtsham su ni ri khrod ma'o// srin mo'i phyogasu ni gdol pa mo'o// rtag tu 'gro bar ni g.yung mo'o// 'di rnams ni mtshams dang bral du sbyin no// gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i
278a4(rgyud): lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nuso// thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rabatu/ son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro ma chen mo dpal mo// gau yan pa
278a5(rgyud): ga 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' gro/ ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' bi'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs te// rigs ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa// rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus// bum
278a6(rgyud): pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas// rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa// der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad sngon sbyin de bsams nas// rdo rje'i
278a7(rgyud): tshigs bcad sbyor ba las// rdo rje chen po rje dgu pa// snying khar rang gi lag pa bya// slob mi'i 'jig rten dbang phyug byas// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// de ring khyod
278a8(rgyud): ni dbang bskur 'gyur// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// bzang spub phyir ni rdo rje bzung // slob ma lcags mchog lha ma ni// sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya// lag pas rdo rje dril 'khor zhing // 
278b1(rgyud): bdag pos dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra d+hi pa ti traM/ a b+hi Shany+tsA mi tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni// ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra satwa b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badz+ra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye cheg
278b2(rgyud): mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyis rang gtsor gyur// de de bdag nyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
278b3(rgyud): na gnas// rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // oM badz+ra ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma ya tA e Sho hitwAd+hA ra yA mi hIHhi hi tsi hi trUM/ kun kyang chog gcig pa yis// rtag tu
278b4(rgyud): bla med mchod pas ni// slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// phyis na rdo rje lag nas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sa de'i dga' chen po// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag// rdo rje snying po
278b5(rgyud): bdag po'i bdag/ yang ni der ni dril buM sbyin// shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i// rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba// sem/ sa can kun gyi don gyi phyir// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes
278b6(rgyud): rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // dbugs byin thams cad byin nas ni// shAkya thub par rang gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung
278b7(rgyud): bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsam med// khyod kyis 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med// de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med// bde chen theg pa chen po ni// 'di las nga yis lung bstan bu// oM e Sho he thA ka ro mi tra
278b8(rgyud): badz+ra satwa ta thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub phyir// kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi// ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur// de ltar bac+doMs kyis rig mchen
279a1(rgyud): ma dbang gi tshig bka' stsal to// denas bcom ldan 'das rje chen po/  na rdo rnon papos// dang tshigardo zhes bya ba gon te/ tshig 'dris da bka' stsal pa// rna mtho rnams
279a2(rgyud): mchod cing // bdun po rnam par dag parabya// byang chub sems ni bskyed rnams// chos kyi 'thung gnas rnam par sgom/ de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam pa ldan bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu bsam
279a3(rgyud): de nas// mkha 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro// dri za mnyam par zhugs pa ni// khu bar rje su dran par bya// 'tshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni// mig la sogs pa gti mug
279a4(rgyud): sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// byinas rjes chags rnga/ rje ste// yos rnam par gzhug pa dang // dbang ni rig mo n+d+had rnams kyi// ya ni bdud ni myang ba dang // lha mo brgya
279a5(rgyud): mchod pa nyid// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o// rang byin rlabs pas byin rlabs te// de la yan lag drug bsgom bya// phyi nas yang ni dam tshi ga gi/ cho ga'i go rims rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag
279a6(rgyud): mtshon par bya// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin// bzhi pa ma menye 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba te// sprin med na mkha' 'dra ba nyid// de ni thams cad
279a7(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i rgyu// dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas sgyu mi'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu yi// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// 'jig rten
279a8(rgyud): khams ni thams cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams// mi shes phung po'i blo ldan pa// de si r+the su thams cad 'brang // ji srid skye gnas las byung ba// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// phyaH/ 
279b1(rgyud): rgya chen po rab sbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi rdo rje rna ma thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni// smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan/ 
279b2(rgyud): rig ma chen mo bdag med dang // rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdog dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang // rta mchog thub pa chen po dang // rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che// rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni/ 
279b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang // lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur// lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis// 'phral du mngon sum byed pa po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi
279b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ tshigs 'di skad gsung so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa// zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che// phyag ni bcu drug
279b5(rgyud): rnams dang ldan// dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid che na po zhabs bzhi dang // sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te// skyil krung phye ba'i gar gyis gnas// rus pa'i
279b6(rgyud): rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par rgyan// lhag pa'i zhal ni dpung pa bzhin// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste// spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog
279b7(rgyud): dar ni rdo rje mdog nag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par rgyan// glang po rta bong glang rngo mo// mi dngasar b+ha byi la// g.yes
279b8(rgyud): pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// drid dang zla ba nyin nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad no'o// skyes bu
280a1(rgyud): chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod// zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la// ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du// reg dang bdag med bsgom
280a2(rgyud): par bya// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa'i gri gug thod pas brel// srog song steng du yang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid
280a3(rgyud): dang // de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi ni chog yis// gnas gsum du ni gnas par sgom// oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni// sku yis rdo rje rnam par rgyun// thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po ma/ rdo
280a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs// a ni mchog gi de nyid de// ngag gi lam ni gsal byed brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi // chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung // ci mi dkyil
280a5(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o// kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 
280a6(rgyud): dmar po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// chom rkun ma yi gzugs can sgom// gcom gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen po// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ro langs
280a7(rgyud): ma ni khrag dang mtshungs// rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed// byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nas g+hasma rI bsgom bya// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel/ 
280a8(rgyud): margad ud pal 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgo skyong ma rdo rje btson ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// mtsham su lha mo bzhi rnams ni// cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// byang sems bum pa ri rab dang / 
280b1(rgyud): yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che// phyi bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi
280b2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po// thams cad kyi rnam pa'i tingange 'dzin la bzhugs te// dbyangs 'di gsungs pa// hUM las byung ba'i khro
280b3(rgyud): bo ni// rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o// nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo badz+ra ru da ga ra hastA ya tsaNAM maN+Da lAk+She pa ka rA ya hUM phaT// de nas 'dir wa~M
280b4(rgyud): bo chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed// skyes pa'i pad+mags chag
280b5(rgyud): med// bsrubs gcig pa dang bsrubs gnyis pa// rig mo bi naM yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // rkang / rjes rdul gyis sbyor ba yis// rkang pas mnan cing bsdigs
280b6(rgyud): par byed/ sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis// bu mo chen mo dgug par bya// gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha su nA su ra mdzan b+hu hrIH
280b7(rgyud): thA hU~M phaT// de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par bye// 'byung
280b8(rgyud): yi dgas sha za nyid// mkha'agro grul bum zin pa la// hUM gis drags byas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje btsi bas bde ba nyid// gzhan gyis mthub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// oM hUM
281a1(rgyud): lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i ti ku ru ma hA bi ShAn AHbtsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin// pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta
281a2(rgyud): bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya ma hA daMSh+Tot+ka TA b+hai ra wA ya/ badz+ra san+ni had d+hA ya/ oM a mr-i ta guN+DA la~M hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo 'gegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
281a3(rgyud): rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to// rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste// tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hUM phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gis
281a4(rgyud): rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi ting 'dzin las skyes pa/ khro ba sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do// rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// shin tu legs par gsang
281a5(rgyud): bar ni// bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar// ye shes rdo rjes bya bi ste// nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa ma n+ya bud+d+he b+h+yo// oM ya ma daN+DA ya nI lA ya nI la daN+DA ya/ tu lu tu ru/ mu ru mu ru
281a6(rgyud): sarba duSh+TA na mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT// de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog le the tshom du gyur to// brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa
281a7(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul ba la gdug bzang 'ching bar 'gyur// dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na maHsa min+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA bawA ya/ 
281a8(rgyud): u rba rba kro d+had+ha dz+wa sa pan+na thA n+do thaM pa t+pa d+hu 9// denas tum pachen po la gdangs/ dug gis gdong migs shing sto sa da pral pa dang / skrag cing di gyu chubs pa
281b1(rgyud): par byed do// rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo a tsa la kaM tsan+da tsen+da moT+Ta mon+ta/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skyes
281b2(rgyud): bu chen po bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la 'gyel to// 'di ni khro bo rgyal po yis// seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las// skyes pa dang ni lha rnams
281b3(rgyud): khugs// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ts+tsha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga waM bid d+ya rA dzA hUM phaT// rdo rjes 'og gnas pa yis// khro bo chen po bshad pa yis// lha min bu mo klu mor bcas
281b4(rgyud): nu ma 'dar zhing nar ba'am// rdo rje zhags pas nges pa/ cings te// lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni// sku gsung thug sa ni bsgoms pa yis// bu mo thang dgug par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum
281b5(rgyud): dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje chos ni char sprin char// rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste// rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun mo// rta mchog tshogs ni chen po dang // phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi// zhags pa
