281b6(rgyud): lcags cu'i sgom pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na// so so'i skye bo smos ci dgos// rang gi rig mo skyes bu bsams// sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par rgyun// lcags kyu la sogs sbyor
281b7(rgyud): sa// dri mo bkug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hi b+h+yo/ oMT k+ki hU~M dzaHkha ti dang ni bcag la yang // rdo rje lda
281b8(rgyud): bu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar tshogs dusu// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // brgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yin// sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ chung mor
282a1(rgyud): rung gag du 'gyur// yang seM / rnam sa na//  sa sa satwA/ sa A/ a ma la/ 9shA ka/ oM rtag pa/ mi sa skyes
282a2(rgyud): ga t+tASh+T+r-itsA kI la na bla ma ma gri sa ni nas \u0f7f/ sa hrI/ gyi/ ga~M ga ri/ mar ma /  hrIrmA dz+dza hU~Md+hI dz+dzad+hu T+Te// bdag nyid srung ba'i rtswa / 
282a3(rgyud): sbyor brgyud sogs gcig pa la// dpung ba'i rig mar gyur byas nas// 'jig rten gsum gyis mda' mi nus// khro ba chen po'i raM li rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dben pa'i nags nA
282a4(rgyud): nyid du yang // yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la// rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste ba'i
282a5(rgyud): ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tu dbye// sangs rgyas gzugs brtan rab bsgoms te/ 
282a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzug
282a7(rgyud): brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// rta yi don yod rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor
282b1(rgyud): rnams ni rtag bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying khar ye shes gnas dgod// ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang sngags yi ge rdzogs
282b2(rgyud): ba dang // phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag/ sgro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung ba nyid// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje
282b3(rgyud): can// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni// rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid// dril rnam gsum rnam
282b4(rgyud): shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni// rin chen phung por rab tu grags// rol rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan
282b5(rgyud): 'dod chags nyid // rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs// reg la rnam ga sum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyi da bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba po// 
282b6(rgyud): srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsgoms par bya// lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// yis lnga ni rnam par sgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab// sna tshog
282b7(rgyud): yis ni byed par brjod// thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shun+da lnga'i dbye ba yis// rdul chen gyis kyang dri bar bye// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang yi zhin gyis// phung po lngar ni rab tu grags// sangs rgyas
282b8(rgyud): mgon pa dkyil 'khar ni// gar gyi nir tu grags// gas rdo ma yi/ rub tu 'dod sags rje kyi mi byang du mo rgyal gyi la// 'du rje sems dpa' yi// shar du/ dab chen po / 
283a1(rgyud): sgron ser po yang dag 'a// dam na gyi snyid du// brjod byung du yang dga'an// rnams shin dang // skyo mo logs dngas du su//  na na rnams nas rgyan// 
283a2(rgyud): tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes// sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbu su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod// snying po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor rer
283a3(rgyud): sgom pa ma// nga na cus pa'i kyil 'dzor/ rgyad brgyad du chu garnas pa'am// yang ti shu // gang cid dkyil 'khor nus pa'i// shAd ni lcags su zhugs pa dang // lpags sgrog na rje
283a4(rgyud): nyi// 'jug pa'i sgo srung dgod par bya// bac+doMs kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to// dom dang bya rgod de de bzhin pas// sdug blang dang ni stag nyid dang // spre'u dang sna thung ba glang
283a5(rgyud): chos kyi g.yas na'o// khwa 'ug chu skyar seng ge dang // mtshor gnas deng / zhin ra dang ni// ri dwags pag dang yang dag ldan// g.yas/ min par ni rtag tu gnas/ rma byi mate chu srin dang // nyi ma
283a6(rgyud): rgyal po rus sbal dang // 'og gi rlung dang ngang pa dang // ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na// sbal ba thu bo sprin shugs kyi// kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi la// g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin bzhed// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyan
283a7(rgyud): na'o// ka ran da dang 'khor lo ngag/ lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni// bye khra hor mo 'ol ba dang // ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang // 'jog po nor rgyas mtha'
283a8(rgyud): yas ni// rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon nor// gza' lag pur bu mjug rings dang // sgra gcan mig dmar pa bsangs// spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid// g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags/ dbang po tshangs/ 
283b1(rgyud): bde bzhin drag/ 'dod la de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni thag bzangs ris// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon no'o// glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin 'jog/ khong skam medze dang rkang shu dang // mchin pa mcher ba'i rang
283b2(rgyud): bzhin yang // glang po la sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang // khrag rdo gcong nang rgyal po dang // gzhang 'brum sran dang bkres nad dang // mig ser dom la sogs pa'o// rdzim
283b3(rgyud): byi dang sond dang // mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung // bad kan 'dzag dang lus skam dang // skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs// rkang 'ba'i tshil nang rlig skrangs dang // rgyu ma 'phel dang gsung pa dang // 
283b4(rgyud): chad pa rims dang rabs gas ni// kar N+Da sogs rab tu grags/ rlung mkhris de bzhin ma nu ba// sprob g.yogs rab rib gcin srig// gnogs byed na dang lkog 'bras dang/ 
283b5(rgyud): rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o// mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni// rab mchog de lta bu 'gro ba// thad nad kyis khyab mthong nas// sangs rgyas lngar ni tsher grags pa// bdag gi lus la gzhug par
283b6(rgyud): bya// sen rnams la gdungs ma gyur// nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgyas ni// glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to// de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la// nad med ru dza trang gru med// 'chi med nges par bya d+ha
283b7(rgyud): med// nga rgyal med cing gti mug med// bkres pa med cing sgom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min mo rnams sam// gang gis kyang ni nad byed min// nad thad rab tu ni
283b8(rgyud): bdabugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thad 'dzin pa po mkha 'gro mi'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni/ 
284a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjesu dran ba sgom// sems kyi rin chen bsams nas ni// chos ni rjesu dran bsgom// las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor bas// 'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni man
284a2(rgyud): rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje rnam snang bsams nas ni// phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i
284a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas// las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab// zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che// skyon rnams thaMd zad par mdzad// spro zhing sbyor bar bsgom par bya// 
284a4(rgyud): bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// sgo dang bsdu ba'i rna rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// sems
284a5(rgyud): kyi rin chen rin po ches// bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad// sa mas kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis// yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya// chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can
284a6(rgyud): thun tshod bzhir ni byin rlabs pa// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas// gzhal mod 'bras bu stsol ba'o// rta mchog char sprin chen po yis// bsdu ba yang
284a7(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// bac+doMs kyi spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dmi tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbuH
284a8(rgyud): gnas par// sku yi yi ge rnam par sgom// khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi yi ge rnam par sgom// 
284b1(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// don yod yi ge gzugs can te// sku gsum mi phyed sgom pa yis// ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam
284b2(rgyud): snang la// rin chen sems kyi rin chen po che// pad+ma bzang po mdab mar dmar// shes rab ral gri don yod kyi// shes rab rnon po'i rang ba zhin gyi// rnam rtog ri bo bcad nas ni// phyag rgya chen po ldan par
284b3(rgyud): 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pan bi'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang // rin chen phung po 'od chen dang // chos kyi phung po mchog chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa
284b4(rgyud): rdo rje las// sna tshogs 'od zer cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas na gyis rna rgyan// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// pheM sa dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon lnga yis gang // 
284b5(rgyud): thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// les rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes
284b6(rgyud): rdo rje chen po 'bar// sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas// skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur// ru rak+Sha dang dung ral gri/ bu yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang // mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs// bsam gtan
284b7(rgyud): ldan pa sngags bzlas bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // mkha' gro ma dang rang btsun mo// mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod// dper na skyes chen la la
284b8(rgyud): zhig/ skad cig nga ros bas pa na// thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa// de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang // na mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du// phyag rgya chen
285a1(rgyud): po'i bde gnas kyi// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs// rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa// e ma
285a2(rgyud): de yis byang chub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin// rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas// mtshungs pa med pa'i yis 'thob// de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// 
285a3(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa// 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te// de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod// sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmagasu nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig sgom
285a4(rgyud): bde bas na// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'ji/ ga rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// ji ltar chos kyang dge 'dun te// seMn khams ni de ltar bshad// na mkha' lta bur dri ma
285a5(rgyud): med// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur// ji ltar na mkha' mi 'jig pa// na mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems
285a6(rgyud): kyi rin chen bskul ba las// sems nyid sgom pa sangs rgyas te// skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid// rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med// rnam par shes pa'i gnas don
285a7(rgyud): nam// phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med// yid kyis sangs rgyas tha~Md nyid// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che// sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang
285a8(rgyud): de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te// chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi// 'din rin chen mchog tu brjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thad sems
285b1(rgyud): las skye// thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// 'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba// sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster// de nyid daphyir na sangs rgyas kyis/ 
285b2(rgyud): sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i// byed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster// rdo rje sa de'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' gro
285b3(rgyud): ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa// sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang // rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i rang
285b4(rgyud): bzhin dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sgrub dang // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang // mchod bstod bdud rtsil sogs pa// rims pas rjesu bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod// 
285b5(rgyud): san+d+ha ta thA ga ta a b+hi She badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsaM// bac+doMs de bzhi na gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba rba thA ga tA mri tA s+yAd badz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma koH/ 
285b6(rgyud): bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tig gis de skad ces bka'
285b7(rgyud): stsal to// oM sarba tathA pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badz+ra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko Ne/ 
285b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi mde bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad de// chos dbyings yi ge les skyes pa// des ni sangs rgyas
286a1(rgyud): gnas dgod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nI la yang badz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 'thung bzhi'i bdag nyid
286a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam// spros nas gzhale yas gnas dgod bya// rdo rje lta bu mi byed phyir// des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya// ma skyes rje su dran pa las// rnar snang mdzad
286a3(rgyud): phan pa nyid// rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen sem su bshad// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las// rdo rje se de'i gnas 'dug pa'i// sems ni
286a4(rgyud): 'dod chags zhes byar bshad// gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grus ster// de phyir don yod rab tu grags// rig ma mdzes mdzo/ zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis pa
286a5(rgyud): la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab yis te// ji ltar lu sa ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam pa bris nas ni/ dam tshig khu ba'i cho gas yis// haM dang bsam gtan bskyed byas
286a6(rgyud): nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkha'agro lnga dang ldan pa dang // dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang // mkha' 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas// rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la/ 
286a7(rgyud): slob ma rtag par nges bsams te// rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni// slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur// spyan dang bdag mo sgrol ma dang // dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis// rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas
286a8(rgyud): rdo rje bla med bshad par bya// bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di// gnyi su med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i ro myang gis// sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ga
286b1(rgyud): dang ha zhes bya ba dang // dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid// dngos grub zad rab ster ba// tshogs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal
286b2(rgyud): 'byor pa// rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur// nad rnams tha rab tu zhi// de ni gzi brjid lus chen po// 'jig rten kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal// 'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos rgyan// 
286b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod// mkha' gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi zas ni zab po// dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ 
286b4(rgyud): nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// rtag par mu shel chen dor ldan// rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med// don yod rgyal po chen po ni// / rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung // don kun sprub cing dpal dang ldan
286b5(rgyud): des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod// mi bskyod btung bar sbyor ba sa/ sa// stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod// rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje'i 'bul// tshe dpag med kyis dpag med
286b6(rgyud): dang // bdun gyis na mkha' ji srid bshad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/ 'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid// 'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes/ 
286b7(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi// thabs dang shes rangab zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thaM / 
286b8(rgyud): sa dang sa 'og bar snang la// khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs// sen mo ba spu de bzhin khams// khu ba la ni rnam par gzigs// lpags dang khrag la gzi brjid tshe// 
287a1(rgyud): / tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po// 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas ldung // rdo rje mkha 'gros rnam par bshad// sa yi
287a2(rgyud): khams ni rnam dag pa// spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid// rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// pad+mi'i bu mo che ba nyid// sgrol ma rlung ni rnam par dag/ rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// rdo rje mkha 'gro zhes bya'o// gur gyis de rnams
287a3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// sngags tha~Md rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o// // khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba// thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas/ 
287a4(rgyud): lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// phug sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs// dam par 'dren pa 'jig rten dan gyi phyir// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba zhes par mdzod// khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs
287a5(rgyud): skyong ba// sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// mgon po ri khrod ma ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad/ 
287a6(rgyud): stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong ba// gsung dag legs par so sor rtog pa yis// lha yi lus na yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// gtum par ldan pa bdag
287a7(rgyud): myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs spyod pa// gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// 
287a8(rgyud): lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// Do ma'i bdag la mgon po myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spongs skye ba zhes par mdzod// med pa zhes par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes
287b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi// 'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni// yes rdo rje can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga tA khe tsa rI bad+d+ha swa b+hA ba At+ma ka/ 
287b2(rgyud): te/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hu tsa ri badz+ra swab+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA pA tA la wa si nI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi// byin rgyam pa gsum rtag par ni// nges rdo rje can gyis
287b3(rgyud): bya// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba// sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya// bsam gtan rdo rje
287b4(rgyud): bsams nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med// ti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang // zhe sdang rdorje
287b5(rgyud): bsams pa yis// sgra yi sgo yi bsams pa'o// sna ni ser sna rdo rje yis// ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis// lus ni phrag dag rdo rje yis// yid ni kun tu bzang po yis// de nyid mkha 'gro bdag med me/ 
287b6(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang // gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang // de'i chu rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas nas ni// 'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam nar
287b7(rgyud): sgom// chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las// gang zag thad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshig pa rnams kyi
287b8(rgyud): gdung dang dug khyab pa'i// lus kyi sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de// ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la// yang ni rgu ni thab su 'gyur ba nyid// ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyis// de bzhin
288a1(rgyud): mkhas pas mon sran gre'u bzhin// drod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi// skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung // 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa// 'dod chags smad pas dadapa
288a2(rgyud): 'gyur// dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas// yid na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhugs pas 'ching ba yis// 'jig rten chags pas byeb par brjod// 'dod chags bral ba'i mngon bya rdzun/ 
288a3(rgyud): 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod// de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi// sgrub thabs sbyin sreg las kyi ni// go chas 'dod don thaMd kyi// sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya// de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pa
288a4(rgyud): yin te// oM na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+ha satwA ya// ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yaSh+Tha/ oM ShA tut+tA re tu ra sarba duSh+Ta ma ma kri te dza b+ha ya/ sam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ 
288a5(rgyud): ya/ d+hu d+hU b+h+rUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ti staM b+hin tA re swAhA// ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// l+h+wam sgrol ma pa sgom par bya// phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam
288a6(rgyud): par brgyan// gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar sgom// gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar// rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can// lang tsho la ni bab pa'i lus// g.yo ba gser gyi rnam
288a7(rgyud): ma// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer dmar pos rnam par rgyan// rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung // g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu ud pa la// bsdigs mdzub g.yon pas
288a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya// shar du me tog sgrol ma ste// kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma// yi ge oM las skyes pa'o// me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab// phyag
288b1(rgyud): gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.ya su bdug spos sgrol ma ste// mdog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma// spos dang dung gis lag pa brel// rgyan rnams kun gyis
288b2(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// nub tu mar me sgron ma ste// mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab// mdog ser rnam par rgyan chen mo// g.yo ba ser gyi rnacham// byang du mi yi sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis lag khyab pa// khrag
288b3(rgyud): gis mdog ltar lha mi ni// dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya// lcogs kyu la sogs rab dbye bas// der ni sgo yi srung ma bsam// steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes mi rabasgom// 
288b4(rgyud): 'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas ni// sgo zhing sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// yi ge bcu yis/ lha yis lha mo bcu// pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma// 'bras bu thad rab
288b5(rgyud): sgrub phyir// rab tu 'bad pas sgom par bya// sngags ni mchog dang phul du phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste// rdo rje gur gyis bshad po'o// sngags 'dis gos
288b6(rgyud): kyi thu bar bdun// mngon par bsngags pa bya ba ste// mdud pas bcings te nags tshal du 'gro 'gron 'od sus kyang mi 'khyer te// stag dang / chomathun dang / mu srin sna 'thung dang / seng ge dang / sbrul dang / 
288b7(rgyud): ba can dang / ma he dang / dom dang / sdug glang la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib po// sngags 'dis ud pal la sbyin sreg ji srid du// lan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzi tsam bslu bar bya ste// oM tA re t+nad+d+ha
288b8(rgyud): a mu ka me waSha dz+nyAn ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis ba'i sgrol lan sum sucu gnyis so u bzlas te/ dgra'i khyim du sbas na// nyim bdun gyis sbed par byed do// me ter da m+b+hi kur tsal pra ma pa shI ts+tsho ma
289a1(rgyud): ni wadat+ta/ umAT+Ta sa d+hu phaT/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba// oM tre sa tA re / a muk+Sha d+hI tAn kum+b+ha nI ma drA mudrA ten ta s+ya si ta tA yAr+tha Tu me swAhA// sgrarmi la dang gtum pa'i sa bon dpa
289a2(rgyud): myos byed dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang / me tog bsreg blugs bya zhing // mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pastong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te// nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas
289a3(rgyud): rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM sa s+thAn ta A kaR+Sha ya ma mAn+ti ke dzaHsngags 'dis pa da ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog bsreg
289a4(rgyud): lugs bya bar brjod pa 'ang byas pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bac+doMs ma phyag gnyis ma zhal
289a5(rgyud): gcig ma// lag pa lcags kyu dang / ud pal dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te// de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas me tog 'di rnams bza' zhing legs zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchong nas byi nis sgom
289a6(rgyud): pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas/ oM tA rer tut+tA re a mu k+Shi ma me pI ta/ swa b+h+r-i ka thA ya hU~M phaT// stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyuraro// zhags pa dang mgrin par bcings te/ lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa
289a7(rgyud): 'og tu bsams te// khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par sngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mig gnyis mig sman gyis bsku bar bya
289a8(rgyud): zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o// de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / bka' drin rtsol zhing snyan par brjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros
289b1(rgyud): ba yang dbang du 'gyur ba te/ 'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar bcas pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te// kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas// @
289b2(rgyud): kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang // arka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sngar la mig sman bsdu bar bya'o// mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang // rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o// thal ba dang lhan cig
289b3(rgyud): mig la bsku bar bya ste// rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de// gal te pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dkrongs pa lag so// 
289b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pas med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba glang gi gi wang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar
289b5(rgyud): thig le yong su bzung ste// gang bltas pa de dbang du byed// de nas gzhan/ yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun ma/ ngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig byas pas
289b6(rgyud): dpral bar sa rtsis byas la byin te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa ni mi spong ba dang / gzhon du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang / rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyar bar 'gyur ba mar khu chen pos
289b7(rgyud): nye bar byugs lo// sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par byo'o// bzlas pa'i mtharas su btags pas mdag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byin pa de lnga por yong mi spong // de nas gzhan yang
289b8(rgyud): sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba les par chags pa'i dusu sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brten pa byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rag tu dregs ma nyi sa
290a1(rgyud): sbyin te/ ji srid du sbyar yang cesu 'branga'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis ma ngan pa la la lan brgyad yongasu 'azlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rnamaH/ 
290a2(rgyud): dang / lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur// oM tI re d+had+hur tu ra a mu ka s+ya ban+d+han mu k+Shi ku ru muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne ru la'i 'du
290a3(rgyud): bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyuraro// de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu ba sha da par bya'o// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis pas kyis rgol ba tha~Md tshar gcod
290a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// lha mo phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma// sku mdog dkar ba yid 'phrog ma// skra byed du yig chu skyes ni/ na tu dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa gnyis par pad+ma mdog da/ 
290a5(rgyud): ba yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje skyil krung su gnas pa/ rgyan tha~Md kyis nor brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o// oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga'
290a6(rgyud): bar byed ni/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas yis sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur// mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bstan
290a7(rgyud): bcos thams cad shes par byed// 'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re la tshigs bshad brgya brgya byed par 'gyuraro// rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya yang 'dzin par byed do// de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa/ 
290a8(rgyud): oM bcu mu d+hA bar+d+hani/ tA la~M trAl me d+hA bAr+d+ha ni/ d+ha d+hi ri bad+ha badz+ra ni sAhA/ 'ami zer ban/ sngags 'das bdun du mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ ma bslangs pa sings po sgyur ba ji srid zla ba drug du gang 'jungs pa
290b1(rgyud): shes rab chen por 'gyuraro// de nas rdo rje skyob dpon gyis// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags// sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub// dal zhing zab mo chos dang ldan// thaMd rig par
290b2(rgyud): mkhas dang bcas// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing // rab gnas gtor mo'i pha rol son// de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/ nyan thos spyod pa srung ba po// sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang // gzugs
290b3(rgyud): ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan// rtsa ba'i ltung 'joms papo// sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan bla mar bcas nas ni// gang
290b4(rgyud): zhig bla ma smong byed cing // skye bo bla ma smod pa gang // dmya la ba chen por 'chal bar 'gyur// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// 
290b5(rgyud): ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya// bla mo'i grib ma bud med dang // lha ma dang stan dang mal stan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'gro/ dbyed na// skyes pa de ni spu gri 'dzin// legs par dbang bskur slob ma
290b6(rgyud): gang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas// g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis// brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las// khongs ma mdzen
290b7(rgyud): chen po can// dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur// de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin// bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na// dngos grub rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs
290b8(rgyud): gyi bas ni rtag tu bya// ni ba la sogs rab tu bskul// snga bar dge 'dun chos ston bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // de yi rnaM suM tshogs kun ma'o// bdag gi lasan
291a1(rgyud): brtsams nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// yan lag rgyan rnams kun gyis brgya'o// rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma btang // me tog bdug spos ma
291a2(rgyud): me dang // de bzhin dri yi dung sogs g.yas// g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon sdod// mdun du snod ni bzhag par bya// zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin// lA s+ye li sogs
291a3(rgyud): mchod pa yis// mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin// me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang // dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul los dang // sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang // byugs pa'i lus kyis rje su dris// lA s+ye
291a4(rgyud): lag pa lnga skye ste// phreng bas phreng ba'i mkha 'gro mo// glu yis hUM gi dam tshig glu/ brla bskums pas ni gar nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med// sangs rgyas thaM mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnams
291a5(rgyud): ni mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' zhing // rtag tu 'khor ba'i/ pha rol 'gro// rdo rje mkha 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med mchod
291a6(rgyud): ba'o// me tog spos sogs mngon sum du// 'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min// de nyid byang chub yan lag min// dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod// ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub tha
291a7(rgyud): la/ dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste// tha ma'i las la nag por// zhib la ni me tog dkar// ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la// me tog nag po tha ma la// dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang // rnal 'byor pa gang dbang
291a8(rgyud): bskur med// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang // gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang // gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol ta// de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med// gang gis slob don
291b1(rgyud): gsol ma btab// 'dir ni rig su skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// gang gis byang chub mthong na// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnasu de'i// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'o// yang nas yi bdag po
291b2(rgyud): nyid/ dag pa'i gan su mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang mkha' gro dang // dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye// 'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa// sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag yon po / 
291b3(rgyud): med rgas pas khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag/ sgra gcan me dang rlung dang ni// 'dod pa'i lha dang thong ldan nyid// 'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur// lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za
291b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang mi// mi 'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang // de rnam sa 'khor 'gyur the tshom med// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rigs dang byang chub byed pa dang // 
291b5(rgyud): dbazhin du ni lhar gshegs dang // khyim nas 'thung ba byed pa dang // rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang // skye ba yong su len da dang // yong su mya ngan 'das bston// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'di ni gan
291b6(rgyud): ni du ma byed// sangs rgyas sems can bskyab bzhed pas// sangs rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad// ri bong stag dang seng ge dang // glang po rnams kyi rig su yang // snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// phyag rgyas
291b7(rgyud): grub pa skye bar 'gyur// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'dod chags can la chos gsung // bud med sgyum sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin gzugasu// bud
291b8(rgyud): med rtag tu yang dag gnas// sgyu mtshan mo gnas 'dug nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster// g.yo zhing dang mo ngo cha med// rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro// dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster// gzugs
292a1(rgyud): dang yon tan nor la yang // 'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med// rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang // bde gshegs bka'
292a2(rgyud): las mi 'da' zhing // bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can// kye'i rdo rje rab phye ba'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gtso mo dang / mkha'agro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa// zhe sdang rdo rje
292a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// ser sna rdo rjes bdag la skyobs// 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol// yid dang phrag dog chen po dang // rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon// las rnams
292a4(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa po// rdo rje can kun dgyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te// dbyangs 'di gsungs pa// thig skud sar pa mdzes
292a5(rgyud): par ldan// shin tu tshad ma gtsang ma yis// he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol pa gdab pa'i dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs
292a6(rgyud): pa tha zhi// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
292a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin to// nga ni snying rje stobs dang ldan// srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba po// rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus// sku gsung las ni skyes pa spro// gal te la la 'da' byed na// 'jig ste 'di la the tshom med// 
292a8(rgyud): lus srul po dang kha cig gang // bde chen yis 'byung ba dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes/ zur cig bgegs ni chen po rnams// 'khor lo yis ni brgyad nyid kyi// cha yis sgo ni rab tu grags/ 
292b1(rgyud): stong khang lha yi snam bu ni// sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya// sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni// ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do// rigs byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i snam bu rig byed phyed// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni// 
292b2(rgyud): gnyis par 'tshams kyi thig dang yang // gsum par ngos ni bzhi yi bzhi// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni// cha drug du ni gdab par bya// de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas// dgu yi
292b3(rgyud): char ni rab tu gdab// de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ oM khaM hUM b+h+rUM/ de la 'di ni ye shes spyan drang ba ste// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya su
292b4(rgyud): tra mA ti kra ma hUM// de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste// 'di ni chas dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni thar bar byed// kye'i rdo rje rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ 
292b5(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni sa rathA// me la mtsham su dge slong bri// chos kyi 'kho ra lo bden bral du// rlung du rdo rje dri bar bya// lcags kyu shar du bri bar bya// lho yi sgor ni nags pa nyid// nung
292b6(rgyud): de bzhin lcags sgrog ste// byang du rdo rje dril bu'o// dbus su thod pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba rdo rje thab khung
292b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i sreg rdzas sbyor ba las// zlum por zhi bar byed par brjod// rgyas par ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs// dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra// dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsad dang
292b8(rgyud): zhe sdang las la ni// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan dang // yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis// tsan dan a ga ruM shing dang // gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis/ 
293a1(rgyud): sbyin sgeg yan lags pas// phyis ni sang ni dgug pa gyu// oM e kyai ma b+hu de ba 'i rnaMngs ma gr-id+hid+d+ha A Ad+hAr sam+b+hi ts+tsha toH5// sngags su nyid kyis dgug rgya/ 
293a2(rgyud): zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing // lcags sgrog gis ni zhags dag bcing // dril bu 'khor bas dbang du byas// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa brgyad// mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba
293a3(rgyud): las// yang ni me ni mnyes par bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste// oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA// de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste// oM sarba pA pad ha na badz+ra ya satwA s+ya sarba pA paM
293a4(rgyud): da ha swA hA// de la 'di ni sreg rdzas thaMd 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te// oM badz+nyA na la ma hA b+hU te dz+wA la ye/ sarba b+hAsmI ku ru sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M a ha~M/ byi nas rang
293a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha gaM wan+ni ha b+hak+Sha Na sa ma yi na tsa a gan+d+ha sam+b+ha ti tsi pU dza d+hA drA pra sid+d+ha me// de la 'dzin dgyes pi 'dam tshig ste// oM kr-i to baHsarba satwAn+taHsid+d+had+hat+tA ye thA nu gA gats+tsha d+hA
293a6(rgyud): bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM bu na rA ga ma nA ya muH// bzhengs pa dang / las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang // sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni// 'jig rten
293a7(rgyud): tha snyad la gnas te// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// dang po ra shig rig ma 'dzin// dril bu 'khor bar 'dod pa dang // rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las// g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang // sod thun skad
293a8(rgyud): ni chag pa ni// gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang // rin chen sman gyis yongs gang ba'i// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// oM de wa bi nu badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ moM mo ha ra ti mad+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ e rA gar
293b1(rgyud): Ni a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM bad+hA ra ti sa d+hi Sh+Tha/ o badz+ra ga rI A kar+tha yadza mo badz+ran dA pra be sha ya n+tu/ oM bad+yA/ tA sI ban+d+ha ya T+Ta/ oM badz+ra d+ha.A rIrba gyi ku hoH// 'di ni rjes dgug pa'i choga'o// mun pa lnga dang
293b2(rgyud): lnga/ khyad par du yang dri lnga dang // lus bshal la ni blugs par bya// mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya// yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya// snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mig la sogs par gti mug
293b3(rgyud): sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// dbang ni rang gis rigs nyid kyis// mchod pa la sogs rim pas brtsam// rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs par bsang gtor ba// ye shes
293b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro// byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// khyod ni
293b5(rgyud): nal 'byor mtshogs yongasu bskor// khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog mnyes pa// khyod kyi rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shi nga // snying rje'i thugs kyi sems can sang mdzad pa/ sku
293b6(rgyud): ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phel mdzad pa// he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes// rdo rje se gol sbyar ba yis// rdo rje sgom pa bsgom par bya// rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ 
293b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje phung po rnam par sgom// de nas rdo rje mchod pa bsam// rdo rje lce yis sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid// rdo rje'i sngags kyi bsang gtor bya// bac+doMs
293b8(rgyud): kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ri myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// stobs kyis sangs rgyas phur bu
294a1(rgyud): / gang ba/ chos 'thung grong khyer yid 'ong bar// rdo rje mdzu mo'i sbyor ba las// gal te dngos grub mi gteran// rdo rje sems dpa' bsad par bya// oM du ru ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da// bcos
294a2(rgyud): kyis pur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos// phyag rgya chen por brjed pa las/ 
294a3(rgyud): pad+ma dmar po spyi bor 'dzin// sku mdog dmar po stobs po che// gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba'i las// bcu drug phyag gi rnam par rgyan// g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma
294a4(rgyud): med// dang po dmar por shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// rdo rje chos ni gzi brjid che// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// bdud ba ni
294a5(rgyud): mnyam par mnan pa'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus pa/ nas par// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// dbu rgyan rdo rje'i/ dzin pa bsam// sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che// phyag ni bcu drug
294a6(rgyud): zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa// spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs par mdzad
294a7(rgyud): dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste// nags po dmar pos rnam par rgyan// lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma rnam par sgom// cod pan rin chen 'dzin
294a8(rgyud): bar bas ma// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// sems kyis rin chen spyi bos 'dzin// bcom gser ltar gzi brjid che// dang po'i zhal ni sem
294b1(rgyud): bo ste// g.yas pa sngon po 'dra ba'o// g.yon bzla 'od bzang po ste// lhag ma'i zhal ni bub mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin
294b2(rgyud): par bsam// mar gad ud pal mtshungs pa'o// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bcu drug phyag gi rnam par rgyan// dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te// rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa po// g.yas
294b3(rgyud): pa kha dog nag po ste// g.yon pazla mdzes dri ma med// ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin// lkog ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'don sgrol ma'i gzugs// lha mo
294b4(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod// gri gug dang ni thod pa/ 'dzin// kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ ral gri dag ni// ga pa nyid// phan par me long de bzhin// rta mgrin la ni gos bzang ste/ 
294b5(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser// rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te// mchog du phan pa nyid kyi yon// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bla ma la rtag rgyun tu dbul// bskal bzang rdo rje sems dang
294b6(rgyud): bdag/ skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad// skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang // skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos
294b7(rgyud): mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra sad+hA rA ya/ marda mdza/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka phaT swA hA// de nas sngags chen bshad pa na// rdo rje skye ba'i snying rje che// 'jigs
294b8(rgyud): shing sreg par gyur nas ni// rdo'i ngos grubar ba tu mu la// de nas bcom ldan 'des rdo chos kyi rnam ri'i ting 'dzin mi snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsus pa/ oM badz+ra bla/ 
295a1(rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro li ka phaT// de nas 'di ni bshad tsaman// rdo rje chos ni grags chen po// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// chos kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas
295a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa// oM swA shwa taM pa ra sA shwa ta e h+ye hi dzi na dzi ka phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ 
295a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs// brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas na// de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo
295a4(rgyud): rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa// oM badz+ra sUr+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma na sa ma/ yas+t+waM a haM rat+na hU~M phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// / rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// 'jigs shing brgyal bar
295a5(rgyud): gyur nas ni// nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la zhugs te// mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsung so// puHpu hi haM haM/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA// de nas
295a6(rgyud): 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de nyid de// rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs// rdo rje
295a7(rgyud): chos kyi pad+ma 'dra// nyi mi'i yid bzhin nor bu sbyin// rta mchog zhes bya de yi ni// thams cad du ni gru gsumo// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// 
295a8(rgyud): rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma// don yod grub po'i phyag rgya che// rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan// stag gi lpags pa bsnams pa dang // dbu skra thod pa byed pa ste// mchod par brtson po'i se der yis/ 
295b1(rgyud): chags pa mig dmar mthong nas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i
295b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsams// me tog 'bras sogs kyis rgyan pa// nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya// nags
295b3(rgyud): tshal du ni slong mo rgyu// zas ni bzang po rgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas ster// nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni// rdo rje can ni 'khor du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun// skye bo gang
295b4(rgyud): zhig skye 'gyur ba// gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa// rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin/ 
295b5(rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// drang srong mngon par shes pas thos// sems/ can kun gyi sems chen po// mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni// lag mthil skyu ru ra lnga bzhin// rdo rje'i sems kyis
295b6(rgyud): shes par 'gyur// skyes pa bye ba stong phrag du// rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te// nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma yis// 'dis ni snang
295b7(rgyud): bar byed par 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / phan pa nyid kyi zhi ba ste/ rdo
295b8(rgyud): nyi mas rgyas pa'o// rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas bsad par bya// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste// dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya// rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste// rdo rje char
296a1(rgyud): sprin rab bsgom bya// rjesu chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya// me yi cha sprin 'bab pa dang // gdug pa'i sems kyis bsad par bya// 'phrog pa
296a2(rgyud): las ni dkar mo ste// skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid// dpal ni sred med bu las kyang // ma bcag pa las raM b+ha nyid// rgam chu srin rgyal mtshan las// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams
296a3(rgyud): thams cad nye bar bza'o// shin du dga' ba'i sems kyi rtse// 'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthar ni swAhA sa zhi ba ste// rgyas pa'i dusu go dzaT// mthor ni hUM Ta bsod pa la// dbang dang dgug
296a4(rgyud): la dzaHdang hriH// las thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcug/ cig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje gur// rdo rje mkha 'gro rab sgrub phyir// thub pas tshig
296a5(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal to// me tog 'bras bus rgyan byas pa'i// ri khrod dang ni sman ljongasu// rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni// bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par bya// dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyab
296a6(rgyud): mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyo su
296a7(rgyud): mchi// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gi 'gron du gnyer// byang chub spyod
296a8(rgyud): mchog yid 'od spyad par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po yis// sems kyi ngal ni gso bar bya// phyi nas byang chub sems gnas te// rdo rje srub
296b1(rgyud): ba'i dmatshig/ bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis// brtag pas nye bar mi dgos te// ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod// oM shun+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tA~M// na mkha'i khams
296b2(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// hUM ni bcu yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 
296b3(rgyud): Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon// mi g.yo ba dang stobs tshon dang // gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa dang // bdud rtsi zhangabs 'og gnas pa ni// bdud rtsi sbyor bas thad
296b4(rgyud): du// khro de'i sgom pas bsgom par bya// dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru// bsams nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom
296b5(rgyud): par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// me ye dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yang ni chu ni bsgom pa ru bya// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// brtul zhugs can
296b6(rgyud): gyis dbang chen sgom// dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// bruM las gnas ni bsams nasu// rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya// ye shes lnga las byung ba yis// 
296b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las zung ba'i// rig mo'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// oM d+harma b+hU tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi
296b8(rgyud): to// mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod mo// gsung gi rdo rjes spyod ma// skul zhabs 'og gnas ma ste// oM AHhUM las
297a1(rgyud): rlu 'o//  / ma su dgas// rdon 'gro bdag med pa// ne do gnas san snang // nI la na/ Sha chung po rgos pagyu// / mnas rkun do snyam/ b+h+ya
297a2(rgyud): sgo srung ma// puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma// rdol pa g.yung mo mtsham su dgod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// 'og tu de bzhinas spyod ma// dbusu bdag med mkha 'gro me// mkha'agro dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom// 
297a3(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod pa che stsal pa// bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// dbang skur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas
297a4(rgyud): kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung bstsol bar mdzad// ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la// cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ 
297a5(rgyud): des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni// bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya// me shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang // lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi/ myang // nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las// brtul zhugs can
297a6(rgyud): gyi sngags bzlas kyang // rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur
297a7(rgyud): te// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnal 'byor mi'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor ma zhes mngon par brjod// phyag rgya chen
297a8(rgyud): bo rab sbyor las// gang phyir de nyid brten pa yi// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur // rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// 
297b1(rgyud): dga' mdzes mkha'agro ma yis mtsho// mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang // dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI// shin tu dgyes rol gsang yig 'phrog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro pan rgyud brgyad// kyai rdo rje sangs rgyas
297b2(rgyud): kun// gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'khor lo sdom pa gur gyi 'byung gnas ni// rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ni rab tu grags// skyes bu rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag
297b3(rgyud): bshad// btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do// man pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya ba rnal 'byor de lta ga la// sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor gong
297b4(rgyud): med de lta ga la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom// ldan 'das la gsol pa// re shig bdag cag gi yu la rnams ni 'tshal na// sems can gzhan rnams
297b5(rgyud): kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa snying rje tha dad med// gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos
297b6(rgyud): dang ni// dge 'dun gyis yang bstan pa'o// mu stegs can sun dbyung ba dang // rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang // rang gi sde'i gzhung mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bdag gi byang
297b7(rgyud): chub thob pa'i phyir// gang phyir gzhan dag bsgral ba'i phyir// des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// chos dbyings
297b8(rgyud): bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni// thabs dang shes rab 'dus po yis// des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang // rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
298a1(rgyud): 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te// tshig 'di skad smras pa// e ma kun tu bzang po yi// bstan pa na mkha' las byung ba// na mkha'i dbusu sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya
298a2(rgyud): mtsho nyan par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// bde ba chen po rnam 'phel bas// dam tshig thams cad bshad par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni// 
298a3(rgyud): glu gar rol mo sgra byed pas// dri dang phreng 'a byug pa yis// rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas// ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya// ji ltar gan su gnas nas kyang // 
298a4(rgyud): yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba 'i sbyor ba dang // bzang po'i rgyal gyis brgyan pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis// dam pa de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// 
298a5(rgyud): rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang // rtag tu de bzhin gshes/ so pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje 'dzin sbyin
298a6(rgyud): bla ma nyid// ji ltar na mkha' rgya mtsho che// ji ltar thub pa rgya mtsho chos// ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po// de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod// des na 'bad pa thaMd kyis// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che// dge ba
298a7(rgyud): mchog tu gsal ba po// nam yang smad par mi bya'o// rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa'o// mkha' gro bdag med
298a8(rgyud): mas 'khyud pas// bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya// rdo rje'i gzugasu bzhag nas ni// ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa yis// rig 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid// dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dri/ 
298b1(rgyud): lnga yang dag blangs na su// rdzas lnga dang ni bsgre bar bya// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gur gum a ga ru ldan pa// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// ril bu
298b2(rgyud): kha ru bcug byas nas// nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar
298b3(rgyud): po kha che dang // dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni// lcags gsum gyis ni dkri byas pa// rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// tsa ni'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las// gu gus
298b4(rgyud): lcags kyis dkris pa ni// mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas// rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya
298b5(rgyud): rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ba bla'i sa bon ldan pa dang // stag gi lpags pa'i chil bu mnye// sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par
298b6(rgyud): 'gyur// yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// dbang po'i brag phug 'gram du ni// rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis// lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya// oM Di'i yul du nye ba na// a mra 'bras chen po yi ni// 
298b7(rgyud): rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis// rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje se de rgyal po che// yang nas yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs// rdo
298b8(rgyud): gnod mdzes sku chen po// phyag gnyis nal ni gcig pa can// sdig mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang // kha dog nag por bsgom par bya// rdo rje mdzod ni blangs nas ni// rnam pa thaMd bsgom par bya// mi bskyod
299a1(rgyud): pa yi yang dag mnan// puHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do// rab tu byung ba dang mig sman rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs
299a2(rgyud): thos nas// dga' zhing mgu bskyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smraso// e ma ho rdo rje// e ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa// snying po med pa'i chu
299a3(rgyud): shing la// ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa// de ltar snying po med lus la// dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no// na mkha' 'thung po thams cad dang // chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te// sems ni nam
299a4(rgyud): lta bur dag/ dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde// don dam dbang po/ 'i rang bzhin gyis// sems las pha rol 'gyur ba med// gzugs sogs so sor 'dod pa yi// sems nyid du ni 'dod par
299a5(rgyud): bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad ji ltar sems stong la// sems las phyi rol gyi don
299a6(rgyud): sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis// phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags// sems kyis thams cad rnam par brtags
299a7(rgyud): sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// shin tu gzhin mdzes mig yangs ma// si la ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas// dbang du
299a8(rgyud): gtsug par bya nas ni// glanas po zung bar yang dag brtsam// darje las 'byas shing // de rnga nyid pas mnye pa bya// de rje 'byung bas yang dag zung // rdo rjem ma su ba bcing bya// de ma tshom
299b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya// rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis// rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'// phyi nas de yi bde can du// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhugs par bya// rdo rje 'ching ba'i sbyor ba
299b2(rgyud): yis// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la// sems ni brtul zhugs can gyi dbrog/ pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya// pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can// pad+ma dmar pos khyad
299b3(rgyud): par du'o// dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// rgyal mtshan ga pur mchod pa ni// 'di ni brtson 'grus bde chen dang // stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang // mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten
299b4(rgyud): 'di ni dbang du byed// gang gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang // gang gis sems can bsad byas dang // gang gis slob dbo na smod pa dang // sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams// lcags
299b5(rgyud): glu yis ni yang dag dgug/ lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing // / zhags pas mgrin pa dam por bcing // rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya// mkha'agro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni/ 
299b6(rgyud): de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste// 'di ste sdig pa chen po ste// ma nir med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// 'di ni dmyal ba chen
299b7(rgyud): por ltung // de ltar bsams nas bsad par bya// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams na su// namakha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje dbyigs pas brdung byas nas// rdo rje can gyi gnasu skyo// lcags kyu
299b8(rgyud): la sogs mi nus na// zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing // de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag/ Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / 
300a1(rgyud): stobs kyi rgyal po che gsum pa// mi g.yo gri tse'i dkyil 'khor can// rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// tha dbugs
300a2(rgyud): dbyung rab gsol bas// dam tshig rdo rje srung don du/ spras pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa// rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che// thams cad zhal cig phyag gnyis pa// snying khar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mjug/ 
300a3(rgyud): g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar// gshin rje gsod pa'i shig to can// gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje dbyig/ rngamagrin la ni dbang mchog dmar// mi byed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las// Tak+ki rgyal po lcag
300a4(rgyud): kyu ste/ dbyig sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtseg sum pa// mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse// tshang skyob rgyal po rgyal po la// chos kyi 'khor lo rnar sgom
300a5(rgyud): gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la// zhags g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// / dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar// mthar byed rnam par ba sgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni// 'jigs
300a6(rgyud): byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra// pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid gnag/ mtshams kyi khro bo cher gnag tsong // spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan// gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te/ 
300a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dbyig pa can// pad+ma'i khro bo rnams gzigs rjes// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// 'og tu pad+ma'i
300a8(rgyud): gdan bsams naso// khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya// ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su// bcu byed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de// bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas// dkyil 'khor lngagro/ 
300b1(rgyud): po bsgom par bya// srung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsamo// srung ba'i dam tshig stobs kyi
300b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po// rang gi byin rlabs rims gnas te// rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid las ni bshad par bya/ 
300b3(rgyud): snying gi dbusu zla bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcos pas// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab// de las rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdag med mkha 'gro ma// cho gas
300b4(rgyud): bskul bas bsgom par bya// mkha' gro sna yi mthar gnas pa// yungs kar tsam du rnam par sgom// yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// de
300b5(rgyud): ltar sgom par byed pa yi// rang gi byin rlabs rab tu 'grub// ga zugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa// der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni// mi 'dzin de phyir bdag
300b6(rgyud): gzhan med// ji ltar rdor pad las byung ba// zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod// rba rlabs med cing snang ba med// rnam rtog med cing yi ge med// myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i/ 
300b7(rgyud): bdag gi bdag nyid mi rib bo// dga' bral dga'ang ngag gi mthar// rtog pa'i dra rnam par spangs// 'gyur med 'khrul ba las 'das shing // kye'i rdo rje rnam par gsal// bems min rnam pa he ru ka
300b8(rgyud): rnam pa khams kyis yongasu bskor// rang nyid mgon po he ru ka/ de yis bdag nyid mi rig cing // de yis dus na thams cad rig/ 'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni// rang gi kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs// sangs rgyas sangs
301a1(rgyud): sras po dang // yan lag kun dang bug kun// mgon po dra ba'i skud par bcas// lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing // skad cig kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin// ji ltar na mkha'
301a2(rgyud): gzigs shing // mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang // gos pa med cing 'khrul pa med// sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs// ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni// rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa// de bzhin
301a3(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru ka'i// rnam pa lta bur gsal bar mthong // de nyid don dang dbang po dang // phung po na mkha' lta bur yod// lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing // 'du byed rnams kyis zil mi mnon// gzugs ni
301a4(rgyud): mig gi mi 'dzin te// sgra ni thos pa po yi min// lce yis ron mi tshor te// dri ni sna yis yang ma yin// reg bya lus kyi gong bus min// 'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni// bud med bzang mo
301a5(rgyud): reg pas bde// rna bas glu yis bde bas bzang // snum pas dri yis bde ba che// skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang // ro yi sa pa tung ba'i sbyor ba las// gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed// 
301a6(rgyud): bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab// bde ba ma rtogs mi sheso// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// mkha 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang // sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni// bde bar phyin cing rnam par bsad/ 
301a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig 'di skad smras pa// phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags// phal pa'i
301a8(rgyud): gnas skabs gzhol ba'i phyir// sgom pa yang ni sgom pa min// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin de// 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs
301b1(rgyud): ba'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lus can sgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i
301b2(rgyud): bdag pa dgos pa yod do// bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do// sangs rgyas nyid ci lags// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci
301b3(rgyud): lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa'o// de ci'i
301b4(rgyud): slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no// phyag na rdo rje sa gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid me long
301b5(rgyud): lta bu'i ye shes so// me long lte bu'i ye shes de ci lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzu na pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa
301b6(rgyud): ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtogs pa'i yis dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// de'i phyir byang chub
301b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra shig/ nga nyid dngos dang dngos me dang // dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod// gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog/ zab mo ni
301b8(rgyud): ba'i chos dang ldan// sems dpa' chen po he ru// bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba// bde chen las ni bems mi ning // 'jig rten kun rdzob bems bong // skyes pa bud med ma ning dang // 'gro
302a1(rgyud): bang yis yang dag khyag/ de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid// rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad// rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams// ma ning gnasu yang dag grub// gang zhig lha mo bdag med// 
302a2(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni btsun mo yin// sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin// de nyid phyir nam ning ste// 'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid dang // shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis// mi
302a3(rgyud): bskyod med cing bdag ma'ang med// dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga'
302a4(rgyud): bachen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa// phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas// zhal cig ral pa 'dzin pa dang // brgyad gnyis lo dang ser mo ni// rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub// dpa' bo'i
302a5(rgyud): g.yas par mda' nyid de// lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid/ gsum par me long rig par bya// lag pa g.yon par ga/ zhu nyid de// gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid// kaM ke
302a6(rgyud): l+li yal ga ste// phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas par ni// bu mo'i snying khar bsams nas ni// rdo rje btsun mo 'grub par 'gyur// mda' yis 'o ma 'dzin pa
302a7(rgyud): 'bigs// a sho ka yis snying khar brab// ral gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya// de nas me lo// stan par bya// gzhu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni// u dpal zhags pas dgug par bya// skra grol/ 
302a8(rgyud): 'ong bar yod pa dang // snyan pi skad ni rab tu smra// he dang si ni byed pa mo// rangs shing yan lag tshod dmas rgyan// kho na so rtsis gang ba dang // 'dod stobs dang bral ba bsams// rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor/ 
302b1(rgyud): ba yis// mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya// 'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas// de yi snying ni bskul bar bya// oM a mu k+Shi me Ar+yA ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaHde ltar sgom pa byas pa yis// 'jam
302b2(rgyud): ba'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni// sgrub po la 'dod pa dang // dbang du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur// zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa khri yis sbyor ba las// g.yo ba gser gyi rnacham// shin tu dag
302b3(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis sgrub// haM gi sa bon las skyes pa// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// chang gis btung ba'i rab sbyor bas// rdo rje yan lag med pa sgrub// ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni// bde da
302b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi// sem das can thaMd dga' bar byed// 'di ni srog ni chen po ste// ma chog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal rtag
302b5(rgyud): tuda'i// dran pa de ltar rab tu grags// mya ngan 'dod chags de ba ni na gdungs// dga' dong dga' bral de bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nyid dbyangs yig drug par brjod// 
302b6(rgyud): ba byed pas yang dag ldan// thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod// sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste// rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
302b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems dpa' med cing sgom pa ste// sngags med lha
302b8(rgyud): yang med pa ste// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba// 'di ni byang chub rim brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsod nams med cing sdig pa med// byang chub med
303a1(rgyud): cing sangs rgyas med// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod
303a2(rgyud): ma yin// 'gro ba gsum po thad med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// sgom pa dang ni sgom pa med// bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// kun rdzong 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 
303a3(rgyud): dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa// rtag tu 'jig rten po nyid 'khor// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa// mi byed
303a4(rgyud): namakha' lta bu ste// zab cing ni ba'i rang bzhin ni// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sgyu ma ji ltar me long ltar/ 
303a5(rgyud): nam mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar// ji ltar dngos po yongs pa// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das namakha 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to// stong nyid rje
303a6(rgyud): med dam pa'i gnas// rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// ji srid ma zhig bar du ni// sems kyi rang bzhin sgom par gyis// ma mA ki'o// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di de bde chen rdo rje ste// gang
303a7(rgyud): zhig yid kyis sgom pas sgom// de ni mchog gis sgom pas sgom// spyan gyi'o// sngags dang yi ge rnam par spangs// 'di ni sems med thig le med// 'di de dam pa'i bde chen ste// bri ba med cing gang ba
303a8(rgyud): med// gos dkar mo'i'o// gzugs brtan rang bzhin ji lta bar// de ltar dngos po bsgom par bya// stong nyid dri med mchog gis gnas// de ni bsod nams sdig pa med// sgrol ma'i'o// ji ltar
303b1(rgyud): chu nang zla ba ste// bden min brdzun pa min pa ltar// de ltar dkyil 'khor lo yi// lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med// 'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sna
303b2(rgyud): tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// mnga' gzhu char 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // muHts+tsha Di dang ser rna yis// chang gzungs khu chung
303b3(rgyud): bzung po yis// g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis// bsnams pas ngagra rnams bsdigs par bya// yan lag kos kor bzung nas ni// mtshon pa'i khu chur bzung nas ni// hUM gis mda' ni btang bya
303b4(rgyud): zhing // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya// brla ni bskum par byas nas ni// lus ni dbugs kyis dgang par bya// lus la khu tshur bzung nas ni// brang ni rgyas pa nyid du bya/ 
303b5(rgyud): sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya// hUM gis kha ni dgang ba dang // g.yas rkyang la sogs sbyor ba yis// gshin rje srin po bsad par bya// 'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya// kun
303b6(rgyud): rdzob du ni bsdus pa tsam// gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang // de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rol mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rol mo'i sgra'i sgrog
303b7(rgyud): ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // tha hi tha hi/ tha ka thaM ka/ thu ba thutha/ thA hi thA hi/ ba hi ba hi/ u D+haM ud+h-i/ kaM ka kaM kr-i ka/ tha ka tha ka/ tsiT+Te ti d+hai/ ta Da wa ta ra wa NI/ 
303b8(rgyud): yang dang ni rnga dang yang // rdza rnga kha cig pi wang rgyas// mngar ba can dang gling bu dang // rgyud gsum ka ra ta ka ni// rnam gsum brdungs pas brdungs par bya// chung ngur brdungs pas rgyal bas te/ 
304a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsol gdang la gsol ba// mchod pa 'di ni rngan med// ngagi cigs cad mdzin// bstan pa 'dzidzin cigag bya// ji snyed ngol mo dun thos// don rdo la tshol/ 
304a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdug spos kyi mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // tsan dan nyid dang gur gum dang // drag
304a3(rgyud): shun de bzhin 'dod ma ni// 'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che// he ru ka la rab tu dngul// gtsor dang kum nyid// de bzhin du yang sgra sgra nyid// bdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni// phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya/ 
304a4(rgyud): kun du ru dang po la ka/ ri dwags lte bsen mo ni// rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di// kun la mi 'jigs gur gum dang / de// shra t+yA'i yi sha thI dang // sha lI dza dang shi la ka/ 'jig rten
304a5(rgyud): mgon gyi bdug pa 'di// rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// / sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du// sna tshogs rdo rje mchod las// bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di// kun tu stobs kyi bsgrub
304a6(rgyud): pa ste// ji srid dri yi bstan bcos su// gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug pa mchog/ de kun phyag na rdo rje'o// rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya
304a7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje gar 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // gus bcas dang por sgeg par ldan// dang po rtse bcas rjes rgyu bas// rkang stabs brgyad du/ 
304a8(rgyud): cho ga yis// rdo rje gom pas rol pa bya// me tog snyim pa'i sbyor ba dang // spos kyi yal ga'i sbyor ba dang // mar me sdong po'i lag tshul dang // yang ni thug pa'i lugs dang ni// mig lani/ 
304b1(rgyud): de bzhin bang dang // nang pa'i do su 'thor ni// gdung ba'i sbyor bas rol bya// de bzhin du yang g.yon pa so// denas rgyun gyi ga byas nas// g.yon pas mang ni ga bya zhing // myung du rdul
304b2(rgyud): pas de bzhin gar// byas nas 'khor lo lta bur bskor// phyi nas gru bani dgang par bya// byinas 'dzod pa'i lag pas bskor// sal brus ni gnyis bcugs nas// log pas mchod mi gas
304b3(rgyud): bar+yabya// ji snyed gar gyi bstan bco su// byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni// de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sgeg pas byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mnyes par
304b4(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi// sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas/ 
304b5(rgyud): bzang po'i rgyan gyi rnam par brgyan// thams cad 'byor pa'am dmigs nas ni// bems po'i gnas su sri ga lugs bya// shar lho byang dang nub phyogasu// phyogs
304b6(rgyud): gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya// phyogs bral rnamasu lha mo rnams// dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya// yid kyi mar khu bsams pa dang // 'bras so chags med 'bras dang ni// 'bru dang zho yi
304b7(rgyud): zan dang ni// til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i shing // dur ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyin bsreg bya// de la 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te// oM ag+na ye swAhA// mar gyi'o/ 
304b8(rgyud): sarba pA pad ha na badz+rA ya badz+nyA satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha swA hA// ti la nag pa'i'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swAhA// 'bras mchog pa'i'o// oM sarbas pa de swA hA// zho dang can dam pa'i re// oM badz+ra bI dzA ya swAhA/ 
305a1(rgyud): 'bras so par// oM ma hA gA ya swAt+ma// nas kyi'o// oM ma hA ba lA ya swAhA// mon sran gre'i'o// oM badz+ra lAswa re swAhA// gronga'o// oM badz+ra A muShe swAhA// du
305a2(rgyud): ba gzhon nu'i'o// oM badz+ra a pra ti hata badz+ra ya swA hA// ku shi'i'o// oM badz+ra yadz+nyA ya swA hA// u dum pa ra'i'o// oM kro d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swAhA// byang chub kyi shing giro// oM badz+ra la tA ya swA hA/ 
305a3(rgyud): lakA'i'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swAhA// n+ya gro de'i'o// oM sa ha kA rA ya swA hA// a mr-i'a'o// tsam pa a sho kA ya kU/ ka dam pa dang srid sgrub nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas// ma tog
305a4(rgyud): 'dis ni sbyin bsreg bya// dgun 'brum amra sbrul 'jig dang // khe 'dzag skyes ma brtse ma ni// 'khor lo lnga yin cho ga rim pas// 'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin bsreg bya// sha rdza
305a5(rgyud): dang ni bdud rtsi nyid// dkyil 'khor lnga yi sgom pa yis// 'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// ye shes me ni rab dgye sa bya// rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang // gser gyi mnga'
305a6(rgyud): bdag mnyes pa dang // pad+ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang // lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang // tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen dang // khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang // thong ldan nyid dang 'dod lnga
305a7(rgyud): dang // zla ba nyi ma gdong gzhan dang // sa ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang // lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang // chos rgyal dang ni klu dang ni// dri za lha ma ni mi 'am ci// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas
305a8(rgyud): ba'i lha// 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang skyo nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang // gang zhig bdag pa'i gnas son dang // 'od
305b1(rgyud): zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang // mi 'byed kham su gnas pa dang // gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang // gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang // snod ldan sems can 'jig rten dang // lcug ma'i
