342b1(rgyud): de skad ces pos nas bcom ldan 'das mnye ba 'bum phrag bdun du cu gnyis kyi mkha 'gro ma dang bcas pas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te khrag dron mos mchod ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mkha 'gro/ 
342b2(rgyud): ma thams cad kyis phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs te cang mi smra bar bzhugaso// yang dam dur khyad pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan rnal 'byor ma yi bdag
342b3(rgyud): cung zad bdag la the tshom skyes// gang zhig dkyil 'khor chog ni// rtsa ba yi ni rgyud du bshad// bdag dang gzhan gyi gnas de ni// sngar ni bdag gis ma sheso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
342b4(rgyud): bdag gi gnas dang gzhan de bzhin// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// gzhan gyi gnas ni d+ha gar brjod// bdag gis gnas ni snying po'o// sgo yi phyi rol gzhan gyi gnas/ 
342b5(rgyud): bdag gi gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro// yang na gzhan gnas sbyor ba/ yin// nye ba'i sbyor ba mtho ris zhesu bstan// de bzhin du yang nga mi yul sbyor// nye ba'i sbyor bas 'og ste// mtho ris/ 
342b6(rgyud): chos kyi snying pad+ma// nye ba'i sbyor ba ri rab rtse// mi yul lte ba'i lte ba'o// sa 'og sprul pa'i snying po ste// ri rab rtse mo gsang sna'o// de ltar gzhan ni gsang chen po// yang dag gzhan du ngas ma
342b7(rgyud): bshad/ 'bad de de ni bsrung bya ste// su la yang ni mi sbyin// rnal 'byor ma rgyud dbang phyug rgya la// rnal 'byor ma la bshad par bya// yang na sems dpa' chen po 'di// legs par brtags nas ga #
342b8(rgyud): dpal he ru ka chen po'i dbang po'i dang po grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgya
343a1(rgyud): po'i mnga' bdag/ thams cad mkhyen pas kyang rnyed par dka' ba// rmad du byung ba'i rmang du byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u skye nyi shurtsa brgyad pa'o// // dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le
343a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag ces bya ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal sngar gi chos kyi ye shes dang
343a3(rgyud): phyug mtshams dgra btsam gyis dad cing gus pas zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gar+b+ha nA ma yo gai nI ma hA tan+da rA dza ya rA dza/ bod skad du/ 
343a4(rgyud): dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyaga'atshal lo// 'di skad bdag gos bris pa dus gcig na/ 
343a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grwa ngas kyi ma' 'gro dang / mkha 'groms yong su bskor nas b+ha gu la chen po'i bskyed mo'i tshal na bzhug so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis
343a6(rgyud): lha mo legs dgyes dbang mo dang lhan cig rol pa mdzad pa'i tshe rje btsun la ba spu langaso// de'i dusu bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes kyi sbyor ba las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo
343a7(rgyud): bos phyag btsal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyid kyi sku la ba spu langs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ma de dgos pa ci zhig
343a8(rgyud): yod/ gang gi don gyi phyir nga'i sku la spu langs pa de ni gsang ba chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po lags mod kyang mchog gi dbang phyug bka' stsal pa/ nga yis
343b1(rgyud): legs dgyes kyi bde ba nyams myong ning steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i bskyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa las baspu lang so// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba bskyed
343b2(rgyud): byed ma// rnams la 'dus pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba bskyed byed ma rnams la gang zhig 'dus pa de ci'i phyir mi shes/ bcom
343b3(rgyud): ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du de ltar ni lags mod kyis/ 'on kyang mi shes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag gis ni zhuso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
343b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni so so rang gis nyam su myong ba yin/ mod kyang / 'on kyang khyod kyi ngor ngas bshad par bya ste/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba 'byung ba'i stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi
343b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi rtsa yi dra ba 'dar zhing g.yos pa tsam gyis tshul shar ro// tshul shar bas thig le'i rgyal po zhu'o// thig le'i rgyal po zhu ba las steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba bskyed byed
343b6(rgyud): ma rnams la 'dus pa'o// de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ dam du 'khyud pa byas nas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas dgyes par byas te phyin nas yang
343b7(rgyud): zhub mdzad do// kye bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dusu 'dus pa lags na/ de la sbyor ba med pa gang gi dus lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dris pa yang dag
343b8(rgyud): dgyes pa mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba// dga' bral dusu sbyor ba med// de ni dga' bral dga' ba min// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dga' bral
344a1(rgyud): gyi dga' ba dang dga' bral la khyad par ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' mo khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra// dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang dga'
344a2(rgyud): bral gnyis la khyad par cher yod pa de brjod par bya'o// gang zhig dga' bral gyi dga' bde zhu ba gnas pa ste/ 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dga' bral de ni dga' ba dang bral ba
344a3(rgyud): 'pho zhing 'jig pa'o// dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni nub gnas pa ste/ 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ rang gis nyam su myong ba'i ngo bo'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ 
344a4(rgyud): rang gis nyam su myong ba'i mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dag 'ab dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i khang par ci la gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cig
344a5(rgyud): skyes pa'i dga' ba ni dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin// gsang ba yang mo yin/ ye shes kyang ma yin/ ye shes las byung ba yang ma yin/ srid pa
344a6(rgyud): yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin/ char yang ma yin/ thig le yang ma yin/ tshul yang ma yin/ tshul tsam yang ma yin/ mchog kyang ma yin/ gzhan
344a7(rgyud): mchog kyang ma yin/ shar ba yang ma yin/ nub pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyang ma yin/ sgra yang ma yin// dri yang ma yin/ ro yang ma yin/ reg bya yang ma yin/ yi ge/ 
344a8(rgyud): yang ma yin/ rten yang ma yin/ brten pa yang ma yin/ khams kyang ma yin/ shes rab kyang ma yin/ thabs kyang ma yin/ thim pa yang ma yin/ longs spyod kyang ma yin/ dbang ma
344b1(rgyud): yang ma yin/ sprul pa yang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ longs spyod kyang ma yin/ lus kyang ma yin/ ngag kyang ma yin/ yid kyang ma yin/ rnam pathad dang rnam par bral ba/ mi bzad pa/ 
344b2(rgyud): dri ma med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtag tu shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang las rnyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
344b3(rgyud): dga' bral gyi dga' ba nyam su myong ba las rnyed de/ de bzhin du bsam gtan la sogs pas ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de/ dga' bral gyi dga'
344b4(rgyud): ba'i nyam su myong ba'i rgyu lags sam 'bras bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cig skye sa pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin te 'bras bu ni ma yin no// bcom ldan
344b5(rgyud): 'das mas gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub pa'i lhan ci ga skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos pos dgos pa ci mchis// rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar sreg pa la
344b6(rgyud): dud pa bzhi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad du smra ba ni tshad ma ma yin te/ dang por sreg pa med par der dud pa 'byung ba gang las 'ong / de lta bu'i rigs las lhan cig
344b7(rgyud): skyes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de ltar lags na lhan cig skyes pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin na// 'on kyang 'dir rgyu ni gnyi su dbye ba dang / 
344b8(rgyud): 'bras bu yang gnyi su dbye ste/ gsal ba'i rgyu dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// 'bras bu yang de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsal ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba dang / 
345a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gsang ba'i rgyu ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste/ ji ltar mar me bzhin no// 'thung ba'i rgyuni dag
345a2(rgyud): ba las mchog gi dga' ba ste/ ji ltar sa bon las myu gu bzhin no// dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i rgyu ma yin te/ dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba yino// 
345a3(rgyud): dpal ye shes snying po las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ gang zhig dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyud kyi
345a4(rgyud): rgyal po las phyag rgya chen po'i don bstan pa de thob par bya dba'i don du de'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' su ral du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis
345a5(rgyud): bdag la zhus pa gang // nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad/ phyag rgya chen po ni 'dir bzhir dbye ba ste// las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang
345a6(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya'o// gang zhig las kyi phyag rgya ni snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa'o// gang zhig dam tshig gi phyag rgya de ni snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'o// 
345a7(rgyud): gang zhig ye shes kyi phyag rgya de ni snang ba thob pa'i rang bzhin khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'o// gang zhig chos kyi phyag rgya de ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no// phyag rgya chen po de yang 'od gsal ma yin pa
345a8(rgyud): gzhan las mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal zhes 'gyi ba ji ltar lags/ gang du gnas pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od
345b1(rgyud): gsal ni na mkha'i dbusu gnas pa'i thig le'i ngo bo ste de ni phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ re shig 'od gsal ni ji ltar rnyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
345b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ las dang dam tshig dang ye shes dang chos kyi phyag rgyaso// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ phyag rgya rnams nyid ni gang las rnyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
345b3(rgyud): stsal pa/ dbang bskur ba'i phyi'i phyag rgya la brten nas nang gi phyag rgya rnams rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol/ phyi dang nang gi phyag rgya de gnas gang du gnas par 'gyur/ mtshan ni ji
345b4(rgyud): lta bu/ rang gi ngo bo ni ji lta bu/ der dbang ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dir dbang ni bzhi ste/ slob dpon dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab sa
345b5(rgyud): shas dang / de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// slob dpon gyi dbang ni dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa gzhon nu ma la rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par ldan pa yis nu ma dang mdza' gu ni reg par byas paso// 
345b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang ni skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la nang gi rkan yongasu 'jibs pa laso// shes rab ye shes ni khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la lhan cig srub dang bsrub pa'i
345b7(rgyud): thabs chen po las zhu ba 'pho ba'i dusu ye shes nyam su myong bso// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa ni shes rab ye shes de nyid brtan par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bstan pa yin no// brtan
345b8(rgyud): par byas pa tsam gyis drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma'i nang du phyag rgya bzhi mnyam par sbyor bar 'gyur ba yin no// de yang 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rten pa'i ngo boso// 'jug pan
346a1(rgyud): gtum mo'o// gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis rtog pa med pa'o// 'gro ba ni bya gdong ma'i rtsa'o// rten pa'i ngo bos sgrog ma'i rwa'o// don dam par phyag
346a2(rgyud): rgya chen po gcig pu ste/ 'on kyang las kyi rang bzhin gyis bzhir dbye'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams la las kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ji ltar lags/ 
346a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po ste/ las kyi bye brag gis phyag rgya chen pos thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ 
346a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po rnams kyi ming dang spyod pa ji ltar lags/ ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba ni dgod pa'o// 
346a5(rgyud): rgyas pa ni lta ba'o// dbang ni lag pas 'khyud pas// drag po ni gnyis kyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o// de rnams la spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i spyod pa dang / brtul
346a6(rgyud): zhugs chen po'i spyod pa dang / gos bral gyi brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / rang dbang gyi spyod paso// dpal ye shes snying po las phyag rgya chen po dang / dbang bskur ba don zhes bya ba'i
346a7(rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/ dbang bskur ba'i dus dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu/ slob dpon ni ji lta bus bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
346a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i dus rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba'i dbang la bla ma la dbul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rang byung gi me tog dang ldan pa'i me
346b1(rgyud): tog giso// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i bzhi mnyam gyiso// bzhi pa'i dus gzhan ma yin pa byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig dkyil 'khor gyi so// de la slob
346b2(rgyud): dpon ni mtshan thams cad kyis rgyan pa dang / rgyud thams cad mkhyen pa dang / dbang bskur ba la mkhas pa dang / thugs rje dang ldan pa dang / rgya che ba la mos pa dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / 
346b3(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub thob pa'i bla ma'i bka'i gnang ba thob pa dang / yang na rang nyid dngos grub thob pa des
346b4(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor dang / dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang / sgrub thabs la sogs pa bya'o// de bzhin du rtog ge ba la sogs pas ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye
346b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur ba'i/ da kyil 'khor mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni chad ji tsam// gtso bo bdag po yang ni gang // ngo bo gang gis
346b6(rgyud): slob ma gzung // las kyi slob dpon ji lta bu// mchod pa rnams ni ji ltar lags// bla ma'i yon ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis bdag la
346b7(rgyud): gang zhus pa// lha mo nyon cig bdag gis bshad// mtshan ma'i slob ma'i mos pas so// yang na ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// slob dpon gyi yid dang 'thad pa'o// de bzhin mtho bo'i
346b8(rgyud): sor gsum lhag pa'i khru byed dang de'i dkyil 'khor bya'o// de ni re shig mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yin te/ de'ang rnal 'byor mir rgyud kyi go rims kyis bya'o// de yang yan lag thams cad tshang
347a1(rgyud): ngo'o// de yi dbus kyi ma'i dkyil 'khor b+hu'o// de'i steng du sna tshogs rdorje ste// sna tshogs rdo'i lte ba'i nang du hUM gi rnam pa/ phyi rol tu sna tshogs pad+ma'ad
347a2(rgyud): ma brgyad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan par bya'o// de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la 'khor lo mdog dkar po dang / lhor rin po che mdog ser po dang / nub du pad+ma mdog dmar po dang
347a3(rgyud): byang du ral gri mdog ljang ku dang / me'i mtshams su rin po che'i shing dang / chu'i mtsham su se 'bru dang / rlung gi mtsham su rgyal mtshan dang / dbang ldan gyi mtsham su ka pA la'o// 
347a4(rgyud): sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dang / lhor zhags pa dang / nub tu rdo rje lU/ gas sgrog dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu'o// mtsham sa rnamasu me tog gi rgun 'byung dang / bdug spos kyi rang
347a5(rgyud): bu dang / mar me dang / dri'i dung choso// de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje phreng ba'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du hUM gi rnam pa yongasu gyur pa las/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhal gsum pa/ spyan
347a6(rgyud): gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/ rang 'od kyis rig mas 'khyud pa/ na mkha' sngon po'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ brgyad
347a7(rgyud): gnyis kyi lo dang ldan pa/ nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / rde'u chung dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'i bdag po'o// 
347a8(rgyud): mtshan ma'i skabasu dbusu rdo rje dang / dril bus bya'o// de nas slob ma sta gon byas la sman sna tshogs kyis khrus byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis ngo bos slob ma gzung bar bya'o// las kyi slob
347b1(rgyud): dpon ni bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa/ ser sna med pa/ mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'o// der mchod pa pa rnams shin tu mkhas pa/ chags pa la sogs pa dang bral ba mtshan ma rnyed pa/ dbang gsu
347b2(rgyud): thob pa'o// slob dpon la dbang bskur ba'i dusu 'am/ rgyud thogs pa'i dusu shin tu gces pa'i chung ma dang / bu mo dang / gzhan yang gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dang / glang po che dang / rta dang
347b3(rgyud): zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / na bza' du ma la sogs pa ci tsam nus pa dbul bar bya'o// nor la sogs pa yod nas gang zhig mi 'bul na de ni bskal pa stong gi bar du dmyal bar skye bar 'gyuraro// 
347b4(rgyud): longs spyod med par gyur pas kyang rang gi lus po dbul bar bya ste/ bran du byo'o// de nas ni tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// lha mos
347b5(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sang sa rgyas sam/ rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ram ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sbyin pa la sog
347b6(rgyud): pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam/ rdo rje 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang bla ma la mchod pas bsod nams chen po'i tshogs skye'o// bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa las sdig pa'i phung po
347b7(rgyud): zad de/ bla ma'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rang gi lha'i sku yang dag pa dang phrad pa thob// phrad pas yang dag pa'i man ngag gnang bar 'gyu ro// man ngag thob pa las brtson 'grus chen
347b8(rgyud): po dang ldan pa yin na// des tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyuraro// dpal ye shes snying po las dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum
348a1(rgyud): pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// mnga' bdag chen po bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
348a2(rgyud): pa/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor dge ba ni// nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// dra ba dra phyed rkun 'phyang dang // 'dod yon rin chen la sogs rgyan// de yi
348a3(rgyud): dbusu gzhan ni bdag/ zhal bzang khyod dang lhan cig go// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum ut+pal sngon po'i mdog/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dang // sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan// zhi ba chen
348a4(rgyud): po'i rang bzhin can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// 'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan// rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis na bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu rje chung dang // ka pA la dang Shadz+ra
348a5(rgyud): banabs// zhal gzhan ser dang dmar dang ldang // lha mo khyod kyang bdag gi mdog/ zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum pa// phyag ba/ nyis gri gug pang snod 'dzin// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan
348a6(rgyud): po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa// 'di yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// 'khor ni gang lags grangs mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig khyod kyis bdag la
348a7(rgyud): zhus// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir dpa' chen po// shes rab yan lag mas 'khyud cing // mtsham su rdo rje ma mo ba na// sgor ni khros pa'i lha mo bzhi/ 
348a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa// de rnams la bskyed pa'i cho ga ni gang // mdog dang phyag rgya dang bzhugs thabs la sogs ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod dang bdag
348b1(rgyud): rol pa mdza cing / drub pa dang srub pa'i babs chen por sbyor ba'i dga' ba'i rtags las dang ngo chen po tshangs pa zhes bya ba phyag bani ba/ zhal gsus ba/ spyan gsum pa/ gser gyi myodog nyi sa'i dkyim
348b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/ ral pa'iri cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ shes rab ma'i yan lag gis 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// rdo rje dang / dril bu
348b3(rgyud): dang / rde'u chung dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ shar gyi 'dab ma ro// yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyis mchog gi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po khyab 'jug ces bya ba mar ka ta'i mdog
348b4(rgyud): lhag ma ni tshangs pa bzhin du byang du'o// yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen/ po drag po zhes bya ba mdog nag po khyab 'jug bzhin nub tu'o// 
348b5(rgyud): yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtag/ sa las dpa' bo chen po dbang phyug ces bya ba mdog dkar po khyab 'jug bzhin l-I phyog su'o// pad+ma'i mtsham su dri zhim
348b6(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i bum pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lngas bkang pi ra ka pA la bzhi'o// yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi ro brgyad las me'i mtsham su dpa' mo chen mo dkar mo'o// chu'i mtsham su
348b7(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub mo bai DUR+Ya'i mdog/ rlung gi mtsham su dus mtshan man mkha' sngon po'i mdog go// dbang ldan gyi mtsham su gau rI mdog ser po'o// thams cad kyang shin tu lang tshol bab pa zhal
348b8(rgyud): gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ phyogs kyis gos can/ gri gug dang / ka pA la dang
349a1(rgyud): kha T+wA~M ga dang / rje'u chung bsnams pa'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje gtum mo nin ga mo chen mo'i mdog go// byang skong rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ser mo'i mdog go// nub sgor rdo rje sngam
349a2(rgyud): dmar mo chen mo'i mdog go/ lnga sgor rdo rje tsartsi ka ljang ku'i mdog go/ phyag bzhi/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ na bza' spangs pa rim pa bzhin du/ na mkha' lding dang / seng
349a3(rgyud): ge dang / stag dang / ma he'i steng na gnas pa'o// phyag rgya lngas rgyan pa/ mgo chen po'i chun po 'phyang ba 'dzin pa// 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ dbu skyes 'bar ga/ 
349a4(rgyud): sgra chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/ ral gri dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ka pA la dang / kha dz+rag bsnams pa/ rang 'od kyi thabs dpa' khyud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
349a5(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag ma ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag rang rang gi mdog dang
349a6(rgyud): pa ste// 'on kyang khyod bzhin du zhal gcig po'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ rnal 'byor rgyun du rnyed pa dka'// dgyes pa thams cad grub byed cing // sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa'i tshul/ 
349a7(rgyud): mdzad// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan khyod dang bdag bskyed pa'i// sa bon gang lags snying po ci// nye ba'i snying po ji lta bu// 'khor gyi sngags ni ji ltar lags// bcom
349a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis bdag la gang zhig zhus// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// sa bon la sde'i bdun pa ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa// lha mo chen mo thig
349b1(rgyud): le ldan// khyod kyis bon rab mchog gi/ ya sde'i sa bon brgyad pa ni// dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa// dbu ni thig le yis ni rgyan// bdag gi sa bon rab mdog/ de nis bon gnyis ka rab// tham da
349b2(rgyud): dbang du byed pa ni// lus can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// skye ba dang ni sdud byed do// drug pa brgyad pa bzhi pa dang // bcu gnyis pa dang bcu dang nyi// dang por oM hUM Ta mthar// bdag gi snying po rab tu
349b3(rgyud): mchog/ nyi shu pa dang bcu gnyis mkha'// dang po dang ni bcu drug nyi// dbang po tshangs pa sku phaT mthar// khyod kyi snying po dgyes pa mchog/ dang por oM dang hUM phaT mthar// dbus ming dang spel ba ni// tshogs
349b4(rgyud): kun gyi ni sngags yin te// mchod pa'i dus mchod par bya// oM sarba mA ra bi mdzan mahA bI ra rA dza hUM hUM phaT paT// skal ldan mo de khyod kyi ni// he snying po drag po che// oM mchis tsa ha~M/ ke le ke
349b5(rgyud): le sarba dosta pra b+hA dza ka hUM hUM phaT phaT/ pad+ma'i zhal de bdag gi ni// 'od chen nye ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ sngags 'di la nus pa'i mthu ci tsam zhig mchis lags// bac+doMs
349b6(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ grub pa tsam gyis khams gsum thad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// rnal 'byor pa khro bo'i lta bas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byed na/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po la bu la 'bum phrag gcig gis
349b7(rgyud): gsod par byed do// ni ba'i tshul gyis bzlas pa byas na grangs med pa'i nang dang / nyon mongs pa dang / dbul po dang / mdze dang / phol mil 'jig par byed// phra mo'i grub pa brgyad skad cig gsu bod// gzhan
349b8(rgyud): yang las du ma rje su 'brang bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs pa rgyas dbang ma stan las langs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// 'khor yad dang ldan cam
